review: Superbe appartement, bien decore et tres propre a deux pas d une station de metro. Quartier ds le 9eme tres agreable. Tres bonne communication avec l hote. Super sejour. Merci Pierre-Antoine !

Pierre-Antoine à notre disposition avec plusieurs messages de bienvenue et nous indiquant rester dispo si besoin.

9ème arrondisst. Mon quartier préféré.

Pierre-Antoine super dispo pour la remise des clés et le départ.

J'ai passé un trés agréable séjour dans l'appartement de Marcin. Dés le premier contact, Marcin s'est montré cordial et attentionné. Il a préparé mon arrivée avec soin, et j'ai trouvé un appartement trés propre, fonctionnel, avec un charmant jardin, mais aussi personnalisé et "vivant" avec des livres, des DVD...le plus que l'on attend d'un logement Airbnb.
Le logement est idéalement situé au sein d'une résidence sécurisée, dans un quartier calme et agréable, et proche de tout.
Je relèverai pour finir la gentillesse de Marcin que je n'ai malheurement pas rencontré, mais qui s'est toujours montré prévenant, poli, et joignable.

Very nice and cozy flat just beneath Sacré Coeur. My girlfriend had a very good time in Paris and just a few steps away from the Métro. The hoss were very nice and always with a reachable by phone and very helpful. Thank you very much Marion and Max :)

Super weekend, merci Marion. L'appartement est cosy et l'emplacement est idéal, directement à coté de la butte Montmartre, avec pleins de restaurants autour! Merci également pour la bouteille, c'était une arrivée très sympathique. Je recommande cet endroit pour les futurs voyageurs :)

El apartamento de Marion es muy acogedor, limpio y cómodo. Además su localización es fantástica, en un barrio lleno de vida y precioso. La acogida que tuvimos fue inmejorable y su amigo Reda es un encanto. Recomiendo totalmente alojarse en su apartamento.
Manon was very easy to work with and super accommodating.  Her place was tastefully decorated and it’s location was perfect.  We highly recommend!
A lovely spacious apartment in a great neighborhood! Really enjoyed our stay.

Manon's place was great! Checking in and out of the place was super easy. The apartment was clean and larger than expected. There's a washing machine for your clothes if needed. All the other essential amenities were there as well such as bath towels and toilet paper. The location was in a more quiet side of town though there are a couple of bars at the end of the block as well as a bakery right across the street. There's also a market next door for any essentials and larger ones 3-4 blocks away. Getting to places like the Louvre and Effel Tower required transferring once on the metro and generally took about 20-30 minutes to get to. We were able to wonder around the area and walked into the area of Bastille in about 20 minutes. If you're looking for a place that's a little less busy and lively, this is the place for you!

It was a pleasure staying at Manon’s apartment! Great central location in the happening 11th arrondissement, quiet, clean, good light overlooking a garden, with plants blooming in the springtime. I would definitely recommend her place!
Enjoyed staying at Manon’s place. Great space and perfect location explore Paris from.

We really liked Manon’s apartment. It is in a really good location for the Marais and for the Canal St Martin/Oberkampf areas, and also close to two metro lines. What we really loved was how quiet it was, it looks over a peaceful internal courtyard garden. The photos don’t do justice to the main room, which is comfortable and well equipped. As others have mentioned, the loo cubicle is tiny, but it wasn’t a problem for us. We would happily stay here again.
Comfortable apartment in a great location. Would recommend.
Recommend!

Very good location, uncomplicated check in and check out. The flat itself is very cosy and nice, especially bright and wonderfully quiet. It corresponds to the pictures. Only the toilet is a bit cramped (approx. 80x80 cm). 
We loved to be there. Highly recommended.

We had a very nice journey in one of the most beautiful cities in the world. Manon's 2room appartement was clean, well equipped and located in a good corner to grab some food and to easily start the day to explore Paris. 
She was also very courteous and tried to help when there have been any kind of issues. So I can definitely recommend a stay at her place if you are a couple or at max 2 people.
Everytring was just perfect.
This is my 3rd time to stay at Manon's place and it tells everything to prove how nice her place and she is! Thanks a lot!
This is my second time to stay here so it says enough how much I like Manon’s place!

Had a wonderful 10 nights stay at Manon’s quiet and delightful place located in a perfect area. Really loved the garden view! The apartment is well equipped and spotlessly clean. 
Although I did not get the chance to meet Manon, I have to say that she’s an amazing host, communication was perfect. 
Couldn’t wish for a better stay in Paris- highly recommended!
Manon is really a wonderful host and her place is just perfect!

Manon' s place is amazing! We really fell in love with it!
It has everything you need and IT IS exactly like the photos. And still when we arrived we were positively surprised. It is full of light and the view to a small intenal garden is really soothing....
We (unfortunetely) didn't get to know Manon in person but she was always available to answer our queries. Check-in / Check-out was as smooth as it gets.
The shower and bed are great and the apartment is quiet at nights - that is ultra important when you are literally walking around Paris all day and need a place to relax and rest.
Her apartment is situated in a great neighborhood, close to 2 subway stations less than 5 minutes walking, supermarkets, boulangeries and cute little restaurants.
We would definitely recommend her place over, and over, and over again... :)

We absolutely loved our stay at Manon's place! We were in Paris for New Years Eve and we were so happy with our decision to stay here. The apartment is a very close walk to the metro, which was super convenient for us and made it easy to get around, but also far enough away from the crowds and busy part of the city. The area was quiet and calm but had everything we needed (supermarkets, restaurants) and was right around the corner from Le Marais. The apartment itself had everything we needed! The kitchen was nice and modern, cute living room and a nice sized bedroom and bathroom. It was very clean and modern. The only slightest issues we had were trying to figure out the wi-fi and heater when we first arrived, but Manon responded to our email within minutes and was very helpful. We loved our stay here and would absolutely recommend it!

Great apartment. Spatious, comfortable, well-lit, quiet and with a fully equipped kitchen. Very convenient location by Le Marais, well-connected through 3  different subway stations that are less than a block away and also steps away from a supermarket. The host was very attentive and waited for us in the apartment until past midnight so we could check in after a late flight. Would definitely recommend it.
Great location

Super apartment in a great area.
The host, Manon is very nice and easy to communicate with.
I wholeheartedly recommend this for a Paris vacation.
Super bien placé et Marine est très accueillante -indirectement -dans son appartement !
Très bien situé, petit lieu charmant et plein d’attention. Prendre en compte la mezzanine, super agréable et jolie, mais il faut pouvoir y grimper. J’y retournerai pour ma part avec plaisir.
Lovely apartment, very clean and quiet in a nice neighborhood. Delphine is the perfect host and her house feels like home in Paris! Highly recommended!
Beautiful apartment in a lovely neighborhood with plenty of bars and restaurants and easy access to main transport lines! Loved staying here!
Delphine was really sweet and careful. The house is beyond clean and confortable. The location is perfect as is near by everything in the center.

I loved my stay here! The apartment is super clean, beautifully decorated and has all amenities for a city trip or long stay. It is located near metro stations, restaurants, bars and some of the main sights of Paris but not noisy at all! I can highly recommend staying here!
Petit appartement confortable dans un bel immeuble 18ème.

Sophie est une hôte charmante et disponible. Elle s’est montré à notre écoute et nous a communiqué d’excellentes adresses dans le quartier. L’appartement tout neuf dans un très Bel immeuble est bien agence. Dans une rue calme et à 2 pas de toutes les commodites. Un petit Havre de paix dans le 10eme, ce quartier riche en mixité et sympathique. Nous avons passé un agréable moment chez Sophie.

Appartement très agréable, propre et situé dans un quartier plein de charme. 
La communication avec notre hôte a été simple et rapide. 
Je recommande

C'est la seconde fois que je loge chez Pepa. Tout s'est très bien passé de nouveau, tout est très simple et la communication très rapide!
Je recommande grandement!

Je suis venu à Paris pour des raisons professionnelles et ai logé dans l'appartement de Pepa.
J'y ai passé un très bon séjour. La vue depuis l'appart est magnifique, de nuit comme de jour, un luxe!

L'appart était propre et agréable. 
La gestion des clés par un concierge est idéale!

Je recommande vivement cet appartement, et n'hésiterai pas à regarder cet appart en priorité pour un prochain retour à Paris.
房间可以看见美丽的巴黎全景，视野非常好，Pepa特别好，给我们留下了许多好吃的，非常感谢她，推荐入住这里

Je remercie Maximilien et son amie pour nous avoir louer ce magnifique appartement ! Il est parfaitement conforme à sa description !
Ajoutez à cela, des hôtes très arrangeant au niveau des horaires. Je n'ai rien à dire si ce n'est merci.
Very nice apartment, close to many chic restaurants and groceries. 10 mins walk to Printemps and Lafayette if you want shopping. The closest tube station is just 3 mins away. Highly recommend!
Ellie was really easy to deal with, very sweet and considerate. Her place was very clean and tidy, quiet, and located centrally in Montmartre.
Great Location! Super close to the metro/ bus stations and is very safe. It can just get very hot in the summer with no AC, but otherwise my friend and I had an amazing stay.

Adorable studio apartment, good location, great patisserie just around the corner, monoprix just down the road. There’s also a street market on a couple days of the week, literally outside the front door of the apartment complex. Walking distance to the Eiffel Tower (just over 20 minutes) and metro stations all over to get everywhere else. 
 We loved our stay, and would definitely stay here again. 
 Just be prepared for the stairs, it’s a 4th/5th floor walk up. (Which I believe is noted, and was fine for us.  If you have difficulty with lots of stairs, you’ll need to look elsewhere)

 🖤
We had a great stay in Paris. It is a cozy, little flat, located near cafes and shops. The area is not too touristy. The flat is clean and equipped with everything you need for a short stay.

Great place in the center of Paris. Only one adjustment, the location is actually 153 Rue St Charles. Oh and note that it doesnt have wifi and its up 4 flights of stairs (but manageable). But other than those, the place is great and Christine is nice and responds fairly quickly. Perfect place to base in Paris

We enjoyed our stay at Christine's apartment a lot! It is really comfortable. There is a supermarket & a bakery right next door and the metro is nearby as well. Christine is very friendly and answered our mails quickly! Highly recommendable!
This flat is very nice. All the comforts you would need for a base for your sightseeing in Paris. It is small but that is the norm in Paris at this very affordable price.
Muy buena
Petit studio fonctionnel et très agréable au calme, Christine donne toutes les infos nécessaires à votre séjour
L’appartamento si trova in un quartiere tranquilla e la sua posizione é ottima per visitare Parigi. Christine é stata molto disponibile! Ve lo consiglio!
Ubytovaní skvěle, vše pobliž centra. Můžu jen doporučit

Très joli petit appartement au calme. Confortable et agréable 
pas de WiFi et pas de tv
Cristine est une hôte incroyablement douce et gentille.  Elle nous a beaucoup aidé pendant notre séjour là-bas.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, 15 minutos a pé da torre Eiffel, próximo a estações de metrô. Muito limpo e agradável!
Christine est très bien organisée et le logement est très calme. Un emplacement parfait. Je recommande ce studio et Christine.
Ótima localização, 20 min da torre, e próximo à estação de metrô! Rua com varios restaurantes, lojas e supermercados! Christine muito atenciosa e nos deu varias dicas! Eu recomendo!
Très bon contact. L'appartement est impeccable et à 10mn à pied du métro Javel. La Tour Eiffel est également proche.

Studio parfaitement situé et très sécure du fait de sa situation géographique car on traverse 2 cours pour y accéder. Hôte très disponible et possibilité de flexibilité sur les horaires d'arrivée et de départ qd cela est possible.
Studio très bien situé, au calme avec différents commerces.

The flat is exactly how it looks in the pictures, super clean and cosy and has everything you would need for a comfortable stay. Antoine and Pauline are extremely responsive if you have any issues and reply within minutes to messages. The area is really good if you want to stay out of the really busy tourist areas and there are nice parks nearby for walks, as well as plenty of amenities.
Would definitely stay again - Thanks guys!

Notre séjour était parfait !! votre logement est très agréable et chaleureux, il dispose de tous le confort et même plus. Le système de coffre en libre accès pour récupérer et déposer les clefs est super pratique. Un grand merci pour votre accueil, nous remettrons ça dès que possible :) 
Jean-Philippe et Lili
Super séjour chez Pauline et Antoine!!! Très bel appartement bien décoré, équipé, le tout au calme! Tout était fait pour que ça soit simple pour nous! Je recommande !
Appartement au top! Propre et soigné! Superbe décoration. On s’y sent comme chez soi. Localisation parfaite nous le recommandons vivement.

Lucas est un hôte très accueillant avec de jolies attentions et suggestions. L'appartement est très bien conçu, très clair, donnant sur une jolie petite cour arborée et silencieuse, d'autant plus appréciable que le quartier est très animé avec de nombreux  cafés et bistrots sympathiques. 
L'adresse est idéalement située tant pour le tourisme que le shopping. 
Je recommande absolument !
This was my second time staying here, I absolutely love Tissem’s cozy perfect apartment and the neighborhood that surrounds it.

Tissem’s apartment is warm and lovely and has a very calm energy. I had a very relaxing stay here and would recommend it to anyone looking for a quiet place in a beautiful neighborhood. The area is wonderful because it isn’t crowded, and has everything you could possibly need. A very quick metro ride on line 11 will bring you to Republique and other major areas in Paris if that’s what you’re looking for. The bed is comfortable, the decor is cool, and there aren’t too many stairs to climb to reach the apartment, all in all it’s perfect and highly recommended!

We had a very pleasant stay at Hania's place. It's close to the Metro, which is great for exploring the city, but one can also get around by foot pretty easily. Though we didn't meet her in person, our communication over AirBNB was nice and her neighbour and a friend of hers took care of the keys. Hania also offered us a rather late checkout time in the afternoon, which was really convenient for us. All in all, we're really happy with our choice.

What a perfect week at Alexandre's amazing apartment! Alexandre met us at his apartment, toured us around, and gave us helpful suggestions regarding the neighborhood. He even followed up with us during the week to make sure everything was going well. The apartment was even more lovely in person than in the pictures. The living room skylight - amazing. The architecture and furnishings were perfect! Everything was in working order: the kitchen just right, the bathroom large and luxurious(think spa-like), the balcony a treat to sit on and watch the neighborhood in action. Street noise in the apartment - not an issue. And the black out shutters assured a great evening's sleep. For us, we were in the perfect location. Local cafes and bistros, markets, patisseries, and walking distance to just about everything. The Quatre de Septembre metro station literally outside the front door. What else to say? I hope to visit Paris with Alexandre's apartment as home base in the very near future!

I have stayed at my fair share of airbnbs in Paris over the years, and Alex's apartment next to the Opera was by far the most enjoyable. On the top floor of a beautiful building with an elevator, the apartment has been fully renovated to expose the ancient structural rafters and add depth to the rooms. The charm is palpable.  There are multiple skylights and windows everywhere that bring lots of natural light into the apartment, not to mention the balcony that extends the full length of the apartment where you can get direct sunlight all morning. The apartment is very spacious, as listed in the description, and the bathroom is amazing with the largest shower I've seen in Paris. Alex keeps the apartment super clean so not recommended for messy people. Otherwise do not hesitate you will have an amazing stay. The closest metro (4 Septembre) is literally 20 steps from the entrance.

Alex was a great host, made me feel very much at home. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures, I loved all the little details. It is a very spacious, very clean and altogether a super charming place in the heart of the city. Everything is just steps away: great restaurants, shops, sights, taxis. I would definitely like to go back to this apartment, I had a wonderful time.

We had an absolutely fantastic stay. The apartment was fantastic. Exactly like the photos. Very spacious. Easy access with elevator. Great views from balcony. Shower and bathroom spacious and plenty of hot water and good pressure. Plus Wifi. Amazing!
The place is amazingly located and even better looking than on the online profile. Highly recommended.

Lucie's apartment is in a most interesting part of Paris - lots of young people, cafes, markets and places to walk.  An area we always choose to stay in.  The apartment has an up-to-date, modern kitchen and bathroom and they were both immaculately clean.  We stayed a month and were very comfortable there.  There was a huge amount of storage and a lot of clean linens and towels.  Lucie made us very welcome.
Appartement très cosy et plein de charme. Entièrement rénové avec goût. Idéal pour un week end en amoureux.
Great location, cozy space. However, host was uncommunicative about several issues that arose - no bath towels, etc.
The place is absolutely adorable and is in a great area! Definitely a special place, would highly recommend a stay :)

Perfect location in the heart of Paris. Many restaurants, cafés and shops nearby giving the great vibe of the city. Jane was really responsive and the flat is very cute and clean! The balcony is a plus !
Only thing to keep in mind: it's on the last floor and there is no lift.
Such a nice place to stay.
L’appartement est bien situé, au calme et le petit  balcon très agréable. En revanche, l’agencement de l’appartement est très différent des photos et encombré, la propreté laisse à désirer.
房东真的很好呀，去的时候有很多问题问她，她都回答的很快呀，所以入住还挺顺利的。房子位置真的很好呀，走路到卢浮宫就10分钟，不到10分钟就能到蓬皮杜中心，从CDG机场坐RER B可以坐到这里走10分钟就到了，就是如果行李很多的话爬楼梯真的挺累的，我们每人就一个背包所以感觉就还行，附近很多吃的，还有超市，买东西真的很方便。主要问题就是热水不够用啊，我们两个人洗，其中一个人容易洗不完。

The Appartment was very clean and easy to find. The Florence and Johan answered very fast everytime we had a question, the communication was very easy. The flat was small but still very comfortable and the cat/dog Charlie is really a good Guy, we liked him a lot. 
All in all a very positive experience :)
Charmant petit studio bien placé, propre, bon rapport qualité prix avec un chat adorable. Je recommande!
Appartement très agréable, très propre. Les hôtes sont sympas et disponibles, et charlie, le chat, est très mignon.

Florence est une hôte vraiment aux petits soins.
Malgré une réservation de dernière minute, elle et son ami ont tout réglé pour que notre séjour se passe au mieux.
Toujours très dispo.
Merci de nous avoir permis de passer un super week-end sur Paris.
Et bonjour à Charlie ;)

We had a lovely time in Paris, especially thanks to this great apartment and warm hospitality of Mathilde and Emmanuel. The flat is super chic, very cosy, clean and equipped with everything you need. The location and neighborhood are super good, don’t miss the exceptionally good bakery right at the corner!

I absolutely loved my stay here! The apartment is super cute, and really feels like a home - so many stylish little touches. Everything was sparkling clean, and the towels and amenities were beautifully laid out when I arrived. It's in a great location, just a couple of minutes from Republique and all the metro lines, and easy walking distance from the Marais. Lots of supermarkets and cute cafes nearby. The apartment itself is dead quiet, which I loved as it meant I always got a great night's sleep (the bed is really comfy, too). I never wanted to leave!

Joli appartement au calme idéalement situé à deux pas de la place de la République et du Canal Saint Martin.
Malthide est réactive. L'arrivée comme le départ furent simple.
Je recommande vivement.
This place is lovely and conveniently located in the 16th, such a beautiful and lively neighborhood. We feel very fortunate to experience the city like this!

Located in a very nice neighborhood with cafes/supermarket/public transportation nearby. Has a nice balcony to sit- the host is very nice and allowed us to check in and have the place early! Great place to stay in Paris
非常非常棒的房间
bon accueil très sympathique
Laëtitia est une hôte prévenante, son appart est très bien situé, clair et accueillant, top.

Really nice apartment with a cool design that had everything we needed. Located in a nice neighborhood and close to the metro and other key spots.
Stéphanie was very reactive and helpful whenever we needed anything.
Amazing apartment with a good price close to the main attractions of Montmartre! The apartment is very well maintained and furnished, I really felt home!

Stephanie was super nice and responded almost immediately. She gave me an entire list of different things to do/places to eat in the area, which was super helpful, because I was there for work and did not have much time to get to know the area on my own. 
The bed is super comfy and the two big windows make the place very bright. Stephanie added lots of sweet little touches like different plants and books, which made it feel really like a home. Will definitely try to come again!
This was a very nice spot to stay
L'appartement est cisy, lumineux et calme

Great location; great host. As other reviews have pointed out, apartment is near  Villiers metro station (a couple of blocks away) and rue du Levi, an open air food market. Traditional flat in comfortable shape. Pierre met us himself at the flat, showed us how various items worked, was there to answer any questions. An intelligent and caring host. Highly recommend.

This was my first time using Airbnb and I could not have asked for a better place! Location was ideal with a street market down the road where we’d grab breakfast every day. Pierre was a wonderful host who greeted us with a clean flat, map of Paris, fast WiFi, and television. Flat is very spacious for 4 people. He also provided us with towels and allowed us to use any of his appliances. Building had an elevator as well.

The apartment is very cozy, the place is wonderful not only for the sightseeing, but for living. The apartment has wonderful position in the city, it's easy and fast to go everywhere. There is an elevator that is such rare to find in Paris. The district is very safe and pleasantly quiet. And the most important: the host! Pierre is very welcomming as well as helping, he really cares about his guests. He was available every day any time. The apartment has all the nessecaries: from the furniture to small things such as towels and soap. Thanks, Pierre!

Pierre is a fantastic host with extra flexible check in and check out time.
He is vey easy to communicate with and is very helpful in all regards (even helping carrying luggages).
The place itself is great with all amenities on site and even more so: Pierre has offered a fridge full of items including wine.

Clean and bright 1 bedroom apartment with a very considerate host.  Close to the Metro and one block from a market-like street with everything you we needed (groceries, pharmacies, etc) for more than a week’s stay.  Pierre provided a folding bed for our two year old, which was an amazing help.  Very clean. 
One down-side is that the walls are thin and you hear the neighbours a bit but that’s the nature of an building on this age and I’m sure they heard and tolerated our toddler more than we heard them. 
We would certainly stay here again.

Pierre was very welcoming and helpful, great communication. We travelled with a 2 year old and he helped us source a couple of toddler items. The apartment is fantastic, spacious and cool when it's hot outside. The location is ideal, close to parks and a short walk to the metro with a lively market street on the way. We'd definitely stay here again next time we are in Paris.
The best place in Paris:)

Such an amazing apartment! So much bigger than expected. Was perfect for my parents and myself with a 1.7 year-old boy. Would recommend and definitely stay again. We loved the location two - walking distance to 3 great parks.

We had a great time in Pierre's flat. Pierre is a great and responsible host. He explained all the thing clearly. The flat is very spacious and comfortable. Nearby the market and metro station, it couldn't be better! We would highly recommend this flat!
J ai passé un très bon séjour dans ce bel appartement situé tout de près d une rue commerçante. Pierre a été très accueillant et flexible. Je recommande ce Airbnb.
Super accueil pour un super séjour en plein cœur des Batignolles ! Je recommande vivement !
Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour chez Pierre l’appartement est très bien situé et spacieux

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour : Pierre nous a très bien reçus, l’appartement est plein de charme, confortable, et parfaitement adapté pour 4, le quartier est vraiment sympa.
Je recommande!

Nous avons beaucoup apprecie l'accueil chaleureux que Pierre nous a reserve, ainsi que sa discretion. L'appartement est decore avec gout, les lits sont tres comfortables, livres et systeme audio Bose apportent une touche personnelle qui font de cet endroit un 'home away from home' ideal. Localisation pres de la rue de Levis tres pratique. Merci Pierre!

Vous pouvez réserver ce logement les yeux fermés...
Ouvrez les seulement pour découvrir ce très bel appartement, et le quartier plein de charme, à pieds ou en transports.
Le logement est spacieux, il ne manque rien. 
Pierre s'est montré disponible.
Je recommande.

Il soggiorno nell'appartamento di Pierre è stato decisamente piacevole, lo spazio per tre persone è ampio ed accogliente, estremamente comodo sia a livello di allestimento sia come ubicazione.
Ritengo questo quartiere l'esempio meno banale e più tangibile della vera vita parigina. Pierre ci ha accolti con estrema gentilezza e disponibilità. 
Da ripetere assolutamente!
L appartement est conforme à la description, il est très spacieux pour 4, clair et agréable. la rue est calme proche d une rue avec tout commerce. A refaire sans hésitation.
dziękujemy za rezerwację i pobyt, wszystko przebiegło sprawnie i bez żadnych problemów. Mieszkanie odpowiadało opisowi, jest bardzo dobrze zlokalizowane, blisko stacja metra.

L'appartement de Pierre est spacieux, agréable, calme, propre et ...Frais par temps de canicule parisienne, central et bien desservi pour arpenter la capitale avec des ados.Séjour bien agréable à renouveler.
Merci Pierre.

Pierre est très agréable et arrangeant. Son appartement est très fonctionnel et très propre.
Le quartier est animé mais la rue dans lequel est l'appartement est très calme.
J'ai vécu un séjour très agréable, je reviendrais volontiers.

Stephen had some great maps for us to use. We are very greatful to have been able to stay in such a beautiful area of Paris. Fresh croissants close by and a very short walk to the metro. Merci Stephen!
Fantastic! We miss it already! Stephen was a wonderful host and the apartment is so relaxing and beautiful. Impeccably decorated, very comfortable. We would absolutely stay there again.

Stephen was a wonderful host, and his flat was absolutely beautiful. Well decorated and furnished, the flat was well lit, very clean, and comfortable to stay at. Stephen was very kind in making sure that we had everything we needed, and was responsive to any questions we had during our stay. Bed was comfortable, shower was very nice, and we cooked several nice meals in the kitchen. Wonderful flat for a getaway in Paris!

This was our second stay at Stephen's lovely apartment. He is a great host. 

The apartment is beautiful, has everything you need and is in a great spot. 

We will definitely stay here again next time we are in Paris.

Stephens flat was absolutely gorgeous!! He was kind enough to get a bottle of wine for us. We were unfortunately late when checking in, however Stephens friend stayed around until we arrived :) the flat is n a perfect location, in walking distance to so many famous sites. Can't wait to come back again!

Stephen's place was awesome! It was cozy, clean, unique, and bed was comfy. The apartment is a couple minutes walk from the public transit and only 10-15 minutes away from the Eiffel Tower. The neighbourhood itself is great with lots of great bakeries and restaurants. Stephen's hospitality helped make our stay even more memorable. He was on time when we arrived and had a gotten us a bottle of wine, a map, and told us about places to eat nearby. Thanks to his suggestion we ate at the pâtisserie Blé Sucré everyday, which turns out had the best pain au chocolat in all of Paris! Overall loved it here and didn't want to leave!

Stephens Appartement is truely wonderful. Cozy bedroom, nice bathroom- just perfect. 
Stephen was a lovely host and even welcomed us with a bottle of wine. 
The location of the flat is also a really nice area and the metro is nearby. 
We had a lovely stay at Stephens Appartement!

Stephen has been great. Kind and helpful as much as needed.
The apartment is just like the photos, perfect for two people, fully accessorized, clean, in a perfect position to visit the city.
We appreciated in particular the coffee machine, the wifi, the fully accessorized kitchen, the big shower and the comfortable bed.
We couldn't ask for more.

Stephen was so nice and kind to us and showed us where to go out for diner, the best bakery and a lot stuff more. He gave us his own and private flat, his home. The flat was very nice and cozy so we had a really good time in Paris and enjoyed our holidays.

Stephen was a great host being friendly, and helpful throughout and with excellent recommendations of local restaurants and sights. The property was in an excellent location and we thoroughly enjoyed our time both in Paris and the property. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this property to anyone.

The apartment was absolutely perfect.

Stephen was fantastic and met us when we first arrived in the city. Really warm welcome and lots of suggestions about the local area and in particular restaurants. Thanks to him, he made our stay really amazing and we will definitely be staying again...if there is availability!! :)

Thanks again Peter and Emma

Stephen is a great host. He meet us with the key and showed us up to the apartment - which is lovely and just like the photos. 
The apartment is very comfortable and is in a great location for getting around beautiful Paris.
The bed is comfortable, shower is awesome and the kitchen is kitted out very well.
Thankyou Stephen for sharing your home with us.
Tess & Ian :)

Great appartment! Really clean, modern and super cosy. Complete kitchen to use (cooking gear, coffe machine, ...) and a big shower as well. Also the service was great, Stephen prepared some infos about the city and even put some things into the fridge to use. Wow!

Absolutely gorgeous apartment - cosy,  spotlessly clean and very conveniently located.
Very helpful host, Stephen, who had maps plus recommendations of shops and restaurants waiting for us.
Metro station 2-3 minutes walk and Bastille not much further for sightseeing, jumping on a tour bus, grabbing a bite to eat and drink or strolling through the busy food and bric-a-brac market on Sundays.
Highly recommend ♡♡♡

Stephen is a great host! We absolutely loved the apartment! It's a beautiful place, very comfortable and situated in a great neighbourhood. Stephen even had some local restaurant tips for us and helped us get our bearings. Thank you for your hospitality Stephen! Would recommend staying here :)

Stephen's apartment was amazing. It had everything we needed. It's spacious, clean and really well located. The neighbourhood is awesome. Stephen is a great guest; friendly, charming and well responding.  Highly recommendable!

Stephen's apartment is amazing. It's really lovely and very clean - the pictures are very true. We felt like home when we arrived! It's perfectly located in terms of shopping and sight seeing (the metro station is 5 mins away). Lots of restaurants and bars are just around the corner. Would definitely recommend staying at Stephen's place! He is very nice, responded immediately when we had questions etc.

From the first moment on we felt like at home! The Appartment has a really warm and cosy atmosphere, Stephen reflects that in his characteristic traits. It is precisely tidy and comfortable as shown on the pictures. Stephen welcomes us very warm and friendly and also had some cold an hot drinks prepared. He gave us a overview about the surrounding area and stays helpful during our stay. The next metro station is just a two minutes walk away. Nearby is a public bike rent, where we lend two bikes to do the paris highlights sightseeing. It was a really nice trip! We had a wonderful time in paris and are looking forward to book the apartment again on our next trip!

My wife and I had a wounderful time in the apartment. The Flat is excatly as nice and tidy as on the pictures. A real romantic getaway for couples. The location is right next to great restaurants and just 2-3 metro stations from the city center which can also be reached on foot with a longer walk.
Stephen was a very kind host: he met us at the flat to show us around, had some juice and water prepared in the fridge and also towels in the bathroom.
We are already looking forward to booking the apartment when we visit Paris again and also recomend it to anyone looking for a cosy flat.

This appartment is really lovely. We stayed here with very high temperatures but with the windows and fans it was pretty cool.
More important: very tidy and comfortable appartment. Everything you need is available. Pictures are very true.

Stephen is a relaxed person to talk and communicate and stays helpful on the background during te stay.

Location: you can do the highlights on walking distance and experience the city more than by metro. Otherwise metro is with 2min walk very close.

I surely would like to come back to this place when I am visiting Paris again, thanks a lot Stephen!
This is my second visit and each time a positive and wonderful experience. Lois is a great host and prepares for your arrival and comfort. Bravo
The apartment was exactly as described and very clean. All my needs were met and more. Louis is extremely available and his place was perfect. The view a pure delight.

Incredible! The only word fit to describe both this host and the apartment you'll be renting. The apartment is on the 12th floor with amazing views of all of Paris. While the building goes up higher it's actually right in line with the top of the Eiffel Tower so you're literally on the perfect floor. I can't tell you how great it was to have coffee in the morning on the spacious balcony with beautiful views of all of Paris in the background. The apartment also has no less than 2 grocery stores (one organic and one traditional) both right as you step outside the building. It's also just about a two minute walk away from the Metro and a 5 minute walk away from Parc de la Villette (the third largest park in Paris) along with another park that is famous among local Parisians. 

Louis is an incredibly gracious and interesting host who did everything and more to make sure I had an enjoyable stay in Paris. If you're lucky enough to get to spend some time with him as I did it will only serve to enhance your overall experience of Paris. If you don't want to be in the main bustly and crowded tourist areas but want a real Paris experience and to live like a local, this apartment and host is the place for you.

C'est mon deuxieme sejour chez Louis et les deux fois le sejour fut tres agreable. Le logement etait mieux que ce que j'attendais: un panorama impressionnant, un appartement propre, pratique. Et l'hote a des attentions delicates: un radiateur supplementaire, une machine a expresso...

Excellent apartment in an incredible location. Some of the best restaurants are nearby and the neighboring arrondissements (11 and 3) are the coolest ones in Paris by far. Gare de L’est is a two minute walk away, for quick subway trains around the city. Paris is a small city so nothing is far. 

The apartment was sparkling clean with all the amenities for my 4 week trip. The balcony is beautiful to watch the sunrise from the 6th floor. The elevator and in-unit washing machine were both life savers. 

Virginie was an excellent host, super responsive and helpful—she recommended some great restaurants to check out in the city. Would highly recommend this place if you’re looking to get a Paris experience beyond the touristy stuff.

This is a wonderful apartment and Virginie is a phenomenal host. The flat is close to a lot of great places to eat and hang out. It was easy to get around through walking or public transit. The apartment is clean, quaint, and beautiful. The three balconies made for wonderful starts and finishes to each day. Plus she had the most incredible fan which helped us get through a nasty heat wave. I would stay here again in a heart beat.
This is a good place to stay. It's clean and covinient.

Virginie's flat was perfect! Although the size of it is fairly compact, it had everything you would need to live comfortably for a few days. It's about a 5 minute walk away from the main railway station (Gare du Nord), so transportation was convenient. Her flat had a balcony overlooking the street and on the 6th floor, it was perfect just to eat a meal out there! Please be aware that the toilet is situated within the shower, so it made for an interesting experience. I'd definitely recommend her flat to all my friends and family. Her responsiveness to my messages was also very helpful!

Virginie's place is in a great location--near canal st martin, which is super fun to walk around in the evening and grab dinner/drinks. The space was very inviting, comfortable, and clean. There was also a great fan that kept us nice and cool during some hot summer nights. Fabulous place to stay in Paris!

We loved to stay at Virginie’s Home! 
This is a great place to stay if you need to be close to public transport and it’s very close to Sacre-Coeur, Moulin Rouge, …
The flat had a beautiful view, was clean and had everything you need for few days. We would return, when we are in Paris again. Thank you!
Despite a few 'quacks' to do the check in due bad luck, we had a wonderful stay and Virginie is really nice. I recommend her place.
Super appart très pratique

Le logement de Virginie est idéalement situé au coeur de la capitale; le quartier de la gare permet d'emprunter plusieurs lignes de métro ou bus, à 2 pas ... Le quartier commerçant permet aussi de faire ses emplettes facilement. Et puis Virginie est une hôtesse sympathique et arrangeante. L'appartement est trés confortable, trés propre et calme. Idéal pour un séjour de plusieurs jours dans la capitale!

Très belle appartement, bien situé dans le 10 
On se sent tout de suite comme chez Soi

Geschmackvoll eingerichtetes Apartment in super Lage. Virginie war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Der Blick aus dem Fenster versetzt sofort in Paris-Stimmung. Es ist alles da, bis auf eine Waschmaschine. Aufgrund der großen, sehr belebten Straße sollte man einen festen Schlaf haben, für mich war das kein Problem. Ich kann einen Aufenthalt empfehlen! :)
Tolle Unterkunft.. Metro ist direkt um die Ecke, absolut zu empfehlen

Virginie a tout prévu pour que ses hôtes soient confortablement installés. De plus le lieu est stratégique et permet de se déplacer dans Paris rapidement. Je recommande avec enthousiasme. Merci à Virginie.
Séjour parfait, l appartement est très beau, avec une vue magnifique et très bien placé! Virginie était disponible et très gentille. On recommande! :)

L'appartement est trés agréable a vivre, et l'été les balcons sont juste merveilleux pour  regarder la ville. L'intérieur est arrangé idéalement et avec soin, le salon est assez spacieux et on s'y sent vite comme à la maison.
De plus Virginie est une hote trés agréable qui a su arranger au mieux mon arrivée et mon départ.
A deux pied du métro, au coeur d'un quartier animé, j'aurais plaisir à revenir et à recroiser Virginie. Merci pour toi et à bientôt peut être.

Appartement trés propre, lumineux et bien situé, vue magnifique. Ai apprecié l'ascenseur et la proximité du metro et de la gare du Nord ainsi que de la brasserie en bas de l 'immeuble "la petite bougnate" ainsi que du monoprix ouvert tres tard. Virginie a été parfaite! Je recommande vivement son appartement.

Virginie m'a très bien reçu. Virginie est une personne joviale et accueillante. C'est aussi une source d'information précieuse sur son quartier et sur paris.

L'appartement est propre et très astucieusement aménagé. Il est situé proche des transports et des commerces dans un quartier très vivant et animé.

Virginie est une hôte joviale et accueillante. C'est aussi une source d'informations précieuses sur le quartier et sur la vie parisienne.

L'appartement et propre et est très astucieusement aménagé. Il est situé dans un quartier animé avec plein de commerce à proximité. Les stations de métro sont proches.

Virginie m'a reçu cordialement. Elle m'a fourni de précieux conseils sur le quartier et sur Paris. 
Son appartement est très astucieusement aménagé et est très agréable. Situé dans le dixième arrondissement, il offre des opportunités de nombreuses sorties. La proximité de la gare du nord et de l'est rend les déplacements très aisés.

Fabrice's place is exactly as described. Great location with lots to do around and close to train station if you decide to venture out to other neighborhoods. The apartment was cozy and after a day of exploring it was nice to have a comfy couch to sit on and decompressed.
beautiful place, nice and cozy. the only thing that we had an issue with was the place wasn't ready by the time of our check-in. we had to wait about 2 hours because the place was getting cleaned
Comfortable and quiet apartment with beautiful views, great location!

Fabrice’s place is SPECTACULAR! The photos of the view of the Sacré Coeur don’t do it justice! I love Montmartre and this spot was right in the heart of things with lots of cute restaurants within walking distance and easily accessible metro stations. The stairs are no fun, but he’s very clear about that in the description and the view is well worth the climb! We were sad to leave but definitely hope to be back on our next visit to Paris. 

Fabrice was always available during our trip for questions and responded quickly. Overall 10/10 experience!

We loved our stay at this Airbnb! The host, Fabrice, met with us to show us how to enter and use all amenities. He even rescheduled around our hectic schedule due to one of our trains being cancelled at the last minute. Extremely welcoming and friendly. The view is amazing (photos really do not do it justice) and the apartment is clean and as described with everything you need. Prior to booking, be aware of the flight of stairs up to the apartment! Luckily we knew ahead of time and packed lightly, but I can see it being a bother with a lot of heavy luggage. Overall 10/10 for us!!!

Fabrice’s place is wonderful! The location is super convenient- 3 min walk to the metro- and in a diverse and dynamic neighborhood. Being on the top floor the flat is absolutely quiet and peaceful, providing a perfect respite after time out and about in the city. It’s quite spacious by Paris standards, and very comfortable. And the view of Sacre Coeur out of all the windows can’t be beat - what a sight to wake up to! Fabrice was the perfect host- accommodating, flexible, friendly and communicative. He proactively checked in multiple times to make sure I was comfortable. 

Just know that the kitchen area is rather small if you intend to cook, and the stairs are real ;) The host graciously helped me with my luggage.

The value for this place is phenomenal!!  The location & VIEW to Sacre Coeur is amazing.  The Montmartre neighborhood is with a 10 min scenic walk.  Metro access is 3 mins.  The space offers a great soaking tub - a luxury for sure.  Fabrice checked in on us regularly and addressed all questions quickly.  Regarding value - you won't find a nightly rate with this kind of access to all of Paris, you are in a multicultural predominantly African Neighborhood.  There are many people congregating on the side walks around the shops.  However, after reading history on the neighborhood I found it interesting to see the multicultural shops around us.  Within mins walking towards Sacre Coeur and Montmartre the landscape changes to traditional Parisian cafes and shops.  The 5 flights of stairs are curved & circular with angled and narrow steps.  We are in our 50's and 60's and managed it fine, but with bags it's tricky. Would we stay again?  YES!!

Fábrice’s place was as described and had a lot of space to relax in after your long Paris days. The neighborhood was warm and friendly with lots of nice restaraunt a nearby. Perfect location to be out of city center and truly take in Parisian culture.

Fabrice is friendly and helpful. He gave recommendations from the airport and met us at the door.  The description is accurate and it’s quite a  haul up to the apartment with luggage. Apartment is simple and clean.  The view is better than shown with sacre coeur from bedroom. The kitchen is for convenience only, not making large meals. Montmartre is a great neighborhood that makes Paris feels smaller and friendly.  Good food near apartment. Great art history nearby. There was building construction when we were there that was inconvenient but should make it nicer in the future. Near 2 metro lines that give good access to many major landmarks in the city center and some other nice areas.

Fabrice was a thoughtful and responsive host. If you are someone who does not want to walk a lot of steps, I would keep that in mind for this place. It has a lovely view, but it is a commitment to get up to the stairs. It was great to stay in the Montmartre area. Getting on the metro to go wherever we wanted was very accessible.

Fabrice's place is very clean and comfortable, and the view is amazing. We enjoyed the neighborhodd: nice people, good restaurants and bakeries, and a short walk to the Sacre Coeur and the Metro. It was quiet at night since the windows face a courtyard, so sleeping was easy. It was a nice place to come back to after a day walking the streets of Paris.

What a charming apartment! The view really can't be beat. It is a climb up to the apartment as described, but it didn't bother us as we knew what to expect. The bed was super comfy as well.

Great neighborhood too - it's multicultural, with lots of different restaurants to try out, a few bakeries and grocery stores within 5 minutes, and just two blocks to the metro. 

Fabrice was very communicative - he met us at the apartment for check in, showed us how everything worked, and checked in to make sure everything was okay.
Great hosts, polite and responsive, provided lots of resources to help visitors. Comfortable with great view

This is really a central location to everything and everywhere we wanted to go to. It is in a much more residential neighborhood than a tourist neighborhood, which is great because it is close to some great eats. The view from the bedroom window is the highlight of this unit.
Incredibly lovely apartment! In a busy neighborhood, but the apartment itself is very quiet. Fabrice was proactive and very welcoming. Cannot recommend it enough!

Great apartment with a stunning view!  Sebastian and Fabrice were welcoming and helpful hosts. We found the recommendations in the binder were excellent. The Bordeaux wine was an unexpected but highly appreciated bonus. The area is busy during the day but is surprisingly quiet at night.  Highly recommend Fabrice's apartment if you are looking for an authentic Parisian experience!

Fabrice and his team went above and beyond to make check in flexible and easy - he even helped us understand the city transit and directions better. There was a bottle of wine and a few beverages waiting for us when we got in which was a great touch. The place itself it wonderfully convenient and easily walkable to Montmartre and nearby a metro line that gets you anywhere in the city in 15-20 minutes. It’s spacious with great views of the Sacré Coeur. The only discrepancy is that is more located in the Goutte d'Or neighborhood or Little Africa vs Montmartre like the description reads. That didn’t really matter to us - just a few more minutes of walking. We would definitely stay again!
Exactly as described like every other review. The view of Sacre Couer is even better in person, photos don’t do it Justice.

We stayed a week and loved every minute.  Exceeded all expectations. The apartment was very romantic, comfortable and surprisingly peaceful and quiet. The pictures don’t capture the beauty of the view of the Sacre Coeur from the windows on both levels.  We enjoyed coffee and croissant from the local Boulangerie in the morning and wonderful wine and cheese in the evening. Montmatre is fabulous and the metro provides easy access to the rest of of Paris. Fabrice was responsive and helpful.
Great stay, thank you!
Sharm place.  Paris stylish. Very quit and safe. Location is perfect. Enough space.
Great place! I recommend it!

Emilien and Julie's place is a real gem. Cosy and very stylisch, far away from the sterile business flats you sometimes come across on airbnb. That's the home of somebody. Good amenities (I always love when there's a coffee cooker), nice and clean, very good location, good size for a stay of a few nights or longer. We didn't cook there, but it's certainly possible. Enough grocery shops in the neighbourhood, very nice bakeries. Amazing restaurant tips from Emilien, ask him, you will not regret it.

Emilien’s flat is the best airbnb place I’ve stayed so far in my experience. It’s a beautiful and stylish space located in one of the most buzzing areas in Paris. 

There are loads of bars and cafes at your doorstop and the flat is conveniently located close to areas such as République and Le Marais. 
Emilien himself was really thoughtful and was always in contact to make sure that everything was going well during my stay.
The flat has all the necessary amenities and it’s clean and bright with loads of personal touches of its owners. 
Waking up in the beautifully lit room every morning made me feel like I was truly living this chic Parisian lifestyle! 
I highly recommend Emilien’s place.

We loved our stay at the apartment - the perfect place to stay and discover the cool 10th arrondisement. Emilien was more than helpful. We really liked his artistic, vintage taste and will definitely recommend to friends.

Die Wohnung ist so wie beschrieben. Ich war sehr zufrieden. Vom Bahnhof Gare de l'Est sind es nur wenige Minuten zu Fuß. Emilien antwortet sehr schnell. Die Schlüsselübergabe war unkompliziert und einfach.
Appartement très calme et agréable  dans un quartier vivant.

Très joli appartement, bien situé et décoré avec goût.
Émilien a été très dispo pour notre arrivée,
Merci!

J'ai vraiment apprécié le lieu, il est très calme et très agréable. L'appartement est accueillant et on y sent une atmosphère positive. J'ai aussi apprécié la rapidité des réponses à mes questions. La remise des clés a été simple et efficace.
Appartement charmant, grand, propre, bien situé, très bien décoré. Emilien et sa copine ont été très réactifs et précis pour répondre à nos questions. Je recommande vivement pour un séjour à 2 !

Nous avons passé un super moment dans l'appartement de Julie et Emilien. Un accueil très sympa, comme si nous nous connaissions déjà...
un appartement très bien situé, dans un quartier vivant et multicolore... l'impression d'être chez nous.. 
bref ne pas hésitez à y séjourner ... d'ailleurs si l'occasion se présente nous y retournions bien !!!
Appartement très agréable et très calme, nous étions très bien. Merci Emilien
This is a great place to stay at. The apartment is close to good restaurants and bakeries. We will likely come back to stay here again next time we are in Paris. Thanks Johanna!
It’s a really nice and sweet home in Paris.The location and the building is very good.And Johanna was very helpful to us.We love this house,a remarkable experience we enjoyed.

Had a great time, Johanna was a lovely host. Some things were broken from the prior guests which were a bit frustrating. Also,  cleanliness could be improved. 
Altogether, we had a lovely stay, communication and support were perfect with Johanna! Location is central, and if you're more than one person I would definitely recommend to go by uber or bolt (car sharing apps) from the airport to the place, it's faster and cheaper. Supermarkets, pharmacies, restaurants all nearby and if you want to explore the city there are also e-scooters you can use to navigate around. 
Thanks again Johanna.

Such an amazing little apartment in a nice part of town. The apartment is situated in a very quiet and quiet courtyard of a building close to plenty of conveniences. There are a couple grocery stores nearby, lots of restaurants, and many metro routes. 10 Minutes walk from Moulin Rouge, 4 minutes walk from two metro routes to get downtown (takes less than 20 minutes to metro to the Eiffel tower, Notre Dame, Louvre, etc.) and 5 minutes from a train that will take you right to Versailles. 

Johanna was very attentive and responses to any questions/concerns, and very accommodating to some changes to our travel plans!  I will definitely look to staying here again next time I am in Paris!
A very beautiful, cool place; well-conected to main attractions in Paris; the host is very friendly, responsive and helpful. Overall, had a great time!

Johanna's place is so cozy and comfortable. It's clean, and has necessary facilities. Location is good, you can easily get what you need by walk or public transport. The communication with Johanna and hospitality was perfect, everything is clear. I would recommend this place to stay in Paris, it definitely helps to fall in love with the city :)

We had a great time in Paris, also because of this great apartment. We arrived in the evening, which was no problem, because the key was deposited. Johanna described us exactly how to get to the apartment. There was a description for interesting facts about the apartment, but also information about Paris. We felt very comfortable.
Johanna would have helped us with any concerns we might have, but she kept discreetly in the background. I personally felt it was perfect because we could be very independent. It felt like our own sweet apartment in Paris! 
I would come back at any time! :)

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator
Super séjour chez Johanna, son appartement est très bien équipé, très propre, calme, le quartier est top, restaurants et magasins à proximité. Johanna est quant à elle très réactive et arrangeante.
Johanna a été très attentionnée et responsive. L’appartement est très propre et bien situé. Je recommande !

Logement cosy, propre et fonctionnel.
Communication au top avec Johanna!
Accueil, emplacement, calme et propreté : l'accord parfait pour ce bel appartement.

AU TOP!!!!!!  Johanna est une hôte formidable comme rarement on en voit. Elle a été aux petits soins dès mon arrivée dans l'appartement jusqu'à mon départ. Celui était d'ailleurs d'une propreté irréprochable. L'appartement est très calme et bénéficie d'une situation géographique idéale (proche Pigalle, Saint Lazare, les Galeries, et 3 métros sont à proximité). Je recommande à 100%. Je reviendrai à coup sur !

We had a great stay at Clara's place, which was clean, roomy and located in a great place to discover and travel about Paris. Clara was very helpful at our arrival and gave us good tips to get around. Would recommend to everyone!
A great place to stay. Clara was very welcoming and accommodating to our slight early check in. Place was clean and there was some definite thoughtful touches. I would recommend

Clara's apartment was lovely and clean - a nice big space with a good sized living room, dining area and kitchen and separate double bedroom, more than big enough for me and plenty of space for a couple or family.
Clara was a great host - very accommodating and helpful. The information such as the wifi code etc was all laid out very clearly in a welcome book.
The apartment had lots of security with 2 door codes to get into the building. The location was good for me as I could walk to Nation in about 10-15 minutes and get the direct line to Concorde where I was working every day.
I would definitely recommend staying at Clara's apartment.
This was a great place to stay at for the conference I attended.
Carla est parfaite
Super appart. Accueil chaleureux et attentionné

Un accueil exceptionnel !

Merci à toi, Clara, pour tout, l'appartement au top et les petites attentions !

Quartier au top. Appart très agréable. Hôte très sympathique et réactive. Je recommande et je reviendrai !
Merci Clara et à bientôt !

allez y , vous ne serez pas déçu, c'est un appartement parfait. 
Clara est une personne magnifique.

Es un apartamento muy bien situado, grande y muy luminoso, todo exterior rodeado de supermercados, fruterias, pastelerias, etc. Tuvimos un problema con la Tv que Clara soluciono. Es una suerte que tenga tambien aparcamiento con acceso directo al piso. Cambiaria algunas piezas de los utensilios de cocina que estan muy usados . Aunque para nosotros no fue problema si que note la ausencia de congelador, aunque tiene un frigorifico grande. Valoro nuestra estancia en el apartamento de Clara como muy positiva. Gracias
Très bonne adresse. Accueil chaleureux et personnalisé. Appartement calme,  fonctionnel et très bien situé.

Emplacement très intéressant avec Metro à 5 mn à pied, commerces dans la rue, immeuble moderne et très bien sécurisé, appartement spacieux et très clair, peu de bruit, emplacement de parking un vrai plus, tout le nécessaire de base à disposition, et jeune hôte très agréable et réactive, que de mieux ?
A stylish apartment in the heart of Paris. Justine is a wonderful host and person, offering useful tips for a wonderful stay.

The apartment was cute and the walk from the street to the apartment door felt like a movie!  We weren't inside much because we were too busy exploring, but the apartment was nice and Justine left a lovely map of local businesses and attractions.

The apartment is bigger and more lovely than the photos! Super clean, comfortable, and sunny. There’s a courtyard to walk through to get to the apartment, which makes it so quiet and special. Also, the best neighborhood for cool restaurants, coffee shops and wine bars. Can’t recommend enough!
Very cosy and french apartment.  Perfect location, perfect host, lots of places to eat. It was perfect time in Paris :)  Many thanks for host, Justine :)

If you go to Paris you can't ask for better. The flat is awesome and you can breath the real Paris. Easy check-in, super clean, nice bed. Justine leaves you a map with lots of useful information. C'était perfait! Super merci :)

Sehr schöne, gemütliche und helle Wohnung mit toller Einrichtung und viel Liebe zum Detail. Das Bad ist sehr klein, hat aber trotzdem alles, was man braucht :)
Tolle Lage mit zwei Metro-Stationen in der Nähe und guten Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Zu Fuß sind auch nette Cafés und Parks zu erreichen. Die Gastgeber waren sehr nett und es hat alles gut funktioniert. Wir waren haben uns sehr wohlgefühlt und würden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen! :)
Bel appartement, joliment décoré, très bien situé, calme et hôtes très sympathiques: je recommande

Appartement idéalement situé dans le 11eme arrondissement. 
Si vous avez peur du bruit ,ne craignez rien.  J'ai trouvé le logement aussi calme que dans ma campagne....
Lorsqu'on franchit la porte la décoration et l'odeur sont agréable, on se sent tout de suite bien. ..
La literie est confortable, le logement est très propre. 
Une carte à notre arrivés nous attendait avec une superbe légende  pour nous orienter dans le quartier et découvrir des endroits sympas....
Merci,  cela nous à permis une belle parenthèse dans nos vies,  le temps d' un we parisien entre copines. ..

We were met by Fanny's friend Pierre at the door, and he explained in detail all the things we needed to know about Fanny's apartment and the neighborhood.  The apartment is located a block away from a G20 supermarket, restaurants and cafe's, and there is easy access to the Metro.   

The nespresso coffee machine, and the small clothes washer in the kitchen made it easy to feel at home.  We loved staying at her apartment, and hope to enjoy her hospitality again in the future!

( I would also like to say that Tranquille Émile does an immaculate job of maintaining and keeping her apartment well kept and clean! )
I had a lovely experience at Fanny's apartment. The place was clean, comfortable, and eclectically decorated. I'd recommend it to anyone staying in Paris.
Fanny's apartment was absolutely lovely. Pierre was extremely helpful and very easy to get a hold of. So cute and styled with amazing things collected from around the world!
Really lovely flat - very homely! And close to metro stations so you can move around Paris easily. Everything was very smooth with checking in and out, too. Would recommend :)

Fannys Studio has a very warm and welcoming atmosphere. It was clean and we had evereything we needed. We really enjoyed our stay there! Pierre, who was looking after us while Fanny is abroad, was very friendly and uncomplicated. We woud definitly recommend it and stay there again if possible!! :-)
Everything was perfect. Lovely apartment in a great area.
Fantastic experience! The flat is great, the location is great and everything was fine. Thank you Fanny and I hope to book again soon :)
Thanks Fanny! A lovely, spacious, well equipped apartment in a great part of town.

Fin, romslig leilighet som kan anbefales! Bildene og beskrivelsene gir et godt inntrykk av leiligheten. Interessant del av byen; veldig enkelt å komme seg til sentrum (nær metro). Kan gjerne tenke meg å bo her igjen!
Innsjekking og utsjekking gikk som avtalt, ingen problemer.
Fanny n'était pas là, mais accueil très sympathique de son ami Pierre. Appartement propre, spacieux, chaleureux.
Encore une fois, la semaine a été parfaite chez Fanny. L'appartement toujours aussi agréable. Le charme parisien, le confort, et un quartier très sympa !
L'appartamento corrisponde alla descrizione. E' arredato con gusto ed è spazioso. Ben collegato con il centro di Parigi

Accueillis à l'appartement, à l'horaire souhaité, par un charmant ami de Fanny, qui nous à fait découvrir un lieu charmant, lumineux, décoré avec goût, et qui nous a aussitôt enchanté. Un sentiment d'espace, de chaleur, un lieu habité et accueillant à la fois.
Tout y est et tout fonctionne, et nous avons passé un excellent séjour. Idéal pour un couple. A proximité de la place des Fêtes et de la rue de Belleville, où l'on trouve....tout!

L'appartement est très agréable, aménagé avec goût. La cuisine est bien équipée et la salle de bain est propre et agréable. L'entrée d'immeuble aussi est très bien, ce qui n'est pas toujours le cas à Paris. Un très bon accueil en plus pour conclure une belle semaine parisienne. Merci Fanny et Pierre !
L'appartement est très agréable et le quartier fantastique. Tout était parfait!

Une adresse que je recommande fortement :)
Très joli appartement, propre et spacieux dans un quartier agréable et vivant.Fanny nous a très bien reçues et mon amie a passé un très bon séjour. Merci encore et à l'année prochaine!

If you are trying to decide if you should book this place or not just do it! This was my favorite airbnb in Paris. The interiors are beautifully decorated and they have a cute balcony where you can sit and relax. The location was close to the metro which made commuting a breeze. I highly recommend this place :)
Beautiful place in a wonderful, charming area! Great communication with Anne-Sophie. We absolutely loved staying here and would recommend to anyone.
The apartment is beautiful and conveniently located. The neighborhood is charming. Anne-Sophie was a great host and communicated quickly.

This Parisian flat was exactly as described, and the location was super close to public transit, which made traveling through Paris a breeze. Anne-Sophie was very quick in communicating with any questions I had, she allowed me to leave my bags early in the morning before check in, had a bottle of wine for me and my fiancé, and told us about a few places near the flat to eat and enjoy paris. I would definitely recommend this place and would stay here in the future.  Overall great people.
The flat is in a great area! There are plenty of shops, restaurants, and there are a few metro lines in the area, so it's really easy to get around Paris. Overall, the experience was amazing!

Anne-Sophie’s place is the best Airbnb experience I have ever had! And they have all been successful:) The Place is clean, modern and bright. Beautiful views of Parisian rooftops and even the Eiffel Tower! Very calm and cozy with all the amenities you need. Efficient and easy check-in, a wonderful experience in every way. Thank you🥂
The place was great! Awesome space in a great location
Place is great! The apartment is spacious and located near several great spots for eating, drinking, etc. Would definitely recommend and would stay again!
Merci à Anne Sophie qui a un appartement parfaitement décoré bien situé. Anne sophie a été très disponible pour répondre à nos questions. Je recommande iu.

Nous avons vraiment apprécié notre court séjour dans l'appartement d'Anne-Sophie, en tout point conforme aux photos du site. L'appartement est grand, très agréable, d'une grande proprété et la déco est classe et soignée. La situation géographique est parfaite, le quartier très animé avec beaucoup de petits commerces, bars et retaurants sympas.
Appartement agréable , confortable , lumineux . Notre hôte disponible , arrangeante , très bon séjour .

L'appartement d'Anne Sophie est vraiment une adresse à retenir !!!
Par rapport à la qualité prix du logement je n'ai jamais trouvé mieux .
L'appartement est décoré avec beaucoup de goût on s'y sent vraiment à l'aise .
Un peu comme chez des amis ...
De plus les prioritaires sont très attentionnés et particulièrement arrangeants .  
Ce qui donne un ensemble vraiment parfait .
Je n'ai rien à redire .
Je réserverais de nouveau chez Anne Sophie lors de mon prochain séjour sur Paris.
Séjour très agréable chez Anne-Sophie je la recommande vivement !!
Very charming apartment in a charming, bustling neighborhood where real Parisians live. Lou is a wonderful host. Very responsive. Highly recommended!
Lou’s place is amazing! Great location and lovely apartment. I would definitely stay again.

We stayed at Lou’s for a quick trip to Paris. Her apartment is spacious with  some great windows that open up and let in lots of light and fresh air. The location is good: close to transit, groceries and restaurants. As others have mentioned, it is up 5 flights of stairs. There is a lift being installed but not sure when it will be finished. The apartment is in a lively neighborhood so can be noisy at night. Otherwise, great value. Thanks Lou!

Lou's place was great.  Great location and very easy to get to all the main attractions in Paris.  Her apartment was spacious and very accommodating. 

Lou was a very gracious host. she provided some food, coffee and some snacks. I recommend her place!

omg! lou and her place is amazing. it’s super cute and clean and feels really like home when you’re traveling. lou was really quick to respond and help out with flexible check in. would definitely recommend. only note is the apartment is not ADA accessible.

Felt like I was a real Parisienne for 5 days. Beautiful and cozy room. I was lucky to stay at Lou’s spacious apartment with almost everything I need. Located in residential area, 5 to 8 minutes walk from metro, and I’m personally a Tour Eiffel lover, so that the metro goes straight to Trocadero without transfer was a good thing. If you have a large, heavy luggage, it might be a little workout time to walk up the stairs. But I think the apartment is working on building the elevator at the moment I was staying. I loved Lou’s apartment a lot. I’ll definitely come back. Highly highly recommend.

Lou's place was amazing! The location is great, near so many things but still on a quiet street which made for great sleeping on a comfortable bed. She was great with giving directions ahead of time and great at communicating. The kitchen has everything you could need if you desire to cook as well. Highly recommend staying here!

Enjoyed our stay in Lou's apartment,  very clean and has a lovely Parisien character.
It is in a great location, very handy to Metro and shops.

I had a very good experience staying in Lou's apartment. It's bigger than appearing on the photos, clean and well decorated. Lou is a friendly and a  responsive host, she greeted me on the arrival and was available to respond quickly to any of my questions regarding the apartment during my stay. The location is also a big  plus. It's situated in a great area with lots of bars and cafes, and despite being on a busy street, it's relatively quiet in the flat and the noise doesn't get inside the apartment.

Excellent stay in what is a real Parisian style apartment! Seamless check-in and check-out, and great communication for any questions I had. Really easy walk from Gare Du Nord and good transport options to get around the city. Also close to supermarkets and boulangeries for grabbing fresh bread for breakfast if you want to save money on eating out. The kitchen had everything I needed for meals and was new and stylish! The only downside is the street below can be a bit noisy during the day, but it was quiet at night and had a great night sleep! Would definitely recommend especially for couples and solo travellers.
Lou’s place was amazing. Well located and just a beautiful apartment. Definitely recommended.

What a wonderful week in Paris! Lou's place is a charming haven very well located for exploring Paris. The apartment is well equipped, full of light with a particularly comfortable bed  :-) I would stay again. Thanks Lou.

We had a great stay at Lou's apartment! She welcomed us at check in. The apartment was lovely and in a great location for sight seeing. We had everything we needed for a long weekend. Would definitely recommend staying!
Just lovely...friendly...very trendy Paris...great host.

Lou's place is fantastic! It's a charming and well designed Parisian apartment, with stylish details and everything we could need for a comfortable stay. The apartment was very clean, has loads of space for two people and loads of natural light, the photos don't really do it justice! We stayed for a weekend in November and the apartment was a warm and cosy home.
The location is great - a short walk from Gare du Nord (so easy for the Eurostar) and close to metro stations, making it quick and easy to get to most popular areas and sights. The road the apartment is on is full of shops and cafes, but was very quiet inside the apartment, on the top floor of the building.
Lou is an excellent host, she got back to all our messages really quickly and was flexible about checking in and out. She was really welcoming and made everything really easy. We would definitely recommend staying at Lou's!
Lou's place is amazing and locate in an perfect area. We were surprised how big the flat was when we arrived.
Super séjour chez Lou à Paris, je recommande vivement cette hôte !

Nous avons passé, mon épouse et moi, un super séjour dans l'appartement de Lou (WE du 13-15 octobre 2017) : la communication a été très bonne avant et au moment de notre arrivée (Lou nous ayant donné de bons conseils pour profiter pleinement du quartier). Le logement se trouve dans un quartier vivant avec de bonnes adresses de restaurants/cafés/bars, à moins de 5 minutes à pied du métro. L'appartement a beaucoup de cachet ; il est très lumineux avec vue sur les toits de Paris. Nous recommandons chaudement ce logement.

Très bien situé. Amateur de marche nous avons pu nous rendre visiter les endroits désirés à pied. Fonctionnel, nous avions tout le nécessaire pour le petit déjeuner que nous prenions à l'appartement et nous aurions pu cuisiner si nous avions voulu.
Calme, pour dormir et éviter le bruit matinal, il suffit de fermer les fenêtres donnant sur la rue et ouvrir une de celles donnant sur la cour.
Les escaliers jusqu'au 5eme étage se montent bien pour des personnes en forme.
Très apprécié notre séjour.
Adrien et Claude.

On se sent bien chez Lou, l'appart est très cosy et confortable.
On a une belle vue dégagée sur les toits et un lieu très lumineux.
Lou est plein de petites intentions (bouteille d'eau, chocolat, confiture,...) qui rendent votre séjour encore plus agréable.

Alexias place is so worth it! It feels very authentic and has a comforting home feel. The metro is very close by and made transportation a breeze! She was easy to communicate with! Would definitely stay here again!

Alexia is the perfect host!  I arrived very late to her flat but she was in constant contact with me to ensure that I got in okay.  During the stay she would check in with me to see if I needed anything and she also provided me with some places to visit and eat.  The flat is very nice and right by the metro making it very easy to get to wherever I needed.  I would certainly recommend this place to others.
Excellent, I recommend the place, Alexia is a great hostess and is always attentive, a pity not being able to meet her in person, it will be for the next time !!
Alexia has a great attitude and she is very kind. I recommend without any hesitation. Place is clean and cozy, all you need is there.
Agréable et très bien situé, commerces et métro en bas  de l’appartement

Super séjour chez Alexia que j’ai pu rencontrer et qui est une personne très agréable et joignable quand on a besoin.
Appartement décoré avec goût, lumineux, à 2 minutes à pied du métro et proche de toutes commodités, quartier populaire.
A recommander ++

L'appartement est très agrèable, idéal pour se sentir chez soi lors d'une petite visite. Le quartier est très vivant avec plein d'offres pour manger, des bons petits commerces... Alexia est très gentille, on sera heureux de retourner chez elle !
Logement conforme à mes attentes, propre, proche du métro, quartier très vivant.

Je recommande sans hésitation !
A deux pas du métro, et des commodités.
Appartement très propre !
Alexia est très réactive et à l'écoute des demandes.
Appartement propre et très bien situé. Alexia a été très arrangeante. Bon séjour. Je recommande.
Parfait. Je recommandes
Logement propre et bien situé, Alexia a été disponible pour repondre à mes questions durant tout le voyage.

Super réactivité et accueil à distance excellent, joli appartement très propre et conforme à la description.
Encore merci Alexia !
J'ai passé un agréable séjour chez Alexia. Très arrangeante et réactive. L'appartement est cosy, propre et juste à coté des transports. Je recommande!

Noémi’s place is perfect. It lacks nothing for a comfortable stay. While it is located in a lively neighborhood, soundproof windows make it quiet and peaceful. Restaurants, shops, Metro are all at the doorstep. I can’t imagine anyplace better!

Fantastic place. Noémi was extremely fast to reply and very friendly. The unit was spotless and has everything that you need from a nice shower,  to a well-equipped kitchen, to even a queen size bed! The location is also incredible. Right in the heart of Le Marais. The Paris Metro Line 1 is only a 5 minute walk away and will take you to or connect you to another line to go basically anywhere in the city. Would recommend her place to anyone.
Noémi was an exemplary host and the space is in an amazing location. My sister and I loved our stay there and our cozy home away from home in one of the best neighborhoods in Paris!!!

Noémi’s apartment is extremely centrally located in the Marais. The design of the studio is thoughtful and modern - it is easy to feel like you are actually living in Paris.

She was flexible about my earlier than expected arrival and gave great tips about the neighborhood. She was very responsive to all of my questions throughout my stay.

I would highly recommend staying at her place.
Perfect combination: Wonderful host, location and home. We couldn't have asked for a better place to spend 5 days in Paris. Highly recommend!

Noémi's home is simply lovely; cute and quaint. Ultimate Parisian chic. The apartment is extremely cozy, easy for guests to feel at home. It is incredibly clean as well. The apartment is small, but perfect for couples, or those traveling solo. Perfectly located neighborhood, and walking distance to some of the major attractions (I got to explore a new area of Paris, which made me fall more in love). I did not want to leave Noémi's apartment; I could have stayed there my entire trip! I have no complaints, and it's honestly the best Airbnb I've ever stayed at. Also, I had the pleasure of meeting Noémi – she is so kind, a beautiful human being with a lovely soul. She recommended great places for me to visit in the neighborhood. I wholeheartedly recommend staying here if you get the opportunity!
Amazing location. Wonderful place. Will be coming back :)

Noémi was a wonderful host. Her home was stylish, clean, well equipped and in a excellent location. She was helpful with recommending restaurants, things to see, and bakeries to try. Would highly recommend the space!
Really great location, and a nicely furnished spot. Noémi is a great host. She gave me a nice recommendation on a French steakhouse for dinner. Would stay here again my next time in Paris!
