Todo excelent, muy atenta, todo tal cual como la foto!! El unico detalle la entrada del edificio que esta un poco antiguo pero lo estan remodelando!! La cama comoda!! Ideal para estancias de unos 4 dias!!
Très bien! Super localisation!!

Es ist schon ein Abenteuer in die Wohnung zu gelangen, obwohl die Anweisungen ganz gut sind, aber jeder der es erlebt hat wird mir zustimmen. Abgesehen davon bekommt man genau was versprochen wird. Sauber, klein fein. Gerne wieder.

Super appartement pour un séjour a paris. Aucun bruit extérieur depuis l'appartement. Lit très confortable. 
L'appartement est semblable aux photos. 
Attention à la fréquentation de la rue, constitué de femme légère. 
Hormis ça, je recomande.

Catastrophique.
L’immeuble est affreux, et très dangeureux. Fils électriques dénudés apparents, j’ai eu peur pendant deux jours. Tout est horrible dans l’immeuble, la porte d’appartement n’est pas j’le indiquée. Rideaux cassés, une rallonge juste à côté des toilettes…. Rien ne va

Ubicación céntrica con metro a pocos metros de distancia ideal para poder conocer , Ines responde bastante rápido , las fotos coinciden lo que se expone en anuncio , si unas escaleras un tanto difíciles luego de unas largas caminatas por paris , pero no quita la excelente ubicación

La communication avec l'agence est correcte.
L'appartement est propre mais pas aussi frais que ne laisse entendre les photos.

Le gros points noir selon moi est l'etat de l'immeuble. Fissuré, il y a des structures en bois pour maintenir l'escalier et les murs. ce n'est vraiment pas rassurant.

Bien situé dans Paris, dans l'hypercentre. Il y a tout le nécessaire dans l'appartement ce qui est un gros plus. Literie très confortable. Cependant les parties communes ne sont pas du tout en bon état. Cela reste un appartement parisien, on entend tout ce qu'il se passe dans les appartements voisins et dans les escaliers. D'ailleurs, ceux-ci sont en très mauvais état, des marches pas droites et très étroites, très compliqué avec une valise ou lorsque vous faites beaucoup d'aller-retour (3ème étage sans ascenseur). Il est aussi a noté qu'à priori, l'équipe de ménage (ou quelqu'un d'autre avec les clés de l'appartement) est entré dans le logement pendant mon absence lors de mon séjour ce qui me semble très problématique. Inès n'y était visiblement pour rien et la discussion a toujours été très fluide avec elle.

Im Groß und Ganzen würde ich die Unterkunft nicht wieder buchen. Die einzigen Vorteile waren die Lage und das bequeme Bett. Das Treppenhaus ist mehr als sanierungsbedürftig. (Marode Wände, offenen Stromkabel, also ich habe so etwas noch nicht gesehen.) Die Wohnung ist mit 175€ die Nacht nicht zu empfehlen.

A região do apartamento é ótima, com muitos comércios, bares e restaurantes ao redor. Apartamento igual as fotos, com tudo que é preciso. 
O prédio é antigo e o acesso pelas escadas (3o andar sem elevador) dificulta pra quem está com malas grandes.
Ines foi super gentil, respondeu tudo muito rápido e tirou todas as dúvidas.
L’appart est agréable et fidèle à la description. Les nuits sont calmes. En revanche l’immeuble et les parties communes sont très  dégradées.

Plus: bien situé près du coeur de Paris et des boulevards. Abordable et décoré. Équipement complet pour un long séjour.
Moins: Quelques soucis avec la plomberie. Un peu petit pour deux personnes si on veut faire autre chose que se coucher, et pas de parc à proximité pour picnic.

Florya was really kind, welcoming and communicative.  The apartment is cozy and adorable and in a really great location.  We really enjoyed exploring the neighborhood-- there’s a fabulous open-air market close by, and it worked out quite well for our stay.  I also appreciated the local recommendations she shared, which resulted in the best baguette I've ever had. :)

The apartment is wonderful. It has everything we needed. is very well situated. We had a great time. Sitting at the dining table and looking at the attic windows and chimneys across the way when the sun comes up or in the evening is magical.  When we requested a second front door key it came quickly. It is a perfect place to stay.
Accueil très bon et attentionné. Localisation parfaite. Appartement fidèle à la description, lumineux et confortable. Merci aux hôtes!

Katia & Sebastien's apartment was located in a fantastic area of Paris! super central and easy access to everything you could need. Apartment was cosy and perfect for our time in Paris. Would stay again!

Katie's was very easy to find. She gave us great directions and made really easy for us to find the apartment. We were also able to be in contact with her when we had questions (even on Christmas Eve). I would suggest this Airbnb to anyone traveling to Paris!

We had a wonderful stay at Katia's apartment. The central location in Paris is unbeatable- east Metro access to anywhere you might want to visit. Rue Montorgueil is a lively and fun area with many cafés, restaurants, bakeries, shops, and bars. We loved staying right off this street. 
The unit is small but that is true of all central Paris apartments! Worked perfectly for us. 
Thank you Katia and Sebastien!
Great location! There are a lot of restaurants around the apartment and it's near the centre. Katia and Sebastian have been friendly and very easy to reach in case we had any problem.

This apartment is a lovely size to have while in Paris for a couple. The location is amazing, only footsteps from Rue Montorgueil (an eat street with lots of restaurants/cafes/bakeries/etc) as well as close to the metro or walking distance to other main tourist sites. There are 2 locked doors so you feel very safe. There is a kitchen so you can cook your own food. Katia makes check in/check out and all communications very easy in french or english. Would recommend.

Katia is nice airbnb host. Her hospitarlity is good.
  
This room location is near to Metro station , famous big Shopping mall ( Des halls paris ) , many Restaurant & Cafe & Bar , Supermarket, Bus stop and Verib (rental bicycle). 
  
This room has a complete set of furniture & appliance.
I love the strongly hair dryer of the room. 
  
I recommend to a couple this room.

We loved staying at Katia's apartment. The location couldn't be better - the Montorgueil neighborhood is our absolute favorite spot in Paris. It has a really dynamic ambiance and there are loads of great restaurants. The apartment itself is great - super quiet and calm (essential when you need to get some work done) and equipped with everything you need to cook 'at home' and relax.

The apartment is very well located and cozy. Katia and Sebastien were there to welcome us and they were very friendly and warm. The neighboutghood is really lively but the apartment is very calm and silent.

Katie's place is cosy, comfy & located along the lively streets of Montorgueil. It's about 5-10mins walk from many metro stations (Sentier, Les Halles, Etienne Marcel, Reaumur-Sebastopol) so pretty accessible to all places/attractions. Lourve museum itself is about 15mins away from foot.

Plus point is it's alley from Montorgueil is well-lighted so we felt quite safe even to go back later in the night! :D

Everything you need (kitchen, cooking utensils, fridge, hair dryer) in a house is also available. 

Would definitely be back again if I'm back in Paris!
L'appartement de Katia est idéalement situé et calme. Elle s'est montrée accueillante et a toujours répondu aux mails rapidement. Merci encore.

La casa è in un quartiere estremamente vivace e pieno di locali! Katia è stata estremamente gentile e disponibile, ci ha dato molti suggerimenti utili!
La casa su due piani ha tutto quello che serve per poter passare un ottimo periodo nel centro di Parigi!

The house is located in a nice part of the city, full of nice place where to eat and drink! Katia is super kind, she gave us a lot of really useful suggestions on nice place to visit during our stay in Paris. The house is perfect and it has everything you need to spend really good time in this amazing city!

petit appartement sympathique au coeur d'un quartier vivant , avec commerces et restaurants à proximité, à 5 mn à pied des Halles et de Beaubourg; accueil chaleureux des jeunes propriètaires ; je recommande cette location
C'était parfait. L'appartement se situe dans un lieu avec beaucoup de resto et bars avec ambiance très sympa et les différents lieux à visiter sont accessibles et proche.
Katia a été très agréable et à tout fait pour nous faciliter la vie ! Le studio est vraiment bien située.

It was awesome! The apartment is very bright and cozy (as on image). There is everything necessary for a comfortable life. Metro just two minutes from the door and also bus stop.The elevator will take you directly to the apartment door, what let you very easy arriving with luggage. Yun answered very quickly and was welcoming. I did not have any problems with communication. Espessially want to say about the area - this is a typical district of Paris with beautiful Parisian buildings - with cafes, boulangerie, shops and the market on certain days. It is very calm and non-touristic. This, of course, takes some time to get to the center, but the opportunity to feel like a Parisian is worth it.  We would like to stay here again. Thank you for terrific experience Yun!

The room is clean, convenient and has good access. it is located near a subway station, cafes and a supermarket. Even if you want to stay a long time, there is no problem. You can use its kitchen, the washing machine, and nice bed. The security of the room is fine as well. The owner is also so kind and responses are quick. I could spend really nice time in Paris, thanks to Ling!

J'ai passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement de Ling, l'appartement est conforme à la description et l'hôte est très arrangeant et réactif. un bon rapport qualité/prix et je recommande vivement cet appartement qui est bien situé

Arnaud’s apartment was nice and very clean.  It is in a convenient location in between République and Goncourt Metro stations, and close to the Canal St Martin.  There were a few missing amenities (such as dish soap or a garbage pail), and there was occasional noise from the neighbors in the courtyard, but overall not too much of a problem.  We had some problems with the washing machine but Arnaud was nice about it, and he was very responsive to our questions. 

Overall, we enjoyed our stay there.

Lovely little apartment, with the perfect location between Republique and the Canal St Martin. Arnaud was super helpful and welcoming.
I would definitely recommend it !
L’appart est très cool et bien situé. J’aime les poutres au plafond et le petit ascenceur est bien pratique. Merci !
L’appartement d’Arnaud est idéalement situé juste à coté de la place de la République. Il est confortable et idéal pour quelques jours.

Arnaud est un hôte vraiment adorable, gentil, vraiment très amical! Très réactif, on peut rapidement traité avec lui ! L'appartement est très mignon, a beaucoup de charme avec les poutres. Situé dans un quartier vraiment sympas avec plein de bonnes petites adresses, l'appartement est au calme car il ne donne pas directement sur la rue donc pas d'agitation et le petit plus est qu'il est proche de la station république où vous pourrez retrouver pas mal de lignes! 

Vous pouvez vous lancer les yeux fermés avec Arnaud, vraiment, première fois sur AirBnB et totalement satisfaite!
L'ideale per un romantico soggiorno parigino. Appartamento curato, con gusto e caldo, si sta veramente bene!

Appartement impeccable et parfaitement situer dans Paris. Parfait pour un couple.
Je recommande.
Henry & Fanny were very kind and communicative. Their apartment is great and in an awesome area and I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.

OK. This is a really sweet spot. 
This super cozy bungalow style apartment is located in the Folie-Me'ricort district of Paris.... OR in NYC terms, The East Village!!
Alive, happening, young, bistro's everywhere  & close to everything.
Fantastic ethnic foods.... and very near Republique area transit stop (super easy to all points of Paris on Metro)
I cannot say enough good things about the simplicity of in/out of this very protected property (gated) and how COMFY that bed was!
Pure Paris on the quick.... and such lovely hosts.

Thank you Henry & Fanny.... 
Fantastic place, fantastic deal.

Henry&Fanny’s place is great location and you can use both station Parmentier & Oberkampf which was super convenient. They were always responding my message quickly so I had no stress to communicate with them. The place was clean & cozy. Also nicely decorated. I would definitely come back!

We had an excellent stay at Henry and Fanny’s place. We did not have the opportunity to meet them as they were travelling, but they were thorough in their communication before our arrival and their concierge, who was absolutely lovely, checked us in. There are so many places to stay in Paris, and we had booked this apartment after our original booking had cancelled in the few weeks before we were due to arrive- I think this apartment was ultimately better than what we had originally booked. It was as listed- the area was great, lots of restaurants, cafes and grocers near by, very well connected to the metro, building was really secure. We walked from the apartment to the river in about 40 mins. There was also some lovely perfume and toiletries waiting for us upon checking in, a really welcoming touch. My friend and I utilized the bedroom and pull out couch and both were very comfortable sleeps. We had no issues at all during our stay, it was really lovely. Thanks again Henry and Fanny for letting us borrow your space for our stay in Paris, it was absolutely lovely.
Everything went very well! Thank you Henry & Fanny!

Henry and Fanny’s is in a fantastic area, and slightly off the main street. It’s still quite loud outside but that’s because it’s a vibrant area. The flat is great for two, we were only really in it to sleep and get ready for the day, but we had no real problems.

Appartement cosy et mignon 
Nous avons pas eu la chance de rencontré henry et fanny mais l’attention y était, ainsi que la réactivité à répondre aux messages. 
Nous avons était bien accueillis 
L’appartement est conforme aux photos et situé dans un quartier très mignon de paris ! 
Je le recommande

Bon séjour chez Lina! 
Lina est une personne très agréable et surtout serviable. 
L'appartement est très bien situé! Très proche de la Gare de Lyon... Bien pratique quand on prends le train tôt!

Staying at Nathanaël's apartment was a comfortable experience. His place is very central and convenient for a few nights stay in Paris and I would definitely stay for a longer period of time when I return next. His personal style and appreciation for art really adds to the charm of the flat. We never did meet but he was available for correspondence and his neighbor who hosted us in Nathanaël's stead was attentive, hospitable, and a very nice guy!

This is a really lovely apartment that is as described, except it feels brighter and airier than in the pictures. It is small but not cramped and would be fine for a couple, and was great for me on my own. It gets all the evening sun through the windows, which I loved. The apartment is 10 minutes walk from gare du nord and gare de l'est and easy to walk to the centre too. The area is lovely and vibrant, with lots of cafes, restaurants and bars, but still feels relaxed. Marion was quick to respond to messages and check-in was easy although we didn't meet. Highly recommended!

Super séjour à Paris, notamment grâce à l'appartement de Marion ! Très mignon et bien situé, c'était idéal pour visiter la ville à pied. Le quartier est vivant, à 2 pas du métro, des bars et des théâtres !
Je recommande sans héisiter !
Sehr süße kleine Unterkunft in gut angebundener Lage. Lebhaftes Viertel.
Petit appartement très joli, bien situé, réponse rapide, top, je conseille.
La logement est conforme à la description : petit mais fonctionnel et cosy !
Appartamento piccolo ma comodo e tipico. la posizione è ottima perché in zona vitale ricca di localini per bere e mangiare. Marion è ben organizzata per check-in/out flessibili.
Merci Carole pour l'accueil. L'appartement est calme et aussi coloré que sur les photos !  Le lit est très confortable !  A bientot si l'occasion se représente !

Accueil dans la bonne humeur avec Carole qui a parfaitement communiqué en amont pour organiser mon arrivée sur Paris. L'appartement est coloré , très agréable et calme. La couette est fantastique, les serviettes et produits d'hygiène ont été très pratique pour un étourdi comme moi. A bientôt !

Awesome apartment in a really cool neighborhood. Perfect place to stay!Very quiet and peaceful. Everything was great and Raphael was very helpful with everything. 

I would definitely recommend it to a friend and would love to stay here again. I had a wonderful time staying in Paris here. Really wonderful. 

Thank you Raphael!
Hôte parfait, emplacement parfait, appartement parfait ! Merci !
El departamento tenia un ambiente muy agradable. Además RaphaEl había dejado una carpeta de bienvenida con excelentes recomendaciones y datos útiles.  El barrio era lindo y seguro.

Appartement vraiment sympa ! Typiquement le charme parisien :)

Très propre, avec tout le confort et toutes les indications nécessaires pour bien profiter du séjour.

Le quartier est top, agréable pour se balader ou prendre un verre, et pratique pour se déplacer facilement dans Paris (accès rapide au centre de Paris). 
Le seul petit bémol de l'appartement est qu'il est placé près d'une école, et il y a parfois un peu de bruit.

Raphael a été très sympa et arrangeant avec nous. 

Vraiment je recommande! D'ailleurs on prolonge un peu notre séjour :)

Highly recommend to stay at Alexandra’s home
We felt into the French atmosphere there
Cool location, awesome details and stylish dishes
Would be happy to stay there again!)
A great apartment with everything you need. Nice open space and situated in close distance to public transport and supermarkets. Victoire is a great host!
Nice cosy place in a great location. Response time was fast. Would recommend :)

Victoire was really gentle and helpful from the very first moment, answering to our requests very fast and possitive! She even bought for us bread when I asked her to, as we were arriving quite late. We were inexpectely much later as expected and didn't manage to call her. But she took care and called us and waited patiently to our delayed arrival, and received us with her very warm welcome. The appartment is just as shown in the photos, clean and accesible, very calm located. I would certainly recommend it. Just to mention one little inconvenience: we missed some curtains in the bedroom to preserve some privacy and have some darker light in the very early hours. But I guess it is not such a big issue to solve.. ;) Merci à nouveau, Victoire et bon boyage a Cuba!!

Very nice place to stay in Paris: super charming neighborhood, very well located (close to a lot of shops, restaurants, public transportation), nicely arranged, clean and very convenient apartment. Victoire is fast responding, flexible and warmly welcoming. I highly recommend the place when you stay in Paris!

Avec mon copain nous avons passé une petite semaine magnifique dans cet appartement qui est super beau et lumineux ; c’est idéal pour un couple qui souhaite découvrir Montmartre ou bien les quartiers moins touristiques de Paris. La communication avec Alexandra était superbe, elle est très gentille,  attentive et facilement joignable par whatsapp et nous la remercions pour notre agréable séjour aux Batignolles !

Appartement T2 sympathique et lumineux situé au 4e (sans ascenseur!) d’un immeuble dans les Epinettes. Propreté très limite, maniaque s’abstenir! Très bonne communication avec Alexandra, disponible et réactive. Logement bien mais visiblement mal entretenu. Quel dommage.
Отличная квартира, в жизни лучше чем на фото. Уютно, красиво, чисто, удобно по расположению.
Alexandra est top et très accueillante !

Reçu à l'appartement par Alexandra. Hôte sympathique, communication par message facile. Appartement, propre correspondant aux photos situé dans un quartier tranquille. Je recommande ce petit appart. :)

Un très bel appartement bien situé.
L'ambiance est cosy, et les hôtes sont réactifs et joignable en cas de problème.
Très bonne communication avec Victoire, qui a été très réactive et a organisé notre accueil en son absence. L'appartement est joli, fonctionnel, propre et bien situé. Très bon séjour.

Super séjour!
Appart très sympa, très bien situé et une proprio très disponible et flexible :-)
je recommande vivement!
Superbe appartement, tres bon accueil et depart tardif. Merci infiniment pour un séjour au top !!
Séjour très sympa dans cet appartement bien placé et vraiment agréable. Victoire a été flexible et nous a parfaitement accueilli. Je recommande vivement !

This apt is spacious and artful with a very comfy bed! Severine was very prompt with communication. There were a ton of yummy shops in the immediate vicinity. Lovely view. Only downside.. on the 6th floor with no working elevator. If that's ok for you, I highly recommend!
Good Experience, thanks
It was perfect
Un très joli appartement parisien avec une vue superbe. Séverine nous a fourni beaucoup d´informations sur le quartier et nous avons passé un très beau séjour ! Merci !
tres bel appartement lumineux et gai dans un quartier anime Severine en fait nous invite chez elle On a juste a la deviner

Charlotte s apartment is great ! First there is no better locations - tons of French and ethnic food restaurants, super hip bars and places. The apartment is also perfect as described on the pictures and Charlotte was super flexible and responsive. thanks again for an amazing trip !

Charlotte was so wonderful and welcoming in my stay at her flat in Paris. Her home is high above the street, beautiful, charming, full of incredible books and true warmth. I would love to stay again and she was an absolutely joy.

Thank you Charlotte for letting me stay at your apartment! It's so spacious and charming! Very close to the Metro and walking distance to all the cool coffee shops in the 10th. ! The neighborhood is great, lively and diverse.  Thank you for a good time and memories!!!

We really enjoyed staying in Charlotte's apartment. It's a cute, clean and comfortable space on the 5th floor and located close to many restaurants and only about a 20 minute walk from the Louvre. You can hear a little noise from the street below, but it was nothing that really bothered us. It is also located very close to a metro stop, which was easy to use, and we used often. We did have a couple bumps when we first arrived (our fault, not hers) but Charlotte was quick to respond and very helpful! Overall a very pleasant experience and we would definitely stay there again.

Charlotte has curated a really fantastic space where we felt relaxed and at home. The neighborhood is very lively and convenient with one of the top bakeries just across the street (yum). Highly recommend staying here!
Great experience in Paris! Beautiful, cozy and clean apartment that made my stay in this city extra special. Perfect location, really easy to live in and move around.

Charlotte's apartment was absolutely  perfect- straight out of a magazine. It was the first time I had used Airbnb, and the experience went above and beyond my expectations thanks to my gracious host.

Our stay was amazing: It is a very spacious, quiet and well furnished apartment. We love the trendy and vibrant neighborhood as well. We were also impressed by Charlotte's availability and support when we faced a small issue with the keylock: she came immediately at the rescue and brought a professional to change the whole keylock in no time making sure our programs are not impacted. Finally Charlotte is a very sweet and interesting person to meet, we really enjoyed our discussions

Charlotte is relly accomodating  person.
Her appartement is prettier than on the photo.
I recommand her adress for a perfect trip.

A brilliant apartment in a great location. Charlotte was very responsive and helpful in answering our questions, and her recommendations for restaurants and bars in the area were spot on. We'd definitely stay here again - highly recommended!

In spite of some hiccups at the start of our stay - that were unfortunately out of the host's or my control - Charlotte made sure that all went well and has been in touch to see that all went well.
The flat is great, very warm and welcoming, the neighborhood is very lively and very convenient in terms of public transports and close to all local amenities.

Charlotte communicated quickly and efficiently so no time was lost. Her housekeeper let us into the apartment. The apartment was easy to use, comfortable, charming. The central location is unbeatable. The rue is vibrant, full of restaurants, and very convenient - easy to reach from Gare du Nord and Gare d'est, and a nice 15 minute walk into some other key spots in the city. There is some noise from the street below, but it drops off around midnight or so, and is coped with by being on the 5th floor. My 9 year old and teenager felt safe in the area and we had a great time here. I would stay again. A wonderful Paris apartment.

Charlotte's apartment is perfectly situated and wonderfully comfortable to stay in during our weekend in Paris. It was a little tricky to find but we loved staying here and wished flats like this existed in London!! Charlotte was out of the city herself but easily contactable by email and always quick to respond to any queries. The perfect Parisian abode!
Amazing flat, very well situated. Very clean and spacious.  The perfect place if you want to spend a few days in Paris. I strongly recommend it!

Perfect apartment. Very clean, spacious and well equipped. Situated at the very heart of Paris with a metro 3 minutes walking distance.

I highly recommend you to check this apartment out if you're coming to Paris!

Perfect Parisian Experience! Charlotte's boyfriend Julien met us at the apartment and showed us around, telling us about places to go in the local area - which all turned out to be amazing!

The apartment is exactly as described and as it looks, absolutely wonderful and charming. The area is lively and full of interesting eateries / bars but in no way full of tourists.

Charlotte and Julien were wonderful hosts and helped us out whenever we needed anything.

Would undoubtedly stay again. A perfect way to experience Paris.

Charlottes place was just like all the descriptions were written. We had an excellent stay there and were very happy with the bed, were able to cook in the kitchen and enjoyed the excellently furnitured rooms. 

The appartment is very easily reachable and is set in a very nice surrounding. Thank you, Charlotte, for having us and letting us use your place for the weekend!

There's nothing we were unhappy with.

Thank you Charlotte .. You have a Beautiful appartement as shown in the pictures.. We love the place it was well organized plus it was so clean and cosy for us. Everybody should be there we highly recommand it. Thank you again.

J'ai passé un superbe séjour dans l'appartement de Charlotte. Il est très joliment décoré, lumineux. Le quartier est très agréable, vivant. Merci Charlotte! J'aurais tellement aimé pouvoir y retourner début juillet! Une prochaine fois... Ce fut un véritable plaisir
P.S : Mention spéciale pour le boulanger :)
Alles perfekt - von Empfang über Wohnung (perfekt) bis hin zu Infos über die Umgebung. Merci a Charlotte!!!
Great breeze when you open all the windows.  Very convenient location also.

The appartement is very clean and cozy. Clementine has good taste. From your bed you can see the tower of Sacre Ceur in the distance. The neighborhood is charming and popular. You meet all nations, cultures and skin colour in the nearby streets.

Lovely!! We, me and my boyfriend Lee, found Clementine's home adorable! A brilliant springboard for our adventures in Paris, and a cozy flat to unwind and relax... She was a great host even though she was not in Paris for the check-in when we arrived, we were welcomed by one of her friend who gave us all the details. She left a bottle of Rose for our arrival which was really much appreciate. We'll definitely consider re-booking for future visits.

I felt instantly at home in this lovely apartment. Close to public transport. Unfortunately didn't get to spend much time exploring the area but Clementine had made some excellent suggestions and was really helpful. Perfect for what we needed

Clementine's place is perfect for a single traveler or couple. I loved the location - so many wine bars and interesting back streets to explore. You can even see the Sacre Coeur from the bedroom balcony. There are lots of stairs up the apartment - but totally manageable if you've got average fitness. I will definitely stay again next time I'm in Paris.

A comfortable, tidy and sunny apartment, well located, near a metro station in a lively area with restaurants and bars. Clementine is a charming and knowledgeable host with local information and advice. Really enjoyed the stay.
Absolutely gorgeous apartment located in a lively location. I'd wholeheartedly recommend this to everybody!

Cozy and charming apartment, not big but all you need for a short stay. It s full of light with the big windows!! it is a pitoresque neighborhood and Camille gave us all tips to enjoy the Chinese area

A charming apartment well furnitured, stylish and with all the conforts.
If you want to know a non-touristic paris, here it is.
Clementine will give you useful information of the neighbourdhood! You'll feel like a Parisien!!
The apartment is really charming. Clementine is very sweet and welcomed us very kind. Everything very clean. Thanks Clementine very much.
Appartement très agréable, chaleureux, ensoleillé et très bien situé.

Appartement magnifique dans sa configuration et la déco authentiquement vintage de Clementine. Nous avons été chaleureusement accueillis et bien conseillés sur les lieux a fréquenter. Clémentine a été joignable facilement pendant tous le séjour. Je conseille vivement cet appartement.
I booked this property for my colleague to stay in Paris. He was so satisfy with this place and location. The owners are so helpful and friendly. Highly recommend for you!
Juliette was an amazing hostess, very kind and helpful! It was a pleasure to stay in her apartment!

We had a great stay at Zeynep's apartment, an ideal place for a couple/guests who want to visit and/or work while in Paris. Good location in a quiet neighbourhood but close to sites and nice places to eat and drink along Rue de Belleville for instance. The apartment was cozy and with everything we needed!  Zeynep and Etienne were responsive and waited for our late arrival. Although we met only briefly upon check-in, they were very welcoming and friendly.

Our stay at Seynep's apartment was excellent!
She was very careful in every detail, as well as being very friendly and welcoming.
The apartment is very stylish and cozy. It was very clean.
It is very close to the metro and a market, which greatly facilitates our stay.
It was all very good!
l'appartement est plein de charme, un vrai petit nid! calme ;)

Die Unterkunft war wirklich toll für eine Woche Paris. Wir haben hier zu zweit mit Baby eine sehr schöne Zeit gehabt, es gab alles was wir brauchten in und um die Wohnung (Nähe der Metro, Supermarkt um die Ecke). Die Wohnung ist etwas hellhörig aber sehr sauber und schön. Wer dem Gewusel der Innenstadt entfliehen will ist hier genau richtig. Die Kommunikation war sehr fix und herzlich. Wir kommen gern wieder!
位置很方便，周围有很多超市，还有地铁线。住在这里10几天很开心。

Appartement avec un séjour et une chambre.
La cuisine est bien équipée. c'est un appartement calme au 4ème étage sans ascenseur
Logement superbe et très bien placé! Je le recommande vivement
Wonderful apartment and Nathalie is a very kind and thoughtful host!

Very nice and cosy flat and great location, instructions left by host to pick up keys and enter the flat were accurate and she  also texted us to check everything was ok and to let us know there was a strike!

Nathalie's home was great!! Easy walking distance to metro and everything we needed. Nathalie was very good to communicate with, she responded very fast. We had no problems and couldn't have asked for a better stay in Paris!

Had a lovely stay in Nathalie's place! It has a great location close to good bars & restaurants, it's a spacious apartment that looks onto a quiet courtyard. Perfect for 3 people staying for the weekend! Nathalie was a wonderful host, offering great recommendations for the neighborhood and she was very easy to communicate with to schedule check-in/check-out.
Great value and great location. All arrangements clearly communicated. Well worth a visit

This flat very comfortable and clean. Location is good, near the underground. Time of arrival may be different, it can deliberate with proprietress of the apartment. I was pleased to stay in this flat.

Everything was what we expected and Nathalie is a good host. We didn't met, but the communication went very fast. A very good place to start visiting all you want, even if you're visiting the city for the first time, Nathalie can help you with a lot of documentation. In fact we should say it's location should stay a hidden treasure, but that would not be nice to Nathalie. We only can recommend the place and Nathalie as host to other visitors. We had an exellent time.

Very clean
Great location
Everything was perfect
Definitely will comeback
Easy to deal with. Very organized
Nathalie is a perfect host.

Nathalie's chic Parisian apartment is tucked away in a quiet corner of the lively Saint Martin neighbourhood. It was clean, well furnished and had everything the two of us could need during our stay. Nathalie was amazing with communication, and local recommendations. We had a really late check-in, and she made it happen without any fuss! There is a mini-mart, some grocery stores and the lovely Marche Saint Martin within walkable distance, along with some cute wine bars and restaurants. The famous Le Pain Des Idees is a nice stroll in the morning, and so is the Canal St. Martin area. We are happy to have found this little gem in beautiful Paris

perfecly cleaned
perfect location
perfect neighbourhood
super nice house
what else?!!?? :-)
I definitely recommend it!
Overall a very pleasant stay in a Parisian apartment, quiet space, close to metro and Gare de l'East and Gare du Nord.

Nathalie’s place was perfect for us. Cozy, convenient, clean, quiet and well located. We also liked that it was decorated with her own taste but we could still feel at home during our stay.

Nathalie was extremely responsive, and flexible with checkin and checkout times, which made our life so much easier. She made sure that we had everything we needed and was available before and during our stay.

We highly recommend staying at her place.

The appartment is excellent located giving the chance to adventure the city center walking. The appartment is in the yard and making it very silent despite the fact that you are in a alive location. Food drinks and all you need very close. And Nathalie was very reponsive and made our trip very relaxed and comfortable. Thank you Nathalie, we enjoyed very much.
Lovely appartment :) I can highly recommend it :)

Fantastic place to stay!! Nathalie was very prompt with all communications and kindly arranged for her mother to let us in as we arrived at a time Nathalie could not meet us. Nathalie left helpful written instruction for us and fantastic recommendations of restaurants and bars in the area. Could not fault this place.....it is as beautiful as it shows in the pics. And being off the street with a locked gate makes it feel very safe. Would highly recommend!!
Amazing. Close to metro, fun area of the city. Perfect stay.

Nathalie's place is very clean and cosy, a romantic get-away in Paris and in this apartment is a truly fine combination. The place is central, hip bars are just around the corner and we managed to get by foot in the centre of Paris. The neighborhood is safe, the boulangerie is just across the street. Nathalie is a very helpful and kind person and I can carry it on like this for minutes. So the complete package is just perfect and recommendable. Merci Nathalie!

The place is just as shown in the pictures: nice, tidy and clean.
We were 2 people and the apartment has the right space for us. The bed is comfortable even for tall people, couldn't say the same about the washing basin, but still it created no troblues.
The shower is nice and quite wide, the kitchen is abslutely well furnished, if you're not used to electric kitchen you should better ask instructions when you arrive, but it is easy.
The location really is nice as Nathalie says, you just need to get out at the right metro station and you'll find a nice area with venues and bistrot. There is also a small but nice market near there and a bakery.
Metro stations are close and get you everywhere you want in Paris.
I definitely reccomend Nathalie's apartment.
Nathalie is a very friendly host. Everything was very well organised. The cosy and beautiful apartment is ideally located close to Gare de l'Est
Nice apartment in good shape and perfect for two or three persons. The pick up of the key was smooth and we enjoyed the view to the backyard.

BEAUTIFUL Parisian apartment with a lot of windows and sunlight. The apartment had everything we needed and it was conveniently located close to many restaurants/bars.  Alice was very kind, responsive, and accommodating throughout our entire stay!

We had a lovely stay at Alice’s apartment. Alice welcomed us at check-in and helped us with our (very heavy) bags upstairs. The space is beautiful especially the living area, and the bed was extremely comfortable! Highly recommend :)
The apartment is beautiful, clean and airy. Alice was very easy to communicate with. We had a wonderful stay.
Amazing place and host!
Amazing location and space. Clean. Check in and check out was a breeze

This is a perfect place! My friend and I were really comfortable in Paris. My wonderful experience in Paris was completed thanks to Ellis's house
Perfect house and Alice^^
Thank you so much to Alice. She is very nice!!

We had a really good time in this place. It is not on the center of  Paris but that's still good thing cause it gives you another perspective off what really Paris is, instead of being near all the touristic places. We value very much that and, anyways, its really near to a lot of metro and bus stations, which makes it really good.

Appartement très sympa, très propre , très agréable . Alice est très réactive et sympathique 
Je conseille 
Thierry

My colleague and I stayed in Marie-Sophie's place for 5 nights and greatly enjoyed the cozy feeling. The place is full of beautiful decor and great little details, and the apartment is full of light. It's a bit on the small side, but perfectly fit our needs - between the bedroom, the bath, the living room and the little kitchen.
The neighborhood is quiet and residential - you'll be a bit far from the main tourist attractions, but you'll get to experience a local neighborhood feel, with plenty of little local shops, including a Boulangerie right in the building. 
Marie-Sophie was super helpful with all of our needs - helping out with instructions from the airport, and providing us with an iron and hairdryer which we requested. 
I'd highly recommend staying with her!

Marie-Sophie is a wonderful and smiley person, she waited for us at the apartment when we arrived even thou it was in the middle of the day.
Her apartment is very beautiful and clean exactly as it seems in the pictures, well accessorized.
We use every day the 5 minuets walkaway metro it was very convenient.
It was a real pleasure!

Marie Sophie est adorable et arrangeante.
Le logement correspondait bien à la description.
C'est une bonne adresse à garder  !

Ho soggiornato a casa di marie Sophie per tre giorni, lei è stata gentilissima e veloce nel rispondere ai miei messaggi. La casa è molto carina, in perfetto stile parigino! Ho trovato tutto pulito e in ordine, io ero da sola ma è perfetta anche per due persone! La zona è ben servita sia dalla metro che dall'autobus! Marie è solare e disponibile e mi ha fatto sentire a casa! Grazie!

Nous avons passé 3 jours dans l'appartement de Marie-Sophie. Le séjour était très agréable et l'appartement totalement conforme aux photos. L'accueil était chaleureux et notre hôte très conviviale. Tout était à disposition: internet, machine à laver, lave-vaiselle...
A 5 minutes du métro et dans un quartier très calme avec boulangerie au coin de la rue, pharmacies et supermarchés. C'est une adresse que nous recommandons fortement.

Super appartement, conforme aux photos, très propre et idéalement situé puisqu'il se trouve a deux pas d'une station de métro.
La garantie de passer un bon séjour!

l'appartement d'Adelin est très agréable, très calme, situé dans un quartier populaire avec toutes les commodités à proximité (commerces, métro...). Les photos sont conformes à la réalité. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.

We booked the apartment last minute and Gaelle was very helpful arranging a time to pick up the keys, responding withing minutes of each message. The Apartment was very clean and very comfortable. We very much enjoyed our stay and would have no issue booking with Gaelle again on future visits to Paris. 
This was our first ever Airbnb experience and Gaelle exceeded our expectations!

This was my first experience with Airbnb and Gaelle made it a lovely one! The flat was as described, had everything you could want and we were welcomed warmly despite arriving later than expected. Great central location, quick responses for any queries by Gaelle, I would recommend this apartment to others!

Nassradine was an amazing host! He was very attentive, left me information, and has awesome Nintendo artwork in his house. The house is a perfect size, bigger than what one may typically find in Paris. Very comfy feelings but at the same time does not feel like you are living in someone else's house. Big comfy bed and nice kitchen. I did not use it to cook, but the island was nice to sit at and do some reading with an open window. There is also a courtyard in this apartment complex. Bathroom is nice and clean as well. 
Area has some food by it, but as with all things Paris you need to walk around. I could not tell you what major landmarks are nearby or any famous bars, but there are a lot of cafes and bars in the area. Garden of Luxemburg is about a 15-20 minute walk away and the metro is only a 4 min (max) walk. Overall great experience and would do it again.
Lovely apartment close to the subway. Nassradine was a great host. Recommended.
Great and cozy place wich a calming view out back. nice neighbourhood and good restaurants nearby. We felt comfortable right after our arrival. In addition to all that Nassradine is a very kind host.
Nassradine was friendly and organised, and made everything smooth and easy. The apartment was spotless and in a nice neighbourhood. We would definitely stay here again!
The apartment is really nice, which is very suitable for couple. It is very convenient, there are many restaurants in the neighbor and metro station nearby.
Fantastic spacious apartment and very welcoming host. The apartment was in a great location, close to bars and restaurants and the metro in a nice neighborhood.

Nassradine was an amazing host and very easy to interact with. He made the whole process and my stay pleasant and smooth. The apartment is well maintained and equipped with all necessary accessories. The location is central and easy to connect to anywhere in Paris. Highly recommend it!!
L'appartement est lumineux et très bien agencé. La literie est particulièrement confortable. Le métro est seulement à quelques minutes. Parfait !

Bonjour,
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Nassradine. Nous sommes proches des transports en commun et d'une rue commerçante. Très bon accueil et ménage impeccable.
Très bon accueil avec les explications qui vont avec. Super séjour et appartement agréable.
Nassradine est un hôte parfait, logement impeccable, une adresse à recommander

Accueil très sympathique par Nassradine.
Appartement très bien situé à 2 pas de la station de métro, dans un quartier vivant de Paris avec tous les commerces à proximité

tres bon accueil de nassradine et explications rapides et claires pour le fonctionnement de l'appartement.
le quartier est vivant et agréable
l'appartement est tres bien eclairé et agreable à vivre
la literie est top
on s'est tout de suite cru ''chez nous''

La casa de Nassradine es muy linda! Es más grande de lo que parece en las fotos. El departamento tiene mucha luz y  esta bien equipada (además nos dejó comida), la cama súper cómoda. Esta ubicada a dos cuadras del metro, lo que hizo que fuera muy fácil recorrer París. El barrio es lindo y tranquilo!! Tiene todas las tiendas necesarias alrededor, supermercado, panadería, verdulerias, etc. Nassradine fue muy accesible en todo momento. Además nosotros nos olvidamos plata en el departamento y el no tuvo problema en hacernos un depósito en la cuenta bancaria que le indicamos, creo que eso demuestra la calidad de persona a que es!!! Best host ever!! Sin duda lo recomiendo!!!!!

Nassradine est très gentil et à été très arrangeant pour les heures de départ et d'arrivé ! L'appartement est très bien, tout est propre et fait pour qu'on s'y sente chez soi! Il est aussi très bien placé, dans un bon quartier et à moins de 2 min du métro ! Merci pour ce week-end, je recommande fortement

C'est ma femme qui est arrivée avant moi, et m'a fait savoir qu'elle avait été très bien accueillie.
De plus nous pouvions partir à notre guise.
Quartier très commerçant, avec une super boulangerie mais malheureusement fermée le dimanche...grrr
Nous avons apprécié le lit...matelas très épais et vraiment confortable..

Appartement très agréable ! 
Nassradine m'a très bien accueilli et est resté disponible en cas de problème !

Nous sommes resté 3 jours et avons pu visiter Paris sans problème.
Appartement très agréable, à proximité de tout et bien équipé. Il ne manque vraiment rien ! 
L'hôte est très sympathique et toujours disponible, il répond rapidement aux messages. Nous n'avons rencontré aucun problème en particulier. 
Nous recommandons! :)

Excellente prestation, appartement de qualité, au calme et près de tout. 
Nasreddine est très serviable m, super gentil. Désolé de t'avoir fait patienter Nasreddine. 
A recommander si vous souhaitez passer un séjour agréable.

Communication très facile avec Nassradine. Nous avons trouvé un logement qui correspond bien à la description, propre, agréable et calme. A deux pas du métro ! Très pratique. Quartier simple où l'on trouve facilement de quoi s'approvisionner.
Very nice place..very good host..very warm place to stay..nice and clean..congratulations

We book the apartment just few hours before arrival. 

Paolo was easy to talk to and he was waiting for us when we arrived after 10pm. 
He gave us 2 sets of keys to make things even easier for us ( we where in Paris for work) .

The apartment is located between metro Rome and metro Villier , really nice and secure neighbourhood with plenty of restaurants, shops, bakeries... just 4 stops from Opera. 

The space has 2 rooms, the first one as you enter the flat is the kitchen, with microwave, stove, kettle, fridge and cuttlery. Opposite a little bath room with a shower (good water presure and really clean) and the main room with a double bed ( really comfy) a little sofa and a coffee table. He left shower gel, shampoo, towels and also offered us to use whatever was in the flat. 

Things to take in consideration there is no internet and the flat is located in the 4rth floor ( no lift)
 
The flat is small but has everything you need and Paolo was an excelent host.

I would totally come back to Paolo's home.
Je recommande le lieu et Paolo
Appartement conforme à la description, très joli et agréable! Paolo s'est montré très flexible pour notre arrivée et a su nous renseigner parfaitement. Très bon séjour, je recommande !
Hôte de qualité logement Parfait

Lovely appartement and nice, very organized hosts, thanks for letting my parents stay over! The staircase was a bit of a challenge to take daily, given that they have a certain age, but we called those walks digestive, quite welcome after late, heavy familly dinners ;)

The house was clean and as described in the announcement. 
Amelie and Clement left us clear instruction about everything and in general everything was very easy. 
The only tiring thing was the fifth floor with no elevator, but it is also good to keep on a good shape! :)
So thanks a lot! 
Everything worked out great!

Amelie was the perfect host and was there to meet me when I arrived.  She made sure I had everything I needed.  The apartment is beautiful and exactly like in the pictures.  The balcony is perfect for relaxing on a sunny day.  I would definitely stay here again!

The best possible option for my first stay in Paris ever. The apartment was lovely, the rooms are exactely as in the pictures, well actually they are even nicer and the balcony is a huge plus (especially for a nice breakfast in the sun).

Amelie did everything for making the stay as comftable and uncomplicated as possible.

I will definitely come back the next time in Paris!
En quelques minutes vous y découvrirez des amis et un pied à terre confortable qui vous paraîtra déjà familier.
L'appartement est calme , lumineux et très agréable .Bien situé à proximité du tram et du métro , avec de nombreux commerces et restaurants tout proches . Je reviendrai sans hésitation .

L'appartement de charlotte est parfait pour une ou deux personnes. Je suis restée cinq semaines dans son appartement et je me sentais très bien à l'aise. La location est bien aménagé et très chouette. En plus, la prochaine station de métro n'est pas très loin à pied. Charlotte était une bien hôtesse, la communication était simple et rapide et elle s'est toujours mis en courant si tout va bien! Merci encore une fois. :)

Camille's flat was lovely and we enjoyed our stay! 

Those stairs ended up being a great way to work off all the Parisian food!

Camille's apartment was a really lovely place to stay in Paris. It was beautiful, clean and cozy, fully equipped with everything you need. The location was good also, close to metro stops and supermarkets. The view of the Sacre-Coeur from the living room was so pretty too! I did not get to meet Camille herself but she kindly arranged for her nice friend Kentin to meet me for check-in and check-out, and I felt well taken-care of. Thanks for a lovely stay!
cozy and lovely flat in Paris ! Located convenient, close by subway , easy to get anywhere in Paris ! I much enjoy the sunshine from dormer every morning。nice apartment

The flat is lovely, cozy  and very well decorated. The location is convenient and very well connected to public transit.  Despite we didn't meet Camille, her friend Pierre was very kind and gave us useful tips to enjoy the city. Definitely a gem to stay in Paris!

A really charming and cozy roof appartment in montmartre with an amazing view on sacre coure!! Camille is a very nice host: everything was clean and she also provided us a guide of paris. I really recommend it!

Camille n etait pas la mais une amie a elle m a tres bien acceuilli! 
Appartement conforme aux photos , meme sous la chaleur de Paris , le vent circulait ds l appart , tout etait parfait , propre et idealement placé. Une vue sur le sacree coeur et aussi du sport en montant les escaliers ! Donc sejour agreale et camille est tjrs a disposition pour repondre aux questions ! 

Je recommande cet appart !

L appartamento di Camille è bello e molto luminoso e caratteristico, sta al settimo piano senza ascensore, ma ha una vista di Montmartre da togliere il fiato. Camille è molto disponibile e anche il suo amico Pierre, che ci ha accolto in sua assenza, ve lo consigliamo!!!
 Paola e Ettore
Das Appartement ist liebevoll eingerichtet mit einem sehr guten Blick auf Paris. Wir konnten unseren Kurzurlaub wirklich gut genießen.

Camille est très facilement joignable et très arrangeante.
L'appartement est très sympa, confortable et bien équipé.

A friend of Jenna welcomed me and my husband, he was very accommodating with our arrival. He showed around the apartment.
A bottle of rosé was waiting for us in the fridge, how kind !
I think the apartment is even better than on the pictures, very cosy. 
It was really nice to chill, drink tea and listen to the radio in the living room. The bathroom is so pretty and the bedroom very romantic. When in the bedroom we can hear a bit of noise from the street but nothing too disturbing.
The neighborhood is great, everything is at a walking distance. We had brunch at 'Le pain quotidien' then walked to quays.
I would definitely come back.
Jenna is very friendly and easy-going. She accepted my last minute extension of stay. The flat is located at a very convenient neighbourood.

I have stayed 3 months and the overall experience was great. This is a special place with a nice atmosphere. 
+location of the appartment
+quiet
+big place
+clean
+Jenna was very resourceful the only time I had an issue with the toilet
-sometimes you get little "stones" from the ceiling, but not big issue

Overall, great experience.

The house was amazing really our style and we couldn't have chosen a better one, although it wasn't so clean as we wanted. Jenna was really sorry about this and she felt really bad about it. We thank her for her hospitality and we surely think that the next time will be better

Jenna has a fabulous and really unique and spacious Parisian flat. 
Ideally located with lots of bars, restaurants and food stores all very close by. We were easily able to communicate with Jenna and even though we did not meet her Jenna's friends were available to make us feel at home.  Jenna's bedroom is in a cozy cave. We spent a week here and slept well every night. 
Thank You Jenna!

Jenna's friends met me on arrival and explained the basics to me and Jenna left a list of her favorite restaurants etc, which was helpful. The apartment is quite large and seems to be very much based on her personality and is obviously her home rather than a commercial let. The location is fairly very central and convenient and in one of Paris's oldest areas, which had great appeal. I think that some people will love this apartment.

Je recommande ce logement ! Il est plein de charme avec ses murs de pierre, sa chambre en sous sol et vraiment très bien situé, de plus Jenna s'est montrée disponible à notre arrivée comme à notre départ. 
Prévoyez peut-être une paire de bouchons d'oreilles, car une petite fenêtre dans la chambre donne directement sur le trottoir. Une fois cela fait vous passerez un séjour parfait !
Superbe appartement, atypique, avec énormément de cachet, on s'y sent tellement Bien. Nous n'avons pas résisté à l'effet cocon, tout était parfait. Merci pour l'accueil et Les prestations

Très bon accueil par des amis de Jenna. L'appartement est confortable et original, surtout la chambre dans une belle cave voutée. Une remarque importante : le wifi est ok mais impossible de capter les réseaux téléphoniques dans l'appartement
Nice appartment. The big bed was great. The neighborhood is the best. Supermarket across the street and subway near by.

We were in four with my friends and came for our holidays in Paris. 
The appartment is really very nice in a good building, clean and has all the facilities. The location is perfect as well. 
We have got used to the flat very soon, so did not want to leave it at all!
Arthur was very helpful and hospitable! 
Thanks a lot for making our vacations very comfortable!
Cet appartement est parfait pour passer un week-end à Paris! Arthur et sa copine ont tout bien expliqué. Le lit était un peu trop dur pour nous. On a fait du vélo. Les Vélibs sont tout près.
L'appartement est tres propre, clair et calme. Arthur et son frère sont disponibles. Je recommande.

A notre arrivée Arthur a été très arrangeant pour la remise des clefs. 
L'appartement est bien situé, confortable et bien équipé 
Petit plus, la place de parking en sous sol. 
Bref, tres bon séjour.

Bon relationnel avec Arthur.
L'appartement au quatrième étage donne sur l'intérieur de la résidence ce qui est agréable pour passer de bonnes nuits réparatrices. Pratique avec sa place de parking, une supérette au pied de l'immeuble, à 10 minutes à pieds du métro avec sur le chemin de petits Bistros Parisien et restaurants.
Bon séjour agréable.

Se trata de un barrio obrero con muy buenas comunicaciones para hacer turismo. Ademas dispone de parking por lo que salir de Paris a visitar los alrededores es agradable porque no precisas buscar aparcamiento en los alrededores del apartamento. La atencion fue excelente y el apartamento estaba a la altura de nuestras expectativas. Es comodo para descansar despues de un dia de visita por Paris y dispone de todo lo necesario para poder hacer vida en él. La relacion calidad/precio es excelente para tratarse de Paris.
Sin duda alguna repetire.

Outstanding location! Really small but just big enough for two. Super fast wi-fi and nice surroundance.  The bed is not the best, but also not the worst and in apartment we found all that we needed. :) we had a perfect time and had no problem with anything even though we did not even meet Elisabeth. I really recommend that place to people that like good location and do not need a lot of space!

Small, but perfectly located apartment. We walked to the Louvre, shopping, restaurants, the river - all over. The sofa pullout bed was actually very comfortable and the apartment was quiet and tidy. Thanks Elizabeth!!
Great location and great price. One of the nights we stayed the temperature was very high. AC is not advertised, but we overlooked it. Definitely something to consider.

Excellent value for money - the apartment is central and within easy walking distance to important attractions. 10 minute walk to the Louvre; 5 minutes to Les Halles metro station (connects to Gare du Nord train station and CDG airport). The apartment itself is on the smaller side and basic - a sofabed, kitchen (with stove, fridge, and toaster/microwave oven), small, remodeled bathroom. But it has all the necessities for a short stay, and it is very clean. Perfect for solo travelers or couples who want to check out Paris' most famous sites.
Apartment was very comfortable and in an amazing location, short walk to the train station that will take you anywhere you want to go in Paris. Elisabeth was an awesome host from start to finish!

Studio location is in best neighborhood you would want to be in Paris. Everything you would want to see and visit is 5 minutes walking distance. Apartment has a welcoming aura, with all the necessities for a short stay.  Host was considerate and communicated before our arrival to let us know of the amenities that she was providing. Highly recommended.

This was a great place to stay for our one night stop in Paris. The location is excellent, very close to major sites and metro lines. Elisabeth was an extremely accommodating host and worked around our flight times. C'est tres bon!

Great location. Compact and convenient. Close to everything and easy to get around. Elisabeth is a great host and is quick to respond to any questions that you may have. She left detailed instructions on accessing and entry including finding keys wifi pw etc. stayed twice and would definitely return.
Elisabeth did everything she can to make our stay the best she can, but in my opinion the apartment its ok but not the best.

This apartment is in a fabulous location, really close to the Louvre and the metro.
We struggled a bit with the bed, as it is a fold out couch it was very uncomfortable and made a LOT of noise every time someone moved therefore waking the other person up. Loud, thumping music from the bar below also made for difficult sleep.
There was no hot water for the duration of our stay however I'm not sure if that was to do with the apartment or the works going on outside.
However, over all the apartment was a good space to have as our base and Elisabeth put in extra effort to ensure the apartment was equipped with extras like toiletries and coffee.
Thank you Elisabeth for your quick communication and letting us store our bags after checkout :)

First of all , value for money, with great location ! We did not meet Elisabeth, but the check in was easier and very clear information given. The apartment is at 2nd floor without elevator but not an issue with me even as i'm traveling with a large suit case. The room is fine and the sofa bed is comfortable. The private kitchen is prefect, all amenities/toiletries is fully supplied!

Extremely good location! Was easy to find, easy check in with self check in key. Flat was clean and had everything we required, even some nice coffee. It is a tiny place, but bed was good size for two, good shower, and we did not use kitchen that much. Neighborhood is lovely with lots of nice places to eat and drink, la Halle and convenient train/metro stop 2 min away. Most attractions walking distance. Great place to stay if you not planning to spend much time indoors. Elizabeth was lovely and swift with answers, thank you a lot!

The location was fantastic. Élisabeth was very helpful with instructions on finding the apartment and getting in using the key safe. Bars, supermarket, transport and the Louvre, all just minutes away! The apartment is small but acted as a perfect base for us to sleep in after a day of exploring the city! My partner and I's first Air BnB stay and we would definitely recommend!
Nice place near Louvre. Perfect for a short stay in Paris.

Perfect location within walking distance to the Louvre, Musée d'Orsay, Pont Neuf and Jardins de Tuileries. The studio is very small, only just big enough for 2 people but it does come equipped with everything you need for your stay; towels, shampoo, tea/coffee. Everything was really clean, the bedding was lovely. The only downside is that the room is quite dark with the window looking out towards another flat- you can't see the sky from the room. But, this is more than made up for by the brilliant neighbourhood and location. Elisabeth was a perfect host in terms of communication and we would definitely stay again!
Dest deal ever if you want to stay in Paris on a small budget. Very nice and clean appartment and a great host!

We really enjoyed our stay in Paris. The apartment is small but it has everything you need. There is a bar underneath the apartment so on the weekend it got a little bit noisy but the location is really nice and close to the subway. We spent most of the day exploring Paris and were really tired at night, so the noise didn't really bother us. Elisabeth put out tea and espresso for us which I think was really cute. And she was really nice and helpful during our stay. Merci Elisabeth :)

Elisabeth is a great host. She wrote to us before arriving and she was helpful doing our stay.  Elisabeth studio has a great location in central Paris. It right next to a big metro and you can walk to all the areas in the city. The studio is small with very little incoming light  and fit just 2 people. If your plans are to be out in Paris all day the studio is perfect.

We were statisfied with this accommodation. The location was very good, appartement was small but included all you would need for a short trip where you dont spend a lot of time indoors. Elizabeth was very helpful and communication went well.

This is a great value place to stay that is within easy 5-10 mins walk to Louvre. Elisabeth is a great host and available constantly for help with anything. Great place and I hop to stay again in the future.
You can relax in a pleasant and peaceful place!
Great stay, super nice apartment and communication with Zoé worked perfectly.

Zoe and Aurelian's flat is in a great area, close to cafes, restaurants and the metro. It was easy to walk to the River Seine and to find many other interesting places. The flat is compact, with 4 sets of stairs to climb- dont bring big luggage! We had everything we needed for a good stay in Paris and Aurelian gave us good information about things to do and places to go.

Séjour très agréable dans un quartier magnifique! L'appartement de Zoé est très bien aménagé et propre. Elle nous a aussi donné toutes les informations nécessaires pour récupérer les clés en simplicité. 
Appartement et hôte conseillés!!
Spacious and well decorated apartment in one of the best neighborhoods in Paris

This place is about 7 minutes walk from two metro lines. It's in the 17th arrondisement but we reached the Louvre in 30 minutes and walked all along the Seine. Even the walk back from the Eiffel tower wasn't terrible. There is one bed and one fold out couch. No tv. There is WiFi and it worked fine. She has a lot of dvds too. The bathroom is a little cramped. Also its on the third floor no elevator. Overall the place was great. I would stay here again.
The apartment is located in a nice area, full of bars and restaurants. Love it!!!
We had a great time in Anaïs apartment, the location is perfect, easy to get to places and also a nice neighbourhood with shops and restaurants. I recommended it!
Nice spacious apartment in a lovely part of town. Anais was very accommodating for our arrival. We would come back again
Very nice location. Good welcome. Good size apartment.

Séjour rapide mais agréable, l’appartement est très lumineux et fonctionnel.
Le quartier est très sympa.
Nous avons passé deux nuits agréables dans l’appartement d’Anaïs qui nous a bien accueillies. L’appartement était bien rangé et joliment décoré. Le quartier est animé mais reste calme la nuit.
Appartement charmant, propre et bien équipé, parfait pour des courts comme des longs séjours. Idéalement situé dans le quartier des batignolles. La communication avec Anais était facile.

Malgre une arrivée tardive, bonne organisation pour récupérer les clés. 
Tout était ok

L'appartement d'Anaïs est très bien, fonctionnel, agréable, et dans un quartier très sympa avec plusieurs accès de métro qui rendent les déplacements faciles et pas trop longs, à proximité des commerces, des restos et des bars. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Anaïs mais son amie très sympa nous a apporté les clés et présenté le logement. On s'y est senti très à l'aise, et nous avons passé un super petit weekend en amoureux.
très bien, très bien placé.
Très bel appartement au calme.

Je viens de passer 5 jours dans l'appartement d'Anais ,et j'ai été enchantée . Très bonne communication avec Anais . Horaires d'arrivée et de départ flexibles . Appartement impeccable, chaleureux, meublé avec goût . Très bien situé. Je recommande fortement cet appartement où je retournerai.

L'appartamento di Anais é molto carino e in una posizione tranquilla e strategica di Parigi. A pochi minuti si trova la Place de Clichy, che é un crocevia di metro e autobus e se si vuole fare una piccola passeggiata si puo' arrivare a piedi a Montmartre, Moulin Rouge, La Fayette e nel centro di Parigi. Anais é stata molto disponibile e cordiale con noi.

Communication très facile avec Anais, elle m'a accueilli malgré l'heure tardive. Son appartement est parfait, propre, bien équipé, la chambre est très calme et le salon agréable. Il est super bien situé pour qui aime le quartier Batignolles, et c'est mon cas, donc super séjour, je reviendrais.
Le séjour s'est très bien passé. Mathieu
Appart très sympa et chaleureux, très bien placé.Merci à Anais pour son accueil ! Je garde cette adresse sous le coude!

Le parfait petit appartement près de Montmartre!
Même si nous sommes arrivé presque à minuit - Anais nous a chaleureusement accueilli dans sa maison amoureusement préparés - que nous pouvions tout simplement tomber dans un lit fraîchement préparé. 
Un spacieux, lumineux, propre espace en milieu de Paris hanche, mais calme pour une bonne nuit de repos. 
Il ya des grands cafés et pubs, petites boutiques et des boulangeries, un parc près de la maison, les vélos de vélib à seulement 200 mètres, et la parfaite petite Mediteranian Café d'à côté .. 
J'ai trouvé tout pour un merveilleux moment à Paris *

+ Bien placé , logement conforme, quartier vivant
 -  logement fumeur, style étudiant

Mais préparation sommaire à la location ...
peut mieux faire car bon potentiel ;)

Nous sommes resté 3 nuits chez Nina et ce fut un séjour très agréable et relaxant. Le domicile, situé dans le 16ème, est parfait pour un couple (nous étions 2), très chaleureux et bien équipé. Un grand merci à Nina pour sa flexibilité et ses réponses spontanées à toutes nos questions.
séjour agréable chez Nina, bel appartement fonctionnel et idéalement situé pour moi, je reviendrais avec plaisir. a recommander.
Nina est une personne à recommander, tout comme son petit cocon. Merci encore pour cet accueil ;-)

We stayed at Antoine's place for 4 nights this summer. The apartment is super pleasant, on the 5th floor in a nice Parisian building with elevator. The neighborhood is great with many shops, bars and restaurant at direct proximity.

The host was extremely responsive, check in was really smooth as someone was there to give us the keys and explain everything to us. The place is exactly as described in the pictures. 

The only small thing is that the internet turned out to be unreliable, but the host was in the process of fixing that, and accommodated us with a wifi/4G dongle as we were staying there.

I recommend staying at Antoine if you are visiting Paris.

Antoine was very freindly with us. Appartment completely corresponds to the descriptions of the site, clear and quite. The place of city was very comfortable, nearby metro, supermarkets and cafes. We've enjoyed our visit in Paris!

My girlfriend and I had the most enjoyable stay at Antoine and Margot's apartment! We felt like staying in most of the time even though it was our first trip to Paris. The location of it was within less than a minute walk to Ménilmontant Metro station.

There were plenty of amenities in close vicinity such as a supermarket and good places to eat. Check in was very smoothly handled by Antoine's friend even though we were held up by traffic for quite some time. 

Communication with Antoine prior to our stay was clear and friendly! He also left recommendations and followed up very quickly with good places to visit with instructions on how to get there during our trip. 

The interior of the apartment was exactly how the pictures depicted it! It was even more charming than expected and it was extremely cosy and bright! Wifi was also very reliable and speedy. We couldn't think of a better place to stay in if we visit Paris again! 

Thanks so much Antoine & Margot, it was a pleasure staying at your apartment.

Antonine's place was exactly as it appears in the photos and well located almost in front of the metro station with a range of bars and restaurants in the neighbourhood. 
Antonine was helpful and responsive and had left maps and information for us about Paris. He had even supplied a couple of umbrellas in case we needed them. The kitchen was well equipped and there was a washer-dryer which was very useful. 
Overall, an excellent stay and I would recommend this place.

The House is cosy and comfortable. 

There is a stop of metro just in front of the building. Below there is a Macdonalds and several nearby supermarkets. 

The neighborhood is quiet and on Tuesdays and Fridays you have a market. 

Antoine is very attentive. Let us planes of the metro, some tips on the neighborhood and drinks in the fridge. We had many facilities to pick up and leave the keys in the apartment when we wanted to. 

Thank you very much for everything!

Fantastic location for 3 first timers to Paris. Very close to two major metro/train stations that easily got us to anything we wanted to see anywhere in the city. Accommodations were small but tidy, exactly as you’d expect for a Paris flat, and everything was exactly as advertised. Natalie welcomed us with a few things in the fridge and pantry, answered questions about a nearby laundromat (200 yards away), and was extremely accommodating about a late checkout. Notable: the owners clearly live in the flat, which was totally fine for us, but since many AirBnBs hardly seem lived in, its worth noting. They also apparently have a cat (not on the premises during our stay) Again, not an issue for us, but worth knowing.

Natalia's place was wonderful. I felt very comfortable and enjoyed looking at her great library of French books. Natalia communicated well and answered all of our questions... she left us a treat on the table, too. I would definitely recommend a stay here!

Natalia was very kind and communication is great with her. We asked Natalia for an early check in and she could arrange it. The location of the apartment was ok for us as we were arriving and leaving Paris by Gare de l’est (otherwise, I would have probably chosen a different location). The apartment was ok. Natalia has all the necessary stuffs in kitchen to cook you meals. That was great! The apartment was a bit disorganized and I was expecting more cleanliness. However, what I have learnt after 4 times Airbnb in Paris is that the order/cleanliness average of an Airbnb in Paris is much lower than in other European cities. If you really care about cleanliness then you need to pay a 5 stars hotel or a very fancy Airbnb. As I plan to continue going to Paris, I really hope to find someday an excellent Airbnb experience.
The apartment is nice and comfortable, it is easy to move to different places in the centre of París.

Cosy, good value for money, quiet considering liveliness of the area. Good location for anyone using Eurostar and Gare du Nord as a base from which to travel. Nice to be welcomed by a bottle of wine and some essential food supplies. Thanks Natalia!

It was an absolute pleasure to stay at Natalias place. Its only 5 minutes walk from Gare Du Nord if you are arriving there. We arrived late at night and had no problems finding it or accessing the address which is in a courtyard behind the main street. Natalias place is wonderfully eclectic. She is an artist, philosopher and film maker according to her book collection! I was there with my daughter for her birthday and she thought it was wonderful to stay in an apartment that someone actually lives in rather than a rental or a hotel.It has a beautiful patio area in which you can have breakfast if the weather is good. Natalias place has everything you need for a stay in Paris and there are supermarkets and cafes very close, as well as easy access to the Metro system for exploring Paris. I would recommend Natalias place to anyone who is visiting Paris, her commmunication in setting up the booking was really good and one of her family members was there to let us in when we arrived which was really nice. Many thanks Natalia.

Her Location is closed to the Train Station Gare de Est. It was clean an very nice. We enjoyed our visit and her loft, too.
Thanks for everything.
Very cute apartment, we had a great time there.

Very close to the metro and train station (North, East). We were warmly welcomed and had a really nice trip in Paris. The place is clean and quiet. Really recommend to family or couples. Thank you Natalia.
Small apartment with the paris charm, comfortable bed. Next to the public transport, very sweet and friendly host.
It's been great at Natalia's... Everything was awesome...No single problem...surely recommended... Very close to Gare De Nord.

The place is as described, the usual nuances of a home close to train station. The connectivity to go around Paris is great. Would definitely recommend this if you're planning to just use to sleep at night and roam around the day.

We had a great stay at Natalia's apartment. The place is perfectly located for people traveling from gare du Nord and And easily connectable via metro with the rest of Paris. The place was clean, perfect for a couple or a small family and the host very communicative and approachable. We loved our stay.

This was my best AirBnb experience thus far. We didn't get to meet Natalia unfortunately but her step-mother Marie-Christine met us and was more than accommodating. The apartment was clean, spacious and looked just like the pictures, Natalia even left us a bottle of wine and some snacks to enjoy upon our arrival. The building is very safe, very quiet, close to many different shops, markets, and restaurants. The closest train and metro station is about a 2 minute walk away which was amazing. I highly recommend this AirBnb to anyone traveling to Paris.

Appartamento in posizione ottima, consente di prendere a qualche centinaia di metri sia la metro che la RER. Natalia gentilissima sia nel check-in/out (flessibile) sia nella risoluzione di eventuali problemi durante il soggiorno. 
Pulizia non perfetta ma accettabile; unica nota un po’ piccolo, tra cui anche il secondo letto, per 4 adulti.
Ma alla fine dei conti, per quanto pagato è andato più che bene.

Bel appartement tel que décrit dans l'annonce: propre, spacieux et cozy.  La situation  de l'appartement est également parfaite si l'on souhaite voyager depuis la gare du Nord. 
J'ai été chaleureusement accueillie par Marie-Christine, avec une bouteille de vin.Natalia ainsi que sa belle-mère ont été disponible durant l'intégralité de mon voyage. 
Mon séjour fut donc très appréciable et je me suis sentie comme chez moi !

Bonjour.
Natalia est très réactive et agréable. Son ami nous a accueilli à l'heure et avec chaleur. Un bouteille de vin nous attendait à notre arrivée.
L'appartement situé en arrière cour au rdc est très au calme. Etant en hiver nous n'avons pas pu profiter de la cour privée sur laquelle donne l'appartement.
Celui ci est cosi et bien situé entre la gare du Nord et Gare de l'Est, a proximité du Métro et RER. 
Le confort est présent pais attention pas de micro-ondes et TV. Le deuxième lit est une chauffeuse.

Io, la mia amica e i nostri due figli abbiamo passato 4 fantastici giorni nell'alloggio di Natalia. L'accoglienza è stata veramente gentile, disponibile, calorosa. Tutto secondo descrizione fotografica e scritta, anzi, sono stati molto gentili a farci trovare un bel mazzo di fiori, una bottiglia di vino e alcune cose in dispensa, ci siamo sentite a casa. Un dettaglio che a me ha fatto piacere sono la quantità di libri di vario genere presenti nella casa.
La zona è ottimamente servita avendo la Gare du Nord a due minuti di strada e non ho mai avuto la sensazione di poca sicurezza. Sotto casa ci sono negozi e un supermercato.
Raccomando questa soluzione anche per l'ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.

Awesome location, in a great local neighborhood with a market right in front of the place. Ideally located for transport given its proximity to one of the main train stations. Really nice apartment with great art and a balcony overlooking a green backyard. Very happy with my experience at Malika's apartment.

Great space in a great location for visiting the city! Malika was able to accommodate us arriving a few hours before the regular check in time and met us at the apartment to show us the amenities, which we appreciated.
