The place is cosy and sweet. It has a very nice style. The communication with Anne-Charlotte was super easy and she seems to be very caring. All in all a good place to stay. Unfortunately the bed is quite uncomfortable and you can tell that the laundry is washed in a smokers place.

We had such an amazing stay in Anne-Charlotte's flat! It's so cute and stylish, the pictures show how it is, nothing came as a bad surprise. Anne-Charlotte is a great host, quick and friendly with messages. I'd recommend this place to my friends! But maybe if you're suffering from back issues the bed is not suitable for you other than that it's a perfect spot for a couple or two friends. :)

Everything went easy and smooth with check in and check out. Anne-Charlotte was very flexible and good with communication. The flat was lovely with a great view and a nice and safe backyard. Everything was perfect except the bed which was very noisy and not good if you have problems with your back. Perfect place to stay if you will visit Paris and very close to Metro, Sacre Cæur and Montmatre!

Really Cosy Apartment near everything you need in the 9th Arrondissement. 100% clean with everything we needed. The host was really kind to us.

We recommend the place.

It's a charismatic and sweet place in a great location. It's tiny (sofa or bed, but not both) but in a cosy way. The bed is maybe a bit loud (considering the thin walls I hardly dared to turn at night). But else it's really quiet considering the central location. The host is charming to match her flat. The view out of the window is lovely. Very recommended.

The place was as described and shown on the photo with a very tasty decoration. Even if it is rather small the space is well optimized and this is big enough for 2 people to sleep for few days. The flat was also very clean and the communication with Anne-Charlotte very easy and reactive. The flat is not on the street side so rather quite even if you can easily hear the neighbors (which were quite when we were there). The neighborhood is very cool with a lot of café, bars, restaurants and local shops. This very close to a metro station and even at walking distance to main Paris attractions. We recommend it for a 3 or 4 days stay in Paris. Thanks!

My best friend and I stayed here and it was the best air b'n'b experience either of us have had! Such a beautiful apartment, great location and Anne-Charlotte gave us so many thoughtful recommendations for our trip! We both can't wait to return again hopefully soon to explore more!!

A very cute apartment, I loved spending time in there. Even nicer in real life than in the photos. Anne-Charlotte was a wonderful and accommodating host, very easy to communicate with. The only snag is a lack of WiFi which I knew about at the time of booking, but I didn’t realize how much I’ll miss.

I went with my girlfriend for a couple of days to anne apartment to meet paris. The experience was excellent. It is located near to gare du nord train station and it is also near of a lot of bus and metro stops. The communication with the host was perfect.
Very cosy but vibrant apartment and good location. Anne-charlotte was a very responsive and helpful host with some great suggestions.

Appart sympa car vintage.Très bien placé et calme.
Le seul hic la taille de la sdb.
Cécile est très accueillante, très agréable et arrangeante. Je recommande.

Guadalupe's place is in a perfect location - there is a métro stop seconds from the apartment, plus many bus lines within a 5 minute walk, which I used more than the métro to be able to see different places above ground. To qualify my response about soap, there is handsoap at the bathroom and kitchen sinks. I always travel with my own bath soap and shampoo so it's never a problem. Guadalupe was very helpful pointing out the amenities of the apartment and offering tips for local restaurants and museum exhibitions. This was by far one of the best AirBnB experiences I've ever had.  Highly recommended!!

I very much enjoyed my stay in Guadalupe’s place. It has high ceilings, spacious for Paris, comfortable bed and kitchen has everything you need, it’s in a fun area with lots of shops and easy walk to metro. Guadalupe is a great host and pleasant to deal with.

Guadalupe's flat was the perfect spot for my wife and I on our last visit to Paris. With a prime location just steps from the Saint Maur metro stop,  you can get wherever you want quick. In this area of the 11e you are at ground zero for Paris's current eating scene and what feels like a very charming and bohemian neighborhood. The apartment has everything you need as a traveller and was spotless. The double pained windows in the bedroom provide you with complete silence for sleeping. The adjustable bed is also super comfortable and has more then enough space for two. Guadalupe was a gracious host, meeting us upon arrival and giving several great local recommendations. I highly recommend this apartment.

Guadalupe's 3rd floor (US) walk-up, just off the trendy rue Oberkampf, was a wonderful base for 13 nights. A rare Airbnb that doesn't scream IKEA, it has an old world charm yet is comfortably furnished. The compact kitchen is surprisingly well equipped and functional. The bathroom is a bit tight (not for those over 200 lbs!) but everything functions well, including the little washing machine (you dry clothes on a rack). The WC is separate, which is considered desirable in Paris. I was a bit hesitant to book with so few photos but they showed what you needed to know.

There's noise from a couple of bars at night, but the bedroom window is triple glazed and very quiet (open windows in summer might be an issue). Metro is half a block away, and nearby Oberkampf is a merchant street with plenty of shops and restaurants. Guadalupe was delightful and communication was excellent. I'd happily stay here again.

(19th century walk-up buildings in Paris have 6-inch high steps, so they're much easier to climb than American stairs)
Very comfortable few days here, a cosy, typical Paris apartment, handy to everything, and very attentive host

Really enjoyed my stay here. Check-in went smoothly and Guadelupe is such a sweet person! 
The apartment is very cosy, you instantly get this feeling as if you’re at your own home. There’s everything you may need during your stay. Super clean, spacious and bright. I must admit that my perfect first time in Paris wouldn’t be as good without this cute place. Thank you, Guadelupe!
Great host, location, value and apartment. Highly recommend !
Very nice appartment! Very well located! Everything was perfect and the host G. was very attentive and so super frendly 10 of 10
Guadalupe's flat is situated in a very lively neighborhood. The streets are filled with bars and fantastic restaurants to eat out. The place is neat and very clean and nothing is missing.

Ohhh the BEST Host and the BEST Flat. 
Good location, with All the tips for the city. 
The flat is well located and there is So much light. We was really happy to spend our days here. Shops and nice coffee places. 
Mega Hipster, young, lively area. 
Dont hesitate to contact her, she's really nice.
very center located apartment.easy access to metro just 2 mins walke. the room was very clean and comfy.

Appartement très agréable, bien équipé, fonctionnel et bien décoré.
Le quartier est très vivant, le métro tout près. Je recommande chaleureusement. Guadalupe est une hôtesse très sympathique.

Appartement tres bien situe, agréable et conforme a la description.
Guadalupe est une hote charmante et pleine d"attention qui rendre votre séjour facile et agréable.
Appartement ancien très agréable. Hôte excellent. Très bonne communication. Je garderai un bon souvenir. Je recommande
Appartement vieillissant qui mériterait d'être rénové car il a un fort potentiel.
Tout est parfait

Hello Xianglu and everybody,
We spent very nice, exactly splendend
time in Paris. Thank You for your apartment. We have had everything we was need. The position of your apartment is very good ..markets, metro station, bars. I hope that we will see again soon.

Me encanto el departamento. La ubicación es muy buena y el precio también. Tiene todo lo básico para ahorrar dinero: refrigerador, wifi, cocina, horno, un balcón. Hay un súper,recado literalmente al frente del departamento. Además Xianglu es muy amable y siempre estuvo pendiente de cualquier cosa que necesitara. Muy buen tipo. (Incluso me guardo una maleta por varios días mientras viajaba por otros países de Europa) muy buena experiencia ! Ah, y tiene un metro al lado del departamento que te conecta con las principales atracciones de París!
Great host, nice place to stay!
Nice apartment in a cozy neighborhood!

Un accueil sympathique , réactivité ds la réponse. Conforme aux photographies.
Quartier animé et très agréable.
Magnifique appartement en plein coeur de la buttes aux cailles, spacieux et parfaitement propre ! Yannis s'est montré très accueillant et flexible,  je recommande sans hésiter
Magnifique appartement tout de bois vêtu, en plein quartier de la Butte-aux-Cailles, nous avons passé un séjour exceptionnel chez Yannis, si vous avez la chance de pouvoir y loger, n'hésitez pas !

Très bel appartement, grand et lumineux, situé dans un quartier très vivant, avec plein de restos et de bars. Yannis est un hôte très sympa et arrangeant. 
Merci pour tout Yannis et à une prochaine fois peut être!
Appartement spacieux et très agréable à vivre. il y a tout le nécessaire pour s'y sentir bien dans un quartier très sympa.

Très bel appartement, dans un joli quartier animé (restaurants et bars à deux pas), proche du métro.
Yannis nous a très bien accueilli et s'est montré disponible et flexible.
Je recommande!!
This is a fantastic place! The location is superb, it is super comfortable, and the hosts are so nice! Would definitely recommend!

The apartment is a perfect choice for anyone seeking a very centric, comfortable (even for Paris standards), sparkling clean, stylishly decorated apartment. The living room is cozy, the kitchen as well as the restroom has everything you need,the bedroom is very spacious and confortable. The place is so charming that sometimes you don't want to leave !!!

A few minutes away from the Opera district as well as the Louvre Museum, everything (from stores, to great restaurants, to supermarkets, to different convenient metro lines) is at your doorstep. Unless you're looking for a location on the left bank of Paris, I cannot think of a better location on the right bank.

The owners are charming and eager to make the experience as positive as possible. They are jovial, polite, extremely responsive and very respectful. Make no mistake, this is the place where you want to stay during your Paris vacation.

L’appartamento di Cyril e Hélén è fantastico, anche più bello dal vivo che in foto, molto accogliente e arredato con gusto e personalità.
Loro sono stati gentilissimi dalla comunicazione al check-in, sempre disponibili, reattivi e molto amichevoli. 
La zona è centralissima e comodissima ma l’appartamento è molto tranquillo.
Non potremmo consigliare di meglio e non vediamo l’ora di tornare!

joli appartement parisien, propre et vivant. On se sent bien à l'intérieur, c'est calme tout en étant en plein coeur de Paris.
L'ascenseur n'est qu'au premier étage donc pas utile pour le deuxième.
très bonne communication avec les propriétaires.
Great location in walkable nieghborhood. Easy access to metro and tons of restuarants.
Camille's apartment was quintessentially French.  Well appointed, comfortable, and convenient to the Pigalle metro station.

My husband and I loved staying at Camille’s place - beautiful and spacious with a great balcony. We loved how close it was to the metro and greats bars/restaurants as well. We can definitely see ourselves visiting again!

If you're looking for the perfect place to rest your head while discovering Pigalle and the rest of Paris, look no further than Camille's apartment. It's perfect! The pictures really don't do it justice. It's spacious. The kitchen is great. The bathroom and shower is amazing and a welcome sight after exploring the city. There's a grocery store not 1 minute walk from the apartment for you to pick up wine and all you need to snack on. Camille was also always available to answer questions and was an awesome host. I'll definitely be renting from her in the future!

Camille's apartment was perfect for my girlfriend and I who spent 8 days in Paris over New Years. 

There are many excellent night life spots on the block, and Rue De Martyr's is a 5 minute walk away with limitless local cheese/wine/meat/fish/everything vendors, and was one of our favorite parts of Paris.

Camille was responsive and very helpful to us in getting checked in.  Everything worked out great.

I had a brilliant stay at Camille's apartment and highly recommend it. Everything was great from Camille's warm welcome and attentive communication to her warm and comfortable apartment and her bustling neighborhood smack in the center of the Pigalle entertainment quarter. A wonderful find!

Camille's apartment exudes retro chic and is a brilliant place to stay; you have everything you need both in the apartment and in the neighbourhood. As the other reviews say, it is actually a minute away from the métro and seconds away from as many bars, restaurants and food shops as you could hope to find. We particularly enjoyed the French Bastards bakery just round the corner but you are spoiled for choice. We would also recommend Peppe Pizzeria at the top of the Rue des Martyres. Unlike many Parisian apartments, there is a lift (one of the world's smallest) which is a boon after a long day seeing the sights. The very many bars and clubs in the area can mean it is loud at night in Pigalle, but because Camille's bedroom is behind the living room, you can sleep undisturbed. It is a real privilege to get to stay in someone's home like this, and we can't recommend it highly enough. Thank you!

Camille’s apartment is marvelous ❤️ made me feel like home. Apartment provides everything you might need for your stay. Building has tiny elevator, that was game changer for me - i had huge suitcase. 
The location is very convenient, minute walk from Pigalle metro station. 15 minute walk to sacre cour and beautiful monmartre. Great place for those who want to explore Paris. Communication with Camille is easy and, more importantly, pleasant and smooth. Would recommend to my friends and family.

Perfect place to stay in the lively and charming neighbour. Camille was always responsive and very proactive in her approach. She left all the necessary instructions and great recommendations in the apartment and arranged a late check-in for me. The place is spacious and clean, with beautiful windows great balcony. The apartment has impeccable decor it makes you feel you are in Paris as soon as you enter the building. The area has everything you need, charming cafes, brasseries, and restaurants, local bakeries, and it is perfectly connected with the rest of the city. I mostly walked everywhere, but you can get one bus or metro to get to all the touristy places in less than 20 minutes. Spent ten days in Camille's apartment, and when I return to Paris, this will be my place to go. Thank you for everything!
The apartment is great, it’s nicely decorated and had everything we needed. The location in nice as well, very close to the metro station and easy to go to every other region.
Camille was very helpful with any little issues that we had.  The apartment is very Parisian and retro, and well situated with the Metro station to get in and around all of Paris.

Amazing apartment , me and my boyfrined stayed here for 10 days and it was just perfect 
colorful and pulsing neighborhood in the heart of montmarte the area we ended up loving the most lots of shops and resturants and people and beautiful scenes
 very parisian.
 literally one minute away from metro and close to evrything 
the apartment itself is so beautiful well kept and comfortable.
host was very very kind and had solutions to all problems with landing late at night  
in fact when i go back to paris i'm gonna try to go back to this apartment if possible . thank you Camille xoxo

Camille was a lovely host with a beautiful apartment. Communication was always quick and even though she was not in Paris during my stay, any questions were answered right away. The room itself is very clean and much wider than the pictures show. I would absolutely  love to stay again :)

Location is absolutely awesome! Great neighborhood with lots happening. Camille’s touches in the home is the cherry on top. Amenities are top of the range. Spacious and warm. Would recommend for sure.
Great location and flat.. super stylish
L’appartement de Camille est très agréable et bien aménagé. L’accueil est parfait. Bref, tout était là pour que nous passions un agréable séjour

Camille var mycket flexibel med incheckningen trots att vi kom sent på kvällen, det uppskattade vi mycket! Lägenheten är supermysig, personlig, praktisk och är enkel att hitta till. Gatan är livlig men man störs inte på natten då sovrummet ligger åt en lugn gård. Det bästa av två världar 🤩 Vi trivdes väldigt bra och rekommenderar till alla! Camille är också snabb och trevlig att kommunicera med!
Tack 🙏🏼
Un appartement très confortable, très pratique, très silencieux. Camille l'a décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Elle a été particulièrement accueillante. Nous conseillons vivement son logement.

O apartamento é amplo para 2 pessoas, claro, limpo,  bem localizado e equipado.
As fotografias correspondem à realidade do apartamento.
Eu o recomendo e retorno, se possível.

Séjour très agréable chez Camille, super emplacement dans un quartier animé au coeur de Paris,  l'appartement est très propre, cosy, joliment décoré, la chambre est au calme. A louer sans se poser de questions!

The flat is very peaceful and has great views. It’s clean and comfortable, has a good functioning kitchen and is in a great location. Many bars and restaurants in the local area plus an occasional outside market. Walk from Gare du Nord in about 35 mins.
Very good apartment, we were very lucky to find Marjolaine as host

We really loved our stay when visiting Paris. The apartment is close to lots of bars and restaurants along the canal as well as a 5 min walk to the closest metro. We will be recommending this place to family and friends when they look to travel to Paris, thank you for making our stay so enjoyable!

Excellent appartement, particulièrement bien situé. Marjolaine est extrêmement arrangeante
C’était parfait, je recommande !
Nous avons passées un trés bon weekend chez Marjolaine, quartier très sympa, hôte réactive et appartement confortable avec une belle vue. Je recommande!
L’appartement est très agréable et la vue est superbe ! Marjolaine est une hôte très sympathique et arrangeante, je ne peux que vivement recommander son logement pour vos séjours parisiens !
Super Hôte, super accueil et très arrangeante! Merci beaucoup Marjolaine!

L'appartement de Marjolaine offre une vue incroyable sur le bassin de la Villette. Bien que situé dans un quartier animé, il est calme et agréable à vivre. Marjolaine a par ailleurs été une hôte attentive, arrangeante et réactive, à la communication très facile. J'y retournerais sans hésitation !
Un apartamento hermoso. Muy cerca de la estación del metro lo que no nos impidió movilizarnos a nuestro gusto. Tiene una vista muy bonita.
Marjolaine est une hôte réactive et attentionnée. Son appartement est parfaitement situé avec une super vue sur le canal et à proximité du parc de la Villette. Appartement idéal, je recommande.

Claire was very helpful and she responded to every single question immediately. She is really sweet! 
The place is very nice, clean, lots of storage for your clothes. The neighborhood is just great. The apartment windows face the interior court, so it is quiet like in a country side, however in the block you can find places from the fanciest (and a very nice vegetarian place) to the cheapest and coolest you can find in Paris. Nice 15 min walk to Galeries Lafayette, different metro stations are very close, bio grocery store 5 min walk and a Carrefour on the corner of the street opened till 11 pm, rare thing in Paris! I come to Paris several times a year for my studies, so will definitely book this place for my next stay.
Sejour très agréable, l'appartement est très bien situé à proximité du métro Sentier et des commerces. Appartement calme, propre, lumineux, lit confortable. Je le recommande sans hésiter.

Awesome stay! Clément’s place was very cozy, comfortable and perfect for my stay in Paris. It’s close to many great sights and Clément was the consummate host. He pleasantly responded right away to questions and was very helpful and informative when it came to restaurants and other places to visit. I would definitely stay at Clément’s again. It's great value for the price.

Great spacious apartment, perfect for two people. In a great location, close to local bakeries, coffee shops and supermarkets. Facing an internal garden, perfect for a peaceful night's sleep. Clèment was a brilliant host - friendly, responsive and gave us some local recommendations which were very helpful. The appartment is a little gem in the centre of Paris ! We loved it.

we had a fantastic stay. quiet and safe neighborhood close to metro, shops, restaurants and cafes. some attractions can be reached on foot. we received excellent recommendations for restaurants and places to see. a big thank you!

Clément was an amazing host, we booked on the same day as arrival due to an issue with other accomodation and Clément was able to accommodate us immediately. The apartment is in a safe, quiet but central area and has all amenities you could need for a short or long stay.
Great location and very confortable. Communication with Clément was excellent.
Clement is very friendly and helpful. The apartment is in a central location and clean. I am happy to recommend it.

Que dire de plus que tous les commentaires élogieux et justifiés ci dessous ? L'appartement de Clément est agréable, confortable, propre, clair. Il est "habité" mais juste ce qu'il faut pour que l'on se sente  quand même un peu chez soi. Il est situé au 1er étage d'un immeuble bien tenu, dans un quartier agréable et bien placé au niveau des transports en commun. Nous n'avons pas rencontré Clément du fait d'un retard d'une journée de notre part mais tous les échanges ont été sympathiques et fluides. Merci Clément !

Le logement est à l'image de son hôte. Accueillant, chaleureux, de bon goût et on s'y sent chez soi. N'y passer que deux nuits fut une déchirure et je ne pense qu'à y revenir. La meilleure expérience Airbnb de ma vie.
Clément est très sympa et arrangeant, l'appartement est impeccable! :)

Apparemment très chaleureux et décorer avec goût.
Idéalement situé au cœur d'un quartier vivant avec de nombreux commère à proximité
Great location right next to subway stations. Cozy and fit for four good friends! We had a great time at Sabrina's flat.
Good sized place with well equipped kitchen. Close to public transport and bars, restaurants, grocery stores close by. Sabrina was always ready to reply quick to any questions there were.
Bien préparé, petit mais très bien pour un séjour de courte ou moyenne durée, bien situé
buen apartamento para pasar una estancia corta, con supermercados y metros cerca, sabrina muy amable y correcta, siempre dispuesta a resolver nuestras dudas
La communication avec l'hôte est excellente. Elle nous a mis dans de bonnes dispositions pour notre arrivée dans l'appart.

Ronan is awesome!!  His communication was excellent.  He provided detailed directions to his apartment from Gare du Nord.  The directions were spot on.  His apartment was very easy to find.  Unfortunately, our train from London to Paris was delayed.  Ronan was so kind to wait up for us and to make sure we arrived okay.  Ronan helped us with our luggage up 4 flights of stairs.  He showed us where everything is located in the apartment and provided us with the wifi instructions.  Ronan also prepared a binder that consisted of nearby restaurants, cafes, bars and tourist brochures.  He also left manuals and instructions for the washer, toaster and TV.  He was very detailed and organized.  The apartment is a good size for a couple.  I particular love the artwork displayed on the wall.  It had everything we needed for a week in Paris.  It's in a good location.  The apartment is located between two metro stations off the 5 and 7 lines.  There are many restaurants, cafes, bars and markets nearby.  The apartment is located by the canal.  On a sunny day we enjoyed taking walks or picnicking along the canal with the locals.  There's a cute bistro below our building.  It was always busy with locals.  A great neighborhood away from the hustle and bustle of the center.  I definitely recommend Ronan's apartment.  Thanks for welcoming us into your home.

Romans apartment is amazing! Awesome location in Paris with a supermarket close by and metro stops too.
Ronan is a great host and met us when we arrived to show us around the apartment and tell us everything we needed to know. He had a book with info about how to work the TV etc and with some directions to nearby food places and shops. 
Communication was easy and he always replies quickly if you have any questions.
Due to my clumsiness I broke a frame that was on the wall! Ronan was extremely understanding and we were able to come to a quick and easy resolution to sort it out :) 
Would highly recommend you stay here!
Ronan was there when we arrived and very hospitable. The apartment is in a lovely neighbourhood with bars and cafes around. Very cozy place!

Had a brilliant stay in Paris. Ronan was a great host - good recommendations of things to do & left us everything we could need for the weekend - and his apartment is lovely. Would definitely recommend it.

Ronan's apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures, very welcoming and perfect for a five days stay like ours.
Bathroom and kitchen are very thiny but with all the essential, bed is very confortable and the flat itself is silent and quiet. 
The buildind is in a nice aerea too, everything we needed from supermarket to bakery or restaurant is close by. The walk to the metro station is less than five minutes.
We totally recommend it!

Our stay at Ronan's apartment was very very nice! Ronan was very kind and helpful! The apartment it's self was clean and cosy, it looked precise like in the pictures! Metro was near by very easy to find! From there you can easily travel across Paris. We recommend this apartment to everyone!!!!! Thanks again Ronan for the super great stay!! Angelica

VERY RECOMMENDABLE!!!
I had a really good stay at Ronans apartment. Ronan is a very affectionate and kind person. He gave me a really openhearted
welcome, explained me everything I needed to know and gave me some good tips for bars and restaurants.

The apartment is VERY,VERY beautiful. It is really comfortable, quiet and very clean. A nice bed - where I had a few good quiet sleeps. A kitchen equipped with everything you need for cooking. A small but comfortable and clean bathroom. 
The neighbours are very friendly. 

Near to the apartment there is a nice canal with bars and a cinema. You can make a nice walk a long the canal. 
Near to the apartment you will find a lot of shops and supermarkets. 
With the subway, which is close, you can get to the centre.

All in all I can really recommend - it's a fair price for a nice apartment. 

Thank you Ronan for your trust and your kindness!!!

Wish you all the best,
Varya

Nous avons réservé ce logement pour une comédienne en résidence à Paris Villette et elle a été très satisfaite du logement. Seul bémol, elle a trouvé que le ménage dans la kitchenette était un peu léger. Mais ce ci est un détail par rapport à l'ensemble qui était très bien. Nous allons le louer à nouveau pour nos représentations si c'est possible.
Appartement conforme à la description,déco sympa et originale, très bon accueil , quartier calme et à la fois animé, séjour  agréable
Ronan a été très disponible et accueillant. L'appartement est conforme aux informations sur le site, spacieux, confortable, le quartier est vivant.

Parfait super génial nickel pas encombré et chaleureux en même temps.
Bravo Ronan, hôte d'exception, appartement adorable et bien configuré, d'un goût exquis de surcroit

Nous avons été très bien accueilli. L'appartement était tout à fait conforme à l'annonce. Il est très agréable et a l'énorme avantage de donner à l'arrière des bâtiments. Il y fait très calme. Le coin est chouette, beaucoup de commerces, le parc et pas mal de chouettes petits cafés, restaurants...

Descriptif conforme a l'annonce
Notre hôte a été sympa et serviable ; il nous a même laisse de quoi préparer le petit dejeuners
Petit bémol : salle de bains et cuisine petite mais tout a fait fonctionnelles
El apartamento es muy bonito y acogedor! En una zona muy tranquila! Y Ronan fue muy amable y nos dejo el apartamento perfecto para que nuestra estancia fuera de lo más agradable! Recomendable!!

Super appart. Une des plus belle déco que nous ayons vu sur les appart s airbnb. Quartier formidable et très agréable. Appartement calme et très bien équipé. Ronan nous a même laissé de quoi faire nos petits déjeuner, un bonheur !
Un appartement coquet, propre où il fait bon vivre. Un Hôte accueillant et sympathique.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour, l'appartement est charmant et très calme. Le quartier est très sympa, de nombreux commerces et le métro est à 5mn à pied de l'appart. Si vous cherchez un endroit romantique et plein de charme pour votre séjour à Paris, ne cherchez plus et réservez l'appartement de Ronan. Ronan est très disponible et accueillant et la carte interactive du quartier est très pratique !! Nous avons testé plusieurs adresses recommandées par Ronan avec bonheur. Si nous revenons à Paris, nous referons sans hésiter le même choix !!

Sylvain was a great host and made us very welcome at his apartment. His communication was excellent - always fast and hassle free. 

Although Sylvain was away on holiday whilst we visited, his friend greeted us on arrival and welcomed us in. The hand written guide was very useful and had some good local recommendations in it. 

The apartment is as described, very clean and had everything we needed for our stay. It is located in a good neighborhood with plenty of Parisian shops, cafes and restaurants near by.  It was just a short walk to a Metro station and not too far from Sacre Coeur.

We had a super stay at Sylvain's apartment and cannot thank him enough. I would highly recommend it to others visiting Paris.
So lovely place here! I stayed 4 nights. Easy access to metro and supermarket. The house was so warm and bright.

Lovely Flat Montmartre is really a Lovely Flat. A nice and calm district, groceries and supermarkets at hand, a beautiful bedroom view on Sacre Coeur: all you need to feel comfy and relaxed, a real home from home,  which still evokes only positive feelings thinking back on our stay. Do not miss such an opportunity to experience it yourselves. Merci Sylvain.
Amazing location, surrounded by cafes and restaurants. Not far from the metro and a fun neighborhood to walk around. Good place to stay for the price. Small but comfortable.
Good place to be in Paris few days!
We totally recommend Anne-Lise's apartment!

Anne-Lise's Flat is located near to the Sacre Coeur, you could see it from the window. The Metro station is also very near (only 2 Minutes by food). The Flat is very nice and comfortable for 1 or 2 persons. We had evering we needed during our stay. 

So we only can say thanks for the accomodation. 
Best regards. 
Corbinian + Lea
Anne-Lise's apartment was great! It was very  well located with a view on the sacre coeur! Would definitely recommend!

A perfect little flat for a few days spent in Paris. The location is great with a view of Sacré Cœur out the window. Everything you need is on hand with a comfortable bed and a homey feel. Great for those on a tight budget who don't need luxury to feel at home.
Nous remercions encore Anne-Lise, nous avons passé un très bon week-end, son appartement est très bien situé et parfait pour quelques jours de visite à Paris
Petit studio agréable, vue imprenable sur le Sacré Coeur, emplacement parfait!

L'appartement est exactement le même que sur les photos, il est extrêmement bien placé (à trois pas du métro), il y a tout ce qu'il faut à l'intérieur. Anne-Lise est très disponible en cas de probleme. Je recommande à 100% et je suis persuadée que je reviendrais!

Ce week end à Paris était parfait grâce à l'appartement d'Anne-Lise, idéalement situé, à 2 pas du métro, et non loin de Montmartre, je le recommande vivement ! 
(En tout cas nous reviendrons)
Le logement d'Anne-Lise est idéalement situé. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié sa gentillesse et sa disponibilité. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir !

L'appartement d'Anne-Lise est vraiment top, très bien situé à deux pas du métro est surtout très calme. Celui-ci est également très propre, assez spacieux pour deux personnes ... un vrai nid douillet.
Anne-Lise a été très réactive et disponible. J'espère pouvoir y retourner bientôt
super petit appartement confortable et idéalement placé pour visiter la ville, très bonne disponibilité d'Anne-Lise. je recommande :)
Merci à Anne-lise, de nous avoir fait confiance et d'être aussi arrangeante. L'appartement est confortable et surtout bien placé! Je le recommande sans hésiter.

L'appart d'Anne-Lise est super! bien placé, idéel pour 1 ou 2 personne, tout était propre et en ordre. 
On a trouvé cet endroit vraiment sympa et  accueillant! On n'a pas eu l'opportunité de rencontrer Anne-Lise, mais avec les mots qu'ell nous a laissés elle nous a fait sentir comme à la maison. 
Fortement recomendé!
Lovely cosy air bnb which was in a nice location with a handy supermarket, cafes and bars down the street. Great value for money!
It was nice to stay there. Close to the metro and a supermarket. I would  recommend  this place if someone wanted to spend a lovely holiday in Paris. c:

Logement tout à fait sympa, confortable, propre, tranquille pour dormir, proche du métro. Les autres habitants de l'immeuble sont discrets et respectueux. Literie très correcte (large et confortable). A recommander, vraiment.
L'appartement est sympa et conforme à la description. Très bon rapport qualité prix. Je le relouerai volontiers.
Modern and quiet studio with easy access to the Metro.  Djamila is a great host - very helpful and friendly!  I would highly recommend.
Bel appartement, fonctionnel et lumineux ; je recommande
Appartement lumineux fonctionnel propre, très bon accueil, merci
J'ai apprécié ce court séjour chez Djamila. plus sécurisé que cela.... Propre, bon rapport question prix, proche de tout, voilà ce que j'attendais
Appartement calme, fonctionnel, lumineux et bien situé : à deux pas de la station télégraphe. Djamila a le sens de l'accueil et de l'hospitalité.  Une adresse à recommander.

Gautier was very very helpful with tips and things to do around
Extremely fast at responses and very accommodating to our needs with check in and check out times 
A very cute place - perfect for a couple or single person stay very well located and has amazing restaurants around! Wel connected

Our stay at Gautier’s place was good. Gautier had advised us that there were building works before we came, but we still decided to book. The building noise is not a problem if you are getting up early to explore Paris, the noise started at about 8am, so if you are planning on getting out early it is ok. Gautier was very quick to respond to any questions or queries. 

There are metros and buses within walking distance which makes it easy to get around Paris.

My only small advice for staying at the apartment would to be to bring some slippers for your feet as the floor is very hard.

Very cool flat - stylish, clean and had everything we needed. Gautier was quick to respond to any questions. The only issue I had was that I was not informed about the construction just steps away from the bedroom windows, so it was a bit of a rude awakening and a lack of privacy had there not been curtains :( aside from that I had a very lovely stay!
Very nice place, great location and easy communication with the host. Would highly recommend!

Appartement  lumineux et très agréable ; une literie de qualité. Dans un quartier très sympathique et animé. 
A recommander vivement.
Appartement lumineux très bien situé, à proximité des commerces. Rue calme.

Gabriel's home is quiet, beautiful and exactly as described. 
I was very convenient for us arriving on the Eurostar from London, just a fifteen minute walk. 

The neighbourhood is a great starting point for walking Paris and Gabriel is a kind and welcoming host. 

Thanks so much! 
Ida & Theo
Absolutely fantastic apartment in a great area. Couldn't have asked for a better first experience!
Apartment exactly as on listing, Gabriel very quick to respond and was there waiting for us at agreed time. Neighbourhood/location great. Recommend.
Gabriel was very helpful and very welcoming. The apartment was amazing, exactly as in the pictures and location was central and close by to main attraction. Fantastic experience!

Gabriel is very good host. He is easy to contact, and replies quickly to any question you could have. The information he provided us with was very clear. The studio is truly great, I could live there myself :-)
Gabriel, thanks for the stay at your place. It was extremely well located and I could walk everywhere, e.g. to Opera, Gare du Nord, Gare Lazaré, etc. Will certainly consider again next time.

Gabriel's place is great. It's so comfortable I was tempted not to leave and explore the city. It's in a prime location and we walked every where. Gabriel was very helpful and I would definitely recommend staying here as I hope to again. Cool guy in a cool flat.
Best location! Great apartment - very friendly host.
It was conveniently located, clean, and had everything a traveller would want, even a washer / dryer!
Staying at Gabriel'place was a great experience, his place is clean, cozy and have every thing I need. The location is good and near metro stop ( Cadet) thanks Gabriel :)

Staying at Gabriel's flat was such a pleasant experience. The apartment was very tidy and cosy. We loved the artsy atmosphere of the apartment due to great overall design and must-to-read collections of books, comics and artworks. The location of the flat is really near to metro station so it was very easy to reach any part of the city. Also, within a few minutes of walk you can get to a bit noisier streets and feel charming night life of Paris. Gabriel was really polite and helpful with any question or request. I really recommend this place and definitely would like to stay there next time I'm in Paris!

Gabriel’s flat was everything we expected it to be. Communication was very easy, he answered any question very quickly. The welcoming by his friend at the flat was good. The flat itself was very nice, beautiful decorated, clean and equipped with everything you need for a city trip. The neighbourhood is the real gem of the flat. Located close to everything and very vibrant. Great stay!

Gabriel was fantastic! He was very accommodating with our late arrival and leaving times and even met up with us at the tube station when we arrived to bring us to the flat. The flat was very clean and it was very easy to feel at home. The building is very old but the apartment looks brand new. It is in a very nice location and super close to the tube. Would definitely stay here again!
L'appartement était magnifique et Gabriel a été vraiment compréhensible et à disposition! 10/10! ;)
Très bon accueil de Gabriel. L'appartement est très bien agencé, lumineux, calme et pratique dans un quartier vivant et agréable. merci pour tout!
Nous avons passé un séjours très agréable grâce à l'accueil sympathique et très organisé de Gabriel et grâce à son appartement agréable, pratique, bien placé et très propre. Un grand merci à Gabriel!

L'appart est vraiment génial, exactement comme sur les photos, et super bien situé. La douche à l'italienne très sympa. 
Je n'ai pas eu la chance de rencontrer Gabriel mais il s'est organisé pour que qqn puisse m'ouvrir à l'heure convenue. Les indications pour trouver l'endroit sont claires, le quartier extraordinaire.
Une adresse à garder absolument !
북역에서도 가깝고,  근처에 지하철역도 있어서 좋다! 집도 깨끗하고 근처에 마트도 있어서 사먹기 편하다.

Nous avons passé un agréable WE. L’appartement est très agréable, lumineux, propre et moderne : un petit cocon design. Il est proche du métro et des lignes de bus ce qui facilite les déplacements à Paris et les visites. Gabriel nous a très bien accueillis, se rendant disponible aux heures que nous souhaitions pour notre arrivée et notre départ. Il a tout mis en œuvre pour que nous nous sentions comme chez nous. Une adresse à retenir !

Gabriel est gentiment  descendu nous accueillir en bas de l'immeuble, nous avons été séduits par son appartement  design , très fonctionnel, bien équipé. On s'est de suite senti à l'aise!
Il a eu la gentillesse d'acheter un ventilateur pour  limiter les effets de la canicule qui sévissait à Paris .
Il nous a fait confiance en nous laissant partir à l'heure que nous souhaitions sans avoir vérifié l'état de son appartement, on a apprécié!  
Nous reviendrons avec plaisir!

Julien was a great host! He was very responsive and the directions to the apartment were helpful. The apartment was smaller than I expected but it was enough space for my boyfriend and I during our anniversary weekend. It was the perfect distance from the lively part of the city. Even though it was a quick 2 minute walk to the local bars and restaurants, the apartment was very quiet at night. Would definitely recommend!
Jullien is an amazing host! I enjoyed his lovely apartment! Great space.

A charming flat in a beautiful little locked courtyard area, and located in a wonderful neighbourhood.  Although I didn't meet Julien, he arranged for his friend to give me the keys and both were very helpful to sort out a time.  His friend was very personable and also kind to carry my suitcase up the stairs (it is only one small flight though so would not be a problem).  

There was a small miscommunication with regards to wifi but Julien was very quick to sort out the problem and even offered for me to take a beer to say sorry which I thought was very kind.

The flat felt very homely and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay there - perfect for a single person or for a couple (as was my situation).  The flat was clean and tidy, but did not feel like a hotel - which is exactly what I look for in an Airbnb.  It felt like staying at a friends house, which was perfect.

I stayed one night alone and felt extremely safe, which I consider very important.  Overall I would highly recommend and will definitely be in touch again when I am next in Paris!

The apartment was very charming, and the neighborhood had a lot of great cafes and walking areas. The apartment has everything you need, and Julien is a terrific host. We would definitely stay here again!
Amazing flat in a great area. Very good value for money. The host was very professional and communication was great on all fronts.

Sympa, fonctionnel et agréable.
Petit appartement bien placé, au calme et avec un accès facile au métro.
Un poil sombre
Sinon Julien est très arrangeant et nous avons passé un agréable séjour
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans l'appartement cosy et bien équipé de Julien. Nous le remercions encore pour sa disponibilité tout au long du séjour.

Bonne communication ! L'appartement est très agréable et calme, très bien situé, conforme à la description. Petit guide d'accueil personnalisé et plateau petit déjeuner☺.  On s'y sent comme chez soi ! C est avec plaisir que nous reviendrons. Je recommande chaudement !

Tout était parfait pour notre arrivée: plan du quartier avec suggestions de visites et de restos sympas. Cet appart est vraiment adorable et il est vraiment central. Merci à Julien pour sa disponibilité avant et pendant notre week end !!

Julien a fait le maximum pour que nous nous sentions à l'aise (café , thé et brioche pour notre arrivée).
Un livret d'accueil, de la documentation étaient à notre disposition.
L'appartement correspondait tout à fait à la description.
Il est fonctionnel, propre, agréable et bien situé dans une rue calme et proche du métro et de plusieurs lignes de bus.
Nous recommandons cet appartement cosy.

Notre petit séjour chez Julien s'est parfaitement déroulé. 
Malgré leur absence, les hôtes nous avaient réservé un accueil chaleureux et agréable, avec un livret de bienvenue indiquant les informations pratiques concernant le logement et ses installations, les lieux d'intérêt à visiter dans le quartier etc...
De plus, à notre arrivée, il y avait un petit plateau avec des choses à grignoter à disposition, nous avons trouvé cela très sympathique !
L'appartement était vraiment très confortable et impeccable au niveau de la propreté et des équipements, il y avait tout à notre disposition y compris machine à café à dosettes, télé, WIFI etc... 
Il y avait également les produits de base tels que serviettes, shampooing, gel douche, draps...
L'emplacement était idéal car en plein coeur de Clichy, proche de Pigalle et Montmartre et à 3-4 min à pieds de 2 stations de métro ! 
Le quartier était tranquille et la résidence bien sécurisée avec 2 codes ; nous n'avons eu aucun problème même en rentrant tard le soir.

Nous recommandons vraiment ce petit studio et nous reviendrons chez Julien avec plaisir si nous en avons l'occasion !

My boyfriend and I stayed at Morgane's for the weekend and it couldn't have been a better fit! We loved the apartment - it was very clean and spacious for 2 people. 
Morgane met me at the apartment after work to explain the apartment and gave recommendations for the area.

The neighborhood was perfect - there was a great coffee shop, produce shop, and nice bars and restaurants all around along the canal.

Perfect place for a nice weekend!

The apartment was beautiful and very tastefully decorated. There are windows all down one side of the apartment so there are great views of the Parisian rooftops. Morgane was not able to meet us so her parents met us at the apartment and showed us where everything was. Everything we needed for a long weekend was there. The area where the apartment is has many cool bars and restaurants without a tourist in site. Thank you Morgane!!
Appartement super agreable, bien décoré... Nous reviendrons sans hésiter chez Morgane qui est très gentille et qui s'arrange toujours à nos horaires.. Vous ne serez pas déçu.
This is a charming,clean and convenient apartment 20 meters from the metro.

Nicolas was very welcoming and easy to communicate with. The appartement is very pleasant and clean. It’s fully equipped and very efficiently organized. I love the neighborhood, it’s very diverse, safe, and nearby underrated gems of Paris. Highly recommended. 

Nicolas nous a très bien accueillis. L’appartement est agréable, bien organisé et très propre. Il est bien situé et on y a dormi à poings fermés. Vivement recommandé !

Nicolas's place was wonderful. It is equipped with everything one needs and is situated in an amazing area close to everything one would want in Paris! The Airbnb is very comfortable and also has a brand new water heater so the shower is great. Nicolas is a delightful host and I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend!
Great Place! The location was perfect.  And the apartment was very clean. Communication was easy with Nicholas.  I highly recommend this place!

Excellent city apartment in a vibrant and busy area (within reach of tourist spots but far away enough for an authentic Paris experience). Very clean and easy to find, good directions from host and right next to a metro station. Enjoyed browsing Nicolas' vast book and music collection.
Very little noise from the street (but being an apartment in the city you do get some noise from neighbours). Be quick with the shower as hot water runs out fast - apparently common in Paris apartments!
Overall an excellent stay!
excellent, clean and comfortable apartment near the metro station. Nicholas and his wife were excellent hosts!
Very nice, clean apartment to stay in and to enjoy some time exploring the City.
we had a nice stay in the appartment, everthing was perfect
Nice place to stay. Mr nicolas and Henri were very friendly
Nous vous recommandons cet appartement, qui est très bien situé et proche des moyens de transport en commun. Les propriétaires sont adorables et l'accueil est chaleureux.
appart un peu petit mais suffisant pour faire du tourisme bien placé metro très proche accueil sympa

séjour très agreable, Nicolas et sa compagne nous ont parfaitement accueillis. 
ils n'y a rien à dire de négatif sur le logement 
Nous le recommandons fortement.
Appartement conforme à la description ! Merci encore !

J'ai passé 1 semaine dans le Studio qui super bien placé A 50m du métro couronnes. L appartement est fonctionnel et spacieux ! Très bien pour les courts voire meme les longs séjours, seul ou en couple.  Nicolas et sa femme que j'ai rencontrés sont très sympa et ont été disponible tout au long de mon séjour lorsque j'ai eu besoin. Je reconseille vivement !! Au plaisir peut être nicolas !

Nicolas ainsi que sa compagne mon offert un accueille chaleureux dans leur jolie petit appartement , très propre à proximité du Metro du bus il y as aussi plusieurs petit restaurant en bas de l'immeuble , je recommande et je compte renouveler L'expérience

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Nicolas. Nous avons été très bien reçues et Nicolas s'est montré très disponible. L'appartement est bien placé pour visiter la ville. Il est propre et tres fonctionnel. 
J'y retournerai avec plaisir!

Ficamos felizes com nossa recepção e estadia no apto de Nicolas,sempre muito atencioso nos ajudando a resolver problemas iniciais para alugar o apto e nos acolheu muito bem enviando uma amiga para nos receber altas horas da noite.
Nos auxilou tambem tanto no chek-in como no chek-out nos enviando um motorista contratado que nos pegou na porta de chegada dos voos no aeroporto. 
O apto é como ele descreve mas cabe 05 pessoas sendo 02 casais e um single muito confortavelmente e com colchoes especiais.
Nos te agradecemos por tudo e foi um prazer conhece_los.
Um abraço

Me and my girlfriend had a great stay in the apartment. It's very convenient to the metro. The apartment itself is spacious with a planted terrace we enjoyed eating on. I would highly recommend a stay in this apartment.
My wife and I really enjoyed staying at Eduoard's flat during our time in Paris. It was spacious, clean, and close to a metro station. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to visit Paris.

We loved our stay in this cute little flat! Perfect for what we needed. We especially loved the parks nearby and all the markets made it easy to eat and find things we needed. Very clean and great experience.

Definitely a great place to stay! Edouard provided everything I needed and was very accommodating to my arrival and departure time. I would definitely recommend this place to stay in Paris. It is such a great location to, a brisk 8 min walk from the metro and a great place to take a walk too. 

Thank you so much, Edouard!

Edouard was great, he lived up to his superhost status. From the very first time that I messaged him about the apartment down to the end communication with him was excellent and he was very accommodating and honest. The apartment is very clean, has amazing internet speed, large flat screen tv, cool shower with a built in radio and a comfortable bed. He left us a bottle of wine when we arrived, a very sweet gesture. We recommend this place to others. It's a 5 minutes or less walk to the train station, perfect if you want to get to Gare Nord station (we did-it was about three stops away) and about a 30 min ride from the Notre Dame via train and a SUPER secure building (you need three codes to get inside). We are very happy with our choice. Thank you Edouard!
It is a small place that made excellent use of its space! Very cute, clean, and functional! Eduardo! Was AMAZING!! Made our trip even more special.

Edouard was at the apartment when we arrived. He was very friendly and showed us around the apartment, and also made local recommendations for dinner. The apartment was clean and very nice. We were impressed by how updated everything is, and our stay was very comfortable. The only downside was the heat in Paris the days we were there, and like most European homes, there was no air conditioning. But overall our experience was lovely.

I loved this apartment. Great area a really short walk to the canals (try the Panama brewery, highly recommended). Funky area with lots of fun cafes and not too far from the main sites. Short walk also to the station.  

Edouard was great to deal with. Met us at the apartment and had a bunch of good tips for us to get the most out of the area. Next time I'm in Paris I'll see if this is free.

Really nice flat, looking exactly like on the pictures. We (my daughter and me) spent three wonderful days in Paris and in this apartment. Everything what you need ist there, and walking out of the door you'll find a supermarket and some bakerys and - not to forget - some nice places to have a drink... Two Metro stations and bus stations close by.. Thank you Edouard! Merci beaucoup! We felt welcome and enjoyed our stay. We hope, that next time, your flat will be available - we would love to stay here again! Merci pour tout! Greetings from Hamburg, Tanja

Edouard was really nice, the apartament is as described in the pictures, close to public trasnport. The only problem we had, which was unfortunate, was the bed condition and the pilows. While we thought it was a mattress problem, it actually was the bed itself that was broken and we found it very difficult to find a position to sleep. We did not sleep well for the four nights we were there and that hurts anyone after a really long flight. I told Edouard about it and he apologized and said he would fix it for next time, unfortunately it is a lot of money spent for 4 nights of not sleeping well. As our first experience in airbnb i had higher expectations.

Hallo Edouard,
thank you for your hospitality, your tips and the opportunity to stay in your nice, clean, good equipped, perfect situated flat, close to the metro, to many little shops, bakeries and lots of parisien attractions , the marvellous canal St. Martin, the blooming Butte de Chamaunt etc.
The flat is  also suitable for a longer stay.
A bientot .
Alice & Bernhard
We had a wonderful stay at Edouard, super modern apartment with everything you need and close by the metro with good connections to the city center. Very clean en neat, thank you!

Edouard is the sweetest host. He gave us directions on how to reach the apartment. It was easily findable. He received us at the apartment, explained everything and coordinated out check-in & checkout timings.
The apartment is very modern with efficient utilization of space. The facilities were more than sufficient. The décor is beautiful and amazing. We highly recommend this place on a visit to Paris and it is close to some beautiful parks, canals and supermarkets.
Keep it up, Edouard!
Edouard's apartment is wonderful ad equipped with everything one might need! The location is very practical with a good selection of shops. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it!

Edouard is a real gentleman!  His place is definitely more beautiful than pictures can show. Close to drugstores, subway, supermarkets, restaurants, grocery stores, bakeries and more. In a very safe neighborhood, it was the perfect headquarter for my first Paris experience. 

Edouard as a host: perfect!
Apartment location, size, condition, furniture, etc: perfect!
Overall experience: perfect!

I hope I can airbnb it again next time I go to Paris!

All I can say , it' outstanding !  A TOP NOTCH in the full sense of the word , you wouldn ' t be missing any thing in that appart , everything is available , tidy and clean , plus Edourad is really a good guy he is at your help whenever needed , Thanks Edourd from the bottom of my heart for everything .

Edouard's flat was the perfect base on my recent trip to Paris. The flat was presently spotless with all amenities that anyone would ever need. I especially liked how I could use the Smart TV to login to my Netflix account when it was raining! The kitchen is well stocked with equipment, pots and pans so cooking was easy. The flat was as shown in all the pictures and was well furnished. The bed was certainly innovative but beware that it is still quite high (~1.5m) even when lowered so not one for those prone to falling out of bed in the night!

I found the apartment easily after a 30 minute walk from Gare du Nord. The nearby canal makes a lovely walk into the centre of Paris or the nearby Parc de la Villette and I made use of the Velib bike hire nearby to easily get into the centre. There is a largely segregated cycle route that runs alongside the canal and into the centre. About 50 metres from the apartment block is a Franprix mini-market which I found useful for all the basic supplies that you will need when self-catering. There is also a butcher and bakery, amongst others, on the same street.

I was shown around the flat on my arrival my Edouard's friend but I had been in contact with Edouard via the Airbnb app from when I booked to when I arrived.  I also had to check-out early so unfortunately did not get to meet Edouard. I felt sure that had I had any issues that Edouard would have tried his best to sort them out.

I would have no hesitation in recommending this apartment to individuals or couples looking for a roomy and excellent value alternative to a regular hotel stay in Paris. Excellent value for money!

Eduoard was a wonderful wonderful host! He made us feel so very welcome and was very helpful.
The flat was beautiful and perfectly located with two Metro stations near by.
Very highly recommended!
Thank you!
Awesome experience with Eduoard. He met us even if we got in so late. His place was fully equipped with everything that you would need for an enjoyable experience

Edouard was very nice and welcoming. He explained us everything we needed to know. The apartment was very nice and stylish with so many small details. The neighborhood has everything you need including shops and metro stops.

Big thanks for hosting us!
Incredible! The place is adorable, really clean and just perfect! Was met by her cleaning maid who kindly showed us around the place. I would highly recommend staying here!

We were right when we had chosen this apartment. It was nice,  clean, tidy and as it was described on website. We were greeted very well at suitable time for us with helpful instructions. This place quite convenient for reaching many famous sights of Paris. Thanks a lot.

Das Appartement liegt wunderbar in der Nähe von Montmartre an einer belebten Straße mit kleinen Geschäften, Brasserien und Restaurants. Es ist sauber und bietet genug Platz für einen Kurztrip für zwei Personen. Wir wurden sehr freundlich begrüßt und Pauline war stets zu erreichen. Vielen Dank für die schöne Zeit in Paris und die schnelle Antwort. Gerne kommen wir wieder!

L'appartement est très accueillant, propre et quasiment neuf. Pauline m'avait laissé un petit mot expliquant tout ce qu'il y avait à faire autour :)
Ce logement est pratique car très bien situé, proche des transports en commun. Je le recommande !

Gaelle and Alexandre are super responsive and friendly hosts and they were flexible with my check-in and check-out times, which was very helpful. The location is super lively and accessible with public transport. Would definitely stay there again!

The good:
- amazing hosts. Nice and fast to respond
- very comfortable apartment. All the furnishings you need for an extended stay. 
- literally 5 seconds walk from the metro

What could be improved:
- deeper cleaning beforehand; there were flies all around the kitchen when we arrived. 

Things to know:
- the area directly around the apartment can feel a little sketchy at times. But walking just a couple blocks and you’re in nicer areas.
Wonderful! Just perfect!
really cute apartment right by the metro!
Gaelle and Alex are great hosts. Very quick response. We enjoyed our stay. Great location.

The house is super nice and cozy, the furniture is very well arranged. In Paris I had very bad experiences in the past, therefore when I arrived there and saw a very nice apartment with a lot of light: it was a very nice feeling.
The area is quite ethnic but super central: 25 mins walking from Les Marais.

Considering everything I would advise to go there.

Stay here. Paris has too many choices, just book this one--the neighborhood is fun and convenient, the apartment is stylish, charming, and feels like using your cool friend's place. Great "real paris" diverse, fun neighborhood; 10 steps from 2 Metro lines); walk to dozens of non-touristy restaurants, nightlife areas like Canal St. Martin and Oberkampf--so much more fun than stuffy Marais, pricey 6th, or touristy Latin Quarter. The apartment is like having your own place in Paris--great windows/velux, views to a great street, excellent shower, comfy couch, av system, great kitchen, espresso machine, sodastream, and a great local's guidebook. As for Gaelle and Alex, they were so helpful and flexible (and we needed a bit of flex, and they helped us out without hesitation). The ideal AirBNB hosts. They say in their site that this is a home and not just a rental--and they really mean it--they totally trust their guests, and that feels great. I hope more aBNB places like this open up soon.
Well decorated place that really shows a lot of character and personality. Comfortable and close to a lot of great cafes and restaurants.
Top floor apartment, very light and spacious. Good instructions and local suggestions. Within walking distance of many attractions. Plenty of hot water. Very responsive hosts.
A lovely flat in a great location. Gaëlle was very responsive and it felt just like home.

My friend and I had a very pleasant stay in Gaelle and Alex's apartment. The apart is very spacious and fully equipped. It is also located in a vibrant central neighbourhood and is a 2min walk to a metro station and 5min walk to a supermarket. We had very easy communication with the hosts and they were flexible with the check in and check out times. We recommend this apartment as it is very good value for the centre of Paris and would stay here again!

The apartment is really beautiful, spacious, clean and the bed is really comfortable. It helps a lot that it's located near the metro stop. Gaelle and Alex are very responsive and flexible. I really enjoyed staying at their place.

Gaelle and Alexandre were very warm and welcoming hosts. My boyfriend and I briefly met them once checking into their very quirky, bright, tidy apartment. We had a lovely stay in their flat which was a convenient location to get around Paris as the metro is a 5 minute walk. Any questions we had were answered immediately via email which was helpful. 
All in all we would recommend this location! Thanks Gaelle and Alexandre! :)
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Place was great, two minutes from the metro. Gaelle was incredibly helpful and always available for questions and recommendations. 10/10

Amazing apartment, really helpful hosts, right round the corner from the metro! Loads of bars, restaurants, shopping. Really good street art if you are in to that sort of thing. Amazing place for the money. Definitely recommend

Spacious and clean apartment near Belleville. Shops, supermarkets and metro station nearby. The check-in and the overall communication went smoothly. Gaelle and Alexandre offered me to stay a bit longer than the check-out time, since my flight was in the evening. I highly appreciated it. Thank you again!*

Geweldig appartement in een leuke buurt, dichtbij Canal Saint Martin en vlak aan 2 strategische metrolijnen. Leuk ingericht, makkelijk contact met Gaelle en Alex als je nog iets wil vragen. Ook heel goeie suggesties voor restaurantjes in heel Parijs. Bedankt voor het fijne weekend!

Nous avons vraiment aimé notre séjour dans l’appart de Gaelle et Alexandre. Ils sont flexibles, communicatifs et gentils. Tout est à la disposition du voyageur: four, cuisinière, couvert, frigo… 
Le canapé-lit est bon mais peut-être trop petit pour un séjour plus long si deux adultes y dorment (nous sommes grands). Mais en général c’est un appart impeccable! Nous avons redécouvert le quartier de Belleville, une expérience géniale. Nous recommandons cet appartement et y retournerons certainement.

Op een superlocatie wat ons betreft vandaar ook dat wij voor de 3e keer hier logeerden. Alles is dichtbij: winkels, metro, restaurants, park. Je hoeft de buurt niet eens uit om een geweldig verblijf in Parijs te hebben. Lekkere douche, goede keuken, veel ruimte met mooie aankleding. Alleen t voor ons nieuwe gastenbed lag niet lekker: een week slapen op een dun, smal matrasje viel behoorlijk tegen.
Leuke hosts Gaelle en Alexandre, behulpzaam & meedenkend, communicatief.
Appartement spacieux bien placé dans Paris

Roman was a fantastic host. The apartment was pristine and felt like a typical Parisian apartment - very comfortable setting and very short walk to several interesting neighborhoods (most famously Montmartre,) very convenient to Gare du Nord station, and steps away from the metro to other touristic areas of Paris. Roman was very communicative and he and his girlfriend do a fantastic job of making sure their guests have a great experience. I would definitely choose this apartment again on future trips to Paris. 

A small note: The neighborhood is very lively and there is a lot of local activity around the apartment building into the night. My friend and I did not feel in danger but females traveling alone may feel a bit uncomfortable going in/out of the building, like in any major city. Inside the apartment itself, it is very calm and quiet, even with the windows open.

This was a beautiful apartment! I felt right at home! =) and Roman was very easy to communicate with. I've been to Paris a few times before, and this was perfect for me. Sacre Coeur is very close, and all the other major sites are very easily accessible by metro (you can get there in 20-30 mins.). I would definitely stay here again. Thanks, Roman!

My train is late and cellphone is not working , Roman is waiting for me for one hour, it is so nice. 

When I arrived , it is a market opposite the apartment , lots of people in different style, I do have some worries. But when I am out two hours later, it is fine. Actually it is very convenient and short walking to Montmatre

I would recommend Roman’s apartment , it is really clean, warm and comfortable. It could be better if there is a hairdryer , girls always need it😝
We  very much felt at home. Lovely apartment. Thank you!
Everything was perfect! :-) The hosts are very kind and trustworthy. Beautiful apartment in a great location.
Everything about the apartment was exactly as described. Communication was really quick and efficient. Would highly recommend staying here. Great location and great hosts!

Roman and his girlfriend are great hosts. Very friendly and helpful, the communications was easy. The apartment is sweet and cosy and the district has a lot to offer. We definitly recommend this place for your trip to Paris!

Romans apartment is beautiful and located in a fun and vibrant neighborhood with great connections to the rest of the city. We stayed for a quick two nights and were able to see and do everything on our list. In the apartment, we had everything we needed for a very comfortable stay. Would definitely stay again.
Super cute and cozy apartment in a convenient location. Perfect place for a long weekend in Paris. Roman was friendly and easy to communicate with throughout.

The place was beautiful, a true “parisienne” apartment, loved every single part of it. The metro station is exactly in front of it and that makes the place even more special. Roman answered to every single thing we asked and even helped us out with the metro, he was very kind and well organized.
Lovely apartment located in Montmartre, 5 mins walking distance from Sacre Coeur and access to metro station just around the corner!!

Great apartment ideally located only 10 minutes away from Gare du Nord. Very cosy feeling and decorated with good taste. A few people are staying outside in the street but we weren’t bothered. Thanks for the great flat and hospitality !
Roman is very kind and we share the house with a lovely cat :)
A lovely apartment, conveniently located and great hosts who give lots of good restaurant recommendations.

Warm welcome in a beautiful appartment with all the neccessary features for a great holiday in the City of Love! Useful hints for lovely restaurants and other points of interest! Highly recommended! :)
Roman was great and we had such a lovely stay in his apartment. Was within walking distance of most of the things we wanted to do and see. Thank you!

Roman foi muito gentil!
A localização de fácil acesso!
Voltaria com certeza!

Tolle Wohnung, in super Lage! Mit den vielen Zimmern und der zauberhaften Deko fühlten wir uns sofort wie zuhause und haben die Tage in Paris sehr genossen. Alles ist super zu Fuss zu erreichen und die Metroanbindung ist auch top.

Roman est un hôte excellent.
Pour l'anecdote : ayant cassé une vitre de sa douche avant notre arrivée ce dernier nous a proposé d'annuler sans frais ou de nous rembourser 30% du logement. Nous avons reçut notre virement des 30% sans avoir à reparlé de l'affaire.
Sur place tout était parfait. Quand au conseil gastronomique ils sont excellents.
Très bon séjour !!!
muy hermoso, típico depto parisino. pequeño pero cómodo. la cuadra es rara, parecería peligrosa, pero en realidad fué una estadía tranquila y placentera.
Wonderful, caring host and nice, comfortable apartment.  Location is ideal for its proximity to getting around anywhere in Paris, if using the metro. Highly Recommend!
Great little apartment, was perfect for a quick stay in Paris.  Close to a tube stop and quiet at night.  Only a 15 min walk to  gare de nore station.

Sarah is very helpful in guiding us to her apt. She is very accommodative; when we inform her that we are not used to this cold weather, she came the next day to install additional heater. Comfortable home and spacious for Paris standard. About 20 steps from Metro Simplon

Отдыхали троем в Париже в середине января. Очень понравилась квартира, полностью соответствует описанию и фотографиям на сайте! Sarah - милая девушка, встретила нас в квартире в назначенное время, все показала, оставила карту с  достопримечательностями и даже упаковку печенья :) Квартира находится в двух шагах от метро, очень близко и удобно. Квартира уютная, в ванной были чистые полотенца, шампунь, мыло, на кухне много посуды. Sarah даже дала нам колонки слушать музыку! Спасибо Sarah!!!

Sarah es una anfitriona estupenda, nos aconsejo sobre sitios donde ir en paris...la casa es pequeñita pero suficiente para pasar unos dias. En general ha sido una experiencia agradable y recomiendo el apartamento de sarah para pasar unos dias en paris.

Sarah es una excelente anfitriona, nos oriento sobre los principales lugares a conocer y sus respectivas rutas, el apartamento esta ubicado entre 25 y 30 de los sitios turísticos, cerca a la estación del Metro de Simplon. Es un apartamento pequeño pero acogedor. La cocina es un poco pequeña.

Sarah es muy amable. Nos mostro el apartamento y el barrio. Recomendo donde ir a comer, que visitar y como llegar a los sitios. Es muy simpatica y amable. El apartamento es muy tranquilo se descansa muy bien. La cocina muy pequeña y muy poco iluminada. Estado casi de origen. Igual que el inodoro. Separado de baño. Al apartamento tenia la cara lavada con lo justo para ir a descansar y preparar algo de comer. El barrio no nos gusto mucho, pero esta bien comunicado. Nos sorprendio el contraste de ruido en la calle con la tranquilidad y el silencio del apartamento. Cuando salimos a la calle el viernes habia mercado en la puerta, y no se oia nada del bullicio de la calle. Supermercado y metro muy cerca. En general nos sentimos muy acogidos. Otra cosa. El bloque y la entrada necesita una reforma urgente.

This is one of the best towns we've visited and the apartment was really great. Small and cozy, perfect for a couple on vacation for both short and long stays. You got stores, nice restaurants, park areas and main street in a minute walk. Would definetly reccomend this to others! Héloise was very good at looking after our needs, even though she was on a holiday herself!
I had a very great stay in Paris with Héloise as a host! She took care of everything to make me feel extra welcome. Highly recommended :)

J'ai été ravie de ce séjour !
Son appartement est très agréable et très joliment décoré ! 
Malgré un petit espace, elle a su le rendre très fonctionnel avec tout le confort nécessaire ! ( machine a laver, lave vaisselle, machine expresso...) 
Quel bonheur lorsque l'on est en vacances ! 
Je le recommande vivement, pour un couple, c'est l'idéal.

Apartamento situado en un edificio tipico parisino, es una  quinta planta sin ascensor pero con  bonitos escalones de madera. Es pequeño pero muy completo,  moderno y muy luminoso. Se encuentra en un barrio de gente de clase media, con la parada de metro y bus a 8 minutos. Muchos comercios y retaurantes alrededor. El anfitrión siempre pendiente de que las cosas estuvieran de mi agrado.

Lovely place, conveniently located. Very close to the metro station and it is possible to walk to Notre Dame from the flat, we did! 
Host was very helpful too even though he wasn't in Paris!

L'appart de Léo est vraiment très charmant et conforme à la description , j'ai passé une super semaine! 
Il est très bien placé entre plusieurs stations de métro et de bus. 
Léo est un hôte hyper sympa, on pouvait toujours le joindre et la remise des clés se passait sans complications !
Le studio correspond à la description de l'annonce, très calme et bien situé. Parfait pour un séjour de quelques jours à quelques stations du coeur de Paris. Prix imbattable !
The location was terrific and communication from Souhad was so easy.

Souhad is an amazing host. His place is very close to the Eiffel Tower (pretty much right around the corner). He made us feel very welcome on our trip to Paris. He was not able to meet us at check-in, but his friend met up with us and gave us the keys and showed us around the place. Souhad left us with lots of maps, guide books, a transit map, and even stocked the fridge with a few beers. His place was very clean! Overall an amazing place for the price considering how close it is to the metro stop and Eiffel Tower.

Great location! Super close to the Eiffel Tower and tons of shops and restaurants. Souhad was very helpful when I needed any help. The place was very clean and comfortable. Hope to come back and stay here again!

Souhad's flat in Paris was perfect. The location is impeccable, literally 5 minutes walking to the Effel tower. Very accessible from the metro too. Souhad was a gracious host, very accommodating with check in and out process. Kindly gave directions to multiple, places we wanted to visit. Also gave a great list of recommendations for eating and wine!  Apartment was very clean, fully stocked which was even better. Can't wait to return!
The location of the flat is excellent

He's not kidding when he says two minute walk to the Eiffel Tower! Cute tiny apt, only had part was it's on the 5th floor... that's a whole lot of stairs! But if you are like us, you won't really be in the room much! He was great with communicating as well! Would def go back!

This apartment is 5 mins away from the Eiffel Tower and metro station. The location is great. Souhad was very thoughtful and prepared us maps and tour guides. The room itself was clean and comfortable to say at. I would stay here again next time I visit Paris.

We had a nice time at Souhad's place. Located close to the Eifel tower in a quiet and charismatic area, this was the perfect spot to discover Paris. Located next door is a nice little Indian restaurant, don't hesitate to go there, it's amazing. Communication with Souhad was good. We didn't meet him personally but his friend Eli explained everything well.
Great

This house was an excellent and not expensive location to spend our holidays in Paris . The house was tidy , with all the necessary commodities and the bed is extremely comfortable. Souhad was extremely nice from the beginning and we have only good things to say about him . One day we forgot the keys in the apartment and immediately Souhad could help us despite the late hours. If I go back to Paris this place will be my first choice. Would recommend 100%

Souhad was a very good host, although we did not meet him he was still very helpful and replied to any queries we had. Check in and check out is flexible which was great. The appartment is very spacious and as described, close to amenities and a very short walk from the eiffel tower. Would definitely recommend and gladly stay again.

Wohnung top für paar Tage ...
Falls du zu Fuß Paris entdecken musst, vergiß nicht das du noch 90 Stufen bis du ins Bett kommst steigen musst

Beau quartier centre Paris, frais de ménage en sus mais malgré cela l'appartement n'était pas dans un état satisfaisant de propreté. L'inconvénient 5 étages sans ascenseur et parking payant 3 euros de l'heure et si on trouve un emplacement bien sûr.sinon quartier agréable ainsi que le propriétaire.
Logement très propre, bien équipé et très bien situé. Excellent rapport qualité prix.
Merci énormément pour l'accueil et La disponibilité , superbe logement Avec un emplacement idéal à 100m de la tour effeil, je recommande fortement Avec des prix défiant toute concurrence
Wonderful stay, wonderful host!
The stay in this apartment was perfect. Bus and metro stations are near, apartment is provided with all necessary facilities and owner reply very fast if you are in a trouble.
nice appartment at great location near metro. Did not meet Aurélie but communication with her and check-in was easy. Can definitely recommend the Appartment for a nice weekend in Paris ☺️
Thanks ,Aurelie for a lovely stay in magic Paris. Feel like home:)
It’s a really confortable flat, perfect for our three days in Paris. Definitely recommend

prestation à hauteur du descriptif , très arrangeante, a deux pas du tram et métro.
appartement très propre répondant a nos attentes , je recommande, tarif justifié, parfait .

Nous avons passé un très beau séjour à Paris, en grande partie grâce à l'appartement de Sibylle et Romain. L'appartement est très bien situé; il y a une tonne de petits restos sympathiques dans les environs, un beau marché extérieur les jeudis et dimanches et le tout Paris est accessible à pied.  Le quartier est animé sans être bruyant. Si les gens attablés sur la terrasse du café de l'Industrie parlent trop fort, il suffit de fermer la fenêtre (bien insonorisée). Le logement est très confortable, idéal pour un couple.
