Le salon offre un espace spacieux pour relaxer après une promenade et pour prendre l'apéro; la petite cuisine possède tous les accessoires nécessaires; Sibylle et Romain nous avaient laissé plein d'espace de rangement dans la chambre à coucher qui possède un lit est confortable. Nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer nos hôtes, mais ils nous ont fait sentir tout à fait à notre aise. Bref, nous avons trouvé une perle et espérons pouvoir y retourner lors d'un prochain voyage à Paris. 

Merci à vous Sibylle et Romain!

Sybille a été très arrangeante pour la remise des clés et cela a été très appréciable.
L'appartement est idéalement situé a quelques minutes à pied de Bastille. Il est très clair est agréable (surtout le salon). 
Un bar se situe juste en face mais nous n'avons pas du tour été dérangé par le bruit et le quartier est très vivant.

Tridib's apartment is located in a super safe neighbourhood with tight security. It's close to line 7 metro which takes you to all the tourist attractions in 10 -15 mins. Rue Moufftard is literally across the road which offers the best boulangeries & fromageries in Paris! The apartment itself is perfect for a short stay & contains all your basic needs.  Compared to other apartments we've stayed at it's a actually a decent size for a studio. The bed is really comfy and not a pull out sofa. As described, the window allows a lot of light & offers great views of the Parisian rooftops. It faces the garden so it's very quiet with no traffic noise!  Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Tridbid but Tridbid was very thorough with his communication prior to our visit & ensured we enjoyed our stay. I would happily recommend Tridib's apartment to anyone visiting Paris.

A pesar que el anfitrion no pudo recibirme por cuestiones personales, el trato de su amigo con quien encargo el departamento fue excelente. El departamento justo como aparece publicado, el barrio muy tranquilo y cerca de la estación de metro. Altamente recomendable, la única falla era el drenaje de la tina, de ahí en fuera todo muy bien.

Очень хорошая квартира. Район тихий, до метро 5 минут. Квартира полностью соотвествует описанию и фото. В квартире чисто и комфортно. Никаких проблем с заселением. Отзывчивый хозяин. Все было замечательно!

Esther’s place was clean and much more spacious than I expected. The shower had plenty of hot water and good pressure, and the washer worked well. The apartment can get a bit hot in the summer, but opening the windows makes it very comfortable. You have to climb four flights of stairs, so be aware if you have mobility issues. Overall, great location and very responsive host. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay again!

We enjoyed uniqueness and "personality" of the apartment. It is typican parisian apartment in an old building. The place is small but we had all the necessary amenities and interesting neighbours. Communication with Esther was super easy. There are shops and cafes near by the apartment and it is in walking distan from metro and sighseeing (Moulin Rouge, Monmartre) as well. We enjoyed Esther's music albums and Netflix. Overall, if you are serching for unique parisian apartment I totally recommend.
Very good and cosy flat
We stayed 3 nights at her apartment and it was a good choice. It was comfortable and we had everything we needed.  I would book it against and I can recommend  this apartment.
Really enjoyed staying in the flat. Its a great location and it allowed us to walk about all day. The flat itself is compact but really sweet! Esther is great on her responses, which was brilliant!

Great place, fantastic location! Just around the corner from Rue de Martys and 10 min walk from gare du nord and sacre coeur, 15 min from lafayette! I was suprised by the appartement on the 4th Floor, cosy, nice shower, simpel kitchen and nice small living. Good price and quality, easy going communication, would visit again!

Staying At Esther  was really great. Her apartment is so cute and cosy. Y pretty much felt at home there! The bed is so comfortable! I just loved it. Esther was really easy, flexible and helpful and she even left me some stacks and a drink to have at my arrival. I totally recomend!
Great location with great restaurants. Metro close by and comfortable apartment.

Esther's place was perfect for a city trip. It is well located. Only 10 min by foot to Sacre Cour and because the metro is right there it is just a quick ride to everywhere you want to go. The apartment was clean and nice to stay in. The communication with Esther was easy and very reliable. She responded quickly and the arrival and departure was very uncomplicated. Thank you!

Appartement très bien situé , calme donnant sur une cours intérieure. Le quartier est proche des magasins restaurants, boulangeries... l’arrivée est très facile , les horaires flexibles. Esther est très réactive. Très bon séjour .
Appartement très bien situé et très mignon

Cela nous a beaucoup plu dans le petit appartement d'Esther. Elle était assez grande pour le prix. Il est situé assez au sud de Montmartre. Tout est bon avec le métro et beaucoup à pied.
Esther était très gentille et toujours facile à atteindre.

Appartement tout à fait conforme à ce que je pensais , très agréable dans un quartier bien situé pour visiter Paris. 
Propreté impeccable.
Hôte réactive et très arrangeante.
Je recommande absolument
L'appartement d'Esther est idéalement situé, pratique et très calme. Idéal pour un week end à 2. Je recommande

Appartement bien conçu, avec du charme,  très bien situé. À 5 mn à pieds de montmartre et des transports en commun bus ou métro,  ce qui permet de visiter Paris très  facilement. Le logement est très calme, avec une grande douche. Quartier sympa avec supérette,  boulangerie. ..ester est disponible pour donner les renseignements nécessaires, souple au niveau des horaires. 1ere expérience avec rbnb réussie.

J'ai passé un séjour très agréable et tranquille dans l'appartement cosy d'Esther. Proche de tout (commerces, métros, bars, restaurants) sans être jamais bruyant, c'est un lieu idéal pour passer du bon temps à Paris. Je le recommande vivement.

Piccolo appartamento nel centro di Parigi ideale per visitare la città,2 stazioni metro a 5 min dall'appartamento e alimentari nelle vicinanze,Esther super disponibile a ogni nostra richiesta e soprattutto per il check-in/out super flessibile,super consigliato!!!
Nous avons passé 2 belles semaines chez Esther, laquelle malheureusement nous n'avons pas pu rencontrer. L'appartement est très sympathique, cosy et bien situé. Un grand merci!
Bon quartier..près de tout..bel appartement..je recommande fortement..

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour chez Esther. Elle est une hote très agréable et nous a très bien accueilli. L'appartement est très joli et bien disposé le quartier est sympatique et dynamique. Nous nous sommes senti comme à la maison et n'hésiterons pas à revenir.

This apartment is in such a fantastic location in Paris. We used the metro the whole time and having a stop so close to us was wonderful! The apartment is made up of one room and is cozy, but works well if you want a good home base in Paris. The hot water was a little spotty but it didn't bother us much, and it was nice having a fridge to use. Marie made a great video of how to get into the apartment, and we didn't have any issues getting in. The apartment is definitely secure! Overall well worth the low price we paid. Thanks Marie!

The apartment was excellent, really close to many sites and extremely well-maintained. Marie was very helpful and communicative with the entire process. If I ever make it back to Paris, I would be thrilled to be able to stay here again!
Marie was an excellent host. She made the whole process very easy. The studio was exactly how it was described. The location is fantastic. I would definitely recommend it.

Marie was really kind and helpful with the indications. The location was good, not the best but good. The room is really small...just for one person we think. I don't think we would stay there in the future to be honest.

Marie's place is really nice. It's small, but you can have everything you need there. 
The bed is comfortable and you can use the kitchenware for cooking something. 
The location is great, some meters from a metro station and we could walk to the Eiffel Tower in the evening we arrived.

Very nice small studio. Everything as told. Easy to find and great location :D 
Even i didnt meet Marie she was great and she made me feel she was there for anything we need and ready to help :)
I recommend it

My wife and I were the first time to stay in someone's house which we don't know . But Marie's apartment is fantastic ,and Marie is a thoughtful host.Marie's apartment is near a lot of scenic spots. There is a metro station in front of the apartment. If I would have been Paris again,I'll stay Marie's apartment.
Perfecto lugar. El estudio de marie es hermoso, cerca de todo. Ella muy pendiente de todo. Es paris hay que caminar mucho. Gracias Marie.

Nous avons beaucoup aimé l'appartement de Marie. Il est très bien situé et nous a permis de visiter plusieurs points d'intéret à pied. Marie répond rapidement aux courriels et nous a bien expliqué comment entrer dans l'immeuble avec son vidéo bien fait. Ce fut une magnifique première expérience à Paris.
Studio piccolo ma agevole ed ubicato in uno dei quartieri più belli e centrali! Marie è stata molto disponibile, grazie!

El apartamento es pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario para una estancia de unos días en París. Nosotros no utilizamos la cocina pero sí el microondas y la tostadora. Todo funciona muy bien. Además tiene un secador de pelo potente. La conexión de wifi buena. Lo mejor de todo es su ubicación: se encuentra al lado de la estación de metro de Varenne.

Meget fin beskrivelse, selvom det at skulle bruge 3 koder for at komme ind,  måske ikke var verdens letteste adgang.
Marie er et utroligt sødt og hjælpsomt menneske, som bruger tid på sine logerende, når de støder ind i problemer. Godt gået!!

El apartamento de Marie es muy cómodo. Está muy bien ubicado por lo que puedes ir caminando hacia los puntos turísticos más importantes. El barrio es tranquilo, lindo, y tienes una estación de metro al lado del apartamento. Lo recomiendo! Marie es muy atenta y responde a todas las consultas.

Un pequeño estudio limpio y bien ubicado, gracias a lo cual puedes recorrer a pie, parte de las zonas más turísticas de Paris.
De Marie, no tengo nada que decir, pues no llegué a conocerla, ellas nos dejó las llaves de su departamentito, porque nosotros llegamos muy tarde un viernes y luego, el domingo, ella no estaba disponible para despedirnos, pero por mail y mensajes de whatsapp, se veía siempre disponible a resolver cualquier eventualidad.

Yalma was an excellent hostess. Very communicative and ready to give us facilities.
 She even left us breakfast for two days!
 The apartment is perfect for two people. Spacious and bright. The neighborhood is great to visit the city, near several metro stations and in a very lively district.
I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Paris.

Very quiet and bright studio, conveniently located, close to Metro, shopping (franprix downstairs), post office, banks, restaurants.
Terencio was a great host, very responsive to my questions, helpful, provided many valuable info about Paris. Awesome experience.

I had a great experience in Paris. As a first timer, traveling alone, I'm glad I picked this listing. It's a great location, Terencio wasn't able to meet me but his brother was nice and helped me with settling in. A lot of walkable places to visit, atm, metro and historical landmarks.. 

Thanks for allowing me to invade your space.
Great place to stay with friends for a weekend in paris. Metro stop right around the corner and AMAZING blackout shutter.

We had a really nice stay! The house was very easy to find and the metro station was just around the corner. Terencio couldn't be there but his mother welcomed us in the flat. Everything was clean but the bathroom really needs to be renovated and a complete makeover. Other than that I can definitely recommend this flat!

For my first visit to Paris, I had such a wonderful time! A big reason why was the apartment provided by Terencio. Though unfortunately, I was not able to meet him personally due to his own travels; thankfully, his brother Lucio was there to greet me warmly and was very helpful in answering any of my questions about the apartment, the surrounding area, and Paris in general. The apartment was clean and provided all of the necessities to facilitate a comfortable stay. The location was also convenient as it was only steps from from the metro which would have you just about anywhere in Paris in 15-20 minutes or less. Other great things were the supermarket right next to the building(!) and the really great patisserie right around the corner. I would definitely stay here again the next time I bust Paris. Thank you Terencio and Lucio!
Good location. Many cafes and bars nearby. I love the vinyl in Terecio’s place. Would stay again when i come back to Paris
I loved staying in Terencio's studio it was very clean and quiet!
Awesome location. It has all the necessities if you are looking for a simple place to stay in Paris for a few days.
The apartment is small and not perfectly clean, but very well located! Terencio is attentive and flexible. We didn't spend so much time in the apartment, but it was a nice stay in any case.

We had a great time at Terencio's place! He couldn't be there himself so his brother welcomed us in a very friendly manner. The apartment is small but cosy and there is an interesting collection of books and vinyl which I love! The supermarket next door, the proximity of the metro and the great bakery around the corner are a definite plus. We visited the entire city by foot and found Terencio's place to be conveniently located. Although the bathroom could use some renovation, as other comments say, it provides all the basics you need. I would definetly recommend this place for a visit to Paris!

The house is very easy to find, in a good and nice location. The metro station is just around the corner, and supermarket just downstairs! Terencio welcomed me in the flat, he is very communicative and answers very fast the requests. Everything was clean, luminous and well equipped. I recommend this flat!

Terencios brother welcomed us. 
The apartment was not that clean, specially the bathroom. The  Bathroom were really bad, the commode were moving and it was very old. The bath tube were also very old and looked dirty, the bathroom must be renovated!  The bedsheet seemed like it was used.
The kitchen tools were also dirty, we had to rewash it before using. 
The bed were really small, so one of us had to sleep on the floor (on matress) and only one duvet, so the other one had to use towels to cover when sleeping. 
The only good thing about this stay was the cheap price and the central location.
Terencio's apartment was a lovely little place to spend our time in Paris. It is very close to the metro and easy to get into the city! A nice neighbourhood too!

Terencio was a great host, he prepared everything in a perfect manner, and helped me during the days. I liked his kitchen, it had everything to prepare a small meal after a long day. He was very kind and always there when needed.

Terencio was a great host and really wanted to make us feel comfortable. He also brought a hairdryer especially for us when we asked him if he had one :) The location is great, the place has everything you need. Recomended.

Terencio's room was very clean and nice and the metro station is only a few meters away. We had good days in Paris and I definitely would stay at his room again! We didn't met Terencio personally, but his father. He knew about everything and made us feel very comfortable.

good place overall, nice and clean and close to the metro. about 30 min walk from louvre. description is quite apt. place has a single bed and a double fold-away futon, hence its best suited for singles or doubles needing twin beds. neighbourhood is safe and quiet. there is a super market right next door. 

The only 'needs improvement' bit i can think of is that the toilet could be better maintained. although it was clean, it had broken tiles, flaking paint, etc.
Buena comunicación y acogida por parte de Terencio y su hermano , apartamento muy céntrico y bien comunicado .

Bon communication avec terencio
L’appartement est propre, zone calme  et proche de le métro

Appartement petit mais très convivial, beaucoup de BD et autres beaux livres. Calme et proche des commerces et restos, bars très animé et populaire. À 2 pas du métro, nous avons été très bien accueilli par le papa de Terencio. Très bon séjour.

The apartment is located in about 25 minutes walk from the Eiffel Tower, about 1 hour walk from the Louvre. The district is very clean and safe, there are lots of shops, cafes and restaurants. The apartment is on the 2nd floor. There’s a small elevator. The flat is very cozy and nice, contains everything you need. But it’s very tiny - maximum for 2 persons. The kitchen can fit 1 person only. It can be humid in the bedroom after using the bathroom, so you need a dehumidifier that is used. Communication with Mona was amazing - very welcoming and helpful host, was very supportive, friendly and provided a lot of advice!!! We felt like at home!
Great location, good appartment, nice !
Appartement agréable, calme, bien équipé, accueillant. Parking pratique. Alexandra est charmante. Quartier agréable entre Bastille et République. Beaucoup de transports urbains à proximité.

Séjour très agréable. Notre arrivée s'est organisée facilement et, Alexandra n'étant pas disponible, c'est Mathieu qui nous a très gentiment accueillis. L'appartement d'Alexandra correspond tout-à-fait à la description faite sur le site et nous nous y sommes sentis très vite comme chez nous. De plus, nous avons profité de la place de parking proposée et cela a grandement facilité notre séjour à Paris. Nous espérons avoir la possibilité de bénéficier à nouveau  de cet appartement lors d'un prochain séjour.

Accueil adorable d'Alexandra, avec une petite description des lieux ainsi qu'une bonne bouteille de vin.
Studio très agréable et conforme aux photos, incroyablement calme avec une terrasse très agréable après une longue journée
Métro à deux pas 
Un excellent rapport qualité/prix pour Paris !

Alexandra a un bel appartement. Même avec un petit balcon. La rue est bien calme. Tous les transports sont proches. Le supermarché est au coin. Le parking sous le bâtiment est spacieux. Nous aimerions bien y revenir une prochaine fois! Alexandra est très hospitalière.

Das Apartment ist wie beschrieben. Die Lage ist sehr gut. Sie können zu Fuß zu den meisten Sehenswürdigkeiten gehen. Alle Dinge die Sie brauchen, finden Sie in der Nähe der Wohnung. Die Gegend war sehr schön und ruhig. Ich kann die Wohnung nur empfehlen. Sie verfügt über alle Annehmlichkeiten: warme Dusche, ein bequemes Bett, voll ausgestattete Küche und ein sehr gutes Wlan. Die Kommunikation mit Alexandra war unkompliziert und freundlich.

J'ai vécu un superbe week-end à Paris, c'est une ville magnifique avec beaucoup de chose à visiter et à faire comme les monuments, shopping, balade, aller dans les immenses jardin où l'on peut se détendre !
A comfortable apartment in a very convenient location. We plan to come back!
Great location and decent value for the money.

Great place located near RER and metro. Grocery store is down the street and many local restaurants near by. Laurent was very responsive and helped me navigate around the city easily. 100% recommend and I would stay here again!
Excellent location close to public transportation, cafes, tourist attractions, grocery stores etc. Clean, cozy, and check in was a breeze! 100% recommend
Very comfortable place, positioned perfectly for a lovely walk along the Seine towards the Tour Eiffel.  Grocery and public transport nearby; a lovely stay.
Amazing experience

Even though we did not meet Laurent, he was in touch constantly and on top of everything. The check in and out were effortless. 
The apartment was better than described and in the pictures.
We would definitely stay there again and it is highly recommended.

We stayed 3 nights . The apartment felt cozy and inviting.  It had everything we needed and more . We  loved to be able to drink coffee right away without running to buy some . The straightening iron was also a wonderful surprise :). Laurent was always available to answer questions we had and was very helpful with recommendations. The location was perfect. We felt safe walking , had a beautiful view of the Eiffel tower and the Statue of Liberty within walking distance  and was close to a shopping mall, restaurants and public transportation. We highly recommend staying here.

Great location , really close to lots of transport ( Mirabeau , Javel etc )
Very clear instructions from Laurent and very helpful regarding check out etc. 
Basil Boulangerie nearby was excellent and “Pops” restaurant nearby for a small place with very friendly staff & lots of specials and homemade food. Hope to come to Paris again and stay here again.
Though I didn't meet Laurent in person, all went well and we were able to communicate if needed. The flat was well furbished and the location convenient.
Laurent is sooo helpful and kind :) His flat is really nice, cozy and comfortable. Great location! near metro, bus station, market and everything what we need.
Everything in this trip was very nice and Laurent was very nice to us. His apartment is very good, clean, it has a good location near metro, train and bus station. I will repeat in future.
Amazing place ! Surely will come back next time 😀
Nice little place. Good Location. Great host
Laurent was a great host! The house is very nice and clean and located in a very nice part of Paris
Great apartment, very clean and comfortable. Would definitely stay again.
Great host, always willing to answer questions! Apartment was even better than the pictures and has great transport links!

We stayed very well at Laurent's apartment. It is not too spacious but perfect for two. In the location you can find everything you need and if you have to buy something every principal shop is close. The house isn't in the centre of the city but is easy to reach every part of Paris with the metro and the buses. You can also arrive to the Tour Eiffel in a few time, both walking near the riverside (Senna) or moving with public transports. Laurent helped us every time we had a problem and we are very thankful for this. We advise this apartment to everyone how want to stay in a quiet area without renounce to the attractions of the city.
Lovely place for a couple or two friends traveling in Paris! Loads of metro stations nearby and you can even walk to the Eiffel Tower. The house was lovely! New, clean and stylish.

Laurent's apartment is very nice, quiet and equipped. It is in a good connected  street and close to supermarkets as well as to the RER train station and metro station, by few minutes walking. You can also go to the Tour Eiffel with a very nice 30 minutes walking along the Seine. Laurent was also very nice in helping us during our stay. Highly recommended

We really enjoyed our time at Isaure's apartment. Her home is located in a lovely neighborhood with easy access to everything that you might need. The place in itself was clean and very tastefully decorated, it was really a pleasure to stay here and we really felt at home.
Fantastic host and place. Lovely, clean, spacious place. Host was very accommodating to our arrival and departure times and we were able to leave our bags there during the day.

Emplacement, calme, accès, propreté et équipement du logement sont très bien.
Très bon rapport qualité/prix. Communication facile avec Isaure. Adresse à recommander.

ce petit appartement est très bien situé - à 10 mn de la station Rome ou Villiers ; on y peut dormir au calme ; il est aménagé avec goût ; il est suffisamment spacieux pour un couple et c'est le grand confort pour une personne seule. Très agréable. Isaure est très soucieuse de notre confort.
Charmant comme le dit l'annonce, dans une rue calme et proche de tout ; bon séjour pour ma part.
Appartemant correct, pas de bruits et bien situé.
Super clean, amazing location. Samuel responds within minutes and was very helpful in giving us all the information we needed as well as local tips. Would stay again!

Worth every step and there are a few!This is a beautiful place perched on the top two floors of a Paris walk up. Check in was very easy and welcoming. Metro (Sentier) is very close as are innumerable bars and restaurants on Rue Montorgueil. It's very clean and airy with a decent kitchen. It faces an interior courtyard so it's very quiet even though you are in the heart of Paris.

Amazing experience! The apartment was very 'zen' and super calm since it gives to a quiet courtyard. There are also amazing restaurants nearby - Janine Loves Sunday is a must try! I would stay there again anytime - cannot recommend it enough.
Clean & cosy app at an interesting location. Samual was very helpful and responsive. We enjoyed every bit of our stay.

The whole process of booking this airbnb at Samuel's place was a breeze! He gave full details on his flat location, and ensured great communication which made the check-in really fabulous. Furthermore, Nathan also showed us around the flat and which was kept neatly. We met Samuel on the last day on our check-out and it went really smoothly. Overall, it has been a very good stay! Thanks so much for your superb communication and coordination! :)
Thanks so much!was our best Airbnb experience! We got so much advice  from Samuels friend
Great place and location. Would recommend!

It was really beautiful house and very peaceful. 
Host Samuel is so kind!
And the place was close to city's central.
I will remember PARIS and nice people, we had a great time here.
Thank you for your kindness!

Samuel's friend received us and gave us useful information about the city. The place is very clean and quiet. It was close to the city center and supermarkets. I would say that a couple of blocks away from the house is not that great during the night but we managed by entering our street from the side that Samuel's friend suggested and we had no problems.
Samuel was great in making us settle in confortably despite our delay in arrival. He was nice enough to help us with our luggage and there was everything needed in a minimalist setting.

We didn't meet Samuel by himself, but he send us a friend to open the door and to us informations about the apartment and the neighborhood. A very nice person. Thanks.
To communicate with Samuel was very easy and uncomplicated.
The apartment is really nice, bright and clean, similar to the pictures. And very, very silent in the night although it is located near the center. All around you will find everything you need in a walking distance as well the tourist attractions. Perfect for a nice trip to Paris!
Un appartement et un quartier qui ont été très agréables.

Die wohnung liegt sehr zentral in paris. Es gibt viele Restaurants und bars in der nähe.  Sehenswürdigkeiten sind gut zu erreichen.  Metro-stationen sind ganz in der nähe.  Die Wohnung ist genau wie in der beschreibung und den bildern.  Sehr hell, einfach eingerichtet und sauber.  Die gegend ist ruhig und die nachbarn freundlich. Die begrüßung war sehr freundlich. 
Alles in allem ein gutes preisleistungsverhältniss! Wir würden wieder kommen.

Camille's apartment is nicely styled, clean, and open-feeling. She was very responsive and helpful to work around our arrival and departure schedules. Nice space to cook, relax, and sleep after a long day of sight-seeing. Couldn't ask for a better apartment right downtown  and so close to the train and metro stops.

I had a great weekend in France. Thank you very much  for the hospitality, an apartment is very comfortable and located in a very beautiful area next to the metro. This is the perfect option for a great vacation!

Ein schönes Apartment in sehr guter Lage, ca. 600m zum Gare du Nord. Um die Wohnung herum gibt es viele Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in Form von Supermärkten oder Bäcker und auch viele Restaurants sind in der Nähe. Die Wohnung befindet sich im 1. Stock, war sauber und Camille war eine sehr sympathische und hilfreiche Gastgeberin.

Un appartement très charmant.. très cosy.. 
J'ai adoré mon séjours.. 
Accessible au supermarché, Au métro, Au restaurant.. 
Très bien placé!

L'appartement de Camille est très bien situé et en plus il est dans une rue calme de Paris ! Camille est une personne prévenante et il a été très facile de communiquer. Merci pour le séjour et je le recommande à toutes personnes voulant séjourner sur la Capitale

Большое спасибо, все понравилось, уютная хорошая квартира, в квартире все удобства есть:кухня, посуда, полотенца и тд. расположение удобное, рядом с метро и другими достопримечательностями. Всем советую!
Very central. wonderful area to stay in!
Julien was great. He helped me find my passports through translating with the Uber driver and overall the place and area was great.

My stay at Julien's apartment, was one of the best experiences I have had on AirBnb. The contact with Julien was prompt and professional, plus he gave me all the information I required and was also regularly in touch during the duration of my stay, making sure I had everything I needed.

The apartment itself is wonderful!! Great location near the metro, supermarkets and restaurants. The living space has all the necessities one might need during a stay in Paris. Comfortable bed and great internet. What more does one need?

Definitely my go-to apartment in Paris!!! Highly recommended.

Great host, great location, flat got everything you needed.

- location is  2 mins from subway
- supermarket is 3-5 mins walk
- host communicate and help in timely manner
- Flat got enogh space around bedroom and living room area. Kitchen is small but compact with fridge and also washing machine.
- for a price and compare to what you got, very well worth the money.

Lovely experience staying at Julian’s, we are first time Airbnb users and the experience couldn’t have been smoother. Located near metro and nice restaurants and a nice safe area for women travelling alone

Everything was great. Super cozy appartment next to a supermarket and the metro. Great Location to start an adventure in Paris. Julien is very communicative and was always there for questions. Highly recommended. We would always come again.
Very nice and comfortable studio/ apartment for two people. Perfect for home office too. Very well located in a beautiful district.

Very good apartment for a long weekend trip for 1-2 people. Julien is a courteous  and very reliable host. Cooking is also totally possible, although the apartment could use some more equipment. We definitely recommend it!

Everything was great! 
Nice apartment and very good location. Would totally stay there again in the future.

Great studio for a single travelers or a couple. The area and the locations are amazing. The check-in was not so smooth but I arrived late then expected. 
The kitchen was fully equipped and also with some food and drinks. 
Great stay !

L'appartement est super bien situé, joli et spacieux (plus que ce qu'on peut imaginer avec les photos). Julien a été très disponible, réactif aux questions et s'est assuré que mon séjour se passait bien. L'accueil a aussi été très facile. Bref, nickel je recommande et n'hésiterais pas à revenir lors d'un nouveau séjour à Paris.

Logement agréable et bien situé. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Julien, qui a été accueillant et très réactif même si nous ne l'avons pas vu en personne. La gardienne est aussi très sympathique ! Nous recommandons.

El apartamento de Julien está ubicado cerca a una estación de metro lo cual permite acceder a cualquier parte. El estudio es acogedor, tiene todas las comodidades necesarias para quedarse unos días en Paris.

Tres bel appartement, fonctionne et bien situé.
Julien est un hôte reactif et prévenant. 
Je recommande.
Appartement situé dans un quartier sympa, avec une facilité d’accès au centre ville. Julien est très accueillant. Je recommande.

Le séjour de mon père chez Julien s'est très bien passé. L'appartement correspond bien à la description (il manquerait seulement une cafetière et 1 ou 2 cintres ou rangements accessibles dans l'idéal), nous n'avons pas rencontré Julien mais il s'est montré très arrangeant et sympathique dans nos échanges. Merci!

Studio moderne très agréable et très bien situé. J'ai passé un excellent séjour. Julien est une personne trèa sympathique, même si il n'était présent sur Paris durant mon séjour, il  s'est montré toujours disponible en cas de besoin. Je recommande vivement !

On the plus side, it's super bright and cheerful, the bathroom is tiny but great, the washing machine was a huge plus, and though the wifi didn't work while I was there, Elsa very considerately gave me a discount in cash. She's super nice, but the apartment needs some work.

Things to know on the con side: This apartment is in a building that keeps its trash just inside the door, so any time you enter or exit the building you're greeted with a cloud of garbage and bugs. The apartment itself is clean, although it's much more cluttered than you can see in the photos -- the bed is surrounded by open closets so you're sleeping in a closet, basically. I definitely felt like a student borrowing someone's dorm room for the weekend.

There's no fan or method of air circulation aside from the open windows, so my choice was to either get the night sweats or listen to people partying up and down the block. I heard several terrible renditions of "Wannabe" from a surprising variety of drunk French people between the hours of 1 and 3am, and one hilarious version of "I feel like a woman," but I would have rather been asleep. I found the bed incredibly uncomfortable, though I suppose that is a personal preference. The host is really nice and I hate to write a negative review, but the above factors made this place generally unpleasant to stay at, if only because even with earplugs in it was impossible to get a full night's sleep at any point. Three stars for the price.

My family had a wonderful time at Elsa's place, which was super cute, cosy, clean and close to all amenities, including supermarkets, restaurants, bakeries and the metro station Belleville which connects to all directions. Elsa was a great host who made them feel very welcome. I highly recommend her flat!

Elsa was so nice and very flexible.  I had a last minute change of plans and she was able to work with me.  The apartment was very charming and exactly as described.  It's in a great part of Paris, especially if you like dumplings.  I would stay here again.
J'ai adoré mon séjour chez Elsa , l'appartement est tres agréable et le qartier très sympa..... je recommande ++++

J'ai passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement d'Elsa ! La décoration est superbe, les livres de bon goût et le quartier de Belleville est vivant et agréable. L'accueil a été parfait et je n'ai eu aucune complication durant le séjour. Je reviendrai sûrement :)

L'appart est top, propre, très lumineux et agréable à vivre. Le lit est super confortable.
Elsa a été très prévenante, s'assurant que tout allait bien ! Grande souplesse aussi pour la remise des clefs et les heures d'arrivée et de départ, c'est parfait !
Elsa est très accueillante et arrangeante et son appartement vraiment charmant, fonctionnel et idéalement situé!

L'appartement de Elsa était très charmant et je me suis sentie comme chez moi tout de suite. Le quartier également est très sympa, tout est dans les environs: le métro, les supermarchés, les cafés etc. 
Elsa était facilement joignable par mail et était toujours prête à répondre à mes questions. 
J'ai passé un très bon séjour! Merci Elsa!

Great apartment, great location and great host.  Severine was responded to questions very quickly and had many helpful recommendations.  A bit of a walk from the metro, but not too much for most people.  Plenty of amenities in area but not too touristy.

The best airbnb i've stayed in to date -  gorgeous, clean apartment in (my opinion) one of the most authentic and nice neighbourhoods in Paris! Severine was super helpful and timely in getting everything sorted out - had a great time during my stay! Thanks again

We definitely had a fantastic stay in Severins apartment! The apartment is perfectly equipped and the location is great, the communication with Severine was super easy and uncomplicated. The check-in and -out was super flexible and we felt at home and welcomed! I definitely would stay there again, thank you so much Severine!
Super logement, tout à fait conforme à la description.
Très bon séjour, échanges par SMS avec notre hôte réguliers et quasi instantanés, d'où notre entière satisfaction. Merci Séverine !
Amazing apartment with such an amazing view!!
Morena has a wonderful apartment in one of the best neighborhoods of Paris. She is also kind, helpful, and responsive to all inquiries. An excellent value for one or two travelers.
Ok!
Lovely place into most young and cool Paris’ district. Perfect for couples, easy organization.
Séjour conforme à nos attentes, appartement agréable et très bonne communication :)
Très chouette appartement, confortable, charmant, très bien situé.

L'appartement de Morena est très bien situé (200 metres du métro), dans un quartier sympa (entre Belleville, Menilmontant et Oberkampf). Idéal couples et jeunes. L'appartement est spatieux et il y a tout ce qu'il faut. Morena a été hyper disponible sur toute la ligne, à partir de l'horaire du check-in.
Je recommande l'appartement de Morena. Il est très bien positionné et le rapport qualité prix est fort appréciable.  Bravo !
Morena est super sympa et l'appart au top! Confortable, propre et surtout ultra bien placé! Je recommande
Such a cute place! Great location, plenty of room, would recommend for any guest. Merci beaucoup!

Anne - Claire’s was very comforting and clean. A lovely bright apartment with everything you need. There are many restaurants and stores in proximity which makes for an easy stay! And it was easy to reach her and her team
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this lovely flat right in the heart of Paris! Ann-Claire was a very welcoming and helpful host. Phoenix the cat was a great host as well! :)

Anne-Claire's apartment is comfortable, luminous and luxurious. We felt like we were in a 4 star luxury hotel. The apartment was wonderfully clean especially considering she has a cat that lives in the apartment. The location was fantastic in terms of proximity to everything you want to do and see. There are grocery stores, bars and restaurants a-plenty. 
The only less-than-ideal aspect to Anne-Claire's beautiful apartment is it is located in what appears to be a red-light district (minus the red lights). Sex workers lined the Rue Ste Foy as well the neighboring streets Rue St. Denis and Boulevard St. Denis day and night. While I experienced/witnessed nothing unsafe I did not feel safe coming and going at night which put a damper on some of my plans.

She was super lovely and came when the shower flooded. She helped fix the problem. The wifi is very slow and often stops working, but her team was more than willing to help. A lot of her stuff is still there though, which sometimes interfere with the spaciousness, however it isn't too big of a deal if you don't have too much stuff. Thank you for hosting me and my friend! The area is super lovely.

I had a great time at Anne-Claire's place! Excellent location good places to eat near by and great transport options. It was like being at home and the big tv was very helpful considering the cold weather outside during my stay. Heating worked well, the kitchen is small but very well organised and working well.  I would only advise to leave the place a little more tidy and offer a rack to hang clothes for travellers that like me are visiting Paris for work.
El apartamento está limpio, agradable y cómodo para dos o tres personas. La cocina es muy completa y tiene todas las comodidades. Lo hemos pasado genial. Recomendable
Отличная квартира, идеальное месторасположение. Есть все для пребывания как на несколько дней, так и на более долгий срок. Тихо и спокойно.
Otima localização e ótimo apartamento. Cuidado com o checkin e o checkout. Pode ser uma aventura.
central and clean. ;) chris is easy to communicate!

Loved the location, quiet street in a buzzing area. 
The apartment has everything you need, ground floor and even a terrace.
Definitely would recommend!
Great apartment, exactly as shown in the images and lovely decor. Spent the weekend here with my mum and we really enjoyed it. Good area, well kept and good communication from Chloe.

Je recommande ce logement pour passer un WE à Paris.
Très bien situé, propre, très joliment agencé.
Bref, au TOP!

Appartement adorable (tel que sur les photos) et très confortable, situé à 2 min à pied du métro Pigalle et à 5min à pied de la place du Tertre de Montmartre! Même si on ne rencontre pas Chloé, elle est joignable avant et pendant son séjour!
Super leuke woning. Erg klein maar precies wat je nodig hebt in Parijs. Buitenverblijf en de inrichting daarvan met al het groens is heerlijk. In een ontzettend leuke wijk van Parijs.

Si proche de PIGALLE sans en avoir aucun des inconvénients et si proche de MONTMARTRE pour se balader le soir ! 
Tout cela dans le calme ----> Je ne pensais pas la chose possible !!!!
QUE DU BONHEUR !

Charmant petit duplex, décoré avec goût, correspondant parfaitement à la description. 
A recommander

The apartment has a little of Paris and lots of good vibrations. It is calm, cozy and great location. Very welcoming entrance patio and a darling church bell ring you can hear from the place. Aida's generosity has been noticeble in many ways from her care about me before arrival and throught out. She was great at communicating and always in touch. No issues arised that needed her attentiin but I am certain that if anything went wrong she would be there to lend a hand. Thank you Aida for helping out making this experience a great one.

Très belle appartement, comme sur les photos, chaleureux, j'y retournerais à coup sur si je voyage à Paris. Très bien placé, proche de plusieurs petits cafés et de petits magasins. Le métro Temple et République sont facile d'accès. À mon arrivé Aïda m'avait laissé un petit souvenir de Paris ainsi que sa carte Velib. Elle ne pouvait pas être présente lors de mon arrivé alors elle a demandé à sa mère Mysiane de m'accueillir, très gentille, prête à répondre à tout mes questions, donne de bon conseils pour aller visiter la ville ou sur les musées.  Aïda est très disponible par messages ou par Skype alors au moindre problème il y a moyen de communiquer avec elle, j'ai adoré mon expérience et je vous recommande cet appartement sans hésiter

Casa molto funzionale e accogliente, in ottima posizione.
Aida è gentilissima , ha risposto sempre velocemente a tutte le mail e mi ha preparato  una accoglienza sontuosa!
Grazie Aida sono stata proprio bene.

Aida avait mis à ma disposition sa carte de vélib et la clé de sa boîte aux lettres. A mon arrivée une bouteille de vin m'attendait. Aida absente avait demandé à Jean Pierre son parrain de m'accueillir. J'ai beaucoup apprécié cet accueil jovial et discret. La sortie a été assuré par Christine la voisine avec beaucoup de tact. Je suis resté en contact avec Aida pendant mon séjour du fait des diableries de la monétique.

superb!
great place, clean, good location, excellent rental

The place is good  but not for seniors as the shower is high and toilet is too small for a tall person
The area is walking distance to train and bus stations and shops are handy.
Logement conforme aux attentes, propre et sécurisé. Nicolas est super sympathique. Le quartier est animé avec pleins de bars et restaurants. Je recommande!

This apartment was very nice & clean.  It has a lot of natural light.  My boyfriend & I were very pleased.  Our host left a binder on the coffee table with suggestion on local restaurants.  The bed was very comfortable.  I agree with some of the other reviews regarding the noise.  There are a couple of bars/restaurants across the street & the noise was consistent every night.  If you are a light sleeper, definitely take a ear plugs or a white noise machine etc...  The apartment had everything we needed & was a quick walk to a local market & up to Moulin Rouge.  We went to the show for my boyfriends 40th birthday.   This apartment does not have an elevator.  We got used to the stairs pretty quickly, however, for some, it may be too much.  I was very pleased with my stay & would stay here again.

Great apartment; much larger and brighter than expected. Two disappointments were the neighborhood and abundace of personal belongings that crowded in on us. The immediate three- block area is upscale, but it is a gentrified island in the middle of much less desireable neighborhoods on all sides. As far as personal items, the owner left notes and warnings not to touch his things, rather than appropriately clear out the apartment. The kids' bedroom and master closet were locked  off with chains and with a minimum of effort all personal items could have been taken out of the way by putting them there. There was  no closet space for hanging clothes

We had a decent time at Loic's place. The price was good for the time we were there and the locations and views of the city were really stunning. There were a few things to note, there was no hair dryer and only French TV, so if you visit be sure and bring something to access netflix or your own shows if you aren't French. This may not bother some, but you are staying in someones home when they are not there, so expect lots of kids toys, personal photos and kids drawings on the walls in the bedroom. For a romantic vacation, it felt a little like staying at our cousins house, and not like a rental as you may expect. Overall, it was a good place if you are there to explore and not spend a lot of time in the room. Expect 5 flights of stairs on a tight spiral staircase as well, this wouldn't be ideal for anyone with issues with stairs. (I know stairs are listed, but these are some STAIRS)
Great location, cosy place, clean. All you need to enjoy Paris

This was a wonderful place to stay in Paris. The location was perfect. Close to the metro so it’s easy to get around. The neighborhood is very nice as well with lots of restaurants, cafes, and bars close by. I would definitely recommend and would stay again.

This apartment is a lovely light filled classic French floor apartment on a quiet street in a pretty accessible part of town. Common in older homes, the floors squeak and the home is decorated with small accessories (like any loved home) that one has to be careful not to accidentally brush into. Overall a nice place to stay. Never met Loïc, the check in/out was through a restaurant down the street that had the key. Kind of strange, but when we had questions we got a response within a day from the host. Better to bring your own amenities like soap and lotion, and for the ladies, there is no hairdryer provided. Basic needs meet. So if your up for a steep climb up 4 flights of stairs this is probable the place for you...just don’t forget anything downstairs 🙂
Nice and cozy! Great location with a lot of charm! Many shops near.

We really enjoyed our stay here! The apartment was exactly as advertised, and very comfortable. There were more restaurants and bakeries nearby than we’d thought based on our Google Maps explorations before we came. The walk to the metro is very reasonable, even in less than ideal weather. The view down the street is lovely and the whole space is well-lit. The 4th floor (5th floor U.S.) walk-up is as expected- but you get used to it fast. The apartment is on the same street as a club/bar, so the evenings were often full of shouting and loud talking (we stayed for a solid week, it was pretty consistent). We used a sound machine app and were fine, but if you’re a light sleeper this could get on your nerves. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay and we would absolutely stay here again. Love the apartment, enjoyed the area, and Loic was great.
Such a cute place to stay. It has the Paris window that you see in the magazines. We really enjoyed our stay there. Thanks!

Loic's place is in a fantastic location, more of a neighborhood and easily walkable to many of the tourist attractions (20-40 minutes).  As the Loic state's, there are quite a few stairs to get to the place, so be prepared for that!   If we are ever back in Paris, I would book this spot in a heartbeat!
Great location and views. Very nice place with a nice book of recommendations and much recommend!
Great and beautiful apartment! Just as described. Would definitely stay here again.
Great location! Super cute and walkable area.

Loic's apartment was very clean and comfortable and well placed for exploring Paris while not being in the middle of the tourist mania closer to centre. It was wonderful to return from a day of museum visiting to an area with a much more local feel. The area is teeming with amazing cafes and patisseries and fresh fruit stalls. Also right around the corner is a store that has everything you'll need and it's right beneath Sacre Coeur with a beautiful view of the city from the top!

In the perfect spot if you’re looking to take in Montmartre. Located near a ton of restaurants, cafes and grocers.

The space is stunning. A winding spiral staircase may be daunting for some, but truly iconic in the design. Loic’s place is a corner unit that gets morning and late afternoon sun. Open all the windows for an amazing cross breeze and the most picturesque view down Rue des Martyrs. All of the fixtures, bathroom and the kitchen are completely renovated. There is the charm of old world, with new world touches.

When I’m back in Paris, I will most certainly be staying here!

Thank you, Loic. :)

THE apartment for those who want a true Paris Experience. Absolutely beautiful apartment in perfect location with tons of great shops and restaurants downstairs. The apartment is airy and light with floor to ceiling windows and white curtains on the corner which means you have 180 degree views. Absolutely charming. The 4 flights of stairs are totally worth the view! This will be where I stay any time I come to Paris!

As an Architect, this apartment is super amazing. I was looking for Paris experience and I feel that this apt is exactly what I am looking for. 2 sides full of windows, and lots of sun! I also really appreciate the nice furnish in the apartment. It made our stay so much more pleasure. I can’t wait to come back again with my husband. It’s awesome for couples!
Beautiful traditional apartment in a lovely area of Paris, within walking distances of attractions, bars and cafes and metro stops nearby too. A brilliant pied à terre.

We had a wonderful stay in Loic’s classy apartment, communication was great - very close proximity to great restaurants, metro and a good outlook too!

We could relax and enjoy, bit noisy at times, but slept well through the night!

The apartment was spit spot, I would recommend anyone staying here!
The aparment was clean and bright and the location was excellent.  We enjoyed our stay very much. Didn't find the hairdryer or shampoo which was a surprise.

The host is very nice and cares that his guests have a good stay. The apartment is very calm and well located. Well equipped for 2 but could also fit a third in a pinch. You'd be hard pressed to find a more peaceful place to stay in Paris for the price.

Nicolas' flat is in a very convenient position and it is perfect for someone who wants to visit Paris and is not planning to spend a lot of time in the flat . The flat is quite nice, perfect for 2 people, but we were 3 friends and for the 2 nights we were there, the sofa-bed was more than fine as well.  
Nicolas is friendly and he cares about his guests, which is always good.
Overall, also considering the convenient price of the flat, we decided it was a very good deal!

Nicolas est arrangeant,  l'appartement est très bien situé. 
Bon séjour, 
Loïc.
Appartement situé près du métro. Rapidement accessible
bel emplacement pour ce petit appartement situé dans le quartier Oberkampf (quartier très sympathique)

The train stop is literally across the street which was awesome! Communication with host for checking in and checking out was great! Just be mindful of the 5 flights of stairs and the fact that the homeowner remains at the residence during your stay!
Excelente ubicación, frente al metro. Ningun problema con el anfitrión
Constances apartment is perfectly situated in Marais - close to metro stations and cafes/shopping, and the apartment has a lovely parisian wibe to it. We would love to stay there again!
Charming, perfectly located apartment and a very responsive host. Would definitely come again!
We had a wonderful stay, very beautiful apartment & easy communication. Everything was perfect. Would definitely stay again.

The apartment is much better than it looks  in photos. It has everything you need and is full of exquisite parisian style. The location is perfect, in the heart of the city, close to 5 metro stations. Constance was very attentive and helped us to host my daughter who decided to come at the last moment. Strongly recommended to everyone.

Super emplacement pour cet appartement très spacieux. Constance est très rapide pour répondre aux questions éventuelles et nous avait laissé de quoi nous faire un petit déjeuner. Je recommande vivement cet appartement et cette hôtesse.

Appartement très lumineux et spacieux et surtout bien situé dans Paris à proximité de nombreux petits endroits sympas. 
Échanges faciles et efficaces avec Constance.

Séjour au top ! L’appartement est très beau et l’accueil de constance était parfait. Le vrai charme d’un appartement parisien et au calme ! Une hôte attentionnée, disponible et prévenante, comme il en reste peu. Encore 1000 mercis !
Brilliant location and host. Lovely home

We had a lovely stay at Claire's flat. Her friend Carolie received us at the flat and gave us a very helpful induction. The flat was just perfect in many ways. It is very conveniently located near three metro lines with bistros, cafés and small grocery stores nearby. The building with courtyard and a small communal garden is very quiet at night and feels safe. The rooms are very clean and well managed, with all the facilities we needed and decent space for two. I will highly recommend it:)
The apartment was really nice and cosy. The location is just perfect, close to rue du commerce and the centre.
L'appartement de Claire est très agréable, conforme aux photos. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour .

Appartement fonctionnel. Il y avait un souci avec la chasse d'eau le jour où je suis arrivée et on n'a pas eu le temps de le faire réparer avant mon arrivée. Mais j'ai été prévenu et j'ai fait avec. 
Le quartier est commerçant et proche des commodités.

L'appartement de Claire est très agréable et vraiment propre, nous y avons passé un excellent weekend ! L'espace est parfaitement optimisé, il y a même un lave-vaisselle et une machine à laver. L'immeuble en lui même est plein de charme et l'accès par la cour privée donne l'impression d'être privilégié. Le quartier est a la fois calme et vivant, et très bien desservi par les transports en commun. Bref super appartement et super hôte !!!

Yes it really light and cosy flat, really perfect interior and good location. 
Everything matches the description.

The owner Georges is friendly and intelligent person.
All the time we had the feeling that we are guests in the best of friend.

In Paris, there are many wonderful places to visit. One of them - Georges's flat :)))
nous recommandons ce logement avec chambre au calme

Accueil très chaleureux. L'appartement est très agréable, très bien situé juste à côté du marché de l'Olive, et tout le nécessaire afin de passer un bon séjour est présent. Mes parents s'y sont bien senti.

overstimulated by street urchins selling €5 trinkets? stay at juliens! awesome neighborhood for authentic local experience. great shopping, even better restaurants, and beautiful sites within easy walking distance. stayed with at a few airbnbs on this trip, and julien was the only one who stocked a little grub for us in case of emergency. comfortable bed and awesome stereo system to listen to jacques brel all night! cinq etoiles.
Super l'appartement, mais la poubelle n'avais pas était jeté et les draps je ne pense pas qu'il était vraiment très propre. Si non super facile pour le contact :) ok :)

J'ai passé un agréable séjour. Contact rapide pour fixer l'horaire de remise des clés.
Accueil très sympathique ! La liste des bonnes adresses dans le quartier nous a été communiquée à notre arrivée et Julien nous a offert des gâteaux ainsi qu'une bouteille de jus d'orange.  L'appartement est situé dans le 11ème arrondissement dans un quartier animé et sympathique. 
Je recommande vivement.

This place was great. The neighborhood is now our favorite in Paris as it feels more local with a good mix of young people and families and close to the Denfert Rochereau metro which will get you everywhere in town. The nearby brasseries were perfect and the place was comfortable with cold A/C and updated appointments. And the bed was comfy as well.
Beautiful place, great host! I will definitely come back! Thank you so much!!!

We had a great stay at Anne's apartment. The entry code at the gate gave us an extra sense of security which was really appreciated as I was travelling with my 13 year old daughter. We were so  busy seeing sites that we really only had one  night to enjoy the spacious place - have to make sure we plan extra time next time. More than 1 towel each for 5 nights and some soap would have been great, but we managed without. Will definitely will book again with you when we return to Paris. Thank you!

This apartment is as beautiful as it looks in these pictures.  What these shots can't show is how perfectly situated it is in a quiet courtyard with other atelier conversions.  For my money, the 14e is an arrondissement to call home.  There is plenty to do locally and its easy to get to tourist central if you must.  If you find this place available for your dates, don't hesitate.

The Airbnb had no hot water for our entire stay and Anne was quite rude when she was reachable. In order to check in we had to take an uber with all of our bags to a bar a few km's away and back. The loft was nice, but no hot water made it a horrible stay.

Even though it's not in a central area, this beautiful house is perfectly located for traveling to the city center or other parts in Paris. Being in a more residential area, there are tons of local boulangeries and grocery stores within short walking distances, which was wonderful. We were absolutely stunned at how nice and beautiful this place was as soon as we entered - from the impeccable decor and high quality of furnishings. The photos are accurate portrayals (which I was a little doubtful about since it was at such a reasonable price)!
Très beau logement bien situé à Paris
très bel endroit qui combine de nombreux avantages : calme  agréable  accessible ( transports ou voiture ), fonctionnel, spacieux, propre, confortable ... vous y passerez un bon moment.
Magnifique appartement, conforme aux photos. Vous pouvez y aller led yeux fermés.
Appartement exceptionnel, un lieu calme et pittoresque au coeur de Paris.  A découvrir !!!

Un appartement de Rêve en plein Paris et dans un quartier vraiment génial. Proches de commerces (rue daguerre à ne pas manquer pour préparer le diner !!! 😜) proche d'un des plus beaux parc de Paris (montsouris) et surtout surtout cette appartement est encore bien plus beau que sur ses photos. Tout est pensé pour recevoir. Un lieu atypique dans un esprit atelier typique. Merci aussi à Anne particulièrement réactive et organisée pour faciliter tout le séjour !!

Superbe appartement au calme dans une cour de charme constituée d'ateliers d'artistes. Vous serez charmés par cet endroit qu'on découvre en poussant un grand porche. L'appartement est bien agencé et décoré avec goût, la chambre et la salle de bains dignes du confort des meilleurs hôtels. 
La nuit vous pourrez même regarder les étoiles allongé sur le lit à travers la verrière de toit située dans la chambre, qui est spacieuse! 
La cuisine est petite pour ceux qui aiment cuisiner mais bien aménagée pour un séjour court.
Petit cocon de charme, j'y retournerais sans hésitation.
La communication avec Anne est par ailleurs facile et efficace. 
Prévoyez de récupérer les clés dans un café sur le boulevards des Maréchaux près de Cité Universitaire si Anne n'est pas disponible pour les remettre en mains propres.

Appartement très sympa avec climatisation ( ce qui est un luxe en période de forte chaleur).
L'accueil était très appréciable . La communication clair et rapide.
Passer une nuit dans un cadre luxueux à faible prix c'est une expérience tres agréable.
Je le recommande vivement.

Perfect location and view! Lots of cafes and shops nearby. The place is great if your alone or a group of four. There was no issues and Antoine and his sister-in-law are amazing if you have any questions. The only thing this place needs is a fan if you visit during the summer. It was fantastic!:)
Amazing location with spectacular views. Host was super helpful. Close to the Metro and restaurants too!

Antoine’s place was bright, sunny and had such a lovely view of the Tour Eiffel. It was warm during our stay but the large balcony windows open wide for a cool breeze. We were so happy with the amenities and the location - near groceries, metro and some lovely cafes (Qu’a Fait Merlin was our favorite). It was a very easy commute to and from tourist locations from Pere Lachaise metro and returning to Antoine’s apartment felt like coming home each night. Just be careful not to trip on the cowhide rug ;)

The balcony view was amazing. I can see Effiel tower from far. Mattress was pretty comfortable. WiFi doesn't work with our cellphones. It was very stressful to deal with the WiFi. We have 3 people but only one set of key to share was a bit inconvenience. Other than WiFi and key issues, everything else was good.

Super stylish apartment with a great view over Paris and very close to the metro station Voltaire.
Antoine is a great host who replies quickly and the key handover was easy & uncomplicated. The kitchen is perfectly equipped.
Also, I never slept better on an extendable couch.
5 stars for sure!

Amazing place and localization! Close to subway, supermarket and restaurants. 
I had a problem with the address accuracy but it was solved. The host crew was very responsible about it.

Antoine's place was perfect for our family (2 adults, 2 children) with a great view of the city from the apartment. Located in a quiet area, it was easy to find nearby grocery/bakery stores, restaurants, and access to public transportation was convenient. The place was clean and furnished with everything that we needed (note that there is no television, although we did not miss it).

Good location, however, the management agency is not receptive. We had to wait outside the building for half an hour and when the person arrived he was not sure on which floor the apartment was located. Later on when I requested larger towels as only hand towels were provided the agency said there was a charge. Finally, after several emails and pictures of the towels, they said that not even for a fee we could get larger towels. Not a major issue however, the lack of custmoer care was blatant.

A really stylish and modern apartment in a great location! Close to 2 metro stations, cafes, grocery stores, right opposite a little park and felt safe even at night. A little tight on space for 3-4 adults with the sofa bed out (though a large and comfy sofa bed!) but the view from the windows more than made up for it. The separate toilet is also in a pretty small space but the bathroom/shower was a good size. The apartment had everything that we needed - basic cooking goods, pots/pans, laundry rack etc. Thanks Antoine and Luckey Homes!

Amazing view of the city during the day and at night, everything about it was really homely. great hairdryer!! like a home from home. would recommend for city breaks. Pretty small but was perfect for four adults. sofa bed was really comfortable. Really well laid out for such a small space. Metro was just a few minutes walk and probably around 10-15 minutes to the city centre (champs-élysées, eiffel tower.... most tourist attractions) Plenty of little cafe’s and supermarkets are less than a 5 minutes walk. And to top it off you wake up to a view of the eiffel tower every morning. Once again would highly recommend.

Location is good, bear-by lots of restaurant. The house management communication was swept and nice staffs attend us with some good advise. 
Clean linen, towels, all you need for simple cooking, kettle, oven, microwave all is there. The good part is you can see eiffel tower and has good view from the apartment. 
We had major issue sleeping at night since no Air conditioning for summer at night is really warm. If you closed the shade no air incoming, if open the shade its too bright to sleep. We really suffer first night kids in the room unable to sleep, next day I slept in the room and I cant sleep and sweating. Its still good choice apartment apart from summer maybe, I was very unlucky and really had tough time. Antoine allowed me to buy fan and promised to reimburse, hopefully he will do. The fan did help a bit. Still suggest to have Ventilator or AC at least as tourist after 18hrs flight and with young kids it too much to go through. Thx
Nice stay. Received more than expected. Great location, nice appartments and much attention to the guests.
J ai passé un super séjour , lucile était à l écoute . l'emplacement est TOP. Je recommande .
Superbe appartement, au calme, proche des commerces et des transports avec en plus une vue imprenable sur Paris et ses monuments. Un endroit idéal pour visiter la capitale et se poser le soir.

The worst Airbnb experience I've ever had. Adrien did not come to welcome us, he sent a friend and neither contacted us by messages to know if everything was fine.

The apartment was very dirty, the floor, the shower, the sheets were already used by other people.

Finally we received a visit from the landlord of the apartment, which was not Adrien himself but another guy. Adrien told us about this visit just the same day, without us being able to answer if we were ok or not.

I suggest everybody to avoid this listing and Airbnb to remove it from the website.
Second time at Adriens place, very short notice but he was great and very accommodating as the first time

Amazing! This is such a cute flat right in the heart of Paris. You will not find a more authentic property on Air bnb. Adrien was very helpful, and quick to answer any questions we had. The area was perfect, with excellent transport links.

I made a last minute reservation and Adrien did his best to accommodate me with regards to the keys which was great.
The apartment is located on the 7th floor, which is a bit of a workout but well worth the effort once you get up there as it is typical Parisien and very cosy! The place was clean and had everything you need, like a French Press coffee pot. I met Adrien at his workplace closeby to drop off the keys which was fine since I needed to leave in the middle of the day and I did book so short notice. All in all a great experience!

Adrians apartment was very clean and welcoming. It was in a great central location and you could walk to just about anywhere in Paris. But Paris is a big city, so take the metro:-) We could not have asked for a better place to stay. It was a very small cosy parisian loft-apartment. 
We truly enjoyed our stay and Adrian is a very helpful and friendly guide to the not so touristed parts of Paris. The real Paris. There is one minor thing: It´s on the 7th floor and no elevator, so pack light! I loved the stairs! It forced me to exercise every day, ergo I could eat more cake. It was awesome. I Liked it:-)

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement d'Adrien ! 
L'annonce correspond tout à fait à la réalité ! 
Adrien nous a indiqué des endroits intéressants pour se promener, boire un verre, manger.. il a vraiment été de très bon conseil ! 
Aussi c'est quelqu'un de très accueillant, à l'écoute et arrangeant.
De plus son appartement est vraiment bien situé dans Paris, on est assez proche de tous les endroits à visiter et le quartier est cool ! 
Nous conseillons fortement l'appartement d'Adrien :) !

Adrien ha estado muy atento desde el principio para organizar nuestra estancia en su apartamento y ha hecho todo lo posible para organizar nuestra entrada y salida del mismo. La buhardilla es pequeña pero suficiente para dos personas, está muy bien situada (prácticamente en la esquina de los Grandes Bulevares, en una calle muy tranquila) con una estación de metro y una parada de autobús a un minuto caminando. Estar alojados alli ha sido una experiencia especial.

Xavier a été très arrangeant, accueil sympathique; beaucoup de bienveillance de sa part. l'appartement est familial, agréable, propre, bien situé; je ne souhaite pas trop le recommander, de peur de ne plus en avoir la disponibilité !!!!!
bravo en tout cas pour cette "Première"
Gaspard was nice and welcoming. The apartment is really nice and feels like home. Amply with the all the things that you need for the comfortable stay.

We loved our stay! An amazing location, with great food, shopping and galleries right outside the door. 

Cozy apartment ... Felt like home, if the opportunity arises we'd love to stay again.

Très bel appartement sympathique, calme et authentique en plein coeur de Paris proche de tout commerce (supermarché, boulangerie, bistrot, restau). Accueil très chaleureux et tout était prêt. J'y retournerai certainement si je repasse sur Paris :-)
This is an excellent place, close to everything, and Marwa was one of the best hosts I had have. The place was clean, super cosy, and she was so nice with us. I recooked it.
We had a nice stay at Cléments place! Would stay there again!
Clément’s place is very clean and comfortable, a small but fully equipped apartment that near metro station. The host is helpful and friendly as well

Clément was so kind and so accommodating. I mixed up the check out time/day and he was so kind and so understanding about it. The apartment was nice and very cosy. It was very hot due to no AC but close to lots of metros and trains. Clément was amazing!
Clément was very responsive and made the whole process very easy. Location is central and photos are accurate and as discribed. Great value.

Marine and her boyfriend were lovely and we had a wonderful stay in their apartment! Everything was spotlessly clean and the apartment had everything we needed - towels, iron, equipped kitchen, hairdryer, lots of hot water etc. The bedroom is on the internal courtyard and extremely quiet, there is also amazing double glazing so no noise in the living room from the street, which is quite a rare thing in Paris! The location in the 10th is safe and perfect to walk everywhere, nearby to our favourite areas (Canal St Martin and Rue du Faubourg St Denis) and extremely close to Gare du Nord. The apartment is spacious and comfortable and Marine is really helpful and friendly and easy to communicate with. Be aware that there is no wifi (this wasn't a problem for us but might be for some!) but other than that all was perfect. Thanks for having us Marine!

Appartement conforme à l’annonce. Un agréable séjour dans l’appartement de Marine (et François). Très bien situé à 2 pas de la Gare du Nord. Nous avons été accueillis par François qui nous as fait la petite visite de l’appartement :) le fait qu’il n’y ai pas de wifi ne nous as pas dérangé . Et la petite cour dans l’immeuble était un petit plus bien sympathique. Je recommande fortement !!!!!
Hugo’s apartment was comfortable, clean, quiet, and in a convenient location. Communication was great, and check in was easy.  We really enjoyed the neighborhood and local cafes. Thank you Hugo!
The neighborhood is lively and a lot of cafes. The apartment is in an inner courtyard so it was quiet. Great place!

Hugo was great! His place was very modern and clean. He quickly responded to messages when I asked him questions and even offered suggestions above and beyond what I was asking. The apartment is close to public transport. It is a younger neighborhood with easy access to restaurants, coffee shops, and bars. However, being close to bars it was not noisy. We had a great experience and would definitely stay again in the future!
Perfect location, beautiful apartment!
Perfect.

I stayed I Hugo’s apartment for 10 days, everything was good. The location is good, the apartment has nice design and it’s really well equipped. I enjoyed my stay. Hugo was very responsive and provided clear instructions on everything.
Definitely recommend this place.

Hugo’s flat is a well equipped bachelor pad located in a very lively area of Paris 11th. We stayed almost 3 weeks and would have preferred if the flat had been more prepped for longer stays, eg. that we had somewhere to put our clothes and personal belongings. The apartment was very dirty when we arrived but Hugo (after some discussion) saw to it that it was cleaned. We had a good stay in Hugo’s flat after settling in, though.

this place is hidden off the main street, so is very quiet. This location is perfect for getting around Paris. We found the use of the underground train easy and stress free. The station is less than 100m from front door. The house is not in a tourist area, so you get the real deal. Plenty of food options in the street below. The apartment is homely, quiet and cool. Hugo is easy to communicate with. I recommend.
Hugo’s apartment is super charming in a great location and Hugo was a fabulous host. He made the check in really easy and appreciated his responsive messages!
Hugo’s space is really good, close to metro, well-decorated and equipped.
Great apartment! Great location, very nice and cozy and clean. Hugo is super helpful and friendly. Highly recommended
A great communication with my friends and with me in order to organize the stay.  A very comfortable, clean, calm and well-equiped appartement. Highly recommended !

Hugo's apartment is really nice, renewed and very quiet. It has everything you need, the kitchen is well' equipped, the bed is very comfortable, the bathroom is big enough with a great shower. The neighborhood is one of my favourite in Paris, full of bars, cafès and nice shops and outside the touristic routes. 
I highly recommend it!

Logement joliment décoré, bien agencé et bien placé. 
Des travaux dans l'immeuble réveille un peu en panique dés 8h, mais sinon le séjour s'est bien passé.

L’appartement d’Hugo est très agréable. Propre, bien aménagé, fonctionnel et en même temps charmant, tout ça au cœur de Ménilmontant, un quartier vivant et authentique. Hugo a été très disponible et avenant, nous recommandons cette location, un bon rapport qualité prix. Merci Hugo :)
Casa molto carina, silenziosa e comfort. Zona accogliente e collegata bene. Una piacevole vacanza.

Mon copain et moi avons passé un très beau séjour chez Hugo. L'appartement est situé à côté du Metro (ligne 2) qui permet de traversé la ville au complet, vraiment bien pour visiter! Le quartier est plein de vie! Tout plein de restaurants à proximité. Hugo réponds très rapidement aux messages et toujours disponible pour répondre a nos questions. L'appartement est propre et grand. Je recommande fortement!!
5/5 à tout niveau
Appartement idéal pour un couple, très propre, très bien équipé. Je n'ai pas rencontré l'hôte mais tout s'est fait simplement!

L'appartement de Hugo est vraiment sympathique bien agencé et décoré avec goût! Très calme puisqu'il se situe sur cour!
Hugo fût très arrangeant pour la remise des clés ce qui nous a facilité les choses! ^^
Merci encore et à bientôt!
Great stay! I highly recommend
It is a cozy space, full of light! . Near metro. Super confortable  I wouldn’t doubt in come back!!!

Highly recommended.  
Beautiful place, nice and light with great views.  A great place to relax.  Facilities excellent.
Close to lots of shops, cafes etc and near transport links and a nice traditional and friendly part of the city.
Really enjoyed staying here and will definitely come back when we are next in Paris.
Thank you
Very good flat like home
Appartement parfait pour nous, propre avec une belle vue sur les toits de paris .nous reviendrons :)
Très bon séjour chez Chloé. L'appartement est très confortable et nos hôtes ont été disponibles quand nécessaire.
Apartamento acogedor muy bien comunicado en transporte público a tocar de Montmartre

C’était un plaisir de séjourner chez Chloé et Thomas qui nous ont réservé un accueil chaleureux et chez qui nous n’avons manqué de rien !
L’appartement est idéalement situé (proche du metro), les équipements sont d’une propreté irréprochable et de bonne qualité, Chloé est très réactive lorsqu’on tente de la joindre.

L appartement était parfait, confortable et bien équipé, je me suis sentie à la maison!
Thomas avait pris soin de laisser du shampoing à disoosotion ainsi que du jus d orange ce qui est très appréciable 
Le quartier est parfait entre petits commerces bobo, restos et le métro à deux pas. Mon séjour fut parfait !
Very Nice stay at Nathalie's place ! Quiet flat with many little shop around and a big Subway connexion point (Nation).
Super accueil, comme toujours. Avec animations dans l’immeuble, vivement la prochaine fois ;)
Super accueil, découverte de petites adresses locales avec l'hôte, belle expérience !

I am giving 100%. I went through 300 flats available in Paris when I searched and this one was the best on the web and live it was just confirmed to myself. Nice, clean, good location for the buses and metro everywhere. Good price. Communication was easy. Well done.

Chez Charlotte, c'est beau, clair, confortable, propre, agencé de telle manière que l'espace vous parait plus grand. Et Charlotte est très réactive, organisée et chaleureuse.
Autour de l'appartement, vous avez tous les commerces et restaurants nécessaires.
La rue est calme, et on dort comme un bébé. le bus et le métro est à 2 mn à pied. Un grand merci Charlotte pour tout !

Super séjour chez Charlotte! Tout est conforme à la description.
Allez y sans hésiter
Très bon séjour chez Charlotte, logement très propre, bien équipé et quelques charmantes attentions. Je recommande !

Très joli appartement, propre, bien aménagé et décoré. 
Proche du métro. Quartier dynamique avec restaurants, bars et commerces.

Merci beaucoup Charlotte notre séjour dans ton appart était tout simplement parfait,  les adresses indiquées pour mieux apprécier Paris et ses environs,  tout était vraiment dans la perfection au détail près.  Bravo pour ton appart super propre et tres design mais aussi pour ton acceuil , tu mérite et de loin le Badge de Super Host ⭐
Adresse très recommandable .
Stéphan Brice
