Jordan was really helpful and nice - and his apartment was clean, well equipped and very nicely located. It was a pleasant stay, with nothing bad to say.
The flat was clean, spacious and quiet. Perfect location with food shops, cafés and bars nearby. Strongly recommend it!

We had a very good stay in Rebecca's apartment. Perfectly located, just a few minutes walk from several subway as well as Autolib (car sharing) and Velib (bike sharing) stations. 
The hosts have been very kind and always answered us very quickly. 
Absolutely recommended!!
---
On a passé un très bon séjour dans l'appartement de Rebecca. Idéalement situé à quelques minutes à pieds de plusieurs stations du metro, Autolib et Velib.
Les hôtes ont été très gentils et nous ont toujours répondu rapidement.
A recommander absolument!!
---
Abbiamo trascorso un ottimo soggiorno nell'appartamento di Rebecca. Molto ben posizionato, a pochi minuti a piedi da diverse stazioni di metro, Autolib e Velib.
I proprietari sono stati molto gentili e hanno sempre risposto prontamente ai nostri messaggi.
Assolutamente raccomandato!!

It was nice stay at this place. The apartment was pretty nice and good location indeed. The only drawback is that its in 5th floor without any lift.
Overall its  a nice place to stay in Paris :-)

The apartment was wonderful and look exactly like it did in the photos. The location was great as well as it is near a few subway stations. The house was very clean as well. Only the bathroom is slightly clogged but it was still a wonderful stay overall. I would definitely come and stay here again!

Great appartement! Good location, near several metro stations. The appartement looks even better in real life then on the pictures. 
Only the WIFI is not so stable, but good enough to search on google maps and nice restaurants in the neighbourhood.
I would recommend this appartement to my friends.
Perfect apartment in a perfect location of Paris. Also, Rebecca was always in contact with me and helping out with everything, she is amazing! I recommend her place to everyone.

everything was great
nice location, close to center
flat is better than in pictures.
Very good comunication with Rebecca
tnx for everything

It was a comfortable stay in Rebecca's apartment. The place is clean and warm with cute decorations that make me feel like home. I couldn't meet Rebecca unfortunately as she was not in town but her friend is nice and genuine who welcomed me to the place on the first evening I arrived. The stairs to the 5th floor is quite a bit of an exercise as I was carrying a big luggage but the stay is definitely worth. There is also a supermarket right next to the building which is very convenient. Wifi is not very stable but is acceptable. I would recommend the flat to my friend next time when they travel to Paris.
Jordan nous propose un appartement bien situé, agréable et calme avec sa chambre sur cour. Un bon rapport qualité/prix. Merci à lui pour sa disponibilité.
Tres bon séjour sur Paris dans le logement de Jordan. Conforme à la description, bon emplacement dans un bâtiment calme même le week end. Jordan a su également être très disponible. Je recommande.

Jordan est très organisé,  l'entrée dans l'appartement a pu se faire sans aucun problème.  Il est très attentionné et donne beaucoup de conseils. Le logement est confortable, spacieux et propre. A conseiller!
Appartement vraiment sympa, calme. Douche top, bonne literie, cuisine bien agencée...je m'y suis sentir comme chez moi. Je reviendrai!

El apartamento de Jordan muy bonito y limpio! Es tal y como se describe, muy accesible, a 5 min del metro y muy buenos restaurantes cerca, así como el barrio también muy bien. Lo único es que quizás sea un poco estricto con el tema de las reglas de su casa. En general estuvo bien la estancia, para repetir!

Appartement très agréable, vivant, très calme dans un quartier très agréable aussi, avec tous les transports et magasins à proximité immédiate. Très bonne organisation de Jordan pour recevoir ses hôtes.

Edith's apartment is really nice, close to everything so you can connect easily with all the city. It s quite big for two people with  really nice kitchen where you can find everything you need.
Even if i didn't met Edith she answered me to any question i had. 
Really a good experience for feeling like living in Paris.

Thanks a lot Edith

We stayed in Ediths beautifully decorated flat for a weekend and felt really at home with all the nice furniture, comfortable bed, huge kitchen and all the small details in every room. Edith is a great and lovely host, the conversation with her was always easy and nice. Her flat is located in one of the most perfect and lively areas of Paris (close to metro Voltaire and Père Lachaise) with so many nice bars, restaurants, shops...around. We highly recommend Ediths place and would love to stay there again!

Accommodation is perfect for couple who wants to spent nice romantic time in Paris. Metro station is about 3 minutes. Parking at the street isn't cheap but possible. Montmartre and Moulin Rouge is about ten minutes by walk. Communication was easy and our checkin as well. I can only recommend it.

We had a wonderful stay in Marines apartment. The communication was from the beginning uncomplicated and Marine responded always quickly.
The apartment was clean, cozy, had a very nice view and is really good located and connected. Also the layout is perfect for two guests.
I would like to stay in Marines apartment again and again :) :)

I had a very nice time in the apartment. You have a beautiful view over the rooftops of Paris. The Sacré-Cœur is only 20 minutes by foot. The apartment is perfect for two people to spend lovely days in Paris. Marine was super nice and the communication before was great! I would love to come back at any time! :)
Séjour agréable aux portes d une station de métro qui vous emmène au cœur de Paris
Super séjour chez Marine ! Appartement très agréable, belle décoration et sans vis à vis ! Proche du métro et du Stade de France. Juste parfait ! Merci Marine :)
Super accueil et appartement. Je recommande vivement. Merci Marine
L'appartement est très confortable et propre. Il est facile de trouver, 3 min à pied du métro. Marine est très gentille et répondait  très vite.Je la recommande!
Super logement, très propre. Marine est adorable. Je recommande vivement son appartement.

J'ai passé un agréable week-end dans l'appartement de Marine. Il au calme, à deux pas du métro, dans un quartier très sympa. Comme j'arrivais tard, nous n'avons pas pu nous croiser, mais un gentil message m'attendait et Marine s'est montrée très disponible par messagerie.
Merci Marine !

J’ai passé un agréable séjour jour dans l’appartement cozy de Marine. Il est idéalement situé, proche des transports, à deux pas des lieux dynamiques de Paris. De plus Marine a été tres réactive! C’est avec plaisir que j’y reviendrais!
Amazing view of the Eiffel tower!
Really nice place with a fantastic view of the Eiffel Tower at night.
Good

The accomodation was amazing: very nice, great location, easy to access, there is a shop just under the building, everything was available you may need. Justine was responsive and friendly. In overall I can totally recommend this place, it was a pleasure staying here:)
Everything was great, the only problem was the small toilet and sometimes it was quite noisy outside. Apart from that it was amazing.
We had a wonderful time at Justine’s place! The place felt very cosy and great for a weekend in Paris. Justine was very friendly, responsive and caring! Thank you :)
the place was great. we had an amazing stay. the location is perfect. super close to everything, we went to places walking but you can also have acess to metro station super close.

We had a really enjoyable stay for a week in May. The apartment is mostly as the pictures show. Had everything we needed, including iron and ironing board. The shower has hot water and the pressure is perfect. It was a bit cold during our stay, and there is no heating controlled from the apartment. But the cover made up for that during the evening.

Some small downsides: 
- The toilet space is very small, depending on your size it might pose a challenge to use it. Not unusable, just challenging. Also, the toilet space has no ventilation.
- The shower is in the same room as the bedroom (see pics). No issue for us, bear in mind depending on who you share with.

The area is great - open air market with fruits, veggies, seafood and tons of pastries. Full of shops, restaurants and boulangeries, not touristy. Close to metro stations and to Parc Monceau.

Justine was great, kept in touch, replied quickly to questions and the communication went smoothly. Key from hotel nearby w/ 24h service.

Such a great place to stay! lovely walkable area with great acces to groceries, restaurants, and public transport. (the entirety of paris in about 20 minutes with pt) 

Highly recommend if youre planning to explore during the day and crash at home during the night.

Justine was always there to help when we needed. The living room is spacious and the bedroom bathroom combo is a great way to feel like ur in a hotel.
Had a very pleasant stay at Justine's apartment. The apartment was exactly as pictured, clean and modern. Justine was always available if I had a question!
Very nice apartment in great location near bars, restaurants and metro. Very nice accommodating host - thanks Justine. Will return when next in Paris.

Very good communication and wonderful apartment. The place is great in a very Parisian quartier with no tourists. The apartment was clean and is renovated. Very fast internet as well, so great for remote workers. Would come again for sure!!

Good communication and  located nicely. Airbnb looks quite the same in real. But be aware of the toilet. You can‘t close the door while you are in because it is that tiny . As well be aware that it is really really dirty ! No cleaning before guest arrive and old sheets on the bed. Used glasses and old food in the fridge. All in all the location and the Airbnb is quite nice but really have to work on cleanliness

L'appartement de Justine est très joli, fraichement rénové et fonctionnel. Il est situé dans un quartier vivant qui offre tous les commerces de proximité (supermarché, boulangeries, traiteurs, restaurants, etc.) Attention néanmoins pour les personnes sensibles au bruit la nuit...
Stations de métro et arrêts de bus tout proches, nous avons passé un très agréable séjour dans le 17e. 
Deux petits bémols néanmoins : la propreté générale des espaces communs et le manque de volets ; pensez aux rideaux occultants ;)

Merci beaucoup à Julie pour son accueil et sa disponibilité !
Appartement en bon état. Moderne  bien situé une supérette juste en dessous. Seul point ennuyeux: le point de collecte -dépôt de la clé qui est éloigné de l appartement.
War alles super! Gerne wieder
Appartement propre, fonctionel et idealement placé à deux pas des animations de la rue de Levis
Très bon séjour

Adrien a été très facile à joindre et nous a accompagnés pour cette 1ère expérience sur RB&B
Merci de sa compréhension avec des néophytes.

Appartement très agréable, bien conçu et chaleureux. 
L’emplacement est parfait, nous avons passé un super séjour!
Je recommande vivement .

Séjour parfait chez Justine, j'adoré le quartier très vivant  et familial en même temps. Situation idéale pas trop loin de la Défense oú je suivais une formation. Justine était ponctuelle à notre rdv d'arrivée et tres flexible pour le départ matinal.

Appartement joli, fonctionnel et propre. Vous vous sentirez vraiment comme à la maison dans ce logement rempli de petits détails avec linge de maison fourni et ménage inclus.
Justine et Muriel m'ont très bien accueilli et ont répondu à mes questions de façon réactive et claire.
L'appartement est super bien situé dans un quartier dynamique et bourré de commerces de proximité. Attention, pour les gens sensibles au bruit, le quartier est animé... Perso, j'ai adoré !
Seul bémol pour ce logement : le manque de volets. Il n'y en a pas forcément besoin mais il faudrait mettre des rideaux occultants.
Je recommande vraiment chaudement Justine et son logement, foncez ! Bon séjour !

Séjour très agréable, comme à la maison!
Appartement particulièrement agréable, décoré avec beaucoup de gout et de charme, bien équipé, idéalement situé dans le 17ème c’est un bon lieu de séjour. Tout est fait pour que vous vous sentiez à l'aise et comme à la maison. Justine a été très réactive et flexible rendant le séjour facile et agréable. 
Merci Justine!
Easy stay and a lovelyspace

If you've seen old movies set in Paris where you open a door from a busy street and enter a peaceful, quiet inner courtyard, with the concierge rooms to the right housing an aged but spry madame concierge keeping an eye on things, then you have a picture of this place. (OK, maybe not the actual madame concierge, but the concierge rooms are there.) Quite a charming spot set off from the hustle and bustle of the Parisian streets. The Chateau d'Eau metro station is right around the corner, and a short walk takes you to the Porte St. Martin and the Boulevard Saint-Denis with its many theaters, cafes, and restaurants. The apartment itself was immaculate and had many new appliances. Highly recommended.

Helie's place is indeed a small pearl! We had five great days. It is located very central in Paris, within walking distance of Gare du Nord and only 200 metres from closest metro station. Nice tiny restaurants around the corner with friendly people. The place itself is quiet, no street noise heard in the rooms, as the appartment is not located at the street itself. Appartment is clean and recently refurbished. Nice living room with good quality sofa and chairs and very useful kitchen. Electrical heating system works very well. Bedroom bigger than expected with very good quality bed. Nice shower. Helie and Laeti gave us some very useful tips where to eat, where to go for running, etc. In short, we certainly recommend you to stay at their lovely place.
The apartment was spacious, clean and really quiet. I highly recommend that place for people that want to spend few days in Paris.
Really nice stay!
Très bon séjour. Merci
nous avons beaucoup apprécié : décoration de bon goût - très bonne literie - appartement spacieux et agréable - cours intérieure calme absolu - bon rapport qualité prix - on retournera !
Emplacement impeccable, proche des théâtres et de pas mal d'endroits intéressants à Paris. Excellent pied à terre pour un WE. L'appartement est conforme aux photos. Idéal pour un couple.
Magnifique petit appartement a quelques min à pied des théâtres, a 1/4 d'heure de la gare du nord, et une petite 1/2 heure de Notre Dame... Un bijou, vraiment!

Un très bel appartement parfaitement situé!
Helie est très arrangeant et accessible!
Un très bel appartement situé à 15 mn de l'hyper centre à pied. Idéal pour un week-end prolongé ou plus pour visiter Paris.

Super 
logement fidèle aux photos, spacieux lumineux et très agréable. Il est bien placé dans un quartier très populaire à 5 minutes de la première bouche de métro, à 10 petites minutes du canal saint Martin. 
Helie est un hôte très sympa et soucieux du bon déroulement de notre de séjour, 
C était parfait !! Merci Helie !!
Merci!!

Amelie ci ha atteso all'arrivo e ci ha dato tutte le informazioni utili sull'appartamento e sul quartiere. L'appartamento è tranquillo e confortevole e ha tutte le dotazioni necessarie. Ottima la posizione, molto vicina alla Gare de Lyon e alla metropolitana.
L'appartement est mignon, merveilleusement bien situé, et Alia est une hôte très sympathique et disponible ! Deux petits bémols : la literie et la propreté de la salle de bain.

logement très bien situé, assez grand et propre. 
Alia est restée joignable à tout moments en cas de problèmes. la réservation a été simple et rapide même au dernier moment.

Amazing host, fast response to any inquiries we had and made the check-in and check out easy for us, the location of the place is perfect, well-equipped with amenities and clean.
We'll definitely recommend your place to others!
Incredible host, very accommodating, amazing location and value, good underground parking for our motorbike. Would highly recommend to anyone. Flat was lovely, the pictures don't do it justice.

M'Hamed Amine was a very gracious host. This place is great, 5-10 minute walk to the Metro Station. It was easy to walk to the eiffel tower and other tourist spots in the area, definitely recommend his place for stay.

Amine is really helpful, friendly and nice host. He replied promptly and the communication was very easy.
The flat is well decorated, clean and most importantly well located. Quick walk to many transport facilities ( bus + tubes + orly bus), shopping center, bars, restaurants, etc.
You couldn't want for a better place to stay for a couple of days  hanging out in Paris!
Amine est quelqu'un de très sympa et flexible, il n'hésite pas à demander si tout se passe bien durant toute la période du séjour. Je recommande. @ bientôt j'espère

Studio agréable et bien situé.
Parfait pour un couple.
Je le recommande vivement! :)
창문 밖이 공사중이고, 화장실이 엄청 깨끗하진않지만 쓸만하고 집 전체적으로 봤을땐 둘이 묵기에 좋은 숙소입니다. 주변 교통이 정말 좋고 주택가라 조용하고 치안에 대한 문제도 적습니다.

Mon copain et moi sommes partis pour des vacances romantiques de 5 jours dans la magnifique capitale française, et nous avons passé un très agréable moment !
Le quartier est tout à fait safe, vivant, donne accès au métro en une dizaine de minutes, l'appartement est pratique et très lumineux, nous nous y sommes de suite sentis bien :)
Amine malgré son absence physique à été extrêmement présent du début à la fin, et son amie qui nous a accueilli très chaleureuse. 
Je recommande !
Amine a été très gentil tout au long du séjour en vérifiant que je ne manquai de rien. Appartement bien situé proche des métros. Tout s'est bien passé. Séjour agréable.
Super sejour chez Amine ! Je recommande ! À très bientôt certainement ! ;)
This place is awesome!  Great location in 14e, very Parisian experience.  Would definitely come and stay again!

Wonderful stay! Anne is friendly and suggested us everything we asked for. Flat is clean, perfectly equiped and easy to reach. For the asked money is flat something like WOW. Thanks so much, were great to stay here!
A wonderful place to stay! Small Appartement with everything you need in paris. The metro is just around the corner, also some supermarkets and restaurants.

I spent a week in this apartment which is very well situated near train, metro and bus stations. A very good starting point for exploring Paris. 
Anne couldn’t be there herself and at my arrival I was kindly welcomed by her mother.
The apartment has plenty of daylight coming in and was very clean. All the comforts are there including a very nice bathroom and well equipped kitchen. The neighbourhood is quiet and I always got a good night sleep with the window open. For daily groceries there are plenty of supermarkets and smaller stores within walking distance.
I’m a regular visitor of Paris and would use this address again for my next trip. Recommended!

The apartment is really nice and very well located in a beautiful and quiet  street in Montparnasse. The only  thing is, it's an smokers apartment, even that We opened The Windows To ventilate the smell Persisted. We only met Anne at the check out and everything Went well.  Her Mother was at The check in and vas very gentle.

La communication avec Anne a été tout de suite très facile, réponse rapide et pratique, flexibilité des horaires pour l'arrivée et le départ bien agréable.Pour notre arrivée, tout était prêt et l'appartement correspondait bien à la description et aux photos Il donnait le sentiment d'être chez soi. Très lumineux, bien exposé, et très calme dans un quartier aussi animé. Anne nous a donné qq adresses de Resto sympas. En un mot c'était super. Si nous avons l'occasion de revenir, je reviendrai à cet endroit si l'appartement est disponible.
Anne nous a tres bien recu, l'appartement est tres agreable et tres bien situe, tout  c'est bien passe et nous le recommendons vraiment.
Buena ubicación, sector tranquilo. Muy completo. En general todo estuvo bien, aunque sería bueno tener dos copias de llaves.

L'appartement est conforme aux photos, au calme.
J'ai été très bien accueillie par Anne.
Je reviendrai volontiers

L'appartement est vraiment très agréable car très lumineux et dans un quartier calme et agréable à 10 mn à pieds de Montparnasse. Il est parfaitement équipé et il a l'avantage d'avoir deux pièces. Il est très conforme à la description faite dans l'annonce.
L'accueil d'Anne a été très chaleureux. Je recommande très vivement cette location . Françoise

Consigliatissimo.  Sono stata insieme al mio ragazzo 4 giorno a Parigi ed è stata un ottima scelta stare da Anne,posizione perfetta perché ci sono supermercati pasticcerie e ristorantini intorno all'appartamento che si trova in una strada molto tranquilla e ben servita dalla metro. L'appartamento è come nelle foto piccolino ma funzionale per una coppia è perfetto. Abbiamo cenato a casa una sera e nella cucina ho trovato tutto il necessario. C'è una macchina per il caffè espresso fantastica per la colazione. Wifi su tutta la casa. Anne è stata puntuale gentilissima a darci ogni tipo di informazioni,ci hanno anticipato volo di ritorno e ci ha aiutato per il check out e per info su taxi e orari per arrivare al aeroporto. Siamo stati come a casa, solo che in un bellissimo quartiere di Parigi. Consigliatissimo.

Accueil très chaleureux par la propriétaire et son fils également rencontré. Anne est de plus très arrangeante, notamment pour la remise des clés. Appartement conforme à l'annonce, agréable, très bien agencé avec tout le confort souhaité, une literie confortable, une cuisine bien équipée et même quelques produits alimentaires à disposition.  Il est situé à  10 mn de la gare  et à proximité du métro dans une rue vraiment très calme avec tous commerces à proximité. A recommander vivement, et merci encore Anne.

Nous avons passé de très bonnes fêtes de fin d'année en partie grâce à Anne qui nous a proposé un appartement agréable, très calme(pas de bruit de rue ni de voisins) à 2 pas de la gare Montparnasse
Petit mais très suffisant pour deux 
Je recommande vivement cette adresse

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour, l'appartement était formidable tant au niveau de la propreté que de l'agencement. De plus, le quartier était calme et disposait d'un large choix de supérette permettant de s'approvisionner. D'autre part,la station de métro la plus proche était à deux pas de l'appartement. 
Enfin, l'hôte était fortement disponible et a fait preuve de confiance à notre égard au moment de partir en nous autorisant à laisser les clés dans la boite aux lettres.
Nous recommandons cet appartement pour une virée dans la capitale.

L'appartement est très agréable, très bien équipé et très propre. 
De plus, il est très calme et très bien situé pour aller à la gare Montparnasse, rejoindre le métro et se balader dans le quartier qui est très vivant avec tout ce qu'il faut comme commerces. 
Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour dans l'appartement d'Anne. Nous le recommandons vivement car c'est un très bon point de départ pour visiter Paris. 
Anne est très sympathique et à l'écoute des moindres questions.

Cute apartment. View of the Eiffel Tower from just outside the door, shower is really nice, he left some treats in the fridge, and he responded to questions quickly. Only downside was no fresh towels. We had a great stay!
Nice apartment (better than in pics!) and excellent landlord. Thank you so much for having us!
Olivier a été hyper réactif. L'appartement était fonctionnel, calme (sur cour) Et le lit confortable. L'emplacement est top.
Gerne wieder! Vielen Dank! Alles war super!

Sibylle's place was a amazing. The location was perfect with lots of great restaurants nearby and near lots of sights. It's clear that Sibylle really takes care of the apartment and it is really lovely and bright and clean. Absolutely recommend staying here.

We had a wonderful stay at the apartment! Sibylle responded quickly to all questions, organized a smooth hand over of the keys, and even left us oranges and beverages in the refrigerator. 

The apartment is beautiful and located just minutes away from both Porte Maillot and Argentine, as advertised. 

Overall, wonderful stay and highly recommended!

Sibylle was a fantastic host. Communication was easy and prompt. She recommended some local places to eat and drink that were great. The location is close to transit which will take you to any of the popular attractions in a very short time. Her apartment is clean and quiet. I highly recommend staying at her lovely place!

Sibylles Apartment is well located, Tods and neat! Sibylle was helpfull during our Star! We feld very comfortable!
Thank you sibylle!

We had an amazing time - Paris is wonderful and we will differently go back. 
The apartment, was absolutly perfect.

Sibylle made us file very welcome and gave us great advice on where to go what to see. Everything was done very smoothly. She is a great host.

Very nice place, a little bit small but very well located.
Sibylle is a very nice person and you'll have all what you need for a comfortable stay.

Was a wonderful experience. The studio is VERY central. It was quite nice to be on a few steps Champs and VERY close to a metro which was a plus. All what you need are provided Internet, towels, equipped kitchen...ect. Sibylle was very friendly and great communicator. She gave all the needed attractions on Paris.... Perfect place to stay If I l came back to Paris I would love to rent it again.

Appartement conforme à l'annonce 
Très bien situé 
Sybille nous a accueilli très gentiment
Super appartement. A proximité des Champs Élysées. Bien situé avec un petit supermarché juste en bas de l'entrée. Petite cuisine super sympa et lit confortable. Je recommande

Accueil très chaleureux même si nous n'avons pas pû nous croiser
Hôte très attentive aux besoins. Logement idéalement situé et très agréable.
Antonia

Sibylle a mis à disposition un logement en tout point conforme à mes attentes. La réception des clefs ne s'est pas faite en personne mais cela a été pour le mieux (compte tenu des contraintes horaires de chacun).
Le lieu est calme, confortable et soigné.
Un petit mot m'indiquait tout ce que j'avais besoin de savoir ... avec en prime des adresses de restos dans le quartier ... et même quelques provisions.
En résumé : simplicité, confort et calme

En arrivant dans l'appartement (grâce aux excellentes précisions de Sybille), je me suis sentie accueillie avec petits mots d'encouragement pour le marathon et pistes de restaurant pour dîner.
Le quartier est calme, très bien desservi (métro, commerces etc) et à côté du départ & arrivée du marathon.
La résidence est très calme par ailleurs. L'appartement est conforme à la description faite par Sybille (notamment via les photos).

Nous n'avons pas vu Sybille mais elle s'est montrée extrêmement accueillante, disponible et réactive à la moindre de nos demandes, ainsi que pour faciliter l'accès à l'appartement. Ce dernier est très propre et convenablement équipé. il se situe dans un immeuble sûr, pas loin de Porte Maillot. le lit est très confortable. Sybille avait eu la gentillesse de  libérer un tiroir de la commode pour ranger quelques affaires si nous en avions le besoin. l'appartement donne sur une cour intérieure, ce qui le rend très calme.

Sibylle nous a très bien accueillis pour notre week end sur Paris, elle a pris le temps de nous renseigner sur les restaurants sympas du coin. L'appartement était comme sur les photos, propre, bien équipé, et très bien situé, à deux pas des champs Élysées et du metro. Nous reviendrons sans hésiter au prochain passage dans la capitale !
Parfait appartement pour quelques jours en couple. La chambre est bien illuminé. L'immeuble est très calme et très bien placé, tout est à proximité.

Le quartier est très calme et idéalement situé près de la place de l'étoile.
Sibylle nous a accueilli à notre arrivée, l'appartement n'est pas très grand (c'est Paris!) mais correspond très bien à la description.
Des essuies avaient été prévus à notre attention.
Restaurants et commerces à proximité.
Nous avons passé un excellent week-end et recommandons chaleureusement cette location.

Très pratique, très calme...
Très bien !
Accueil sympa de Sybille, ses indications sont parfaites. L'appartement, sans surprise, est propre et en phase avec l'annonce. Je recommande ! :)

Deux jours parfait.
L'appartement de sybille est un havre de repos.
Je le recommande encore et encore

Top aan deze studio zijn de absolute stilte, het goede bed, de lift en het sfeervolle pleintje met ruime keus aan restaurants.
Zeer aan te bevelen.
Adequate en prettige communicatie met de verhuurder per sms bij aankomst en vertrek.

Elisabeth’s home is in a wonderful location, close to a number of metro stations. She was an immensely kind and helpful host, and offered wonderful recommendations for art and architecture to see! It was a very comfortable place for my sister and I to stay and from which to enjoy the city.
Amazing location and really friendly and helpful host! Loved it!
Great location. Suitable for two. Small bathroom but manageable.
The place has a great location, is very confortable and has a lovely host.

Elisabeth is a fantastic host. 
Always available and reliable. 
Her flat is well located and perfect for a great week end in Paris. 
I can recommend Elisabeth to everyone need a great place to visit Paris.

Notre séjour était superbe, l’appart d’Elisabeth est très bien situé, accessible à plusieurs arrêts métro à pied et aussi tout proche de beaucoup de sites d’interet. Elisabeth était toujours très  réactive et serviable. Je recommande vivement cet appartement pour un séjour à Paris.
Hôte agréable et à l'écoute.
Exceptionnel et bien situé 👍

Séjour très agréable dans l'appartement de Elizabeth, et très belle rencontre avec Elizabeth. L'appartement est propre et bien agencé, tout à fait à notre goût, nous gardons l'adresse et le contact pour plus-tard-on-sait-jamais!!!

Nous sommes ravis de notre séjour dans l'appartement d’Élisabeth.
Il est très bien situé et lumineux.
Élisabeth est très sympa et accueillante.

Romain’s place was the perfect spot to stay in Paris. It was very clean, in a great location, and very safe. We really enjoyed our stay in Paris because it was so easy to get to all of the major tourist attractions just by walking. Highly recommend staying at Romain’s place for a great, stress-free experience in Paris!

Flat is really spacious and located in a good neighborhood near supermarkets and a lively food street with lots of restaurants. Romains friend welcomed us upon arrival, gave us the keys and explained everything. Pictures are accurate.
The apartment is great, spaciuos, quietand perfectly located, very central in a  lively neighborhood. Everything was smooth from the arrival! I will definitely book Romain's place again.

The flat was nice, clean and modern. It was exactly as described in the description and pictures. Also the neighborhood was OK. We felt very welcome and everything was well explained. There even was a list of recommended bars and restaurants. We hope to visit these the next time we will be in Paris and we certainly would enjoy returning to this flat!

Large and quiet apartment - top floor, so nice and bright. All the organisation went well and Romain's mother was there to meet me and pick up the keys when I left. Would most certainly recommend this apartment to someone coming to spend a few days in Paris. There really is a lot of space!
très agréable appartement, moderne et spacieux. Excellent suivi pour la préparation du séjour et accueil par Romain et sa mère.

Très bon séjour à Paris chez Romain. Nous avons été très bien accueilli par sa maman. L'appartement était tout à fait conforme à la description. Très bien situé  et vraiment très calme nous étions proche des métros, bus et tout pouvait s'envisager à pied. Les commerces vraiment proches ont rendu toutes nos envies possibles (restaurant très sympa au pied de l'immeuble, monoprix non loin, rue commerçante non loin. Très bon rapport qualité/prix.

Frédéric’s apartment is in the perfect location. Local and cosy, despite being so close to Sacre Coeur and tourist streets. It’s in a nice little niche with a good bakery down the street (Pain Pain) and a cute square.

Positive things: The apartment is charming, with a great feel for classical music and films. There is a beautiful and well-tuned piano. There were clean towels and space in the cabinet to unpack your suitcase, as well as a washer. Frédéric was very good with communication throughout, and helping with checking in, problems, and checking out. 

Negative things: The apartment is on a back garden, so there’s not much of a view. It wasn’t 100% clean, but not too bad.

If you’re looking for a reasonable place for your stay in Paris, I’d recommend it.

Frédéric's house is cosy and welcoming and has everything you need for your holiday. Although it's not a big house, the space is well organized so that you can have a comfortable stay. 
The location is amazing because the Sacré-Cœur is literally behind the house and you can reach it in less than two minutes by foot. There are also two metro station close to the house. 
We had not the chance to meet Frédéric but he has been very kind and friendly.

Frédéric’s place was lovely. He has a lovely record player and comfy bed. His friend met us, so that was easy. He always responded really quickly and let us check out late because of our late flight. It is in  a great location, in the hubbub, and easy to get metros, it's in a touristy area. We had a lovely sty in this cosy flat - even in the summer it didn't get too hot!

I really fell in love with the apartment. It’s super cosy, lovely furnished and has what I call Paris charm! It’s also nicely located, 5 minutes by foot from Sacre Cœur and Place des Abbesses where you can have great french breakfast. Marie is the best host you can wish for, really uncomplicated and super helpful with anything you need. Next time I’m in Paris for sure I’ll contact her first. Thumbs up!!
Nice appartment for a weekend in Paris. Marie is very helpful and responds quick to messages.

A great value for money if you're looking for a nice private space to relax after a hard day of exploring the city. The apartment itself is relatively small but conveniently organised and extremely cosy. The location of the place is well situated near a local bakery, atm and the metro so we had no problems getting around. Marie is a lovely host, leaving a booklet filled with notes and suggestions of activities to do. Although we never met her, she was very quick to reply to texts. 
The amenities were all in place, it seems to be her apartment so it's well stocked. 
The only inconvenience I would make notice of, is that the toilet is confined in a very tight space. Making a struggle for someone of regular height like me to squeeze into. It made for an entertaining experience at least. 
Overall I'd say a bargain if you're looking to share or spend time with your S.O. Would definitely visit again.

Marie's place is very well located, the apartment is cozy and has all the amenities you need, fully equipped kitchen and Netflix to lay back and chill. Marie is very responsive and an amazing host.  If you have long legs like me you may find the toilet room a bit too small to fit in it. Other than that it's a great place! I totally recommend Marie's flat.
Very cosy flat, we had a lovely weekend in Paris thanks to Marie and her good tips. I highly recommend this place !!!

Such a warm and cosy place ! Fine decoration and precise directives to get to the apartment 
The area is not the best but only one minute from metro so very convenient. 
5 min walk from montmartre
Marie has been giving very great tips
Highly recommended
Appartement très bien aménagé dans un quartier sympa. Marie est disponible et arrangeante sur les horaires et nous a donné pleins de bonnes adresses. Je recommande!

La casa de Marie está en una zona muy chula,  con encanto, alejada del turismo y con sitios para comer  baratos, para ser Paris. El piso es muy bonito, como en las fotos. La cocina es muy cómoda y Marie nos dejó café para desayunar.  La cama era muy cómoda y no se oye nada de ruido. La ducha también genial. El piso parecía muy seguro. Lo único a tener en cuenta es que hay que subir muchas escaleras, no hay ascensor. Y el lavabo es muy pequeño. En general estuvimos muy bien en su casa. :) ¡Gracias, Marie!

Die Wohnung von Marie liegt direkt an der Metro Station, ganz in der Nähe von Montmartre. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber und ist stilvoll eingerichtet. Wir haben ein schönes Wochenende verbracht. 
Die Toilette ist (wie von den anderen Gästen schon beschrieben) wirklich sehr klein aber diese Detail sind meiner Meinung nach auch typisch für einer Pariser Wohnung.

Appartement magnifique et très agréable. Très belle déco. Quartier sympa avec une station de métro juste à côté et une autre à 5mn.... Montmarte à 2 pas.....
Le seul petit défaut: les WC minuscules!
Sinon tout était absolument parfait!

Marie est très arrangeante au niveau de l’heure d’arrivé et de départ, très réactive par message. 
L’appartement est bien placé et très bien décoré, je le recommande !
Very comfortable and cozy apartment in a nice location. Claudia was fast at communicating and her home is clean and peaceful

Claudia’s apartment is perfect, and a wonderful size as far as Paris apartments go. It’s very close to the metro, as well as several restaurants and bars in a nice, fairly quiet area. Claudia was very responsive and helpful throughout our stay.
Good communication and helpful check-in instructions

We had a great stay, the flat was cosy, with a relaxed feel and just right for us for a few days. It's quiet at night. Nice staying in a real home in Paris,  its up on the top floor of an old building and you can see the roof tops and even a distant view of Sacre Coeur.  Interesting, authentic area I hadn't visited before, and pretty close to the centre of Paris.  Claudia was very friendly and helpful throughout. Thank you.

Thank you very much for your great apartment. I really enjoy living there during my amazing vacation. Metro, restaurants, shops are very near. Apartment is cozy and clean. Bed is very comfortable. Owner is very kind and very helpful
Le logement de Claudia est très agréable, lumineux et on s'y sent bien. Le quartier est très sympa et bien desservi.
Wir hatten einen wundervollen Aufenthalt in Claudias gemütlichen und liebevoll eingerichteten Wohnung! Die Lage war auch super und wir konnten Paris wunderbar erkunden und genießen. Merci!

Appartement petit mais très cosy, dans un quartier très sympa à proximité de restaurants et bars divers et variés et à deux pas du métro . Très bon plan pour quelques jours sur Paris ! Merci Claudia pour ton accueil !

Super séjour chez Claudia. Elle a été très arrangeante dès notre arrivée. L'appartement est très bien agencé, petit nid parfait. L'emplacement est également un bon point, rue calme , proche du  métro et vraie vie de quartier. 
Je recommande.
L'appartement est correct et fonctionnel. Claudia et très réactive, arrangeante et attentive. Je recommande !
Super appartement, très bien entretenu, bien situé (station métro à 5 min à pied), calme (on peu dormir les fenêtres ouvertes sans problème), bref idéal pour passer un week-end en amoureux !
Pequeño pero muy adecuado para pasar unos pocos días en solitario o en pareja en la ciudad.

L'appartement de Claudia est superbe et très attractif d'un point de vue rapport qualité/prix. L'intérieur est design vintage et le matelas du lit est confortable. Bien desservis par le métro "ligne 12" à 5 min à pied. Son logement est proche des commerces de proximité (resto, bar etc.)   Claudia est très attentionnée et disponible en cas de question et précision, ce qui fait d'elle une hôte très sympathique. Je recommande son appartement et je serai ravis de retomber sur son offre en cas d'un prochain séjour sur Paris.

I'm beginning this review with the fact that I'm not a clean freak and I absolutely loathe cleaning.  This place took the cake though...especially as people are PAYING to stay in it!

I arrived early evening from London.  Had to pick up keys from a nearby pub.  Walked to the apartment and after letting myself in, I thought someone else was in there as the smell of cigarette smoke was so fresh.  After opening the windows on both sides of apartment, the smell vanished a bit (I saw the ashtray out one of the windows, so the smell had definitely come from someone recently smoking it in the apartment).  

The bedroom.  Oh, I wish I could post the photos I took!  The bed was unmade, which I thought was strange.  Upon closer inspection, it looked as though the sheets had been slept in and hadn't been changed in over a month!  GROSS!!!!!  Couldn't find any others to replace them either.  Just pulled them off and slept on a sarong I had in my suitcase, with another sarong on top and then the blanket (the blanket cover hadn't been washed in a very long time too...YUCK!!!)

The bathroom.  Hair all over the floor.  No clean towels to use (the towels had obviously been used many times and had been left there to dry...they had a funny smell to them, so had to basically drip dry after the shower).  The shower hasn't had a good scrub in many months!  Black mould in the grout that I could wipe off with my finger.

The kitchen and living room were lovely though.  Looks like the kitchen was fairly new, hence no time to get dirty yet.  There were some dirty cups left in the sink though.

All in all, it was not a great experience.  It doesn't matter if it's cheap or if people are only staying one night, it still needs to be relatively clean!  It doesn't matter if the sheets or towels are old...they still need to be clean.  Preferably no smoking inside and leaving the windows closed also....not a great start when you walk into a room with a very strong smoke smell.

A definitely bachelor pad that needs to either be cleaned up, or not available for rent on AirBnB!
Lovely, stylish apartment within walking distance to Gare du Nord and plenty of shops and restaurants. Beautiful church just around the corner. Wonderful stay!
Great location, good value for money and James is easy going.
Bright and spacious, I enjoyed it very much, thank you!

Fantastic location, 12 mins walk from Gare do Nord & in the buzzing Montmartre, close to Sacré- Coeur
Perfect spot for a weekend in Paris! Great communication.
Great flat in a great location! Clean and orderly apartment and very flexible with Check in/out times. 100% would stay again
Flat was great. James was very friendly, helpful and flexible in picking up the key. Great value, and it was convenient to be close to gard du nord.

Appart tout à fait conforme à mes attentes. Sympa. Très bien situé. A cause des grèves nous avions un problème avec la remise des clefs. Mais James a été très réactif et à trouvé tout de suite une solution! Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
Appartement propre et endroit calme, au top !

James est très chaleureux et sympa. Nous avons pu réceptionner les clés avant l’horaire du check-in grâce à la flexibilité de l’host. L’appartement est à 10min à pieds du Sacre Cœur ainsi que de la Gare du Nord. L’appartement pourrait être au top si plus d’attention serait donnée à la propreté.

Localisation impeccable: à 15 minutes à pied du Sacré-cœur, idéal pour une balade en soirée. Le quartier est très coloré, ce qui donne une atmosphère très sympa. Métro à proximité, proche des gares... James n'a pas pu nous recevoir en personne, mais il s'est arrangé pour laisser les clés dans un bar au coin de la rue. Les récupérer a été très facile! Si vous souhaitez cuisiner vous même, la cuisine manque peut-être un peu d'équipement, mais ça fait l'affaire! ;) Excellent rapport qualité/prix: si vous cherchez un logement pour une petit séjour à Paris agréable et pas cher, je recommande!
Logement bien situé, pas très loin de la gare du Nord et à deux pas du sacré cœur. L'appartement est super bien décoré, on s'y sent bien
Appartement agréable et idéalement situer pour la visite de Paris avec métro à 5 min. Super

Hôte arrangeant, arrivée et départ tardif. Je vous conseille de descendre à la station de métro "château rouge" plutôt qu à "Barbès", trajet plus calme et plus agréable, comptez un peu plus d une dizaines de minutes pour vous rendre chez James. L appartement est très agréable, situé dans un quartier calme.
Parfaite localisation pour profiter de Paris
Appartement conforme à la description, hôte arrangeant et disponible

❤️un posto accogliente - a 9 minuti a piedi da Montmartre - pieno di libri belli, in un palazzo tipico e silenzioso di fronte a una chiesa neogotica del 1800, nella parte giusta della città per raggiungere il mercato delle pulci e fare lunghe passeggiate romantiche
Séjour très agréable à proximité de Montmartre ! James est très disponible et arrangeant 🙂 A recommander sans souci !

Très contente de mon séjour ici. L'appartement situé dans une rue calme est facilement accessible, très propre, agréable et bien décoré. Il permet de bien se reposer et se détendre après une journée de visites. L'accueil sympathique et décontracté de Max est appréciable. Je recommande sans hésiter !

We had a great time in Paris living in Emmanuelles apartment for four days. The place is gorgeous, very large, bright and neat, with a modernized bathroom and kitchen, comfortable bed (and very comfortable sofa as well!) and this stunning view over Paris!
The location is great, too, a beautiful neighborhood, with a lot of restaurants, cafés, and bars, and very good metro connections. You only have to be able to ignore the street noises, the big avenue is always very busy, also at night. 
Emmanuelle was very nice, communicating with her was easy.
We would definitely recommend to stay at Emmanuelle's!

Our stay near Buttes-Chaumont was excellent. The size of the studio fit perfectly for our 1 week trip. Ideally located by the park, grocery and cafes. Elodie was an active and precise communicator allowing for check-in/out and activity references to be completed easily. Will certainly reach out again if the opportunity to return happens!
Un petit appartement dans un quartier calme et charmant à 5 min à pieds du métro...idéal pour un séjour parisien !
Tout est super chez Talia! Le logement est très beau, on s'y sent très bien. La rue de Bagnolet à tout ce qu'il faut comme commodités. Nous avons eu un séjour magnifique. Merci beaucoup Talia!

Très joli appartement parisien, décoré avec goût. Tout le confort est présent, les transports en communs sont proches ainsi que les commerces. Beaucoup de petits endroits sympas pour sortir manger ou prendre un verre sans avoir besoin de rejoindre l'hyper centre de Paris. Grand merci à Talia pour son accueil et sa confiance.

What a luck to find this lovely flat and equally lovely host. While Lucie could not meet us herself she arranged for her friend to show us around instead who we found very friendly and helpful- even saving us a parking space on the street. Inside the flat Lucie ensured we had all the info we needed including recommendations in the area, emergency contacts and so on. The flat itself is very warm and cosy with all the essentials provided. It is close to shops, restaurants and transport- a perfect position to explore the 'real Paris'. Only be prepared to climb a lot of stairs as is on the top floor...but this is normal in Paris!
Lovely flat !

Lucie was a fantastic host, who was very welcoming and forthcoming at our arrival, giving us plenty of recommendations and a great feeling. Her apartment is marvelous, spacious and has a great view. It is located in a really nice area, with lots of great restaurants, bars and places to explore. 
I would definitely recommend Lucie's place to anybody looking for a nice affordable place in Paris for a few days. It was  one of the best experiences Ive had on airbnb so far and I would love to be able to stay there again. 

Thanks again for everything Lucie!

Excellent séjour parisien chez Lucie! L'appartement est très agréable avec beaucoup de charme (beau parquet au sol) doté de tout le confort nécessaire. Il est situé à moins de 5 min de la station de métro Marcadet-Poissonniers, emplacement idéal. Le quartier est un quartier vivant, il y a donc un peu de bruit le soir mais les fenêtres en double-vitrage permettent de l'atténuer sans souci.

Lucie es unapersona amable y atenta en todo momento. Nos dejó una lista con cosas que hacer en París. 
El piso es super acogedor, con toca-discos genial! 
Nos sentimos muy a gusto!

Kate and Antoine were wonderful! Kate gave us impeccable detailed instructions on how to use the transit, and Antoine let us drop our bags earlier than check in. The flat is located in the middle of a bustling African market with tons of culture! Close to the metro to take you everywhere you need to go and walking distance to many great restaurants!
Kate’s space is a eclectic wonderland. Filled with beautiful touches. Fast communication and easy check in. Kate was very helpful

It the best airbnb! And lokal tips are amazing, we went to one off Kates recommended restaurants and where so happy with the result. Nice and quiet place. Nice kitchen. And beautiful outdoor area with many plants and herbs.

Flat is conveniently located for those travelling to/from Gare du Nord. Well connected with the centre through metro and buses. The flat itself is good size for a single traveller or a couple. A place with  character. Terrace great for sunny summer breakfasts.

Wonderful nice apartment with a beautiful terrace. Very good connected to the whole city and only 20min away from Gare du Nord by foot.  Kate answers quickly to questions and was very polite. We would come back

Audrey is a very friendly person. She gave us a lot of good tips and was willing to answer all our questions. The apartment is very nice and good equiped. Also the area is very nice and has a lot of attractions for young people.

We've just arrived home (18th June 2016) after staying at Audrey's apartment. This was our first ever Airbnb experience and we're a little bit apprehensive after the booking went through as using Airbnb was a bit of an alien experience for us! However, once we heard back from Audrey and eventually arrived at her apartment, there was no need to worry whatsoever!

After booking and prior to our arrival, she sent very detailed information about her apartment including how we would get the keys, how to access the apartment, access the wifi and some really good recommendations about the area.

On our arrival at Audreys apartment, we we're really happy with our booking. The place is very secure and once in the apartment, you've gone through 3 locked doors (roadside, apartment block and apartment).  The photos of her apartment were very representative of her place, very homely and very cosy and just right for us as a couple. It was clean and ready for us to settle in. It has everything you need for a stay, a home away from home. It's on the 3rd floor which is nice to be away from the street level and will also keep you fit by walking up the stairs! Don't worry however as their is a lift which will take you up there if needed!

The area of Bastille is a brilliant base to explore the city.  Very close to 2 metro lines which will get you anywhere in the city in no time but also a very vibrant area which you feel very safe in if you don't want to venture far out at night. Just down the road from the apartment, there's a lot of bars to enjoy. The majority of which drop their prices during happy hour (usually from 1700hrs to 2200hrs). There's also plenty of restaurants for both formal and informal dining. This along with a Carrefour City (Tesco Express style supermarket) over the road, lots of cafes and a brilliant bakery just on the corner of the next road for fresh croissants and baguettes for breakfast and lunch, makes the location of the apartment fantastic.

Check out (as well as check in) was simple and variable which was perfect for our Eurostar connections which means there was no hanging about and gave us more valuable time in this great city.

Throughout our stay Audrey was on hand via whatsapp to answer any queries we had, replying within the minute.

I would definitely recommend Audrey's apartment to friends and family and to you too, get booking!

Audrey's flat was so lovely and she was very helpful with recommending things to do in Paris. Bastille is a great area - lots of bars and restaurants and a great vibe! The metro is a five minute walk away and Le Marais is a 15 minute walk with loads of great shopping. 

Would definitely recommend booking this flat!

Audrey was very helpfull on all relevant paramters to make me feel (almost) at home, relaxed, easy. Very cosy little street in a VERY central spot in Paris. Apartment is typical French. Nice, good size, clean. All in all a very positive experience! I will come again in December! :-)

Audrey's place was perfect for our stay. It was great to have so much space, compared to all the other apartments we had looked at in Paris it was huge! Audrey was very helpful and gave us some great recommendations on places to eat, especially A La Francais a great little bistro with very friendly staff and amazing food and drink - but be warned, they make STRONG cocktails!
I would recommend Audrey's apartment to anyone, we had a perfect weekend!
Audrey's flat is clean and tidy, amazing location. We had a great time!

Audrey's place was in a brilliant location in a lively part of Paris with plenty of bars and restaurants near buy but far enough down the street that it was quite at night. Her apartment is everything you would want high ceilings, wooden floors and French shutters. My boyfriend and I had a lovely time in her place would definitely recommended it for a couple or 2 friends wanting to explore Paris. Also very hand for the metro !

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour Chez Audrey, l'appartement était bien conforme au descriptif et très propre. Le quartier est très sympa et calme. Beaucoup de commerce à proximité...Je recommande cette adresse et je pense déjà à cette adresse pour un prochain séjour à Paris...

Audrey è stata gentilissima, l'appartamento era confortevole, peccato per il bagno veramente piccolo. Camera matrimoniale e cucina veramente spaziose! 
L'appartamento si trova a qualche minuto da bastille, quindi gli spostamenti in metro o a piedi sono molto comodi.

The apartment was neat and clean.  It is a little far from center city, but as long as you are a public transportation kind of person, it's nice.  It's close to the #3 metro line, but I usually took either bus 76 or 26 so I could see the city.  The 20th arondissement is pretty far out there, but still a reasonable distance to get to everything major.  There is a Franprix just down the street, which is a small grocery store.  The apartment is lovely and has a small courtyard.  It's on the 3rd floor, but manageable and private.  It was a lovely stay!
It was such a charming stay at Thomas’s place. Highly recommend.
Clean apartment, very nice and great location.

The place where we stayed was very nice and quiet and had everything needed for a comfortable stay. Since there was no Air condition, we ventilated the apartment by keeping the windows open but left for uninvited guest late at night which ate us up.

The place seemed closer to all the tourists attractions on maps and on the listing,  however that was not the case. The place was very close to public transportation which took 45 minutes to an hour to get to. We did take uber which cut down the time to get to all the tourist stops.

Thomas was very friendly and always responded quickly. The check-in was seamless and check out as well. I would recommend for either a couple or with a friend. For a family accustomed to air conditioners this may not be the right pace. Overall I give it 3.5 out of five. Enjoyed the stay.
Thomas and Sébastian were both very helpful, kind and quick to respond to queries. They have a beautiful apartment in a nice neighbourhood. The stay was very peaceful! Thank you both.

Thomas’s apartment was bigger than we expected. With very nice lighting in every space. What we loved the most about staying here is that everything was so close and convenient in getting to the main attractions in Paris. We even went to the Palace of Versailles and it was quite easy to get to the metro and move around. The area was trustful, we felt safe at all times even though some days we arrived pass 11pm. 
Thomas was easy to talk to and very helpful and quick with responses. 
I will recommend this place for sure to friends and family visiting Paris!
Nice stylish place, quiet neighbours,  close to metro station. Also near apartment there is a cheap sushi restaurant (Sushi King)
Great weekend at Thomas place! Great and design apartment. Lot of commerce nearby to have a pure French experience!

Lovely flat. Very Art Deco with a 70’s touch in a very Parisians , Haussmann style flat.
Expect wooden floor, high ceiling, huge room with a very quirky and arty decoration. Minimalist with great taste.
Thomas wasn’t available during my stay but the outstanding communication and instruction made things so much easier. 
Easy access to Porte de Bagnolet tube station to get to central Paris within 15min.
Very close to Rue de Charonne for eclectic dining option.
It was a great stay! Great French style apartment with a wonderful atmosphere :)

It was an amazing experience at Thomas’s place. Everything was neat and clean. The location is also very accessible. And we loved staying here. Kitchen was having all the necessary utensils and basic things so we enjoyed cooking. The apartment is very beautiful and peaceful. Although Thomas was not in the city during our stay but he made sure that we reach safely at the apartment and gave us all the instructions in prior for our convenience. 
We are glad that we chose this apartment.
We had a wonderful stay at the apartment. The apartment was clean and looked even better than on the photos. Thomas and Sebastian were totally helpful and nice.
This was a really nice apartment in a great location. Full of light and it felt spacious.

Thomas' apartment is large and beautiful. We really enjoyed staying there, and Thomas was very helpful in all regards.
Truly recommendable!
Appartement correspondant à l annonce et bien situé au niveau des transports. Calme, agréable et propre.
Vraiment bien, très agréable !

Appartement bien situe à 300 m du métro.
Très propre et fonctionnel, il permet de bien dormir grâce au double vitrage et au calme du quartier.  L hôte est très réactif

Nous étions 3 filles et nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement. Ce dernier est grand et bien aménagé, il se situe dans une rue très calme. Les lits sont très confortables et tout est propre.
Thomas a été très  sympas et réactif à nos messages.
L'appartement est proche de différents métros facilitant nos déplacements.
Je recommande !
Bonne adresse. Je recommande.

The apartment was exactly as pictured -- an adorable, stylish place with a comfy bed and a great bathroom and kitchen. Carole was very easy to chat with before I arrived and during my stay, and she checked in to make sure everything was going well.
She also had great recommendations for bakeries, cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood.
I loved that there were two subway stops within walking distance, a Velib bike stand right outside and a the beautiful park Buttes Charmont right next door. Definitely a perfect location if you have events at the Parc de la Villette or you need to be on the northeast side of the city.
Great flat, nice location, everything was exactly as showed in the pictures. Was a super pleasant experience. Carole is very warm and welcoming.

A lovely place to stay in Paris! I love the area around Buttes Chaumont and Carole´s  apartment was not only next to the park but also perfectly located to bus and metro system. The apartment itself was very nice and I loved to take advantage of the kitchen and stay in for dinner or start the day with breakfast at home. Thank you Carole!

Carole was an amazing host, great communication before, during and after the stay. She even left a self written guide book of the area detailing her favorite places to eat and shop. The apartment is true to the photos, clean and a quiet nights sleep. The surrounding area has the Buttes-Chaumont park which is great for a run, Velib station outside building and a 5 min walk to the metro. 

Carole is the best host I've stayed with. If you're looking for a real Parisian apartment, this is the place for you!!
Carole was a wonderfully warm and fabulous host! Her apartment is lovely as well!

My best Airbnb experience so far. Lovely clean flat. Cosy but perfectly spacious. Thoughtful charming  decor. Fairly priced. The host was very communicative and friendly. The flat is also close to Buttes Chaumont, one of Paris' best parks.

A friend of Caroles welcomed us and showed us the appartment. Her little flat was beautifully furnished and very convenient. The area is quiet, but close enough to the canal, le Marais, a nice little park, et cetera. We were in Paris for a concert at the Zenith, which is on a walking distance. Highly recommended!

L'appartement de Carole est très stylé, propre et confortable. Parfaitement situé près du Canal St Martin et des Buttes-Chaumont. Carole a toujours été disponible et très agréable. Une belle expérience!
Carole is a wonderful host who makes herself available when needed. We had no problem finding everything. Her place is an authentic parisian experience, lovely, stylish and comfortable.
Hôte agréable et sympathique a l'écoute de ces invités

Très joli appart, très bien entretenu et bien placé tout à côté du parc de la Villette! Hôte très réactif et consciencieux. La seule chose qui nous a fait un peu mal au coeur c'est la pauvre tortue  qui a l'air de déprimer ferme dans son aquarium :-(

En dehors de ce micro détail qui peut toucher les âmes sensibles à la cause animale, je recommande   fortement!!!
Barrio muy animado por el dia,  con todo cerca para comprar al lado del metro

Mooi, strak ingericht appartement, super schoon. Vijfde etage bereikbaar met klein liftje. Gelegen in een aantrekkelijke buitenwijk van Parijs, tegenover Parc de la Villette. Centrum uitstekend bereikbaar met de metro op de hoek van de straat. Parkeergarage vlakbij maar niet goedkoop. Bijna dertig euro per dag.
Sėbastien was er zelf niet, maar had alles tot in de puntjes voorbereid. Met tevens hulp van zeer vriendelijke buurvrouw. Op het allerlaatste moment toch Sėbastien zelf nog  ontmoet. Een zeer vriendelijke en enthousiaste jongeman.
Zullen hier graag terugkomen.
Very stylish and comfortable apartment in a great neighborhood. Comfortable bed and couch for sleeping. Very clean. Cute little balcony. Many shops and bistros nearby. Highly recommend.

Though we never had the chance to meet with Emmanuelle during our stay in her apartment near Bastille station, she was very responsive via email to our questions while we stayed at her apartment.  Regarding the apartment, it's quite spacious; the pictures posted on this site are quite accurate in detail.  Regarding the location, it's walking distance to Bastille station which connects to the subway stops of many popular spots to visit within Paris.  In fact, we never felt the need to navigate the busing system as we felt we could get to where wanted to go quite easily.

Considering the convenience and the amount of amenities of Emmanuelle's apartment, we will definitely look for it again the next time we visit Paris.

Merci, Emmanuelle!

We had the best time in Paris while staying at Emmanuelle’s Apartment. The location is perfect, especially if you’re a foodie. Super quiet as well. Pretty much everything can be reached within 30 minutes from there. The apart was super nice, clean and - as I was staying wirh my son - ideal since we had two very separate rooms. Emmanuelle made it very easy to communicate and was extremely helpful with all our needs. Recommend!

We very much enjoyed our stay at Emmanuelle's place, situated between Bastille and Gare de Lyon.  The location is really nice and not touristic at all, in a quiet street in a very pleasant neighbourhood.  She welcomed us with a delicious bottle of Chablis in the refrigerator. Her appartment in an old charming Parisien building  is just as nice as shown on the pictures.  Next door is a very authentic restaurant where you can also go for a drink at the bar in the evening. For future visits to Paris we definitively consider staying again at her place.  We highly recommend it to others.
Would come here again. Loved it!

We enjoyed our stay at Emmanuelle's. It is a very nice location, close to Bastille and a nice walk from major sigths. Comfortable, cozy and clean apartment to relax after a lot of sightseeing in Paris. I would definitely recommend her flat to stay!

Emanuelle gave us a warm welcome, handing over the keys and a bottle of wine from her parent's wineyard. Her apartment, which she occupies herself when not renting out for guests, is very well located, the area has a lot of good shopping opportunities and nice restaurants where locals go out eating. It's close to Gare de Lyon station, well furnished and maintained and quiet. Compared to others in central Paris, the surface is big. The photos give an accurate impression of the apartment, even though the layout of the furniture slightly changed. I can fully recommend her place.

Our stay near Bastille was excellent. A great location with some nice cafes and restaurants nearby. The apartment was spotless, comfortable and had great character. Emmanuelle was very helpful in helping us prepare for our stay and met us with the keys on our arrival. We had a great weekend and hopefully will come and stay again.

We had a wonderful time in the lovely apartment of Emmanuelle. The apartment is located in a pleasant living neighborhood and is in a easy walking distance from Gare de Lyon! The apartment itself is very clean and we felt right at home. Communication with Emmanuelle has always worked very well and the key handover was perfectly organized.
We would love to come back.
It was all perfect! Emmanuelle is a great host. We loved her apartment. It is very clean, cozy and super located within the city. Definitely a recommendation for Paris.

We have stayed for five days in Emmanuelle’s beautiful apartment with two balconies. It is situated in a quiet area but still close to the metro (Lendru-rollin), several bakers, shops, the Aligre market, and a Monoprix. Emmanuelle was very helpful, she had arranged how we could get the key when she was at work herself. We were welcomed with a delicious bottle of Chablis in the refrigerator. When visiting Paris again we would definitely consider staying at her place if it is available and we can highly recommend it to others.

The apartment was exactly like in pictures if not better. Both me and my friend really loved it. Emmanuelle was a great host, she waited for me and gave me great recommendations and even left for us a bottle of wine from her home in Burgundy, which was really nice. The neighbourhood is also great, close to Bastille which we needed, nice cafes, bars and restaurants around the place, even right in front of the gate was one really nice one, which our host recommended. Market D'Aligrie was also very close, I wish I could stay longer.

Emmanuelle's place is very cosy, interesting, nice and lovely!
The contact to Emmanuelle was easy, very quick and uncomplicated.
The appartment is well equipped, excellent for a family ( 4 people) and in very good conditions ( clean and comfortable).
Supermarket, good bakery and market right around the corner.
The surrounding is a bit! louder (counts for the living room) but only on fridays and saturdays..and it's Paris,what do you axpect ;)!

So all in all we all (me and my family) can recomend this please very much!!
Greetings

Todo muy bien! Emmanuelle muy atenta y predispuesta. El departamento es tal cual lo publicado. La zona muy buena, te manejas muy bien desde ahí a pie, en metro o colectivo para diferentes lados. 
El departamento contaba con las comodidades y servicios ofrecidos, es tal cual las fotos. 
Si tuviese la oportunidad de volver, no dudaría en volverme a hospedar ahí!

Emmanuelle est extrêmement acceuillante et arrangeante. 

Son appartement est très bien situé,  et permet de relier a pied ou a métro un nombre important de commodités, et d'activités.

L'appartement d'Emmanuelle est un vrai appartement parisien plein de charme et décoré avec beaucoup de goût. La chambre est au calme sur la cour intérieure et mes parents y ont bien dormi ! Le quartier est un quartier sans trop de touristes mais proche du centre de Paris.

Emmanuelle nous a patiemment guidé, soit par mail/sms, soit par l'intermédiaire de sa gentille voisine. Son appartement est un petit havre de paix très confortable et soigneusement décoré. Situé au coeur du quartier de Ledru Rollin. Métro à une minute à pied, plein de petits bars et restos très sympas, de commerces et de bonnes boulangeries...

Super organisation pour un très bel appartement très bien situé ; l'espace de vie est vraiment très agréable. On s'y sent bien!
Emmanuelle était en voyage mais une personne s'occupe de ses hôtes pendant ses absences rendant la remise des clés à l'entrée et la sortie très facile.

L'appartement est parfaitement conforme à la description. Son emplacement présente un double intérêt. Très proche de l'hyper-centre aux hauts-lieux touristiques et en plein cœur d’un quartier très vivant : un super marché, des commerces en tous genres à deux pas, il y a une vraie vie de quartier, et c’est très agréable de découvrir cet aspect de Paris.

L’appartement en tant que tel est très fonctionnel, lumineux, il y a des ondes très positives, on s’y sent vraiment très bien, le quartier est calme, la literie très bonne.

Et les échanges avec Emmanuelle ont été excellents. Rien à redire, je recommande !

L appartement etait formidable, tres bien situé, beau et tres propre, Emmanuelle avait tout regle pour nous et tout cela nous a garantie une tres agréable sejour. On va certainement essayer de revenir!

Florence was lovely and met me when I arrived to hand over keys and show me around.  She was very sweet and made me feel very comfortable. 

The apartment is cozy and the perfect size for a single person or couple (or two friends that will share a bed!).   

Its in a great location and felt perfectly safe coming home later in the evening. 

I'd definitely stay there again!

Florence's apartment was a charming and comfortable weekend getaway in Strasbourg  Saint-Denis and I would highly recommend for anyone considering visiting Paris. Everything in the apartment was neat and tidy with plenty of space and accommodations for two people as well as a plush and comfortable bed. Florence was amiable and worked with us to set up checkin/check out times without worry.
Florence's place was very warm and welcoming. Located in a great jumping off spot to explore all of Paris. And she even provided welcome chocolates. Would certainly stay here again. Thanks, Florence!
The apartment was as described, very quiet neighborhood. Everything was very clean and tidy. Florence was available to help me when I needed to. Great place to be in Paris.

What a lovely apartment to live in while exploring Paris. Very clean with all the amenities needed for a city vacation. Florence was very easy to communicate with. We very much enjoyed staying here. A highly enjoyable experience!
Florence was amazing. Beautiful place, really convenient to go central, surrounded with shopping sprees. There are loads of great places to go eat too. It was a great experience.

Super quite flat perfectly located to enjoy Paris for a weekend.
Nicely decorated, and equiped with all necessary. I really enjoyed my stay and would defenetly recommend this apartment. No problem to get the keys. Thank you  Florence
Séjour très satisfaisant !
Le logement est parfait pour un petit séjour parisien à deux.C'est très calme,d'une propreté irréprochable et sécurisé.Je le conseille fortement.

Appartement tel que décrit sur les photos.
Florence nous attendait à son logement.
Remise des clefs.

Florence est une hôte très agréable, super accueillante souriante!!!
L'appart est superbe ancien mais bien rénové tout est propres et beaux. 
Je reviendrai pour sur. 
Résidence hyper calme.
Tres bel appartement au centre de Paris. Très calme et bien équipé, nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Florence !

A very sweet and stylish studio a good ways up in Ménilmontant. If you want to be in a residential neighborhood in Paris, it's good. If you want quick access to the Metro and to tourist areas this may not be the best place for you. It takes about ten minutes to walk to the nearest Metro, Telegraphe, and then you've got at least 10-15 minutes in the Metro to get to Chatelet, for example.

Very nice Apartment ! 
Clean, Central to city center. 
Good communication with Renata.
See you next Time!
Renata's place is stylish, safe, clean, has a magnificent view and in a great location. Renata is an excellent host - providing very clear instructions, making it a very easy stay in Paris.
An amazing apartment, I would definitely recommend it
I will be booking this flat again when I come to Paris! Thank you Renata for being a super host xxx
Хорошая уютная атмосферная квартира. Хороший вид из окна. Все понравилось, достаточно уютная квартира.

Renata a été très réactive dans nos échanges. En ce week end ensoleillé de février, nous avons profité d’un appartement très confortable pour 2 personnes et avec une magnifique vue sur tout Paris. A noter, vous trouverez tout à proximité : supermarché, pizzas, pharmacie, boulangerie, boucherie etc...

This was easily one of the best Airbnb’s I have ever stayed in. From the very beginning they were very communicative in trying to get all of our trip details down to ensure that we were well taken care of during our stay. They always responded very quickly and made sure we had everything we needed to know. They gave us several suggestions for bakeries, bars, restaurants, etc. Their flat is amazing and so very cozy it really felt like we were coming home every night after a busy day in Paris. It was also very clean and well decorated which is something that was important to us while we were looking for accommodation. It’s in a beautiful and quiet  neighborhood that’s just a few minutes from the metro so it was still very accessible to everywhere we wanted to see. Staying here was a major reason as to why we loved Paris so much!!

Romain est un hôte parfait. Il nous a chaleureusement accueilli un peu avant l'heure du check-in afin de nous laisser déposer nos sacs. Quand nous sommes arrivés, il nous a aussi offert du café et des pâtisseries comme il était l'heure du petit-déjeuner. Très gentil! Son appartement est joli, propre, confortable et dans un quartier sympa et sans aucun bruit jour ou nuit. Beaucoup de lumière le matin et jolie vue d'autres immeubles typiquement parisiens.  : )
Le métro n'est pas loin (ligne 12) et il y a aussi un tramway qui vous amène au RER C (parfait pour notre visite à Versailles). 
Nous y resterions encore et le recommandons vivement. Merci, Romain!

Très propre, bien stylé, et un super toilet bien sûr. Pierre a été à l’heure pour tous les RDVs, et bien présent via messagerie tout au long du séjour. Petit bémol pour le cartier qui craint un peu, mais sinon un excellent séjour.
Un appartement vraiment agréable et fonctionnel, métro, épicerie, restaurant à proximité. Pierre est un hôte disponible et réactif par rapport à vos demandes.

Tout était parfait ! Appartement très confortable à la très belle déco, lumineux et d'une propreté exemplaire !
Pierre est très sympathique et c'est un privilège de pouvoir être accueillie dans son très bel espace ! Mention spéciale aux toilettes japonaises ! Proximité du métro et d'un Franprix, double vitrage efficace assurant le silence nocturne, bonne literie...
Pierre est un excellent hôte. L’appartement est non seulement impeccable mais aussi très agréable à vivre grâce à sa déco chic et zen. Je vous recommande l’adresse à 200 %.
The apartment was nice and clean with everything I needed.

Bon accueil par un ami de Zoe très sympa. De petites attentions montraient que Zoe avait pris soin de bien préparer son appartement pour mes parents, dans le but qu'ils s'y sentent bien. Ce qui a été le cas.
Merci Zoe!
Logement pratique et hôte disponible! Merci à Benjamin!
Super petit appart en plein paris. Idéal pour les besoins professionnel. Hôte très agréable
Appartement confortable et clair, décoré avec beaucoup de goût. Benjamin est ponctuel et sympathique,  très bon séjour je recommande.
Appartement petit mais fonctionnel, Benjamin a été très ponctuel

Un appartamento veramente carino, piccolo ma con tutto quello che occorre per due persone.
La zona è ottima, vicina ad una fermata della metro 9 e a tutti i negozi indispensabili.
L'host Benjamin è stato disponibile e sempre contattabile e  i suoi familiari, che hanno provveduto al ckeck-in e check-out, sono stati molto gentili.
Consiglio vivamente

Anh Thy was a great host. Her home is very inviting. It was in a good central location. She was very thorough with all the directions for the house. This home is family friendly. There is a crib in the bedroom and a play area in the livingroom that is not shown in the photos. If you have a small child this would be perfect for you. Loved staying in her home and loved the pastries Anh Thy provide. Great place for family of 3 with small child to stay

We loved staying at Anh's spacious apartment! She was very welcoming and did so much to get the space ready for our stay. We had access to internet. She stocked essentials like shampoo, and basic cooking supplies, and laundry soap. She provided an excellent fan for the unexpected heat wave, for which we were very grateful.

The bed was very comfortable and the neighborhood was so convenient: close to two Metro stops, not far from Gare Montparnasse, and in our favorite arrondisement. 

We highly recommend a stay here!

This apartment is fantastic. It was clean and tidy and everything was as advertised. Anh Thy's willingness to  allow early collection of the key was really appreciated and the lovely breakfast foods, milk and wine were a nice added touch. The neighbourhood was extremely safe and the apartment is so close to metro stations, local shops, bellangeries  and cafes. Seeing the sights of Paris was so easy from this apartment. We highly recommend this apartment and would happily stay there again when we return to Paris for another visit.

The appartment is perfectly located, beautifully decorate and spacious in a beautiful traditional Parisian building. Anh Thy and her brother were flexible with arrival and very pleasant throughout. Highly recommended !
Great place to stay, lovely hosts, very clean.

Ahn was very thoughtful and always available for us,  the house was charming super clean and close to the subway station,  we loved our stay there and recommend it to anyone who is visiting Paris, Ahn's house is definitely a good choice :)
