El apartamento es muy bonito y agradable. Anh Thy muy pendiente

Bel appartement bien décoré, et bien placé à côté de commerces, pharmacie etc Anh thy et son frère ont été réactives et très agréable, des petites attentions comme de la confiture, des biscottes et biscuits pour le petit déjeuner par exemple ont rendus mon séjour très agréable encore merci à vous !
La maison est très confortable, tout bien rangé et prope. Elle est bien située. Le quatier est genial! En special la rue Daguerre, Alesia, Maine, Leclerc. Bien situé et plein des services.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement d'Anh Thy qui est confortable, fonctionnel et bien insonorisé. Anh Thy nous avait libéré de la place dans les diverses pièces pour ranger nos affaires et nous a préparé un petit mot d'accueil ainsi que le manuel de la maison, très pratique. Elle a laissé à notre disposition de quoi nous préparer les petits-déjeuners et faire notre toilette. Nous n'hésiterons pas à revenir chez Anh Thy !
Gaelle apartment was clean and located near some very good and inexpensive restaurants. It's just an easy subway ride into Paris.

(Texte en Français plus loin) Perfect apartment for a great stay in Paris. I stayed at Gaelle's apartment for 5 weeks and loved my experience. It is fully equipped with everything you need: shower, washing machine, dishwasher, fully-equipped kitchen, etc. Perfect if you are staying for a while. Gaëlle is very friendly and has given us a full explanation on our first day, and she is always responsive and ready to help if there is anything during the whole stay. The location is also great, it's more quiet than anywhere else in town and it is not a tourist area, so the restaurants and shops nearby are very affordable compared to what you will find in tourist areas. The metro station is about a 3 minutes walk from the apartment and it will take you to the centre if town in less than 10 minutes. I recommend this place highly! //// Superbe appartement à Paris! J'y suis resté 5 semaines et j'ai adoré mon expérience. L'appartement est équipé de tout ce que vous avez besoin : douche, lave-linge, Lave-vaisselle, cuisine tout-équipée, etc. ce qui est parfait si vous y êtes pour un séjour prolongé. Gaëlle est une superbe hôtesse. La première journée elle a pris le temps de nous faire un tour complet de l'appartement en expliquant tout ce que l'on avait besoin de savoir autant sur l'appartement que sur le quartier. De plus, elle est toujours disponible s'il y a quoi que ce soit durant le séjour. J'ai énormément apprécié le quartier dans lequel l'appartement est situé. Il est un peu en dehors du centre-ville, ce qui en fait un endroit moins fréquenté par les touristes. Les restaurants et les commerces y sont donc beaucoup moins chers. Toutefois, la station de métro est à environ 3 minutes de marche et vous emmène au centre-ville en moins de 10 minutes. Je recommande cet appartement très fortement!

My room mate and I had a great experience at this apartment. We stayed here for one month, and didn't have a single problem. The building is safe, friendly, and clean. Gaëlle was always readily available and responsive if needed. The apartment is modern with a great kitchen and washroom.
Gaelle is a really nice Host, she was waiting for us in the flat and she was really kind in giving us all the information abuot the flat.

Communication and check-in with Gaelle was great - she was thorough in giving us instructions for her apartment, and patient with our fluctuating arrival time. The place is small, but is cosy for two people. It is heavily decorated with interesting art and nice color schemes - there is not much counter space to put your things, although Gaelle made space in her closets for clothes and such. The bed is comfortable, the internet is fast. 

The apartment appears clean on the surface, but actually it is not so clean - dirty carpet in the living room, and in the kitchen: dirty shelves, drawers, dishes and cutlery with spots of food, dingy pots and pans(they were rusty!). I spent almost two hours cleaning on the first day, plus had to clean the vacuum cleaner first so that I could use it. We are not at all clean freaks, by the way. But as we were there for 9 days, I was expecting to be able to cook some meals, but the state of the kitchen made this very unappealing. 

It was starting to get cold outside, and unfortunately the heater was not working...so the apartment got quite cold on some nights. The towel heater in the bathroom works, but is not enough to heat the whole place. It was nice to have a clothes washer, but be aware, it takes a long time - it seems to be an older model.

Location is great! Very close to bus 26 which brings you directly to Gare du Nord - perfect for Charles de Gaulle airport connections. Also the metro Jourdain is a 5 minute walk away. Two beautiful parks at your fingertips - Buttes Chaumont, and Belleville - its a great place to be. Also, there is a small grocery store opposite the apartment - very handy!

Having an elevator is a plus, and it was an amazingly quiet one too - couldn't hear it at all even though is it right outside of the apartment. Being on the second floor means it is noisy from the street traffic, but that dies down from around midnight to 7am...

All in all, we had a good stay, but were dismayed by the state of the cleanliness in the kitchen. Not the best value, in our opinion.

Gaelle is the best host ever.we loved the apartment and the picture is exactly as shown here.me and my husband enjoy the stay and though our flight was late we still got gaelle waiting to give us keys.the kitchen was very ok for two of us.the host is very welcoming and jovial.due to me being unwell our day was over BT gaelle allowed us to spend on more  night again I recommend couples to rent gaelle apartments and you will never regret.is also near metro and buses so is easy to  move

We had a nice staying at Gaelle's flat. The studio is perfect for a couple who wants to visit the city. Just few minutes from bus stop and metro. We actually used the kitchen only for breakfast but it has anything we may need. Wifi works perfectly. Surely recommended!

The host is very nice offering me a detailed direction to the place. The apartment is clean and is exactly the same as the photos. It is close to the metro station and easy to get around. Plenty of restaurant around also.

L'appartement est très jolie et confortable et Gaelle est gentille et disponible.
En plus on se retrouve en plein milieu du quartier de Jourdain, très sympathique et vivant. Le métro pour aller dans le centre est à 3 minutes à pieds. 
Je le conseille!
Gaelle a été très accueillante. L'appartement est propre et très charmant. Le quartier est super. Nous avons passé un très bon mois chez elle.

bell'appartamento luminoso perfettamente equipaggiato in zona vivace e animata (jourdain) sia di giorno che di notte.  secondo piano con ascensore. Metro diretto al centro. Ci tornerò. Gaelle è puntuale e precisa.
accueil très souriant appt confortable et bien situé

Gaëlle est une personne très accueillante et son appartement est très chaleureux, super bien décoré, et parfaitement équipé pour séjourner plusieurs jours. Je m'y suis sentie comme chez moi! 
Le quartier est sympathique, vivant, tout en restant calme la nuit. 
Un vrai beau séjour et une adresse à conserver!
Gaëlle est très accueillante et l'appartement et parfait, il y a tout ce qu'il faut, bien situé, à 2 pas du métro  et au 2ème étage, bref impeccable!

Sebastien was a great host. He was extremely helpful in orchestrating out travels from the train station to the apartment as this was our first ever trip to Paris. The property is exactly what we were looking for and was in a perfect part of town. It was quaint and could be made very quiet at night as there were quality sound proof windows. Our stay was perfect and we will try to stay here again on any future trip to Paris.

My husband and I had a great stay. While we did not meet Sébastien, he was responsive and provided detailed instructions on how to get into the flat, which was clean, spacious and well appointed. We loved the location, close enough to everything, with numerous shops and restaurants nearby, but far enough from the hustle and bustle to be quiet at night. I would recommend Sébastien's place to anyone looking for a place to stay a little off the beaten path.
We loved staying with Sebastien. The flat was in a terrific location, had great amenities and Sebastien was really helpful with our arrival and departure times. We would definitely stay here gain.

Fantastic apartment and a great way to experience the Paris lifestyle. Very comfortable and cozy with all the necessities included to make your stay an enjoyable one. I've been in quite a few hotels in my lifetime and this apartment is close to the top of the list. It was very clean, neat and tidy. 

A great location that was walking distance to everything that we wanted to see. I must say walking the streets of Paris and taking in the atmosphere was just awesome, especially in this neighbourhood. The apartment is also close to every means of transport if you need it.

Due to the excellent WiFi internet, I was able to research and plan each day perfectly.

Our host provided very good information about getting to and from the airport.

Thank you Sebastien. We had a great introduction to Paris.
Sébastien's flat was perfect! Clean and tidy! Perfect location around the corner from Bon Marché.

This was a lovely, bright and airy apartment. It was a fantastic place to stay. It is also in an excellent location, surrounded by cafes and shops. It is also within walking distance of many of the main sights in Paris. We had a fantastic time here and would definitely recommend it.

This is a superb area to stay in. We walked everywhere from here. The only time we used the metro was to go up to Montmartre. We never came across an area - apart from  Île Saint-Louis that is, where we thought we would prefer to be based. A whole array of local artisan food shops to hand to suit all budgets and then ofcourse the rather expensive but excellent Le Bon Marché Rive Gauche with its grande epicerie de Paris  500m away on Rue de Sèvres. Sébastien is very laissez-faire, if you don't need him he's not there and if you do you just need to text, phone or email him. The road is a little noisy in the morning but the double glazing blocks it out; if you like fresh air there are some smaller back windows you can open.  Overall a very easy, comfortable and enjoyable stay.

Wonderful apartment and very secure.  In a quiet road so away from the main hustle and bustle. 

A big recommendation for other travellers is to buy your food from the grand L'epicurie gourmand down the next road  (4 minute walk). They have a HUGE selection of fine foods including bread, cold meats/pates, cheese and fish to name a few. Plus a huge selection of fine wines. No one does good quite like the French. Fabulous!

This accommodation was exactly as shown and described in the listing. The apartment itself was spacious, clean and stylish. Equipped with comfortable beddings and useful appliances. The location was unbeatable. 2 mins walk to La bon marche and many boutiques and great cafes right within the door step. The manager of our host was also very accommodating and easy to contact. I would certainly stay here again and would highly recommend choosing this apartment!
Nice apartment as per the photos and in a good location. Friendly host / manager with prompt check-in. Would stay there again.
A very surprising apartment, the one you can discover sometimes in beautiful Paris. With a bunch of interesting restaurants around. We enjoyed our short stay at Seb's flat.
The host is nice and helpful.  The apartment is Clean, Great Location and very convenient.

Loved Sébastien's appartment! As an Australian couple and our 4th visit to Paris this appartment has been the best experience and as close to the Paris you see in the films without the hordes of tourists.  The photos are accurate and it was wonderful having a bright, airy living room with a lounge overlooking the street. This was a last minute change of plan for us but Sébastien was incredibly quick to respond and so there were no dramas and it couldn't have gone more smoothly if we had booked weeks in advance. The neighbourhood is vibrant but the street is very quiet at night so no problems with sleeping or noise, but all the upside of wonderful restaurants and brasseries in the street. And the cake shop Mamie Gateaux just 3 doors away was heaven! Luxemburg Gardens are an easy walk and we even walked to Musée D'Orsay comfortably. We only stayed 4 nights on this trip but Sébastien's appartment would be suitable for a long term stay as well. Just the one flight of stairs and no elevator, but the stairs are wide and easy to navigate. Wifi worked well and no problem with connection. Definitely stay here again when we are in Paris and the neighborhood/street is by far the most we have enjoyed of the times we have been in Paris. Thankyou Sébastien.

El apartamento estaba lleno de detalles familiares,  se sentía un ambiente francés y la decoración era perfecta porque era sencilla pero los  muebles muy buenos y cómodos.  Nos dejo una lista recomendando  restaurantes y bares del barrio o de otros sectores de Paris.  Estuvo muy pendiente de cualquier inquietud nuestra a travez de Dolores que es la persona que le ayuda con todas las cosas del apartamento.

El barrio donde esta localizado el apartamento creo que es de los mejores de Paris,  Saint Germain, donde esta se encuentran muchos restaurantes, tiendas y varias estaciones del metro.  Es un placer caminar por  este barrio debido a su historia , arquitectura y las personas que lo habitan.

La descripción que Sebastien hace del apartamento es fiel a lo que uno encuentra,  es cómodo y los muebles que tiene son sencillos pero buenos.  La cocina esta equipada con todo lo que uno necesita y los baños son pequeños pero funcionan bien.

Logement charmant et typiquement parisien dans un quartier très agréable et vivant. Sébastien, même absent, avait tout organisé et tout prévu pour un séjour sans accroc. Merci, Sébastien ! Je reviendrai sans hésitation.
Bon emplacement, Sebastien disponible et appartement conforme au descriptif.
L'appartement est très bien placé et l'accueil de Sébastien était parfait. Le quartier est  vivant mais calme la nuit. Nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
Appartement très bien situé et fonctionnel. Sébastien est prévenant et très arrangeant. A recommander.
Apartement bien décoré, super bien placé, chaleureux et bien préparé. Merci

Nous n'avons pas vu Sébastien mais il s'est montré à l'écoute de notre demande, très réactif, cordial et disponible pour nous aider à faire la réservation, malgré une demande au dernier moment et des problèmes de vérification Airbnb! Sa concierge a pris en charge notre arrivée tardive et était très chaleureuse et attentive.

L'appartement est exactement comme le décrivent les photos: beaucoup de charme, lumineux, au calme et au chaud, propre, et une jolie décoration. La cuisine est bien équipée pour le petit-déjeuner et prendre des repas, et le lit de la chambre confortable.

L'appartement est très bien situé dans le quartier charmant de Saint-Germain. Toutes les commodités sont au pied de l'appartement: boulangerie, épicerie et plein de bars et restaurants :-) Sébastien a d'ailleurs laissé une liste de bonnes adresses à disposition dans l'appartement!

Cécile was a great host, kind and very helpful.
The apartment itself was very well located. Quiet and at the same time close to the all happening areas. It's nicely decorated and maintained by Cécile.

Lors de notre arrivée à l'appartement, Cécile nous a accueilli très cordialement, nous a expliqué brièvement le logement et nous a fourni des informations relatives au quartier.

Le seul bémol concerne l'emplacement de la vaisselle et des ustensiles qui sont dans un meuble non fermé près du plancher, ce qui occasionne que la poussière se dépose sur la vaisselle et sur les ustensiles.

Cécile peut corriger cette lacune facilement.

À mon avis, cet appartement convient mieux à des touristes qui ont déjà visité Paris une première fois.

The apartment is nice and cozy and the location is good: further down the street there are many nice restaurants and the metro is closeby. Good to know: this apartment is located on the 5th floor, with no elevator available. This was no problem for us, but it might be a challenge for other people.

Beautiful parisian apartment in a great location. My wife and I enjoyed every minute of our stay in Quentin's apartment and we would definitely chose it again if we would come to Paris. The bed was exceptionally comfortable, there was a coffee machine and Quentin very kindly left a few beers for us. Highly recommended!
Best apartment I've ever had with Airbnb. So cosy and quiet! So well equipped! 1 min walk from Metro station. You won't find anything better at this price.

After having our reservations canceled with another Airbnb last minute we booked Quentin’s place the night before we arrived. He was very good with communication and check in and out went smoothly. Apartment was charming with a nice view from the living room. Bed was comfortable and we were able to relax while at at the apartment. Would recommend to any other travelers.

This was a charming, trendy, modern and clean Parisian apartment. Comfy bed, spacious living room and a kitchen with everything you need. Clean toilet, bathroom and plenty towels.
The host left us with a few beers and told us we were welcome to the coffee machine which was a really nice touch.
Just watch the hot water in the shower doesn't run out if 2/3 people are staying!
I would definitely stay in this flat again if returning to Northern Paris.
Merci Quentin!
Appartement très agréable, silencieux, tout s’est très bien passé, bien placé !
Super bien dormi. Sleeping room is vers la court
Bel appartement qui correspond bien au descriptif. Je recommande.
Quentin a été un remarquable Hote. A l'écoute et très disponible. Son appartement est très agréable, au calme et très lumineux. A recommander !!

Do yourself the favor and book Alexis' & Carlotta's perfect apartment.  It is very very spacious and stylish.  There is a combination washer and dryer, which means you are able to pack super light, and their large kitchen with full-size fridge and freezer make is super easy to buy (Franprix at the corner) and prepare food.  And speaking of food, do yourselves another favor and try l'Office, which is literally right outside of the building.  The most fantastic food I tasted in Paris after several trips.  All in all a terrific place and arrondissement to call home for any amount of time. Parfait!!

Alexis and Carlotta have a beautiful and stylishly decorated apartment that is spotlessly clean. I appreciate the fast wifi and ample space for work. It is located close to multiple train stations and there is a Franprix right around the corner! It is also walking distance to good restaurants and bars. Both hosts are quick to reply with help, if needed. I felt more than comfortable during my stay and love this apartment for its accessibility and charm.
Alexis' place is simply fantastic. Located in the heart of Paris' exciting dining scene, and in walking distance to everything you need in the city. Couldn't recommend it more!

Perfect spot - we pretty much walked everywhere whether it was Montmarte for view, Saint Germain or Rue Royal for shopping or just a casual drink and food at any cafe nearby!

Space - extremely spacious and cute decor. Got to love the crown molding on the roof :). The bathrooms were great and clean also.

Con - the bed was uncomfortable.

4.5/5
Amazing place, 100% recommend!
유럽에서 머물렀던 숙소 중 가장 청결하고 쾌적히게 머물렀어요! 위치도 좋아요 :)
Estupendo lugar para quedarse unos días . Muy recomendable
Superbe séjour dans cet atelier atypique. Voisinage super sympathique. Toute commoditées... Super grand lits.. Vraiment merci.. en plus place de parking....... Je n'en revennais pas. A bientôt Rosy

Berenice is a super host, we felt like we were at home. The apartment is super nice and she was always available. The zone is very full of "vida" and is full of places to eat and drink something. I will come back for sure and I'll stay at Berenice's flat.

Amazing little apartment right in the heart of all the action of Paris. Perfectly placed to get around with access to loads of different metro nearby. It is very compact, but would definitely recommend. Berenice was really helpful and gave us loads of great recommendations.

Bérénice was really lovely and helpful, welcomed me to her place and made sure everything was explained and working. The house is really comfy, small but very bright and cosy! The area is really close to the centre with great connections to other parts of the city, in a very lively neighbourhood with all the things you need close by.

Très bon week-end Parisien chez Bérénice. Elle est très accueillante et prévenante. Elle reste toujours à notre disposition pour les éventuelles questions que l'on pourrait avoir. Son appartement est plein de charme et il est très bien situé pour faire une grande partie des visites de la capitale à pied.
Bérénice est très gentille et disponible pour toutes questions. L'appartement est vraiment très bien, et le quartier est calme! Je recommande sans hésitation :)

El barrio estaba cerca del centro y estación de metro, nos falto información acerca de las cosas que podiamos utilizar o no del apartamento. No se podía entrar a la ducha. Bérénice fue amable y disponible.
Merci Berenice, super week-end parisien dans un quartier tres vivant !

Bérénice est une hôte très agréable prenant régulièrement de nos nouvelles et nous donnant de bon conseil pour faire de ce week-end un bon moment ! 
L'appartement est situé dans une contre allée très calme donnant sur une rue pleine de vie. Le métro et des magasins devant la porte bref une très bonne adresse que je recommande pour passer un bon week-end sur Paris.

Bérénice est très accueillante et sympathique! L'appartement est petit mais très bien situé, à deux pas du métro et des restaurants. Toutefois, certaines commodités n'étaient pas au rendez-vous : serviettes, draps, rideaux dans les fenêtres, lumière dans la toilette, micro-ondes, four, grille-pain, etc. Séjour tout de même très agréable!

Je remercie Bérénice pour son accueil. Appartement bien situé, magasins de proximité, Métro à côté, autant d'atouts pour se sentir très bien. J'ai apprécié mon séjour à Paris.
Encore une fois, merci Bérénice

100 % recommended! Valerie place is exactly as the photos. I stayed for 8 days with my spouse and we were like at home, was perfect for two! 
Location is great, 3 min walking from metros, bus. There are a lot of bars and places to eat near, supermarkets and it is closely to Sacre Cour. 
The only complaint about the apartment is that it is a 4 floor (I know it before rent) - but is good  for exercising and all the buildings in Paris are like this one, and the shower is very small, but after a couple of day you use to it.
Definitely I would stay again if I would came back to Paris. Thanks Valerie!

Perfect place to spend time in Paris!
Great location and really nice neighbourhood :)

We had a very nice and comfortable stay at Valéries place. The little appartement is rather small, very cozy and well furnished in an aesthetic and functional way. We had a warm welcome at the beginning, Valérie even organized a baguette for us as little snack. The appartment is nice for two adults, your reach the next metrostations Jules Joffrin and Marcadet-Poissoinniers in around 5 minutes by feet. The area around is inhabited by artists and students, it's livley and colourful, not touristic. There is a bakery across the street and many restaurants and bars nearby. We liked it very much and can easily imagine to return. Thank you Valérie!

My husband, three year old and I stayed at Valerie's place for eight days. The apartment is walking distance to train station Joffin, and some restaurants/bars. However, it is wise to note that most food establishments are closed on Sundays and Mondays outside of the center of Paris. There is a supermarket, pizza hut, and wine shops nearby.

You have to walk up five flights on winding steps to get to the apartment which is on the 5th floor (Parisians refer to it as the 4th because they count the main floor as zero) The stairs are uncomfortable to walk up when carrying luggage, or if traveling with a child. There is no lift.

The bed is loft-like, and not safe for children. Neighbors are a little noisy at times so if you're looking to sleep in, forget it.

If you don't expect much, and aren't planning on staying indoors much, then for the price–it's ok.

Valérie was a supernice host. It was very easy and quick to communicate with her. The apartment has everything one could need during a short stay in Paris (the wifi was also stable and good). The apartment is small, but very cosy and  it was enough even for the 4 of us. Valérie was very helpful and she helped us a lot. Can definately recommend!!!
Valérie è simpatica e disponibile, l'appartamento è situato in una ottima zona ben servita. Ottimo per un weekend a Parigi!

Die Unterkunft von Valérie ist wirklich sehr sehr schön! Die Wohnung ist sehr stilvoll eingerichtet und wir haben uns richtig "parisisch" gefühlt. :) Es gibt alles was man braucht. Alles war sauber und ordentlich. Valérie selbst ist eine wirklich tolle Gastgeberin. Sie hat uns herzlich begrüßt, uns gute Tipps gegeben und wir haben uns direkt gut und sicher bei ihr gefühlt. Vielen Dank!! :)))
Der Aufenthalt war wirklich einmalig. Die Lage ist perfekt. Viele Bars, Bistros, Cafés etc in der Nähe, die Metro/Bus um die Ecke. Eine wirklich coole Gegend, in der wir uns rundum wohl gefühlt haben. Wir können uns gut vorstellen, wiederzukommen. Eine wirklich tolle Reise! :)
Encore un séjour parfait dans l'appartement de Valérie (c'est la deuxième fois que nous logeons chez elle). Encore merci !

Excellent séjour chez Valérie qui est une hôtesse sympathique et arrangeante. L’appartement est très confortable et idéalement situé dans le quartier Custine Ramey Caulaincourt, un quartier animé (dans le bon sens du terme) où il fait bon vivre et qui a gardé une certaine authenticité. De plus l’appartement est tout proche des métros et bus permettant de sillonner Paris sans problème. Les balades à pied dans le 18ème restent néanmoins un régal. Je recommande les yeux...bien ouverts !
RAS très bon séjour !

Valérie est très accueillante, à l’image de son appartement, situé au pied de la butte Montmartre, à proximité des moyens de transport et de commerces, dans u quartier calme et agréable. Très bonne adresse pour séjourner à Paris !

J'ai été très bien accueillie par Valérie qui est tres arrageante. Son appartement est tres bien :  fonctionnel ( et la description est fidèle) ,  tres bien situé ( transport public, commerces, resto, lieux à visiter, ...) et calme ( tres tres important pour moi) . Je suis restée 11 jours et me suis sentie tres bien chez elle. Je recommande.

Nous avons passé un excellent week-end dans l'appartement de Valérie. L'appartement est joliment décoré, a beaucoup de cachet et l'espace à vivre est très agréable. Le quartier est en plus très chouette et nous avons trouvé un super resto pour la soirée du 31.
Valérie est une hôte pleine d'attentions et de bons conseils. Un grand merci Valérie, nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir!
Хорошая квартира. И приятная хозяйка
Stephanies place was truly amazing! So cute and stylish which is perfect for 2 people. It was in an great location which was near nice restaurants and shops.

This place is INCREDIBLE! Couldn’t be a better location — close to great food and shops, and walking distance from so many museums. There are about 100 stairs to get to the apt but well worth it. I wouldn’t recommend it for anyone over 6 feet, as the ceilings are quite low.

I had a lovely stay at Stephanie’s place in Le Marais. It is a very stylish place with interesting books and plants. The view from the attic windows is also fantastic. Stephanie is friendly and very quick to respond to my questions (even at a different time zone). I recommend this place to any travelers who wish to have a local taste in one of the most touristy cities in the world.

Stephanie’s apartment was so special - a completely unique space in one of the best Paris neighborhoods. Yes, it’s a little journey up to the top floor, but no different than a New York City walk-up! The space itself was so stylish and cool. There was so much natural light by way of antique stained glass windows. A beautiful accent to a great weekend in Paris!

Stephanie's place was unreal! Our first time in Paris and it couldn't have been more a perfect stay. The apt had SO MUCH character and charm, the exposed wood beams and little nooks not to mention the sky lights!! The entire space was filled with little sky lights and the living room was breathtaking with the sunlight streaming through the colored pains. Even listing to the rain pitter pattering on the glass, it was a perfectly romantic. We loved the stylish decor! and my personal favorite was the large bathtub tucked in the corner. 

The location was very convenient, right in Le Marais, walking distance to lots of cool bars (speakeasies), cafes, vintage shops and restaurants. Also near the Picasso Museum and Atelier Brancusi which I was dying to see. Definitely a hike up some stairs, she warned us and I was totally fine, figured it would be a good way to work off all the croissants I ate :) but I think my boyfriend counted 97 stairs haha so just know before booking. Would definitely stay again!!

Stephanie's home is AWESOME. After leaving her home we thought "we need to find a place like this in New York!" This apartment has so much personality and is really fun to spend time in. It's a perfect place to relax after a day out. The bedroom is beautiful with the most incredible old wooden beams framing the space. 

We loved that the bathtub was tucked into a cozy corner of the bedroom. But there's also a separate shower/toilet room for those who want more privacy. The kitchen was stocked with all the important appliances, along with a great espresso machine. 

Stephanie's place is ideal for friends, couples or folks traveling alone. It's in the heart of the Marais, so as soon as you walk out the door, you're in the middle of a cool neighborhood with tons of bars, restaurants and shops.

We loved staying here and will definitely re-book when we return to Paris!

Wonderful place, very stylish and cozy. Would definitely stay again. Lots of narrow, steep stairs but worth every step.  Location is absolutely amazing, everything you could ever want or need steps away.

Stephanie's space in the heart of the Marais has a lot of character and is set in a fantastic location. 

She has clearly made enormous efforts to make her guests' stays as enjoyable as possible - from a very convenient check-in/out, to lovely little touches throughout the apartment. In particular, the beautiful living area with natural light and stylish decor feel very warm and welcoming. 

The location could also not be more convenient for those who enjoy the food, bars and shopping of the surrounding area. Stephanie is also a great communicator and was always very quick to respond - we really appreciated her hospitality. 

Two things to point out to guests are that the apartment is on the 5th floor with no lift so ensure you travel light. Also, the bedroom has a number of wooden beams in the ceiling that mean you need to watch your head - tall people should consider this! 

Otherwise, I would highly recommend Stephanie's apartment for those looking for a stylish space with lots of character in a very central Paris location.
Awesome flat! Very clean, cool decor, and great location.
Very cool apartment in a great location of Paris, plenty to do within a few minutes walk.
Cozy and stylish little place in the heart of Marais. Stephanie was a great host, helping me with everything I need. Would definately stay there again.

Stephanie apartment was a great place to explore Paris from, located very close to a central metro station. The space was very nice, with good views from the balconies. Stephanie was helpful and always responded to us quickly

A very warm welcome and a lovely stay in Stephanie’s quirky, cosy flat! The location was perfect - quiet, but near loads of places to eat, and easily walkable to many metro stations. Everything was provided and we enjoyed the unusual flat. There are many stairs to get all the way to the top of the building and you would struggle a bit if you were too tall, but it suited us well for a few days. Thank you for a lovely nest in Paris over the new year!

Great location, funky space, useful amenities. Lots of stairs, but worth the climb... Close to many metro stations, stores and restaurants. Host was easy to communicate with and very helpful when needed. Clean and spacious.
おしゃれだが､生活の面では泊まりづらい｡ﾄﾞｱの鍵があまりにも硬くて開けられず困った｡ｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀｰがないのでﾄﾗﾝｸを持って上がれなくて困った｡

Le logement de Stéphanie est un cocon, tout est fait pour que l’on s’y sente au mieux, et nous y avons passé du coup un très agréable séjour !!!
Merci pour les gentilles attentions, la disponibilité et la réactivité !!!
That apartment is really really cosy as it is written in the description. It's the kind of apartment I would love to live in, it's spacious with a good distribution.

Sophie was always very kind and helpful, not only when we arrived but also in all messages that we've shared before.
It was easy to find the appartment which is well located, very close to metro station.
The appartment is very bright, cosy and clean, with everything that we needed. We really enjoyed it!

Je recommande cette hôte. Très disponible et arrangeante. L'appartement est très agréable, fonctionnel, calme et le lit est confortable. Le top c'est d'être à 10 secondes de la bouche de métro ! 10 secondes de la boulangerie. 10 secondes d'un supermarché....

Bref, un bon appartement, je vous le recommande vivement !

Sophie est très sympathique. Son appartement est fort agréable, car plein de plantes partout ! On se croirait dans un mini parc ! Tout était nickel,  rue aussi, tout à proximité. Que du positif ! Un rapport qualité-prix imbattable ! Merçi Sophie.

Très bonne communication de Sophie avant notre arrivée. Malheureusement nous ne l'avons pas rencontrée.L'appartement est conforme à la description. 
Le quartier est calme et idéalement desservi pour les promenades dans Paris.
Nous recommandons cet appart. ( même à quatre nous n'étions pas à l'étroit.)

benoit et sabrina

Echanges préalables à ma venue déjà très cordiaux. Appartement cocon, fonctionnel, confortable et lumineux dans un quartier typique de Paris, et très accessible par tous moyens de transports. Je recommande vivement cet hébergement. Merci à Sophie.
Perfect apartment. Clean and close to lots of restaurants. Host is very helpful and responsive.
Beautiful place

Our stay at Antoine's was perfect. He was very accommodating when our flight was delayed and with check out time, and also quick to respond to my questions. He also recommended a great spot for dinner the first night. The place was larger than expected - a true one bedroom with separate living room and separate kitchen. The bed and pillows were comfy, and the shower is amazing. The location in Montmarte is very charming, close to the subway and the Sacre Coeur. You cannot hear the busy streets from the bedroom at night, but you can hear your neighbors if they are chatty in the hallway, Overall I'd say the space is quiet. I would definitely recommend for a quick weekend get away or even a longer stay!

We had a wonderful stay! Antoine's place is huge. Bed and sofa are both super comfortable. I had no problem with checking in. I especially love the view from the living room. The place is walking distance to metro station and bus stop. There are variety of restaurants and supermarkets nearby. The room is clean and all the basic needs are available. Antoine is very friendly and responsive. It is a quiet neighborhood and not far from the city. I definitely recommended.

We stayed in this spacious apartment for a week during our visit to Paris. It is in a beautiful neighbourhood with just couple of steps to supermarket, bakery, wine shops and very nice restaurants. 

Apartment has everything you may need for a comfortable stay. 

Antoine was very quick and helpful answering all of our questions upon arrival. 

Would recommend this place for sure!

The apartment is beautiful and the view from the little balcony is amazing. Everything is the same as shown in the photos. 

Antoine is a super nice and friendly host and is willing to answer all our enquiries. Check-in is smooth. Location and neighbourhood is nice. Supermarket is nearby and the metro is just a few mins walk away. Would definitely recommend Antoine’s place and would love to come back. Thank you again for your hospitality!
cozy, good furnished apartments, easy check in, perfect location

Lovely place to stay at. Walking distance to super market, restaurants and places of interest in the 18th district. His house has a small balcony which gives you a flavor of the old town Paris. Highly recommend to stay at his place!

Antoine’s place is located in a quiet neighborhood, very well connected to the rest of Paris through metro and bus, just 600 meters away from metro station and 700 to bus stops. The apartment was very clean and furniture is brand new. The kitchen has all amenities that you can imagine, Antoine even came back to bring a coffee machine. The bed is very comfortable and clean. There is really nothing better in Montmartre at this price, would recommend to anyone who wants to have a lot of space in a very new apartment! On top of all of this, the view from the balcony is spectacular!

Wir hatten ein paar tolle Tage im einem der schönsten Stadtteile von Paris. Die Wohnung von Antoine hat französisches Flair, ist super ausgestattet und die Aussicht vom Balkon läd zu gemütlichen Abenden ein. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt - es war wunderbar.
appartamento bellissimo e comodissimo, il prezzo è un po' caro ma giustificato dalla posizione strategica e dall' abbondanza di servizi e comodità
Sehr ansprechende Wohnung mit allem, was man braucht - und mehr. Tolle Lage. Sehr guter und netter Kontakt. Sehr zu empfehlen.

Casa fantastica, spaziosa, ben arredata, con un balconcino che offre una bellissima vista sui tetti di Parigi (il palazzo ha un piccolo ascensore, fondamentale visto che si trova al 5 piano!). Facilmente raggiungibile con la metro, nei dintorni si trovano diversi supermarket e nelle vicinanze ci sono tanti cafè e ristoranti. La posizione è molto buona, in una zona molto tranquilla e silenziosa. Letto e cuscini (difficile trovarne in generale) molto confortevoli! Una doccia molto ampia. La cucina è agibile e con tantissime cose a disposizione. Peccato per la TV che non aveva il cavo.
Casa super consigliata, nel caso ritorneremo a Parigi, di sicuro sarà qui!

Apartamento maravilhoso. Bem iluminado, bem arejado, bem decorado e arrumado. Limpo e funcional. Vista da varanda charmosíssima. Quarto e cama confortáveis e o chuveiro MARAVILHOSO! Mercados e muitas lojas ao pé do prédio. Antoine muito educado, simpático e solicito. Saímos querendo voltar!!! ATMOSFERA encantadora!
Super appart, bien situé , coquet, et bien équipé
Exactly as advertised. Great location next to restaurants, stores, and main tourist attractions. The hosts were responsive and really nice. Would stay there again.

Clara was extremely friendly and easy to communicate with (and fast). She worked with us to schedule a key pick up since she was out of town. Her place is exactly 133 stairs up so quite the work out, but worth it. The location couldn’t be better. It can be quite noisy at night (because of the area). Would recommend!

Had a wonderful stay at Clara's place. Perfect for a weekend away in Paris. Communication was great and the location is amazing for walking to all the main attractions. The place is very cosy and has all you need. Deifitely recommend!

Very nice, cozy flat at the city centre next to Pompidou, spacious and comfortable for its size. Great location within a very vibrant neighborhood ideal for exploring Paris day and night-time. If you don't mind the stairs (6th floor without escalator), I would highly recommend!
Clara was very friendly, she answered very fast and everything went very well. Her apartment is at the heart of paris and very nice. Would recommend!

Appartement très agréable et décoré avec goût. Le quartier est très sympa et idéal pour visiter Paris. Très bonne communication avec notre hôte Clara. 
Je recommande vivement ce charmant appartement.
Petit appartement sous les toits , très  calme mais avec une situation parfaite. La déco charmante nous fait oublier les 6 étages à pied. Merci Clara je recommande
Audrey & Axel contacted us several times before our trip to make sure we had all the information we'd need. The apartment was great and very centrally located. We had a great stay!

The apartment was fantastic! The location was super close to the Mètro and only two blocks from the Eiffel Tower. The living room was spacious and the kitchen was well stocked to cook for ourselves. It was in a very safe area and not too hard to find. The bed was incredibly comfy and it was nice to have a futon to sleep on for a second person. I was there for four days and very comfortable. They even left out guides to Paris and treats for the guests in the living room. Awesome experience!
Fantastic location. 1 minutes to the Metro. Nice host。

Audrey &Axel are very helpful.Before we arrive there they send a guidelines for all the things related to home and near areas. The house is super near to Eifel Tower and most of the attractive parts of Paris. I will definitely stay in the same place again :) Thank you very much again...

It is a good experience for us living this apartment for 3 days. It locates in the center of Paris. Only 15 mins if you walk to the tower Eiffel. The only thing the apartment is not as big as it looks in the picture. Anyway, it is still a good home.

The place is strategic which is VERY near to metro (Bir-Hakiem station) which is where the Eiffel Tower is located.Audrey is a helpful and welcoming host too.We can say that our stay in Paris is comfortable :)
We had a great time in Paris staying in Audrey's apartment, it was very conveniently located and Audrey was always on hand to answer any questions.  Many thanks! :)

Loved this cozy apartment which was perfect for the three of us. It's location was perfect for us as Bir Hakeim metro was literally a minute walk away and very convenient for visiting Eiffel Tower  and Seine. Although we did not meet the hosts, we loved their thoughtful gestures of a welcome drink, lovely chocolates and cookies they left for us. 
We had a pleasant stay and would definitely stay here again.

We went to Paris for a weekend, with our two kids, and this apartment was perfect for us, cozy and lovely. 
Great location, close to subways stations, buses and the Eiffel Tower just 2 blocks away.
Our hosts truly make us felt at home. Communication with them was easy and nice.

We had a wonderfull time in Paris. The appartment was clean, and perfectly suited for 4 persons. We went with 4 adults. Everything was in working order. As expected it was very close to the Eiffel tower and even closer to the Bir Hakeim subway, thus making getting around very easy. Also it's close to all kind of shops and restaurants.
Communication with Audrey and Axel went very smooth. They respond fast and answer all your questions.  Perfect experience !
The communication was great, great location, plenty of privacy. Really enjoyed staying in Paris here.

Very interesting apartments.
Thanks.  That was very good. 
Yuriy

Nos hôtes nous avaient préparé des petites surprises a l'arrivée, une gentille attention qui fait toujours plaisir! L'appart est hyper bien situé, nous nous sommes tout de suite sentis chez nous, et parisiens!
Un super séjour parisien dans un bel appartement. Un très bon accueil chaleureux. A refaire!

très chouette appart, bien décoré, très cosy, très propre, très central et à 2 min du métro !
très bonne communication avec audrey

Nos hôtes nous ont très bien reçus; les informations données au départ sur la remise des clés et l'appartement étaient simples et claires; rien n'a manqué à notre confort. L'appartement est très bien situé près de la tour Eiffel et du métro; donc facile avec les enfants et super point de départ pour bateaux mouches, bus touristiques...Vraiment à recommander.

Nous avons passé un super we à Paris avec nos deux garçons. L'appartement d'Audrey et Axel est très bien situé à quelques minutes à pied de la tour Eiffel et à côté du métro. C'est un petit nid cocoon, bien équipé, où il fait bon rentrer après les heures de découverte de la journée. Même si on n'a pas eu le plaisir de croiser Axel et Audrey en raison de nos horaires incompatibles, ils ont tout mis en place pour que notre arrivée soit agréable et ils étaient joignables par sms quand nous avions une question. En outre ils nous ont laissé plein d'infos pour que tout ses passe bien. Bref une super adresse :-)
Tout s'est bien passé. L'appartement est charmant et fonctionnel. Audrey et Axel nous ont bien aide pour notre sejour et ils nous ont tres bien decris le fonctionnement de leur appartement.
Super accueil, explications très détaillées,  appartement conforme à la description chaleureux et à deux minutes a pied du métro, et 10 minutes a pied de la Tour Eiffel.

Nous avons passé un super week end chez Audrey et Axel. De petites attentions nous attendaient à notre arrivée. L'emplacement est idéal. La description des lieux est l'exact reflet de la réalité. A recommander !

We have choosen the house of Aurelie because it looks cosy, with dining table, equiped kitchen, WIFI and the location. It is value for money. We stayed with 2 children who slept very well at the bed couch. One of the best boulangers are around the corner together with other delicious food shops(wine , cheese, roast chicken, fish).  The neighbourhood  is relaxed and not that touristic. It is short walk to the centre of Montmartre. Parking is a problem but you can park in parking2000 for 15 euro a day.
One critic remark is the bathroom..their is no fence for the shower(the shower is in a bath). 
Thanks for staying in your house and the unforgetable holiday we had in Paris.

Je n'ai pas rencontré en personne Aurélie, elle à était aussi bien à distance en faisant la «bienvenue.
La description de l' appartement è véridique. Il y a tout !
La position e le quartier sont formidable.

Very comfortable and clean apartment. We enjoyed our stay there very much.  Adrien was very communicative and helpful throughout our stay.  Only issue here is the walk up the stairs.  55 steps is challenging when hauling luggage or after a long day of walking the Louvre or other attractions.

We had a fantastic stay at Adrien's place! The apartment is clean, neat, stylish. Super easy checkin n checkout. The location is perfect, two metro stations nearby, all kinds of restaurants and bars in the area. Adrien is a trustworthy host who gives all info in advance and makes everything go just well. I would highly highly recommend the apartment and I would like to stay here again in the future!
A great host and a wonderful apartment surrounded by great bars, cafes and restaurants. The apartment is in a great location and easy to get around Paris.

Apparemment très bien situé 
Extrêmement calme et très confortable. 
Quelques détails indiqué à Adrien , 
Nous recommandons sans restrictions
Adrien est a l’écoute bien situe très propre a une prochaine fois

L'appartement d'Adrien est bien aménagé, fonctionnel. Il est idéalement situé, à 2 minutes de la station de métro Charonne et proche de tous commerces. 
Les équipements sont récents (plaque de cuisson, salle de bain) et confortables (lit et canapé lit). Le numéro laissé par Adrien est très facilement joignable et fait preuve de réactivité. 
Nous n'avons pas eu de chance lors de notre séjour, le ménage avait était négligé.

A lovely stylish but homely apartment, and spacious compared to others that we looked at. Franck was friendly and provided breakfast for us along with information about the area.
The apartment is close to Alexander Dumas Metro station, so it was easy to get around the city, and we enjoyed not being in a touristy area. There's a good supermarket across the road and an organic supermarket close by.

L'appartement de Franck est très agréable à vivre, calme et bien situé 
Un grand merci à Franck pour ses délicates attentions

The Alexandra apartment is located in the 12th arrondissement on the top floor (13th)  of a large parallelepiped as often seen in Paris. The apartment is quiet, bright, comfortable with views over a small park. It is not an empty apartment Alexandra lives here I suppose. The metro is about 200 meters away and in the area there is a Monoprix supermarket, pharmacy and various places to eat. We did not use the kitchen but it is definitely possible to eat at home. The bathroom also works well. We did not meet Alexandra because she was traveling but we solved the little problems with the emails.  If I went back to Paris I would go back to Alexandra's apartment.
A very good house in a central zone of Paris near place de la Bastille. Alexandra was very kindness. The communication was perfect, she answer always rapidly.
同じ価格でホテルに泊まるのと迷っているのであれば、見晴らしがよく、パリの中心に出やすいお部屋でお勧めです。近くにスーパーもあり、キッチン道具も豊富にそろっていました。キッチン以外にもバスルーム、居間、寝室兼デスクがあり、不自由することは何もありませんでした。私自身フランス語ができるのでフランス語にて対応していただきました。英語でも大丈夫だと思います。

J ai adoré mon petit séjour à Paris:) 
Je recommande vivement l appart d Alexandra . 
Dès mon arrivée, elle m a fait me sentir comme à la maison . Super accueillante et attentionnée .
L  appart est bien décoré, clean et idéalement situé... que dire de plus ? 
Mis à part que je reviendrai sans hésitation ;-)
Communication très facile. Alexandra est très disponible. L'appartement est propre, idéal pour passer quelques jours à Paris.

Appartement proche du métro et de magasins d'alimentation et restaurants. Je vous recommande "Le Globe" à quelques centaines de mètres...
Ne pas oublier de saluer le Concierge lorsque vous arrivez. Cela fait plaisir de savoir que quelqu'un est là "au cas où". Attention : il y a un ascenseur pair et un impair ! :D moi je me suis faite avoir, étourdie comme je suis.  Appartement très spacieux et confortable.

Very good location in the centre of Paris. Melissa (friend of Marco) handled our requests while we were there and was absolutely lovely. I would recommend this place if you're visiting to discover the beautiful city of Paris.
nous avons adoré notre sejour chez marco! :) et nous avons etais tres bien accueillis par sa femme de ménage qui et une femme pétillante et charmante tout comme sa maman qui a récupérer les clefs

Très bel appartement, très bien situé. 
De nombreux commerces à proximité. 
Accès rapide au métro. 
Je recommande.
Jag vill gärna bo hans lägenhet i nästa resa till Paris. Det kommer blir populär. Det var en bra läge.

Our first experience with Airbnb, and we couldn't have chosen a better host and location. Claire's description of her apartment was spot on, and she responded fairly quickly throughout the process. Immediately after greeting us, she made sure she showed us the door code, how to make coffee, turn on the tv and set up the couch/bed which we really appreciated, especially in our jet lagged state.

Shortly after that, Claire went above and beyond to make sure we knew about restaurants close by, including the best baguettes!, metro stops (her apartment is extremely close to two), and the sights of course. Sacré-Cœur is just five minutes away!

As far as Claire's apartment, it was exactly as pictured. We were comforted and charmed by it. As any vacation done right, we hardly spent time there when we weren't sleeping, but it was so nice to open the windows for breakfast and at the end of the day. It felt like a safe location as well.

We took a taxi to Claire's apartment when we landed at CDG, but it is also extremely easy to take the train back to the airport from the Pigalle station. Took us 45-60min in the early morning.

I would search for Claire's apartment for a return visit to Paris. It fit so well with our experience and settling in for so long. Claire's hospitality was icing on the cake!

My son picked up the key so we never met the host.  The apartment was in a fantastic part of Montmartre and generally calm, although Friday night there was a lot of noise from the street. The internet was very good.
Beautiful apartment, great location but be prepared for stairs (five flights) and noise (if you have windows open).

It's was great staying at Nicolas's place!

Fridge, freezer, washing machine, dishwasher, and oven! A large bed and a sofa bed in the living room. Wifi, Smart TV connected to Deezer, Bose speakers, and a Playstation with game disks! Chess, playing cards and backgammon!

We were rain bound one morning and was not bored at all. Perfect if you're bringing a teen with you. 

Great location that's near to metro and cafes, and a park literally at your doorstep.

The team that managed the apartment was very friendly,  and there was no problem with check in,  check out or communication.

Nicolas was a perfect host, and recommended an easy route out of Paris as we had to check out on Bastille day, where some metro stations are closed. 

Don't let the stairs deter you!

Nicolas has a most incredible apartment!! Light filled (as described) and in a brilliant Central location just minutes to the musée D'Orsay and the Lourve. 

There's a Velib bike station downstairs and lovely cafes and bars around the corner. 

Nicolas had an agency managing the house and they were excellent with communication and meeting us at the house (even after we were late with a flight delay.)

The house was is wonderfully equipped with everything you could need in the kitchen and lounge. Would highly recommend staying here!
Apparemment très ok
Very nice room, well connected to public transport. I recommend it to everyone who visit Paris.
Appartement étudiant calme, Louise a été très réactive aux messages et très avenante.

Nous avons dû faire appel à un serrurier : nos hôtes ont omis de nous informer qu'il ne fallait jamais tirer la porte. C'est pourtant la seconde fois que ce problème leur arrive. Si la poignée bloque, vérifiez bien que la chainette ne s'est pas décrochée ; le système est fragile.
Plus simple encore, demandez leur la clé qui permet d'ouvrir la porte à la place de la poignée. Il ne leur a pas paru judicieux de la donner, ni même la donner au gardien. 
(le concierge a ensuite cassé la clé dans la serrure en essayant de nous aider, mais c'est un autre problème...). 
Nous avons dû payer 3 fois plus que prévu au final.

Au départ arrangeants et sympathiques, ils sont devenus arrogants et malhonnêtes.

Hormi ce problème, l'appartement est correct et la communication facile.
Studio étudiant conforme à la description

Appartement en mode étudiants,
Parfait pour un week-end en amoureux sur Paris, à deux pas du rer cité université parfait pour se déplacer
Appartement vraiment sympa pour un prix très abordable. La communication avec Louise était très fluide. Je recommande !
Louise est très compréhensive et très à l’écoute. L’appartement est niquel. Je la recommande vivement.

The apartment was amazing! I spent a month at Esther’s flat and it was perfect. Esther was a lovely host, I had a few difficulties with communication but besides that, she was wonderful. The flat was clean and clam, and the neighborhood is amazing!

Great stay in Esther's apartment for 2 weeks for work. Amazing location, beautiful walks in Parc Monceau, and great supermarkets nearby. 

The apartment was beautifully decorated, and spotless. Bed incredibly comfortable in a cosy niche with a massive duvet! 

The 7 flights of stairs to the apartment did take some getting used to, however, it was worth it for the view of the Effiel Tower from the room, peace and sun beaming inside in the morning. 

I will certainly be staying again when travelling back for work. 

Many Thanks Esther.
A pesar de estar en un sexto sin ascensor,es una buhardilla preciosa,con mucho gusto,una cama estupenda,y en un barrio con una ubicación estupenda

Séjour pour un étudiant qui passe les oraux des classes préparatoires scientifiques , parfait , deux ventilos mis à disposition par l’hôte . Accueil parfait . Hôte gentille ( dixit le jeune ) et bienveillante .

Un grand merci
Très bien, agréable, silencieux, mais il faut monter l'escalier :-)

Ich habe sechs tolle Wochen für ein Praktikum in Esthers Wohnung verbracht.
Die Wohnung ist neu und modern eingerichtet. Perfekt für einen Paar-Kurzurlaub oder einen längeren Aufenthalt alleine. Die Wohnung ist klein, aber alles wichtige ist da und es ist sehr gemütlich. Vom Fenster sieht man in den Innenhof und sogar den oberen Teil des Eiffelturms.
Wichtig ist noch zu wissen, dass sie sich im 5. Stock ohne Aufzug befindet, für dynamische Menschen sollte das aber kein Problem sein.

Die Kommunikation mit Esther war zu jeder Zeit unkompliziert und sie ist auch auf persönliche Wünsche eingegangen. Danke dafür!

Die Lage der Wohnung ist sehr gut (17. Arrondissement) und ruhig, zwischen den Metrostationen 2 (Monceau) und 3 (Malesherbes). Supermarkt, Bäckerei und Apotheke sind in unmittelbarer Nähe. Außerdem braucht man nur 2 Minuten zum Park Monceau, der gerade bei schönem Wetter zum Joggen oder zum Entspannen im Grünen einlädt. Auch zum Arc de Triomphe braucht man zu Fuß nur 15 Minuten.

Très bel appartement rénové avec goût avec un petit clin d’œil à la Tour Eiffel !
Je le recommande.

Charlotte was really nice by providing us details on how to get to her apartment from Charles de Gaulle airport. It was really helpful because we arrived late at night. Communication with her was really easy too because she has What's App. She is very friendly and the apartment is cozy.

Charlotte is a great host, easily reachable by phone. We enjoyed a lot our stay in her flat that is exactly what we were looking for!

We totally recommend her flat.

I stayed a week at Charlotte's place, not as a tourist, but looking for an apartment in Paris. Her flat is indeed very charming and cozy and so is the room. Since Charlotte was travelling during my stay I was welcomed by her lovely flat mate. It was very well organised, everything was smooth and pleasant.
The host is really nice. When we have  any problem, she always replies our text messages or phone calls fast. And the apartment is nice, especially with the Christmas tree.

Merveilleux expérience chez charlotte!
The apprtment is very pretty and clean in a traditional French building.
I reserved it for my parents and they really enjoy it!
Charlotte is very nice. Her place is cozy and calm. Nice neighborhood, calm and convenient.

I stayed 3 days at Charlotte's place and I had a great time. Charlotte was away during my stay but she managed to make me feel very welcome anyway. The room is spacious and the bed comfortable; the whole apartment is very convenient and tastefully decorated, I felt really at home there. The location is good. I definitely recommend staying at Charlotte's place.

Chalotte is nice. Although we did not meet, she guide our way to her house thoroughly. She is also very helpful during our stay, for the map of Paris. Also many thanks to her roommate. The house is clean and quite in its neighbourhood, not far from the center of Paris by metro. We had a good time there.

I spend an amazing week while staying in Charlotte's place!! She is a wonderful and relaxed person, who made me feel like home immediately. We shared lovely talks during the week. She also helped me to carry my luggage upstairs, arrange everything that I needed and nursed me when I was knocked down by the flu. Perfect hostess for sure!! The apartment is beautiful, cozy and clean with a lot of Parisian charm. I also liked the area very much, plenty of nice cafes and bars, but still calm and very safe. The room is very comfortable, I needed to work a lot during my stay and it was very suitable for that as well. And one more thing: there is a great coffee machine to make excellent coffee. :) Highly recommended for every possible way!!

Un apartamento encantador en un barrio con tiendas de todo tipo y muy bien comunicado con metro. El sitio es tal y como se ve en las fotos y la casera se encarga de que no tengas ninguna duda y te lo facilita mucho todo. Barrio genial,  apartamento genial. Muy recomentable

Bien que je n'ai pas rencontré charlotte, elle a été tres disponible pour que le sejour se passe bien.
Son appartement est tres focntionnel, et agréablement décoré.
Le lit est tres confortable.
Bien situé également, pas tres loin de la gare montparnasse.
Logement très agréable, tel que sur la photo. Rue très calme, parfait pour dormir. Tout est très propre. Je recommande !
Je n'ai pas eu la chance de rencontrer Charlotte, mais l'appartement était comme indiqué sur l'annonce, spacieux et très bien situé.

Милая комната в типичном парижском доме без лифта в хорошем районе Парижа. Хозяйка гостеприимная. Комната очень милая, все соответствовало описанию. В кухне есть все необходимое: посудомоечная и стиральная машины, посуда, плита, микроволновка, чайник, кофемашина :). Мы остались всем довольны.
Charlotte fut très avenante, la chambre était impeccable avec un super lit.  L'accueil était super.

Aside from the check-in mix up, Thomas' place was nice and quaint. Prime location with a great bakery right next door and the metro a few blocks away. Thomas was kind enough to check in on is during our stay although he was away. I enjoyed Paris very much. Thank you for having us Thomas!

Very good experience in splendid apartment of Thomas. Very spacious, with everything you need for a weekend of fantastic week in Paris, Thomas opened the doors of his house, a small apartment on the inner courtyard, with an incredible charm, very typical of Paris. The apartment does not lack anything and although the bed is a sofa bed is very comfortable and large. We are very clear that if Thomas allows us, we will repeat the experience.
The host really made us feel welcome.  The location was amazing, close to restaurants and shops...the apartment was cozy, quiet and comfy...
Logement très bien placé à proximité de Bercy et conforme à la description. Très bonne communication avec Thomas, je recommande !!
Thomas est super sympa et l'appartement exactement comme les photos. Aucun soucis et très arrangeant :)

un appartement tres cosi et tres propre. bien situé proche du metro tres pratique et en plus cest un tres joli quartier. Thomas est tres prevenant et disponible. je conseille vivement cet appartement noud en gardons un tres bon souvenir.
Bien accueilli, appartement propre et bien décoré. C'était parfait.

Thomas a été arrangeant et disponible pour les clés. Appartement agréable, fonctionnel, décoré avec goût. Logement bien situé près de stations de métro dont la 14. Endroit calme en fond de cour et avec toutes les commodités à proximité dans le quartier dont une bonne boulangerie en voisin. Adresse à garder.

Mon compagnon et moi avons été ravis de ce séjour passé chez Thomas !
Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Thomas est à la fois agréable et réactif en cas de demande particulière. 
Le logement est impeccable et extrêmement calme.
C'est avec grand plaisir que nous reviendrons :-)
Gentillesse, spontanéité, disponibilité et ses attentions (serviettes de bain, plateau petit déjeuner)

Très beau logement, bien équipé, propre et avec tous les commerces à côté. 
Le séjour c'est super bien passé et Thomas a été très arrangeant pour nous remettre les clés et facile à contacter. 
Appartement à recommander !

Petit appartement très agréable,  au calme, décoré avec goût et bien situé en ville (proche de la salle de Bercy, proche des transports...). Thomas nous a accueilli très chaleureusement, avec beaucoup de sympathie, et a été disponible pour nous. Bref c'était parfait, je garde l'adresse de côté pour une future escapade à Paris et bien sûr, je vous la recommande vivement :)
We had a great time in Paris and this flat was in a great location!

The location was amazing. All the big tourist attractions were within walking distance. It was right off of the Champs Elysees, which was really nice as there are lots of places to eat nearby. The only thing was that the place was four stories up, and the stairs are very narrow. I had a really nice time here!

Ayoub's flat is in an ideal location of Paris where everything is within reasonable walking distance.  His place served as a great base to explore numerous shopping, sight seeing, and restaurant options, with champs élysées a street over.  (It was great being close to things without the excessive level of noise from the street).  If you are able bodied enough to take 4 flights of narrow stairs in a renovated, yet charming building, then I highly recommend.  Building security is passcode protected and then once inside (before stairs) also key protected from a secondary door, something my girlfriend and I appreciated.  Excellent value.
Great place to stay! The place had everything you needed. The space was a little tight but you will find out that all of Paris is. Overall a good place, price and host for your stay.
Great place nice guy very helpful for tourists.
Perfect place to enjoy Paris!!! Everything your looking for in one place.
Ayoub's flat was the perfect place for us to stay during our Paris trip. Ayoub went out of his way to make sure that our stay went as smoothly as possible.
Location is wonderfully near Champs Elysées and neat 2 different metro lines
Great place to stay! Ayoub was very helpful.
Great location, very friendly host

Ayoub was quick in answering any queries and also provided clear instructions for us to get the keys when we couldn't meet him on the day of check in itself. The location was really good, a few minutes walk from the nearest metro and conveniently located at the Arc de Triomphe. Nearby has some marts to get some snacks/necessities, a bar and good food that is reasonably priced. 

The flat was really nice and cosy, very very comfortable for 2 people. Price wise it is really value for money. To get to his flat, it requires you to climb 4 flights of stairs which can be a hindrance if you're having big baggage. The ground floor is also protected via a passcode and is really safe. 

Would definitely recommend to stay!

Ayoub has been very friendly and punctual! he responded my message instantly and waited for until my arrival at midnight! it is a place super close to my office and I am happy for my short business stay.
Great location and comfortable bed. Ayuob is a very nice and helpful person.
5 minute walk from the champs e'lysées, so you pay a very good price.  Ayoub is a very helpfull,  and kind person. Nice and clean appartement! I recommend!

The apartment was perfectly located, just in the heart of Paris. We could not imagine a better location! It was really close to the Champs Elysées and the Arc de Triomphe, so it was ideal for sightseeing. Thanks to this apartment we were able to get Parisian feeling which we were looking for :-) It was very cosy and fully equipped. Ayoub was nice and helpful. Honestly, there is nothing to complain about. We would love to come back!
Le séjour s'est déroulé sans problème. Ayoub était ponctuel et disponible. Son appartement est bien placé dans Paris. Je recommande.
хорошее расположение
Ayoub etait disponible et accueillant.
地點非常好，樓房位於4樓無電梯，需自行搬運行李。廚房適合處理輕食，床為沙發床，浴室空間較小，適合單人或2人入住。
Super emplacement. Appartement très propre et bien située
Paul and Axelle place is delicious ! To be tried !!

Très beau logement pour le prix. Commerces, métro et lieux touristiques à proximité. Attention, des points peuvent et doivent être améliorés (appartement fumeur, propreté de la douche à améliorer, commodité à prévoir pour le locataire). Pour un week end entre amis, bon rapport qualité prix. Et Paul était disponible par téléphone en cas de besoin.
Everything was as described and the location was great. Strongly recommended. If we go back to Paris we will try to return to Pauline's studio.
Very nice studio, strongly recommended!

L'appartement est bien situé et c est exactement comme dans les photos... jolie! 

.. finalement tout c est bien passé !

Séjour vraiment très agréable dans un très bel appartement vraiment bien situé proche de la Place d'Italie. Merci à Pauline pour sa disponibilité et sa gentillesse 
Je recommande cet appartement

Appartement très sympathique, complètement conforme aux photos. Je n'ai pas eu la chance de rencontrer l'hôte mais son amie s'est montrée très disponible pour me remettre les clés. Je recommande cet appartement !

We had a wonderful time staying at Adrien and India's apartment over New Year's! The apartment is spacious and we loved the neighborhood. Also, Adrien and India were easy to communicate with and so flexible when our arrival and departure times shifted.

Adrien faisait des voyages lors de notre séjour à Paris. Nous ne l' avons pas rencontré personellement. Le conciërge du bâtiment nous a donné les clés. L'appartement était beaucoup plus spacieux qu'on s'était attendu. J'ai adoré l'ambiance de l'appartement ainsi que du quartier. La cuisine était bien outillé. L'appartement, situé au premier étage, était muni de tous les conforts nécessaires pour pourvoir passer un excellent séjour.

Appartement spacieux, propre et lumineux dans rue plutôt calme.
Juste à côté du métro, et de nombreux petits commerces de quartier.
Adrien et India sont des hôtes disponibles, serviables et très à l écoute.
Je recommande ++
gorgeous and stunning place and host

Very nice and clean apartment equipped with everything a traveller needs in a perfect location close to subway, supermarkets, Montmartre. Very nice to have the balconies with the morning sun for breakfast. 
Edouard is a great host, without doubt I will highly recommend this place to anyone.

Edouard is a great and easy-going host. Me and my partner felt relaxed, and the duplex has a wonderful and interesting decoration and is situated in the heart of SoPi. We really enjoyed the comfort of the place, the views, and the atmosphere, and Edouard was kind with flexible check-in and check-out times. Recommended!

Edouard was there to greet us upon arrival and ensured we knew where everything was, before departing. He was extremely polite and helpful: a perfect host!
The flat was immaculate and we enjoyed a great few days in a location that worked well for us. It's close to Monmartre and Gareth du Nord, so perfect if you travel by Eurostar.
I especially appreciated a booklet that Edouard has put together with recommendations for local restaurants etc - we would not have located some gems without this. 
All in all - a great find and I'll be recommending it to friends.
Had a great stay at this flat! It looks exactly like on the photos. Thank you very much Edouard!

Me and my boyfriend stayed in Edouard's flat for 4 days. The flat is situated in very nice and quite area, it's easy to reach 2 subway stations, 15 min by walk to opera or 20 to Montmartre. Near also you can find supermarkets and cafes. It looks exactly like on the pictures, really nice furnished! Nothing to complain about. We really liked our staying!

Staying at Edouard's was a brilliant experience and would definitely recommend it! My girlfriend and I visited Paris for a short weekend away and had an amazing time. The apartment itself is very spacious and has a really good feel to it - particularly enjoyed the luxury of having breakfast on the balcony in the morning. It's in a fantastic location, and a great base to explore the city - just a short walk from numerous metro stations. Ed was really helpful when it came to picking up the keys (despite us arriving late) and had some great recommendations in the local area to explore in the welcome book. Would definitely stay again.

Édouard was a great host. He waited patiently for us to arrive, even though traffic caused us to arrive a little later than expected. He showed us around the apartment and made us feel very welcome. The apartment was exactly as described and pictured on the website, and it was in an ideal location for exploring Paris. The neighborhood in Pigalle has everything you could need or want, including grocery stores, restaurants, bars, subway, and shopping areas. We would definitely consider this apartment again the next time we are visiting the City of Lights.
Nous avons passé un super séjour dans ce logement. Je le recommande et je reviendrais.
房東很好，位置非常方便，安全性很高，如果我再到巴黎，一定會再租此房間
Tout était parfait ! Appartement top et emplacement idéal pour visiter Paris. Un vrai cocon. On garde l’adresse précieusement. Merci Edouard !
Very Cute and stylish apartment in a great location.  Chris and Bruno were super responsive and easy going and made us feel very welcome. Thanks for having us - wish we could have stayed longer!

We loved our stay in Chris's flat! Chris and Bruno were both very kind and quick to respond, and she was very thorough in her explanation of how to get to the flat from the airport. She also left a detailed wonderful note about all of the amenities and let us use anything that was there. I was surprised that she also included an adapter for US outlets, which was extremely considerate. My husband and I stayed here for our anniversary and had a lovely stay. Would highly recommend staying here!

Both Chris and her place are wonderful. I spent nearly two weeks in her home and it is incredibly charming, very clean, very comfortable and quiet. It has a nice view, lots of indoor plants, and the decor is lovely. It really has everything you need too.
Chris and Bruno were very conscientious, checked on me a few times, and responded to my questions very quickly. They were also available for advice and suggestions on Paris. 
When I return to Paris, I would most definitely consider staying here again.

A stylish apartment  with a very Parisian feel. Chris and Bruno were quick to respond to messages and timely at check- in. Loved the extra touches like the recommendations sent out beforehand and the decor in the flat - especially with all the lovely plants. We had a fantastic stay. Thank you both! Merci +++
we enjoyed our stay and the place is nice, little and quirky
Chris and Bruno was really welcoming. The flat was really nice and cozy, clean! I love everything. especially the light and decorations. I would like to go again!!! I recommend for everyone.

Chris' apartment is located in a perfect neighbourhood close to everything you'll want to visit, but far enough away that you'll feel like you're living as a Parisian rather than a tourist. Both she and Bruno were extremely helpful and quick to respond. Bruno went above and beyond to assist me (i.e. running over to help when I was struggling with the lock) - and Chris provided me with a great vegan bakery recommendation, and was always just a text message away. Both of them put my mind at ease when I left my wallet behind after checking out. I can't thank them enough for contributing so much to the quality of our first few days in France!

A really beautiful apartment in central Paris. Chris has decorated it so nicely- it was like having our own little home for the weekend.

The check-in was very easy- meeting us in person with the keys and explaining building security. We also really appreciated her thoughtfulness in leaving tips about the apartment and Paris generally.

We would definitely stay again in future!

Chris's apartment was fantastic! Nicely decorated and with lots of indoor plants, it was a really comfortable little place for my wife and I to stay.
The location is great, close to Rue de la Roquette and the Voltaire metro stop, with plenty of cafes and bistros nearby.
Although we didn't get to meet Chris in person, she was always available and really helpful.
Bruno let us into the apartment and he was great too, they're both really lovely people. We would definitely stay here again!

Die Wohnung von Chris richtig hübsch – sehr gut für zwei Personen, ginge wohl auch zu dritt (eine Person im Wohnzimmer). Typisches Pariser-Wohnerlebnis, klein, aber fein. Chris wohnt hier normalerweise, die Wohnung ist also bestens ausgestattet, viele hübsche Designer-Details. Die Küche ist eng (2 Herdplatten), aber völlig ausreichend. Wir haben bei geschlossenen Fenstern geschlafen; da wars superruhig, ausser dass man den frühaufstehenden Nachbar oben umhergehen hört (nicht weiter schlimm).
Très bon appartement si vous souhaitez passer quelques jours dans un quartier vivant de Paris. Bruno et Chris sont super sympas et leur appartement au top !
Student guest.  So safe and accessible.  The apartment is lovely.  Thank you for your hospitality.

Sylvain was an excellent host and his Paris apartment felt like home! He even left me a few beers 😉

Communication: Fast and reliable! Sylvain made me feel comfortable.

Check In: I appreciate them waiting for me since I got lost. Directions were simple to follow from the airport, but I took the wrong metro haha

Value: His flat is huge for Paris standards! I’m coming from NYC so this was humongous for me! I love that there was laundry in the flat and separate rooms for the living spaces. Wifi is strong for WFH. It’s a real two bedroom flat. The guest room has a bunk bed and pull out mattress which could fit 4 people if you had someone sleep on the living room couch.

Location: Felt like a real local. This is in a young artistic area. It’s far enough away from the central area to not feel tourists but close enough to be walking distance to main attractions and metros! The flat faces a busy street but I don’t mind city noises.

Price: I felt the price was well marked for what you receive.

We had a lovely stay at Sylvain's apartment - it was beautiful and right in the centre of a busy street with lots of restaurants, shops and a market on Tuesday morning. It is very close to transport links to central Paris which was very helpful. Loved it!

Great location, very cute apartment, bunk beds aren't the most comfortable,  but if you don't mind sleeping on then it's all good :-)
Gorgeous selection of plants and great buzz to the area.
The apartment is centrally located with everything you need. The beds are comfortable and the interior lovely :) sylvain is very kind and answered quickly. I can only recommend!
Huoneisto oli kotoisa ja hyvien kulkuyhteyksien päässä. Viestintä oli helppoa ja ystävällistä. Kiitos.

Samen met mijn zoon heb ik een fijn verblijf gehad. Dankzij de Vélib die volop beschikbaar zijn in de buurt konden we overal makkelijk komen. 
Bakkerij Chambelland zit op 6 minuten fietsen en is een fantastische aanrader als je glutenvrij brood of gebak zoekt.

L'appartement de Sylvain est bien placé par rapport aux différents transports, dans un quartier animé sans pour autant que l'on subisse le bruit quand on dort. Tout était propre également, et il a eu la gentillesse de me laisser une bouteille de vin au frais pour mon arrivée !
