Recommend this place 100%

Thanks Julien!!

We had a wonderful time in Julien’s apartment. The place is comfortable, homey, and clean. It’s in a great neighborhood with so many amazing bakeries and restaurants nearby. If you want to see the tourist attractions, there are two metro stops very close and it’s a fast trip to the center of Paris.

Julien is quick to respond and very helpful. He made everything so easy for us. Next time we come to Paris we will definitely stay at Julien’s again.

Julien’s apartment is super comfortable and located in a quiet, charming area not far from the Batignolles neighborhood with its hip boutiques and cafés. We had a great few days wandering and exploring.

Julien was a great host! responses were very  quick and all communication was friendly and helpful. 

The apartment is beautifully and thoughtfully furnished. It has everything (and more)  for a great stay. Another reviewer mentioned the shower had great water pressure—true!

Neighborhood had loads of restaurants, stores, etc. Perfect jog to Sacré Coeur and Montmartre.  A lovely local park w very cute cafes/ shops nearby. 

Metro very close to apartment, lots of bus options as well. Excellent, award winning bakery nearby. Pass Sanitaire/ return Covid test handled quickly by pharmacy just steps away from apartment. 

Hope to stay there again!

Julien's place is wonderful! Decorated eclectically and fun, we enjoyed spending our down time sitting with the windows open and having friends over for a glass or two in the spacious living room.  There is no AC or elevator to the third floor where the flat is, but the charm of the architecture makes it totally worth it. We preferred to enjoy local cafes and dining, so the small kitchen didn't bother us. The shower has awesome water pressure and shower head, a definite bonus!

As American tourists visiting Paris, this flat was a little far from where we spent our time. The metro stop was a short walk and scooters available down the street which made transportation very accessible. We enjoyed local cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood, and hearing the school children each morning down the street :) In the future, we would probably choose somewhere a little more central.

Julien is an excellent host, communicating with you before, during, and after your stay. He is friendly and inviting, as is his home.

My husband and I stayed at Julien's place for 5 weeks and it was fantastic. The bed was comfy, the couch was comfy, the kitchen had everything one would need. The decor was awesome.  The neighborhood had great restaurant choices, fancy to everyday. The metro was close and easy to get everywhere.  And Julien was great to communicate with.  He responded quickly to any questions and concerns.

The apartment is, as advertised, stylish, with ample space and reliable WiFi.  I was looking for a place where I could feel at home (and get some work done) after some sightseeing and this fit the bill.   AirBnBs can, sometimes, feel incredibly impersonal.  This was quite the opposite and I appreciated that.

There are also many great shops (and parks) in the area.  Batignolles is a great neighborhood ... safe and friendly.  The only downside to the neighborhood is taking the 13 line of the Metro (both of the nearby stops are on that line.). It was at  times miserably crowded!  But, both stops are right near the apartment.  Julien is a thoughtful host,  responsive, and accommodating.
Great apartment, conveniently located for experiencing the city. Apartment was quiet and comfortable - would definitely stay again! Great suggestions from host too!

Enjoyed my stay at Julien’s apartment. Juliens was there to greet me personally at the door upon check in and offered to help me with my luggage which was extremely nice of him. I really enjoyed the neighborhood.

Julien’s apartment is so stylish and comfortable. It was a dream visit for me. I was so happy to be able to cook and chill out, and I had no trouble making connections around Paris, from the airport and to the Eurostar at Gare du Nord. Airbnb has really elevated the quality of travel.
Amazing funky apartment! Great art and space, makes you not want to leave. The location was AMAZING, great restaurants and bars in the area

Julien’s apartment was a perfect place to stay - it is located away from many tourists, so was a perfect way to experience more typical Parisian life. It is well situated next to Montmartre for easy walking access, and also to the metro for access around town. The apartment itself is quirky and Julien has a very cool style. The bed is comfortable. There is a lot of room and you have everything you could need. Julien was very responsive and great at communication - I highly recommend staying there!
Juliens place is excellent! It was clean, well stocked, comfortable and spacious, in a lovely neighborhood. Julien is a great host. We recommend this place!
Julien's apartment was ideal. I love the neighborhood. The flat was very comfortable and neat and styley, had everything I needed. Lots of windows and light.

Place is exactly as listed, huge, comfy, really loved the neighborhood, more chill than the rest of Montmartre. The bed mattress is like sleeping on a cloud. Only thing I would suggest is providing small basic shampoo and conditioner. Thanks julien xx

Our host Lingzhen was excellent at communicating with us throughout our stay. She provided great information and we arrived quickly to the flat after flying into the airport. Great location to all popular sights and other hidden gems.  Gorgeous apartment. Very comfortable for our family of four. We really enjoyed having a balcony and fans helped on the warmer evenings.  When we return to Paris we would definitely stay here again.
Very nice place, at around 10 min by walk to the Luxembourg park. The room is very convenient for kids too.

We had a one night stopover with our 2 young children. Lingzhen was extremely quick in replying to our messages and very flexible - we changed our time of arrival twice and had a late check-out, both no problem! The apartment is in a good location - short walk to Jardins du Lux., metros & essential shopping. It looked just as it did on photos - perfect for a couple but perhaps a squeeze for a family staying for a longer break. My only criticism is that it needed a better clean - some dust & hairs need vacuuming, floors a wash etc. Bedlinen was fine though.

Lingzhen met us at the apartment when we arrived & showed us a few things. The pictures are accurate. The apartment is bright, modern & comfortable. The stairway leading up to the second floor is dark & musty smelling, but honestly it added to the old city feel!  But the appartment itself is newly renovated. It was quite hot out (about 25 degrees) and the apartment was very hot at night!  We couldn't leave the windows open all night because of the traffic noise below (not terrible, but enough to wake you up). Lingzhen immediately bought two fans, which helped a great deal. The neighbourhood feels safe & welcoming. It is very close to the Luxembourg RER station, making it very easy to get virtually anywhere in Paris. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here & would book it again without a second thought. Highly recommended.
It is very nice clean apartment near  Luxembourg garden. Well  equipped, cosy and beautifully done

Lingzhen welcomed us and showed us the amazing apartment! We loved it so much. It was so spacious, clean and had everything you could want. We stayed for 10 nights so for us we needed a kitchen and the kitchen here was amazing with hotplates, oven, dishwasher which was really nice to stay in Paris and be able to buy some of the incredible produce we found at the markets and take it home for dinner! The neighbourhood was one with a much more local feel which was so close to the pretty Luxembourg gardens and train station   too. We love walking and found you could see some really cute streets and surrounding Arrondissements too like St. Germain and Marais District. We have been to Paris before, but this was our favourite location and accommodation. I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone, Beautiful.

La casa está muy bien aunque es un poco pequeña y en la cocina faltan algunos utensilios, lo mejor q tiene la casa es la zona donde está, tranquila aunque estas cerca de la zona más turística. Lingzhen es muy agradable y te ayuda en lo que puede dándote guías y resolviendo las dudas
La descripción del anuncio es correcta, el piso es remodelado, estaba muy limpio y moderno. Zona céntrica.
On a été très bien reçu ! L'appart est très beau et propre ! Super bien situé dans la ville !

PARFAIT ......Il n'y a pas autre chose à dire.La meilleure expérience AirBnB que nous ayons eu(et nous en avons déjà pas mal!)L'appartement correspond vraiment bien aux photos et il est vraiment très très joli,spacieux et très confortable jusqu'au détail(couleur, atmosphère,qualité).Situé au calme,dans la chambre,donnant sur une cour intérieure, c'est très silencieux.L'accueil de Lingzhen a été tout autant à la hauteur également, tout à nos petits soins et dans une grande discrétion; extrêmement réactive à nos questions avant d'arriver, nous attendait à l'heure de notre choix d'arrivée et nous avait préparé jus de fruit,eau,thé.Nous sommes hôtes nous même et espérons avoir la même qualité de réception.MERCI,merci vraiment Lingzhen.A une prochaine fois,c'est sûr. RECOMMANDONS +++++.Annie Alain
很好的位置，房间设施齐全，房东非常友善，价格也很合理。强烈推荐

J'ai reçu un accueil agréable et sincère.  L’appartement est bcp mieux en vrai que sur le photo! Tout neuf, tout propre et organisé avec le confort et du charme! Et en plus il es placé dans un quartier historique, dans 2 pas de tous les show-places, dans une ancienne maison avec l'escalier en spirale. Bon, c'est un bon compliment au voyage de découvert de Paris. Ça donne l'envie d'y retourner!

Thibault's place was quiet and comfortable, which it where it counts. The shower had great pressure and it was perfect for two people. There's stairs, but an elevator. You'll love it. Thibault was friendly and lives on the floor below so accessible.
The studio is perfect and Thibault is a great host. Next time I'm in Paris I will definitely book again. Thanks again Thibault!

Thibault's place is wonderful! There is a real bed that is so comfortable. The location is awesome for exploring Paris with major metro and RER stations near by. There is a grocery store across the street and excellent restaurant below the apartments. Thibault is very available and very kind. We highly recommend his place!

Thibault's place is great. It has everything you could possibly need, including converters, phone chargers, etc. The space was perfect for us as a couple. The mattress was super comfortable, and a real mattress (not a futon mattress), which I appreciated as a tourist who spent all day walking. It's also very close to several metro stops, breakfast places (including Odette and Aime at the bottom of the building) in addition to a grocery store. All of which made our mornings very convenient. There are bars and night life around, but none so close or loud that it disturbed our sleep at all. There are also some really wonderful restaurants around including Verre & Chope which I highly recommend! Overall we had an excellent stay, Thibault is a wonderful and accommodating host. Def pick this place!
Great place ! Has everything you need in the apartment and just downstairs are restaurants and grocery and pharmacy and bakeries!  I will stay here again next time in Paris!!

Thibault's apartment is a cozy, small apartment and a great home away from home.  It was perfect for my daughter and I.  There is a very comfortable full size bed in a small bedroom and the couch folds out into another comfortable bed so we could each have our own space.  The apartment is very easy walking distance from 2 metro stations, grocery is across the street and the restaurant downstairs is very good.   The neighbor hood has all you need and we were able to explore all of Paris with great ease from this location.  HIGHLY recommended!

I can't tell you enough how great the location is! You're 15-20 minutes maximum from the main touristic attractions. But a majority are a lot closer. The metro is a short 5 minute walk and there's a convenient bus stop across the street. I was extremely surprised with how accessible everything was from this Airbnb. This apartment is suitable for one person or two people that don't mind giving up their privacy since the apartment is not that large in size. Thibault is a very accommodating host and I'm so grateful for his attentiveness whenever we needed him! Thank you!

Thibault's apartment is centrally located in Paris, easily walkable to both Montmartre and Gare Du Nord and plenty of transit options (Métro especially). He just had a brand-new shower put in, which is a phenomenal upgrade. While the apartment is on what Americans would call the 7th floor, fear not: only one flight of stairs thanks to an elevator to the 6th. The apartment is well laid out and furnished. And being on the top floor, the windows open wide to scenic Parisian boulevards and skies. What more could you want?

Thibault's place literally has everything you will need for your stay, from clean towels, cable TV to coffee maker. The studio is located right above a cafe, across the street from a carrefour, and near numerous bakeries, restaurants, and most importantly, the metro. Also, the studio is actually what we call a "junior 1 bedroom", with the bed located in a separate room from the dining and living area. Better yet, for those of you who, like me, visit Paris with great trepidation due to the lack of any French ability, do not worry, as Thibault speaks fluent English and will answer any questions you may have. Solid five star.
Thibault was flexible about check in / out and available to offer suggestions and answer any questions. It's a very cute studio with everything you need.

The location was very close to multiple train lines. It made the commute easier as for my work I needed to travel in different directions on different days.

The place had a nice restaurant in the same building - ground/first floor, a supermarket right on another side of the road, a mobile shop to buy any local prepaid SIM card, and many more places to make stay smoother.

Thibault  - the host was very nice. He came down to pick up me and helped me check-in and get easy. I was having some issue with local telecom company SFR and he helped with that also.

Overall a very good place.

Thibault's flat is an amazing value for anyone who enjoys cozy spaces in the heart of Paris. He has clearly thought through the needs of all of his guests in having all the standard items one would expect in a hotel and more. The views from the windows were amazing and the place excellent for the three days we stayed. It was also nice to be close to major transit options but not smack dab in the middle of all the tourist attractions. Direct connections to Charles de Gaulle made it super easy to fly home. 10/10 in value, ease, cleanliness, and hospitality!

The stay at Thibault's place in Montmartre was just great. Our apartment was enough spacious, located on the top floor of a typical Parisian palace. The location was also great as you can take the near metro or just walk and get lost in the city!

Amazing stay! Thibault is very friendly and helpful. The place is exactly as describe, very clean, cozy and you have everything you need right on hands. Location is also great and I would certainly  come back and stay in Thibault`s place again.

The flat was fantastic, it had everything you need and it was excatly as described. It is in the great neighborhood, everything is close( market, bus, metro). Our host Thibault was very nice and helpfull and he was always available. All in all we had a wonderfull time in Paris and we recomand this flat, we will surely stay here on our next visit. :)
Small place but one finds all that is necessary for a confortable stay. Very central location and easy check in and out. Can recommend.
The apartment was exactly as described!  Central location, great for travelers.  The host was very nice and made us feel welcome!
The place is very well located and very well equiped. Whatever you need as a traveler is in this friendly place. Thibault is a great owner and is always ready to help you.
A good place to stay.. small place but it has everything you need ..safe neighborhood. thank you mr. Thibault :)
The neighbourhood was great.

Overall, a very positive experience at this flat!
Guillaume was very quick to respond to communications and questions prior to our arrival. He was accommodating to our arrival time and personally came to give us the introduction to the flat.
Location of flat is perfect. Away from tourist crowds but just steps to bus and metro for easy access to all that Paris has to offer. Also walking distance to many amenities such as restaurants, bakeries and outdoor markets.
The flat is exactly as the photos.  Very bright and spacious. Comfortable bed and fully equipped kitchen. 
We visit Paris on a regular basis and this flat will be at the top of our list. 
Thank you Guillaume for being such a good host.

Guillaume is the perfect host. Gentle, helpful, communicative. A wonderful apartment in a most interesting quarter of Paris. Cafes and restaurants are nearby as well as all kinds of shops for the everyday needs. The Butte aux Cailles (a 15 min walk) offers a gerat choice of bubbly bars and restaurants. All in all, I recommend Guilaume's place wholeheartedly to everybody who loves Paris (or who wants to learn to know  Paris).

We have encountered a very friendly welcome. A little welcome paper had been really useful, giving all the informations needed by a guest, especially when new to Paris. The appartment looked exactly like the photos, very spacious, with much light from the big windows.  We liked the well equipped kitchen very much because it gave us the freedom of choice between a restaurant visit or cooking by ourselves (which we did). This is the general advantage of an appartment over a hotel room - if it rains (and sometimes it does rain  even in Paris) you can stay in the appartment and feel comfortably at home. The bedroom is spacious, too, and the king-size bed has room enough for two (even without disturbing each other,  if that may be necessary). By the way, bed clothes and towels are provided and you don't have to care for the final cleaning. The TV in the living room has access to at least 500 international programs, which comes very handy if you want to stay connected to news from your home country. Highspeed WLAN is also available. A maybe important feature for those who have security issues against Paris: The appartment can only be reached via a metal-grilled entrance, which is always closed and supervised by a concierge. From the balcony you have a marvellous view of Paris, from Montparnasse to Pantheon. The street looks beautiful from above, with so many trees.  Most people don't think of a green Paris! 

We have to admit that we do know the quarter since many years really well. It is charming, a wonderful mix of all kinds of people. The Butte aux Caille can be easily reached by a little walk - there are lots of bars, cafes, restaurants for every taste. It's something of an in-quarter, too. The Jardin du Luxembourg is near, also the Jardin des Plantes. For those who want to discover whole Paris the nearby Place d'Italie gives access to three Metro-lines, the fastest way to go whereever you want, e.g. it takes only 30 minutes to the Eiffel tower. For the gourmet fraction there are markets with really fresh products. Of course you could also visit supermarkets or bakeries or butcher shops and a french specialty: The so-called traiteurs with their luxurious convenience food.

All in all, it has been our most pleasant visit to Paris in the last years. We would recommend an accommodation like this to anyone who loves Paris (and who does not!). We are sure to be there next year again. Thanks to Guillaume!
L'appwrtement de Guillaume est exactement comme sur la description, spacieux et tres pratique pour visiter paris, vous y passerez un eccelent sejour

Guillaume nous a chaleureusement acceuilli dans son joli appartement ou nous avons sejourné 5 jours.
Un 2 pieces spacieux et lumineux, charmant et propre avec tout ce qu'il faut pour se sentir comme a la maison. 

L'appartement est très bien situé dans le 13ème. Dans un quartier calme mais vivant. Il y a des restaurants, des commerces et un petit supermarché juste en bas du bâtiment.Proche du metro Gobelins et Place d'Italie.

En plus Guillaume a pris soin de préparer un livret d'accueil avec des conseils utiles.

Nous sommes très heureux d'avoir séjourné chez Guillaume nous le recommandons vivement

This is a great flat, all conveniences, very clean and tidy and larger than we thought, this is the first time we have stayed in somebody's home, all others have been rentals. The area is quiet and convenient and safe, the lift worked, thank goodness as it is on the 4th floor. We had a great time walking round the area, there are supermarkets, bakers and beautiful parks within a few minutes walk. Would highly recommend this apartment, in the 20th arrondissement, a new area to us, but transport links are good and cheap. Visited arts and metiers museum and the decorative arts as well as a few others. would highly recommend this apartment, did not get to meet our host, but should we have needed,there were several ways to contact him.
It was a great experience to stay at Rémi's place. He was very nice and polite. The neighborhood is lively.

Rémi was a perfect host, reliable and friendly - and I can absolutely recommend his place. The apartment ist beautifully furnished, comfortable and the surrounding / city area is really nice. When I come to Paris for the next time, I'd be happy to to stay here again.
Rémi est un hôte parfait, et son appartement est très agréable !

O Rémi foi muito um anfitrião muito prestativo em todos os momentos da estadia. Explicou os detalhes do apartamento e deu indicações interessantes sobre o bairro. O apartamento é muito bom, espaçoso e o transporte é fácil, permitindo aproveitar bem a cidade francesa. Recomendo!
Superbe appartement, tout confort, très calme et spacieux et où l'on se sent comme chez soi. De plus, Rémi est un hôte très arrangeant et disponible. Excellent séjour.
Cet appartement a tout ce dont on peut avoir besoin. L'emplacement était parfait pour ce que je devais faire. Remy est tres accueillant et arrangeant. Je recommande cet apartement.
Nous avons ete tres content de l'apartement .Il est bien situe et confortable

Très bon contact avec Rémi qui a été très arrangeant.
Ce n'est pas moi qui ai logé dans l'appartement mais un de mes collègues qui en a été ravi.
Je recommande!

Margot was a wonderful host. She was quick to respond to any and all questions we had on our trip. Her apartment is lovely and is wonderfully located to public transit. Would highly recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Paris. ❤️
Charming apartment, great location and hospitality.
Very nice host! Place is very clean and cute! We had a great time!
Charming apartment and easy communication with Margot
Great experience. The apartment is full of fashion! Thank you
We had a lovely weekend stay at Margot’s apartment! It’s a lovely flat in a great location, within walking distance of loads of great restaurants and bars. I would definitely recommend this place!
Margot replied quickly as a cobra. She was clear and very cooperative. I strongly recommend her as a host and will happily return to her flat next time someone in the family is heading for Paris.
Lovely apartment in an excellent location. I had to make the bed on arrival, however I really appreciated the flexible check in / check out.
Great placement and great apartment. The entire check in and check out processes were automated, which I absolutely love. Had everyhing I needed in it and the view was also nice! Recommend <3

My girlfriend and I had a lovely stay in Margot's apartment and would recommend it. She answered all our questions very quickly in the days running up to our stay and took time to give us recommendations for restaurants and bars nearby. The location was perfect, it took very little time to get to from Gare du Nord, was only a few mins walk to the nearest metro station and a few mins from the nearest Velib spot which makes it great to explore the city from. The apartment was clean and tidy, the bed comfy and the kitchen area was great for making breakfast and baguettes for lunch. We would definitely stay again!

Très bel appartement et très bien situé près de République. Jolie décoration et appartement propre, idéal pour passer un weekend à Paris. Merci a Margot pour sa flexibilité, son amabilité et son hospitalité.
Nous sommes entièrement satisfait de notre séjour chez Margot. Nous recommandons vivement ! Sur tous les plans : emplacement, décoration et équipements !!! À refaire ;)
Très bon accueil de la part de Margot.  Appartement très bien situé on le recommande

La casa está situada en un sitio perfecto, cerca de todo, es más amplia que lo que parece en las fotos, el colchón es comodísimo, hay que avisar que es un 4º piso sin ascensor, que no hay armario, ni cajon ni nada similar salvo un perchero donde dejar tu ropa, estaba todo impecable y Margot fue superamable y muy flexible en cuanto a la entrada y la salida, lo recomiendo para un fin de semana o 5 días en París.
Appartement bien agencé et très bien situé dans Paris, plusieurs stations de métro et commerces à proximité

Très jolie et grand appartement, aunsi que confortable et à un prix abordable.
Hôte flexible, donc arrivée très pratique !
Je recommande completement !
À noté que l'appartement est au 4e sans ascenseur.

L'appartement de Margot est vraiment idéal pour un couple: une belle pièce de vie lumineuse et pleine de cachet, et une chambre, certes petite mais très agréable et confortable. Situé dans une rue commerçante en pleine métamorphose, à deux pas du métro et au coeur de Paris, on a l'impression que la capitale nous appartient quand on sort de l'immeuble. Mais surtout, Margot est absolument adorable, disponible et à l'écoute. Je recommande sans réserve l'appartement comme sa propriétaire!
Margot a était une super hote ! L'appartement est encore mieux que sur les photos et très bien placé ! Merci encore :)

Un super appartement, confortable et bien équipé. Très chaleureux avec beaucoup de cachet ! Margot a été très agréable et réactive lors de nos différents échanges :-) L'appartement est idéalement situé près des transports et de tous les commerces. Ultra pratique ! Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. Nous on n'hésitera pas à y séjourner de nouveau si l'occasion se présente ! 20/20 :-)

El dpto es ideal para un viaje corto en Paris en pareja o solo. Queda en el centro de la ciudad y es fácil moverse desde alli, sea caminando, bus o metro. Las fotos exhiben exactamente tal cual es el departamento. 
Recomiendo el lugar (precio-calidad) y por la buena predisposición de Margot.
Alessia’s place was very clean and had a great location. Would stay again.
Perfect apartment, great location and very stylish! Great communication from host and help given when needed. Would definitely recommend to any traveller looking for a break in the centre of Paris.

This is a great apartment to be based in to explore Paris . The area felt safe to walk around at night . The convenience of supermarkets , metro , restaurants made it all very easy. Would recommend this apartment to friends .
Perfect flat, location and host.
Siamo stati una settimana ospiti di Alessia. La casa è molto accogliente e la posizione strategica per visitare la città. Servizi di ogni tipo a pochi passi.

Appartement très bien placé a deux pas de métro avec des petites supérettes juste a coté. L'appartement est très propre et bien équipé (pour la période automne-hiver prévoir une vraie couette 2 personnes pour le salon quand même). La communication était rapide et efficace. Un super adresse pour visiter Paris.

Logement bien situé, proche de la place de la république et du haut marais. L'appartement est spacieux, nous y avons voyager avec notre fils de 5 mois et il y a suffisamment de place dans la chambre pour placer un lit parapluie (que nous avons emmené). La rue est assez bruyante en week end ce qui reste normal pour Paris. A recommander

Appartement super bien placé dans un quartier très animé et agréable, très confortable pour 4 personnes ... A améliorer toutefois : la propreté de la douche + prévoir une couette plus grande pour le canapé-lit
정말 호스트가 살고 있는 집을 그대로 주는 에어비앤비의 본질을 잘 살린 집이에요! 집안 분위기도 너무 좋고 시설도 깔끔하고 위치도 불편했던 적은 없었어요!

It was really easy to communicate with Pierre. He is reliable, pontual, clear and helpful. The stay in his flat was really comfortable. The place is cosy and spacious for Paris standards. The neighbourhood is also really calm and the local bar quite lively and friendly. There are many little shops for nice cheese and charcuterie near by, and even a great local bookshop. I'd certainly come back.

Pierre is a wonderful host, he told us everything we needed to know about the nearby area and waited for us as our flight was delayed. The flat is very nice, light and comfortable maybe a bit smaller than it seems from the photos. It's easy to reach several metro stations. We enjoyed staying at Pierre's place very much.

We had a wonderful time at this apartment! Pierre is a great host and did everything he could to make our stay comfortable and nice from arrival to departure. He always responded quickly by email and phone. We fell in love with the apartment and would definitely stay here again. The apartment looks even better than the pictures. Its hip, spacious and the location is great. When you get out of the door and you look to your left you see the Eiffel tower behind the buildings.

Très bon accueil de la part de Pierre. 
Et l appartement est très joli. 
Conforme aux photos. 
Le quartier est très silencieux.
Je reviendrais avec plaisir...
Merci Pierre.
El apartamento muy bien y el barrio muy tranquilo, cerca del metro y de varios comercios.

2ème et 3ème séjour chez Pierre tout aussi réussis que le premier ! Un hôte souriant et disponible, un rapport qualité prix imbattable pour uns séjour très agréable dans notre capitale. Je recommande encore et encore!
Chacun de mes séjours chez Pierre fut impeccable et la hauteur de l'annonce. Pierre est hôte disponible et souriant. A recommander sans hésitation !
Pierre est un hôte accueillant et arrangeant. L'appart est très confortable et fidèle à l'annonce. À recommander sans Hésitation.
Stylish, huge place in a great location of Paris and close to 2 metro stations.

We had a great stay at Loic's apartment. Check in was coordinated with his co host and went smoothly. The apartment is in a quiet cul de sac conveniently a 7 minute walk to both Convention and Boucicaut subway stops. There is also a bus stop 2 minutes away.  It is a quick 20 min metro ride to the major attractions and there are several restaurants and grocery stores nearby. The apartment is spacious and comfortable with the only small space being the toilet. I am a large guy, about 6ft 1 in and it was a tight fit but that's European living for you. The bathroom (shower) is quite large and laundry facilities are included which was a nice bonus. i would definitely recommend staying here.

Loic’s place is a true Parisian place in an quiet, peaceful, and well connected neighborhood. Grocery stores and two metro stations are nearby his place which can take you anywhere in Paris. Loic’s apartment is very spacious compared to other Parisian apartments. Check in and check out process is smooth, also he is very responsive. I’d strongly recommend his apartment to the folks visiting Paris.

The apartment/flat was real.  It had more than what I could have asked for.  The bed was soft, firm and very comfortable.  The washing machine was a big plus.  Centrally located in a very nice neighborhood.  I felt like a true Parisian staying there.  Highly recommended.
This was a beautiful apartment in a nice neighborhood.  I recommended it to all my friends traveling to Paris.
Nice large place to stay while you are away
Great, clean apartment in a convenient location with all the necessities.
It’s a cute flat, l love it. I have nice days in Paris.

Loic's apartment was fine and very well-connected. Also, it was larger than the average Parisian place, which is such a great advantage. On a less cheerful note, prospective guests should take into account that there is a big fish tank in the living - one with a rather noisy cascade...
The apartment is clean and close to Metro and supermarket. The neighborhood is clean and quiet. I recommend this place and I would stay again.
Very beautiful place! Metro line 5. minutes walking! Great communication! We needed a hairdryer and Loic did the best to have. one! Thank you!

Loics place is indeed bigger then you'd expect from the pictures. Nice flat and comfy bed. Everything's  there you need, including a nespresso machine. Great location with fantastic restaurants where you can eat for a very decent price (considering Paris). Very easy check-in and conveniently located, close to several metro stations and bus stops. Supermarket close by. Small drawback you sometimes hear the neighbors upstairs walking around. We'll come again !

Great stay. Very easy to check in and out. Loic was quick to help when we had questions and he was flexible to our need. 

Thank you Loic. :)

Appartement calme agréable  propre correspondant bien aux photos produites  ,Loïc est rapidement réactif à toutes nos demandes et très accommodant . Proximité des salons d’expositions de la Porte de Versailles

El apartamento es estupendo. 10/10
Se llega fácilmente.
Está en perfecto estado, el colchón es bueno y tiene de todo. 
Es acogedor y está decorado con buen gusto.
Inmejorable

L'appartamento, anche se non centrale, si trova in una posizione abbastanza comoda perché vicina alla metropolitana. E dotato di tutti i confort necessari e la comunicazione è stata molto semplice e rapida. Unico aspetto negativo è la pulizia dell'alloggio che non era ottimale.
Appartement très bien situé et très agréable
Logement parfait dans un immeuble super bien placé et très calme..;très bon accueil de la gardienne....ne le ratez pas si vous venez à Paris...
Dans le cadre d’un voyage pro, mon séjour chez Loïc est l’une de mes  meilleures expériences Airbnb.
L'appartement est idéal pour un séjour à 2 à Paris

The apartment is very comfortable! also it is well located, near to some subway and bus station, so you can go easily everywhere you want. Flora is so kind, she helped us a lot and was always ready when we needed something. I will recomended it without any doubt!!

Déjà l'acceuil de Flora est formidable. Nous sommes resté un moment à discuter comme de presque amis... L'appartement est vaiment bien situé, idéal pour un moment romantique. Tout est cosy, sous pente (attention 6ème sans ascenseur, mais la vue sur Paris est au bout de cet effort). Le quartier est à la fois proche du centre et très calme.

Très agréable appartement avec vue imprenable sur Paris,et un parc donc très calme dans un quartier branché
Très nombreux restaurants magasins ...
Enfin Flora est une hôte parfaite mettant tout à disposition pour un séjour agreable 
WI FI , TV cuisine etc...

Perfect little apartment in the most charming neighborhood. We were right in the thick of it, just like we had hoped. There is also an amazing little bar just outside the door. This apartment was comfortable and quaint and nothing was more than a short walk away.

My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay at charles' studio! The neighborhood is fabulous and we enjoyed exploring Le Marais. Charles was especially kind when letting us check in early when our travel plans changed. Would definitely recommend his place for anyone looking to stay in the wonderful neighborhood of Le Marais!

The floor in the bathroom area is very cold. The shower, sink, and toilet are in the same oval shaped area without any walls. This means showering floods the floor by the sink area since the floor isn’t sloped enough and the drain is not great.
We stayed at Charles's place for 1 evening and it was perfect. Right in the middle of the Marais, a stylish space, would definitely go back!
Very cute place in a great location! Super close to tons of eatery’s and shopping. And only a 5 minute walk to public transportation!
Charles place was good. Closed to many places; if you like to walk around is really cool. Many museums and nice restaurants. Great 👍🏻.

Fantastic location, right next to great little restaurants like L'as du Falafel and Droguerie des crepes.  Quite close to the 1 Metro line, which gets you to the museum district.  You can walk to Notre Dame.  Charles has a good system worked out to get people into the apartment.

Overall, the studio is as described in the listing. Great location, comfortable bed and clean. There were areas for improvement: water in shower is lukewarm, inconsistent WIFI and the sink drains onto the bathroom floor. Charles is very accommodating and responsive which in sense made up for our concerns.

Charles' place is compact but charming. It was very comfortable for my husband and I during our 4 nights in Paris. The neighborhood, the Marais, is excellent. Lots of places to explore in short walking distance. We ate out at every meal but did enjoy coffee and croissants at the little table by the window in the mornings. If you want to live like a local, this is a perfect spot to do it.

The location is perfect for Le Marais- quiet, tucked into a smaller street in the neighborhood, and convenient to all the surrounding shops and restaurants.
The place is exactly as you see in the photos.  It's a smaller studio, but artfully designed.  It was a little colder for me because of the time of year/marble, but overall warm enough.  
Charles was super responsive and helpful- he came by within 1-2 hours when the wi-fi stopped working temporarily, and also helped me with my check-out time.  Great host and place.
Peefect location, the host solves a little trouble with towels and bed sheets at the moment we arrive. We enjoyed our stay a lot.
Would defintely reccommend this apartment! Amazing location and the apartment itself is lovely. Really close to transport to get to other places but the area it is in itself is also fab!

The location is perfect for staying in Le Marais. You are right in the middle with lots of trendy shops, bars, cafe and places to eat. 

Just as the pictures, the room is small. Fine for one person and ok for two if you are ok with confined spaces. The central heating was great (was snowing while we stayed), but room was very warm. One wall looked like it was being treated for mould, but no smell so fine. Just needed to be painted white to match the rest of the flat. 

The flat is up two floors of stairs with no lift. This added to the character of the building, but bare-in-mind if lots of luggage or trouble with stairs.

There is a small fridge (extremely cold), plates, cutlery to use. A plug in stove if needed, but I would suggest if you need a kitchen while staying, this flat is not the one. There are great places to eat in the area, bring money as all very expensive. 

My only negative is the temperature of the shower water if you like a warm/hot shower. The water got warm for a quick dash in the shower. 

Tips for the area; Le Perla bar for the fashion crowd and good priced drinks, La Pick Clops for food. Wine at La Belle Hortense. Morning pastries and sandwiches (have breakfast here too) Boulangerie de Rennes... Delicious!

The studio is basically the size of a large hotel room for a fraction of the price. Very stylishly furnished and decorated for such a small space. Communication with Charles was easy and it was very handy to be able to check in late. The shower could be a little warmer but otherwise I would fully recommend the apartment and we would definitely stay here again.
This is a cute and stylish studio, in the perfect spot. Central enough to walk everyone and (in my opinion) the best area of Paris. Recommended

Charles was a great host, clear instruction on arrival and departure. The apartment had everything we needed for our visit. The area was superb, plenty of bars, restaurants and shops. A few hundred metres to the closest metro and a short walk to Notre Dame.
This AirBNB is amazingly clean, centrally located, and has a calming energy. The location is perfect -- in the middle of a local neighborhood close to anywhere you would like to go. 100% recommend.
I really recommend the place. Beautiful flat in great neighborhood ! Just so Paris ;)
Lovely space in the best area. Apartment is tiny but very well finished. Would stay again
Amazingly clean and a perfect location!
Accueil au top. Appartement très bien situé, fonctionnelle, propre. On était chez nous...

Très bien accueillis chez Paola, avec une bouteille de vin et quelques adresses locales. Gros plus pour l'emplacement au coeur de Belleville si on ne recherche pas que le Paris carte postale mais avoir une vie de quartier. Recommandé !

Tout s'est merveilleusement bien passé. Arrivant un peu plus tard que prévu initialement, Paola a eu un chargée une amie de m'accueillir et me remettre les clés.
L'appartement est particulièrement chaleureux avec un côté vintage dans la déco qui m'a séduit. Il est donc convivial et surtout très fonctionnel. On y trouve vraiment tout le nécessaire (depuis la cuisine jusqu'à la salle de bain) et pas uniquement les basics comme dans la plupart des hébergements. Je craignais le bruit de la rue étant en rez-de-chaussée mais il n'en fut rien. C'est très calme (et pourtant à 3min à pied seulement du M° Belleville). Avoir une cour privée en centre-ville était très plaisant durant un week-end de canicule. 
Lors de mes prochaines escapades à Paris, je vérifierai si cette offre est toujours disponible. Je recommande fortement ce logement.

Helene's apartment is really central - very close to the Eurostar terminal (Gare Du Nord) and other metro stations. 
We stayed there for a long weekend and we managed to visit all the major attractions. The area is nice and quiet, there are lots of cosy bistrot, restaurants and supermarkets nearby, and a lovely bakery round the corner. The apartment was clean and tidy - perfect value for money! 
We really enjoyed our stay in Helen's place and we definitely recommend it!
A great location for a weekend in Paris. Arrangements with keys worked perfectly.

Helene's apartment was in an excellent location - we were able to easily walk with our luggage from the Eurostar terminal at Gare Du Nord. There were restaurants, boulangeries and a small supermarket all in close proximity, as well as several metro stations. The apartment was clean, tidy and surprisingly spacious. It overlooks a courtyard, making it a quiet place to stay. Helene was an excellent communicator throughout the process, including leaving us useful map printouts marked up with local amenities plus the wifi details. We would definitely stay here again. Merci beaucoup Helene.

We enjoyed Helene's lovely apartment very much. It is very well located, just near metro stations in a nice street with many restaurants. The communication with Helene was quick and pleasant.
Definitely recommended!

Perfect location. Perfect flat for a couple. Perfect price. Hélène really arranged everything for us, so we wouldnt have to mind about anything but a perfect stay in paris. Next time in the city, i'll make sure to book the exact same deal again. Thank you hélène!!!

The communication with Helene was excellent. We collected the keys of the apartment at her brothers place and the whole arrival went smoothly. The neighborhood is one of the best in Paris. We loved the street and the small shops and restaurants in the neighborhood. Very good start of our holiday in France!

Très bel appartement, très calme et propre. Belle pièce de vie. 
Quartier très vivant avec de nombreux restaurants et bars, Hélène a été de très bons conseils. Nous recommandons vivement !

Super séjour chez Hélène. L'appartement est charmant et situé dans un quartier très sympa avec boulangerie, restaurants et métros à proximité.
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement pour un séjour à Paris.
It was so easy to communicate with Balthazar ! His apartment is lovely and in the perfect location. It's a small space but very well designed, so has everything you need.

Balthazar was a very inviting and courteous host. The apartment was quaint with an amazing view of the canal, great natural light and had everything I needed to a 10 day trip. But the neighborhood is the best with boulangeries, cafes, cool shops abounding. There is even a grocery a block away. The metro is a ten minute walk but I walked almost everywhere because this area was quite well located for right bank site seeing. Would definitely recommend this place.
Balthazar is awesome. His apartment is beautiful. Tasteful, clean and with a killer view. The neighborhood is perfect For strolling, eating, shopping. Don't think twice !

Balthazar was great, and the apartment is AMAZING and in the perfect location. You can hear the water rushing through the canal when the window is open. Nearby is a ton of great restaurants (I recommend Holybelly for brunch and ten belles for coffee!) and it's a short walk to the center of Paris for typical attractions.

The best airbnb I can imagine. The location is great, wonderful view onto the canal, gare de l´est in 5 min reach, all the cool places around Republique not much further in easy walking distance. Balthazar was not there, but a nice friend of his handed over the keys personally, and Balthazar was super responsive by email. He must be a fun guy, and he definitely has a great taste. The appartement is beautifully decorated, you can tell its an architect´s place. For Paris, it is a very fine size, even for two, all equipped. It is super super clean, especially bathroom and toilet, rather hotel-like. The very best, still, is the Velux window - you have a view from the bed onto the stars, which you can close to sleep long after a long night.  Waking up then, opening the blind on the roof window remote from the bed, and the one to the canal, having a tea in bed with this view to wake up - pure luxury! From my side - just absolutely top, my favourite place in Paris. And I am there regularly for work, so I can tell! Thanks, Balthazar!

We had a wonderful time at the apartment. It's small but had everything we needed. It was clean and perfect location with a few metro stations close by. We really enjoyed the many wine bars, great restaurants and boutiques nearby. Would recommend chez prune!
Balthazar is cool and his flat is cozy in a cool area. Nice view from window, many nice restaurant and cafe, cool shops. I would def recommend!

Nice charming apartment in a great area. Surrounded with nice restaurants. And a canal right in front of the house where locals meet for drinks after work and hang out untill late. We joined them and had a lot of fun. (When you shut the window it's really quiet in the house, so you don't hear the noise from the street). Would definitely recommend this place. Oh and Balthazar, I really liked your interior.

Great appartement at superb location! It's just like the pictures show: modern, minimalistic, stylish and clean. Everything you need is present: kitchen, shower, toilet, fridge, combo microwave. And once you step out of the building, you can take a seat in the sunshine alongside the Canal St Martin. Close to 3 metro stations, among which Gare de l'Est, allowing to get anywhere in Paris relatively easy. Balthazar is a great host, easy going and communication was very fluent. Is there a downside? Well, no, actually.

Balthazar's apartment was amazing! It is exactly as seen on the photos–minimal and stylish. The place was kept really clean, which made the stay really comfortable. The neighborhood is cute as well. Cute little restaurants and shops and some nice bakeries. The canal is literally right outside of the building, so it was nice to take a walk everyday. Last but no least, Balthazar was an amazing host! Very generous and warmhearted. You would love absolutely everything about his place! Thank you Balthazar! :)

A recommander! L'appartement est idealement placé, avec une vue magnifique, très propre et bien décoré! Balthazar est un super hote, il nous a laissé plein d'informations sur les choses à faire dans le quartier!
I spent a few nights in this appartment and really can recommend it! It is clean and beautiful with lots of space in the lovely neighbourhood of Montmartre. I will definitely come back :-)

Marianne was overseas during my stay, however her friend and father were both very helpful and accommodating with any little issues. The apartment was clean and cosy, and a good generous size as Paris apartments go, especially for the cost. There was some street work going on outside and renovations in the apartment upstairs that were very noisy, but that was just an issue of unfortunate timing. It's a lovely area. Central to Sacre Couer, but set back from the heavy tourist areas. A lovely village feel with lots of great food and cute bars.
Great experience!! Excellent place

Мы жили у Marianne две недели, нам очень понравилось. Мы почувствовали, что живём на  Montmartre, рядом с собором, кафе, лестницами...  Замечательная квартира, чистая, уютная. Она нам даже показалась больше, чем на фотографиях. Окно спальни выходит в маленький французский дворик. Этого мы не знали. Это был приятный сюрприз. Очень красиво.
Перед поездкой Marianne очень нам помогла. Объяснила как доехать до дома, ответила на все наши вопросы. Большое ей спасибо. И всё время, пока мы жили у Marianne, мы были на связи. 
К сожалению мы не встретились с Marianne, так как её не было в Париже, и нас встречала её мама. Наш рейс задержали на два часа и мы не могли сообщить об этом. Мама Marianne дождалась нас на квартире, всё рассказала, показала и даже провела маленькую экскурсию по району, хотя было уже поздно. Спасибо.
Если будет возможность приехать ещё раз в Париж, остановимся у Marianne.

L'appartement était parfait, très beau, sympathique et fonctionnel. Le lieu était très tranquille tout en étant dans Montmartre et ses attraits. Marianne a facilité mon arrivée et s'est montrée disponible pour des conseils pour le quartier et Paris. Je recommande sans réserves cet appartement, valeur sûre!

Magali's home is absolutely beautiful. I recommend this to anyone thinking about staying here, stop looking at all the other airbnb's, this is the one to choose. Very clean, very homely,  very helpful and informative.
Really easy to communicate, her mother handed over the keys. friendly, funny hosts - tidy, pretty studio - perfect location for the area of canal st. martin. would recommend magali's place to anyone

Magali was so nice and cute young mum, very friendly, generous and chilled. 
We felt welcome the same second we came through their doors. It is nice that you can actually meet your host in person. Magali really helped us with suggestion and let us stay till the evening on the day of departure. Flat is small but full of life and cosyness... we would definately like to return some day
Appartement cosy et très agréable. Magali est une hôte très serviable et disponible.  La localisation est parfaite pour des ballades le long du canal..

Spent New Years in Thomas' apartment and couldn't have had a better experience. Great location in the Marais, really spacious flat, and Thomas is a lovely guy and communication was easy. Would definitely stay here again
Our stay in Thomas place was amazing!! The place was identical to the pictures, but nicer in real life. Thomas was a very good host. Thanks

This is a cute, colorful, comfortable, and convenient apartment in the heart of Paris. If you're looking for sterile elegance, look elsewhere, but if you want to live like a young Parisian for a weekend, this is your spot.

The location of the house is great, near the subway station, and several good cafes just few minutes away. Also, we like the decoration inside hhh, very um... artistic. Gives me a tad of Paris. Oh and the bedroom, open the window in the middle of the day, sitting on the fluffy carpet with sunshine all over it--just makes the perfect day. The only downside is the bathroom...which is quite small and I find it hard to even turn around in it. Besides I'm Asian so I'm quite petite already. But overall a pleasant stay in Thomas's house!
The apartment was very nice and the location was fantastic. Thomas was very kind and provided us with all the information needed.
Beautiful flat in a very nice neighborhood. Thomas is a extremely generous and well organized host. We had a great weekend a Paris. Merci Thomas!

Great location, very close to metro station to go to the main touristic places. Improvement point: the bathroom was not clean (neither the toilet nor the bathroom carpet). 
The room was big and Thomas had an optimal communication with us.
Amazing place, good location, very confortable and Thomas prepare everything for us to be like home. Very recomendable.
El departamento es hermoso y está súper bien ubicado, nos sentimos como en nuestra casa!  Muy recomendable, thomas es un gran anfitrión.

Logement très bien situé avec un bon rapport qualité prix, très agréable pour un couple en séjour à Paris. Thomas et sa sœur sont facilement joignables et disponibles, nous recommandons et y reviendrons avec plaisir.
Très bel appartement, emplacement idéal pour se déplacer facilement, hôte chaleureux et très arrangeant, je recommande!
Super appartement. thomas a tout fait pour que nous passons un très bon séjour

Très bel apartment, décoré avec goût, spacieux et lumineux.
La rue est calme mais le quartier animé, proche des restaux, commerces...
Très bonne communication avec Thomas.
A recommander !!!

Thomas es super gentil. Son appartement très agréable, lumineux, grand, et localisé dans une rue tranquille, à deux pas du metro République. La chambre es grande, lit confortable. Il a tout ce qu'il faut pour un séjour parfait à Paris. Merci!

Appartement trés agréable, idéalement placé;  lit confortable et bravo pour la propreté de l 'ensemble.
Thomas nous a laissé trés gentiment 2 billets de cinéma.
Les clés nous ont été remises par un de ses amis, Antoine, qui fut charmant.
Lovely small apartment a delightful stroll from Montmartre. Compact and tidy. Great for a short stay.

Alice was very nice and very flexible with check-in time. 
She made sure we had everything we needed for a nice stay, she even got little goodies for a quick breakfast. 
As for the apartment, it is very small, but very cute! My boyfriend and I found it was perfect for a couple, cosy and intimate. 
We enjoyed every part of our vacation, including the apartment, and the fact that it is in Montmartre is the cherry on top.
Lovely appartement.. Alice is great, always helpful and friendly.. the appartement is clean and really nice. Love it!

Nous n'avons pas rencontré Alice durant notre séjour mais elle était toujours disponible par message. Très agréable et toujours là si besoin. L'appart correspondait parfaitement à la description. On aurait préféré la télé dans la chambre (pas de canapé). Nous avions le petit dej compris (brioche et confiture). Je recommande !

Der Aufenthalt in Alice' Wohnung war wirklich super! Die Wohnung ist mit zwei Zimmern sehr praktisch und von der Lage auch echt gut gelegen. Alles war gut vorbereitet und sauber. Die Gastgeberin ist unheimlich freundlich und antwortet schnell auf Nachrichten, was die ganze Organisation sehr entspannt hat. Prima Paris-Trip!

Es un hermoso departamento, tranquilo y cómodo, con todo lo necesario para una buena estadía. Próximo a dos lineas de metro, y en un barrio muy lindo, con supermercados y tiendas cerca. Recomendable 100%. Alice super atenta en todo momento.

J’ai passé un séjour agréable dans  le logement d’Alice qui a été  bien propre, rien n’a manqué durant le séjour et le quartier est calme. Bon accueil et bonne disponibilité d’Alice en ce qui concerne la communication.

I had a lovely stay in Laure's apartment. It's a fantastic location that's close to everything while still being calm and quiet. There's a wonderful bakery on the first floor so you wake up to the smell of baking bread, and quaint views of Parisian rooftops out of both rooms. 

Quick notes: The apartment is located on the seventh floor (6th if you're counting in French) and there was no elevator, so it may not be appropriate for people who are handicapped or have limited mobility. But if you're visiting Paris you're probably already doing plenty of walking and I enjoyed the exercise :)

The bathroom is also quite small and while I was very comfortable, the shower could be a bit cramped for someone on the taller side.
I had a great stay here, you can walk to mostly all major sights from this apartment, there are also supermarkets and restaurants in close proximity. The apartment was bright, clean, and very quiet.
Nice location, very central. Flat very quiet and calm.
Great location and nice apartment. Communication was excellent.
We've been there as a couple and had some beautiful and romantic days above the rooftops of Paris =) The apartment is authentic and charming, the great location makes it perfect.

We absolutely loved the place.
The house is ideally located in a residential area near all the attractions. It has a great atmosphere of old Paris and a nice view from the windows.
Everything in the apartment was in good working condition, and the furniture was nice and modern.
There is no lift, so you'll have to use the stairs to get to the 6th floor.

Bel appartement, bien décoré 
Très bon accueil 
Disponibilité, ponctualité 
Beau quartier,  très bien situé !!!!
Je recommande vivement !
Salle de bain authentique mais parfaite pour un petit séjour !
The apartment was in an amazing location and was more spacious than I thought it would be. Easy walk to many restaurants and attractions. I would definitely stay here again.

Amandine’s place was even better than we expected from the pictures! They were very accommodating when we asked to check in early. The apartment was clean and perfect for our two week trip! I highly recommend it, especially in the fall!
we really enjoyed staying at this location close to restaurants shops and metro. I always felt safe even when coming home very late. A+ that it’s very close to the metro.

We had a lovely stay in Amandine’s apartment. Communication with Nicolas was fast and flawless, as was our meet-up for keys. The apartment is located on a quiet side street only 2 blocks from Champ de Mars and easy access to the Eiffel Tower. The home is very bright and has so many new (operable) windows, be sure to bring your pajamas! The décor and appliances look newly updated, it has a large bathroom and is literally across the street from access to 3 Metro lines. The comfortable mattress, washer/dryer combo, Bluetooth speaker and other touches made it a very comfortable place to return every day.

This apartment has all the comforts of home.  It’s super cute and has a perfect location.  Nicholas was very responsive and understanding regarding check in.  I would definitely stay here again if I’m lucky enough to be in Paris and it’s available!

Fantastic location for easy access to a metro stop that connects to multiple lines all over the city. Great neighborhood! Check out the local market on sundays by the metro stop! Huge and local and cute to boot!

Everything was excellent. So far our favorite Airbnb yet! It was very close to some amazing restaurants, a 10
Minute walk to the Eiffel Towel and just 1 minute away from the metro. Very convenient. Loved how safe it felt, stylish and we had absolutely everything we needed. Our only regret is that we couldn’t stay longer.

Amazing place. Perfect located and having all what you need for a memorable stay in the middle of Paris. Few min away from the metro and Eiffel Tower, surrounded by great restaurants, grocery stores and a Starbucks, it provides everything you need in order to feel like home. Highly recommended
A+
Clean, stylish, comfortable, and worth coming again.
The place is stylish, location is very convenient to anywhere in Paris. Surrounding many nice restaurants & grocery shops. We enjoy a short stay there.

The apartment was lovely, and definitely as pictured.  It is very close to a metro station, supermarket, local shops, restaurants and of course the Eiffel Tower.  The apartment was clean and tidy and had everything you need for a stay.  Nicholas was very helpful and responsive.  We would stay here again.

We absolutely loved our stay at this location! It made our trip to Paris even more memorable!! Everything was at a walking distance, from the Eiffel Tower, the metro, amazing restaurants and bars!! I would highly recommend this place to everyone. Can’t wait to be back myself!!

The house is very close to the subway! There are many restaurants and supermarkets around it very convenient! The equipment in the house is very complete, even music can be listened to and books can be read. If you like cooking, the kitchen equipment is very complete!
Nicolas is very enthusiastic about solving problems and it is very convenient to check in! This will be our other home in Paris! ! !

It is located in one of the best areas of transportation and security in Paris. There are global chains like Starbucks and McDonald's around, as well as cafes for breakfast or late-night drinks, and supermarkets are close.

The place is nice, clean, has 3 metro lines close by, supermarkets, restaurants, bakeries and the Eiffel Tower. The internet is amazingly fast! Globally very good place for a couple of days in Paris. Also it has both nespresso and filter coffee machine. And elevator which is super convenient
Great apartment, very well located. Next to a metro station, supermarket, bars, restaurants and specially right next to the Eiffel Tower. Thank you for hosting us!!

The apartment is excellent, both in terms of accommodations and location.
The hosts were fantastic, including answering a special request from us promptly.
A perfect stay, highly recommended.
We hope to return soon.
숙소 위치도 청결도도 너무 좋았어요. 주변에 한국분들이 많은 거 같더라구요. 에펠타워는 걸어서 10분정도면 볼 수 있는 위치에요. 프랑스파업중이라 지하철을 이용하지 못했지만 지하철역과도 너무 가깝고 좋은 숙소에요.
메시지에 대한 답변이 매우 빨랐습니다. 그리고 깨끗하고 위치가 좋았습니당

에펠탑 도보 10분 거리이고 메트로 역도 가까워요 주변에 현지인 맛집인 카페 식당 마트 다 가깝고 집 들어가는 골목 식당이 새벽까지 영업해서 밤에 들어갈 때도 안전합니다
숙소는 사진 그대로입니다 그치만 먼주1가 많았어요 청소를 ㄲH끗ㅇ1는 안 ㅎr는 느낌ㅇ1랄ㄲr요 하지만 비싼 파리의 숙소값을 생각했을때 이 정도 넓이 위치에 이 정도면 만족합니다
Es un apartamento bien ubicado, Léa  esta siempre atenta a las necesidades.  Lo recomiendo.  Lo Único es que el apartamento debería estar más aseado, mejorando la limpieza es perfecto.
Si vous voulez un logement avec de la personnalité, super bien placé et avec une hôtesse super sympa, disponible et accueillante, vous êtes à la bonne adresse.

Notre séjour chez Léa a été tout simplement magnifique. Léa est une hôte exceptionnelle et une personne très accueillante et ouverte d’esprit - et son père aussi, qui est venu récupérer les clés au check out: c’était un plaisir de converser avec eux, on les a adorés ! Sa maison est un petit nid de beauté qui se trouve au sixième étage (sans ascenseur, mais ça fait du bien ;)) dans un très bel immeuble du bas Montmartre. Très bien aménagé, l’appartement est spacieux et lumineux, avec une vue magnifique sur les environs. En plus, il est situé dans une position absolument stratégique: à mi-chemin entre le Sacré-Cœur et la Porte de Clignancourt (tous les deux à distance de marche) et juste en face du métro Simplon, ce qui est parfait pour tout déplacement ! Donc, je ne peux que remercier Léa encore une fois pour sa gentillesse et recommander vivement son logement !
À la prochaine fois ! :)
Appartement très sympa et bien placé!!! Thomas est très agréable! Je recommande à fond cette appartement!
Everything was fine! The Apartment was very cozy and comfortable. The communication with Flavien was easy and quick. We had beautiful holidays there ;-)

We have spent 2 nights here, the flat is very nice and cozy, lot of various shops and cafes nearby, easy check in and out, Flavien is a very nice person, always replies quickly, he has put stickers with notes and tips in the flat, that was nice and helpful. Definitely can reccomend that appartment!
Check-in and check-out was super easy:-) Just as the commutation with Flavien.

Nice, comfortable apartment! We’ve enjoyed the staying there. 
Flavien was so responsive, hospitable and attentive!
appartement très joli, vue sympa sur Paris ! Nous avons passé un agréable séjour !
Très agréable et accueillant
Bon emplacement, hôte réactif mais l'appartement n'était pas très propre ( poils de chien..).
Appart proche métro, restos et commerces. Accès rapide stade de France et La Villette. Parfait pour un séjour à Paris.
Amazing choice if you're going to Paris! Apartment was very accessible and comfy! Margaux is amazingly helpful and nice! Very flexible and willing to assist! We loved our stay there!

Margaux's place was absolutely perfect for our weekend stay. The flat is located a short walk from Montmartre and has everything that you would need. It was super clean and stylish, too. Margaux was incredibly flexible with check-in and check-out times, and always available to answer our questions. Thanks!
Impeccable

Overal it was not what we expected, I will never go there anyway.
We couldn’t used shower because the water was cold and there was real problem with the valves! So three days without shower.
The couch was not good for using as a bed, it was dirty inside so one of us slept on it without opening it. 
It wasn’t what we expected despite good pictures and reviews!

Perfect flat for myself and two friends for two nights. Margaux was there to greet us and offered great recommendations of the local area. The flat is quiet and situated close public transport (& Gare du Nord!) so it was easy to get into the city and around. It was a true pleasure. Thank you Margaux!
Margaux is a super-friendly host. The apartment has everything you need

The apartment of Margaux is located very centrally, perfect to visit Montmartre and the rest of Paris. Various metro stations are near the apartment. We really appreciate the possibility of the easy access code based check-in! Thanks Margaux for hosting :)
Stay in Margaux's Appartement was absolutely wonderful. We enjoyed coming "home" After long walks in this beautiful city. Book this appt, you Will Not regret it!

This was such a charming and cozy place. Very well situated--so close to the metro and a great spot in Montmartre, close to several nice food shops and restaurants and easy walking distance to explore Montmartre itself. The street was quiet and felt very safe. The apartment itself was very clean, nicely decorated and the perfect size for the two of us--comfortable bed, nice shower, great lighting throughout the flat, such a joy to return to in the evening. Our host Margaux was great--she was away during our stay but was very attentive the whole time, making sure things were going well, and the communication beforehand was warm, clear, and consistent and everything worked out perfectly. Would definitely stay here again next time we're in Paris! Highly recommended :)

We really enjoyed our stay at Margaux's. The apartment is exactly as in the pictures, it has everything you need and is perfectly located. Metro is a 5-minute walk from the apartment, and the lively Montmartre district is all around you. We really recommend this host. Margaux was not able to greet us personally but we felt taken care of. Thank you!
The stay was amazing. Margaux was extremely friendly by answering our questions on the stay. The apartment was very comfortable. I would recommend this apartment.

Margaux's apartment was exactly as seen in the pictures. Very easy to find and close to the metro. Margaux wasn't able to meet us, but made it easy for us to get the keys, she was easy to reach and always willing to answer any questions we had. She also left information for us regarding local attractions and how to get there, which was helpful. This lovely apartment is within walking distance of the amazing Sacre Coeur, Place du Tetre and Moulin Rouge. We really enjoyed our short stay in Paris and recommended Margaux and her apartment.
Margaux was very accommodating she helped us with directions to find the apartment and was really friendly when we arrived ! The flat is lovely and we felt very at home, we really enjoyed our stay.

Margaux has a very confortable apartment, simple to reach by Metro and perfect to use for a short trip in Paris. She couldn't be there for our arrival but she organized a perfect way to let us have the keys and was very available to answer every our question.
The apartment was clean and exactly how it looks in the photos.

Host consigliatissimo per chi vuole trascorrere qualche giorno a Parigi, non manca niente!

Margaux is a very responsible and helpful person. She was available all the time and waited for us to get the key altough we arrived late. Also, the apartment was like on the pictures: comfortable and lovely - the perfect place for relaxation after exploring Paris. It was easy to drive to any sight from the metro station nearby. All in all, we enjoyed our time in Margaux's place and felt at home from the very first minute. Thanks for everything!

My friends and I were at Margaux's place for 3 days (Friday - Sunday).
Margaux is a very good host - very kind and helpful. 
She picked us for from the subway Station and brought us to her place, showed us her appartment and gave us some recommendations for Paris. Her Appartment is very cosy and very good located. 
Very much recommended. Thanks, Margaux :-)

Un appartement propre, très bien équipé et lit vraiment confortable, vous y serez comme chez vous! Metro à 5 minutes à pied et adresses sympas dans le quartier. Je recommande. Merci à Margaux pour sa réactivité, conseils et accueil.

L'appartement de Margaux est bien situé, très agréable pour un séjour à Paris.
L'appartement est très propre. Margaux est disponible si vous avez des questions et elle donne d'excellents conseils.
Je recommande sans hésiter!

Un ravissant nid parisien , très calme pour recharger ses batteries après des journées trépidantes à Paris
Studio propre , cosy et confortable
Réservez sans hésiter

Appartement parfaitement conforme à l'annonce !
La réception des clefs à été très simple tout comme leur restitution.
Il est très bien placé par rapport aux bouches de métro (seulement quelques minutes à pieds) et il est également proche d'un très bon petit bar-brasserie :)
Je recommande sans hésiter !

Thibaut' place was great! Perfect for Paris. A little far from the city center but that is what we wanted. The door was a little weird to work but we got it and Thibaut was very helpful. The flat was clean with a comfortable bed. I would deff recommend this place.

Thibaut was a great host and was more than accommodating, especially considering our flight got in at 6:45 am and we're looking for a place to put our bags ASAP. The apartment was clean and in a very diverse and interesting area.

Thibaut's apartment was very charming and lovely. On the 6th floor with windows overlooking the street and median. Excellent views and very cozy. The location is close to the 4 subway and easily accessible to both airports. It's much closer to CDG airport. From Orly, it took me about 40 minutes but very easy to find and navigate. Location is very safe and very hip. There are trendy bars and restaurants all around. Thank you Thibaut for a wonderful experience!

It’s really nice place with a good view from the window and really funny construction of the flat (no one straight angle, but it wasn’t uncomfortable) 
Thibaut was really friendly and kind, they left flowers and Netflix for us :3 

One night it was a little bit loudly, but closing windows totally helped us 

I absolutely recommend the flat
Very nice cozy flat with a really comfy bed. The place made commuting by metro throughout the whole trip really convenient. Thibaut was very communicative and pleasant.

I've already stayed a few times at Thibaut's place as it's great value for money and the host is very friendly and responsive.
As expected, the flat was clean and the bed super comfortable. I'll definitely stay again next time I need to travel to Paris.
Thibaut's apartment is a perfect place to spend some quality time in Paris. Very reccomendable for a couple.

My girlfriend had a great time at Thibaut's place.
It's a typical French apartment, very close to the tube station and supermarkets.
The place is clean, sunny, the perfect location to enjoy Paris.

Thibaut is also very friendly and always happy to help.

All in all, highly recommended at a reasonable price.

Thibaut was a gracious host and we loved our stay in his flat. Very clean space and super comfortable bed. Very handy location - only a few minutes walk to the metro, cafes and markets. We would love to stay again!

A really lovely flat with nice views. Nice little neighbourhood, close to the supermarket and two metro lines so very well connected. Fantastic place - would definitely stay here again next time I'm lucky enough to be in Paris. The only downside was the lack of a lift since the apartment is on the sixth floor.
Very nice, comfortable and clean apartment. It is so French that we didn't want to leave Paris , just because the apt.

Hemos estado en casa de Thibaut 6 días. En general bastante bien, cerca de metro y si quier s andar puedes ponerte en el centro en una media hora. En cuanto hemos tenido una duda nuestro anfitrión nos la ha resuelto al momento. Bien, repetiremos.
Appartement très agréable. Calme, lumineux et très bien situé. Un hôte à l'écoute et très sympa. Merci mon séjour fut agréable.

Мне понравилась такая очень очень французская квартира. Отсутствие лифта нисколько меня не затрудняло. Район замечательный! Тибальд мне быстро помогал в решении маленьких проблем. Удобное расположение вблизи магазинов и нескольких станций метро. Мне в квартире было очень комфортно. В конце недельного пребывания я уже чувствовала себя как дома и не хотелось уезжать. Всё было прекрасно и замечательно. Огромное спасибо!

Özgün karakterli, konforlu, kullanışlı bir  çatı katı dairesi. Thibaut çok sempatik bir ev sahibi, bizi karşıladı, evle ilgili bilgi verdi ve sonrasında ilgilendi. Havadar, temiz, aydınlık bir apart. Binası da güzel, temi ve güvenli. Önünde ağaçlı güzel bir yürüyüş yolu, hemen yanında otobüs durağı var. Tavsiye ediyoruz.
It is a comfortable, functional penthouse with original character. Thibaut was a very sympathetic host, welcomed us, informed about the house and was interested afterwards. Airy, clean, luminous apartment. The building is also nice, clean and safe, near the bus stop. We recommend.
El apartamento es muy cómodo, bonito y acogedor. Mi estadía en el fue maravillosa. Lo recomiendo sinceramente.

Le logement est très confortable et agréable. La description du logement est fidèle à la réalité. Tout était très propre !
Proximité des stations de métro + un supermarket juste à côté : très pratique !
Thibaut est un excellent  hôte, facilement joignable et réactif aux demandes.
Nous recommandons ce logement.
Appartement spacieux, au calme, très confortable. Très bien accueillis par l'hôte. Je le recommande sans hésiter !

El departamento de Thibaut es increíble!! (Mejor de lo que se ve en las imágenes)  es un espacio amplio, con una cama cómoda y limpia, con un sillón increíble para descansar después de horas recorriendo esa hermosa ciudad y con una disposición a ayudar al 100%

Si volviera a París (y eso espero) trataría de alojarme nuevamente en su departamento!!

Le séjour pour notre père/beau-père/grand-père et sa compagne était très intéressante, et beau. Ils étaient agréablement surpris du confort, la taille et l’arrangement de l'appartement.  Le hôte était disponible, parle anglais et a bien gentiment répondu sur tout les questions posé. Ils recommandent fortement cette appartement.
Great space for on the budget. Walking distance to many cool spots in Paris. Right next to a train. Vibrant neighborhood.
This was a good place and quick and easy to be near the metro.

First off.. Moshe is one of the best hosts I've ever dealt with on AirBNB. He's such a nice guy and very helpful. One day the internet went down, and I had 2 very important meetings coming up. He dropped everything and got on the phone with the service company and got it all resolved in less than 30 minutes! Just one example but he helped us out plenty during our stay. I can't stress enough how nice this man is! Thank you again Moshe!

The flat is perfectly described in the listing. It's small, but the space is nice. The neighborhood is awesome! I read a previous review saying the area was "sketchy"? HAH! The neighborhood is vibrant and the people are so friendly! It's a lively area and normal to see people at the sidewalk cafe's drinking and eating into the late hours. People from all walks of life roam the streets. It's perfectly safe. My teenage daughters and I would be out picking up food at 2am. Never had an issue.

Several metro and bus stops are minutes away. You can be on your way to pretty much any where in Paris within 5 minutes.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
The flat is very cute, yet functional. It's close to public transportation and has many places nearby to eat and shop. Moshe is very welcoming and helpful.
Moshe is a good host, you will like him. He makes sure your pleased and is helpful.

A very nice apartment in a lively area. A very nice stay.
Thanks!

The flat was perfect for our trip in Paris. It is equipped with everything you need, we loved it!! Also, it is very close to the metro station so that you can get easily to wherever you want to go. But also walking is not a problem, the Canal St Martin for example is very close by. Moshe himself is a very nice guy! The communication was perfect! Would definitely recommend it and would book it again! Merci, Moshe! À la prochaine fois :)

For me and my family Moshes house was just wonderful!! He was very helpfull and a very good host, he even welcomed us at the airport! His apartment was central and just fine for three persons!! I would recommend it!! Thanks and good luck!!
The location is a little bit far from city, but close to public transport. Other than that, everything is really nice,

Was perfect.
Thanks Moshe
The appartament was great for us, Moshe is a great host, the comunication was perfect, he help us with everything during our arrive, I recommend 100%! Thanks Moshe !!
Thanks Moshe!
It was a very great time. Good location near the metro. And very nice host. I only can recommend it. The check-in and check-out times are flexible, too.
Sehr schöne, schlichte Wohnung. Alles vorhanden: Föhn, Flaschenöffner etc.. Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in Paris
По советским понятиям - это малогабаритная двушка. Стоит за уплаченные деньги. Особенно подходит для молодежи!
Moshe人很好，很热心。但是房间的床上用品感觉很久。门锁也不好打开。

Piso pequeñito pero muy bien para 2 personas, cama cómoda. Es exactamente lo que se ve en las fotos. Está un poco alejado pero en 30-40 min andando estás en Notre Dame y toda la zona del Sena.
