Marie Christine war sehr freundlich zu uns und wir haben uns sofort wohl gefühlt. Am liebsten wären wir noch länger geblieben!
Bei unserem nächsten Aufenthalt in Paris würden wir definitiv noch einmal bei ihr wohnen wollen!

This place is exactly what the listing shows. The owners were super friendly and helpful with all of our questions. Checking in and out was very easy. Even though the location is right in the middle of restaurants and stores it wasn’t loud at all on the apartment. It was very walkable to the Louvre  and metro stops.
Quiet, 3rd floor apartment. Very close to Les Hales train station, Louvre, Montogruel St restaurants.

We really enjoyed our stay here! Once you leave the apartment entrance you are in the heart of the city. There are so many great restaurants close by. We loved that it was super quiet in the apartment but also right in the middle of everything! We were able to walk so many places. The communication was great. You do have to walk up three floors but the stairs are super wide and it was easy to carry luggage up. I loved that the host met us at the property to show us around. We will definitely stay here again on our next visit to Paris.
great location! good space for two people. super responsive and kind hosts.

This apartment is in a wonderful location for anyone who is looking to get around the city primarily by walking and via metro. It is located in a very busy area, but is still quiet at night. The bed here is very comfortable, particularly the pillows! Many basics provided by the host, and our welcomer made the check in very smooth. Easy check out process as well. The only challenge we had was getting our luggage up and down, but this would not be a problem for anyone coming for a short stay.
Great location and good communication.

This is the perfect place to stay in Paris. Very central and on a street lined with the best in restaurants and bars. A wonderful grocer, too. There were some issues with my stay (the electricity went out in the entire building) and the way the hosts handled it was top notch. Very communicative. I highly recommend this address for your stay.

This was a great location and appreciated how quiet and cool the apartment was since I was there during a very bad heat wave.  Xiaoling was incredibly helpful and responsive before and during my stay.

This lovely apartment is perfectly situated less within walking distance to the Seine and numerous Paris tourists sites. The street is lively with lots of restaurants, cafes, and shops nearby, but the third floor, back-of-the-building location means that the apartment is shielded from street noise. The apartment is lovely and the bed is super comfortable. Xiaoling was very helpful and communicative, and has such attention to detail -- from the madeleines on arrival to the multitude of hangers to the laundry detergent provided for the nearby laundromat to the basic cooking supplies. I would happily stay here again!

Loved staying here for my trip to Paris. The apartment is adorable with all the essentials and seemed quite spacious compared to other rental options at a similar price. The bed felt very comfortable, large and clean. Felt quiet and private with elegant French windows that open to the inner courtyard. The clothes rack with hangers was also helpful to arrange my stuff. Wood floor and beautiful ceiling beams lend a rustic-chic vibe. I didn’t do serious cooking but I was able to have a couple friends over for wine and cheese which I stored in the fridge and baguette which I warmed in the oven. Amazing convenient, central location on a fun pedestrian street, close to a main station and many attractions within walking distance. The host was great at communicating and making the checkin/checkout process easy. This is a great find and I highly recommend this place. Thank you!!

This was such an AMAZING place to stay. Xiaoling was an absolutely tremendous host. She waited for us to check in even when our flight was delayed by 40 minutes. She gave a very thorough explanation of the various amenities of the apartment upon arrival. The apartment itself was in a PERFECT location being a 2 minute walk from the metro and a 10 minute walk from the Louvre! The bed was very comfortable and shower was delightful and the main area was great for relaxing after a long day of walking. We couldn’t have asked for a better host or apartment. Would 100% absolutely recommend staying here if you are going to Paris!!!

This apt was really great and was very central to all the places we wanted to go while in town. The road itself is a pseudo pedestrian only street that has many lively cafes and restaurants. Luckily you can't hear any of this from the room itself- it is well insulated, facing inward which was really nice. Xiaoling was very kind and helped acquaint us with the space, and even left us some snacks and water! We found this very comfortable and would definitely recommend.

The apartment was very convenient - great location, close to Les Halles, walking distance to everything and a tons of cafes, pharmacies, shops right on our street.  Had dinner there at a different place every night. Felt very safe, and simple one route metro to the airport.  Apartment was simple and cute, had everything we needed and very efficient.  Nice to have the two small rooms, bed was very comfortable, kitchen was well equipped with dishes, silverware, basics for cooking breakfast.  The bathroom only had a tub with a handheld shower adapter, but we enjoyed the bath experience.  No complaints.  Great place - it is on the third floor with no elevator, so be prepared to walk up the stairs, but good exercise for us. No self check in, had to get a key fab for access but Xiaoling was there to receive us, explain everything and very nice! Great experience overall!
Sarah was easy to deal with upon arrival and the location is great but the flat wasn’t very clean and quite a few of the lights weren’t working.
Great place right around the corner from the Chatelet.  Very accommodating, and good communication regarding check-in/check-out

Lucas' place was great. Very Parisian feel. The location was wonderful. Exactly what we wanted. There is a grocery store next door. Lucas is a great host. I would definitely recommend his place to anyone. Great value for the price.
Nice quaint apartment / comfortable bed and quiet surroundings in the evening / helpful guide to navigate the neighborhood!

Excellent location right near a major station including direct access to CDG.  Spoilt for choice of restaurants.and very interesting historical area.

Allowed early check in when we really needed it.

Super responsive.

We would definitely recommend.

The location is very good and it is easy to get to everywhere. The rooms were clean and tidy, well equipped and with interesting interiors. The hosts  were very friendly and welcoming. It was my first visit to Paris and they gave me a very good impression. I hope to stay here again on my next visit.

this was an amazing stay in Paris. the location is right on a buzzing, high energy street with lots of food and drink options. when you come out you feel like you are right in the bustling heart of paris. Xiaoling helped us getting our bags up the three flights of stairs also and overall I'd highly recommend this to anyone visiting Paris.

Great spot which was amazingly close to the Rue Cler market. We could easily walk to the Eiffel Tower. Much mkre space than a lot of other rentals. The host had good communication and everything went smoothly during our stay.

Loved Heloïse's place, despite the 4th floor climb, it didn't feel like that much of a struggle at all. The flat is very nicely appointed, and had everything I needed, while location was excellent, as well! And Heloïse was very kind and flexible with both check-in and check-out times, which made it much much easier for me! Thank you very much, Heloïse!
Nice apartment in a very cosy area.
The apartment is small but very clean and stylish. The location is perfect since it’s close to the Tour Eiffel and subway stops. Héloïse is very kind and flexible with check-in an check-out times!
Wonderful location, great host, great communication!

The apartment is very well located in one of the fanciest neighborhood of Paris. It's sparkling clean, quiet and very stylish. If you're not afraid of climbing 4 small floors, Heloïse's place is a bargain!

Great location
But heater was not what people in North America or Asia are are used to.
No explanation on those and I got some what scary using those. 5th floor(inFrance 0 is 1st floor) without elevator.

But clean and nice apartment to stay.

Thankyou

Iv booked a weekend surprise for my girlfriend's birthday and we found Heloise appartment. it is indeed very close near the Eifeltower, metro and all the other shops which was perfect. The housr was very clean, on a good central location and all you need for a weekend of Paris. The host is very nice and she responds quickly. Since we came by bus we arrived earlier and checking in earlier was no problem. Thank you for your hospitality and till next time Heloise. We will come back for sure.

Great stay! Clean and homely apartment, very close to metro and the Eiffel Tower. Everything was in walk-in distance, so very handy. However, there was a lot of building work going on to the building, which resulted in a lot of noise during the stay and the no blinds/glazed window in the bathroom meant quite an invasion of privacy with builders right outside sometimes! It didn’t interrupt our stay too much, but it would have been nice to be pre-warned about the work before arriving. Héloïse was a great host and helpful before our trip :)
We enjoyed a weekend stay at this well equipped, charming, spacious and centrally located apartment. We will definitely book it again next time.
Everything was good. Héloïse very well organised check in, easy to contact with. Very reasonable for value.
Perfect !!!!👌🏻👌🏻👌🏻

la casa di Héloïse è fantastica
a pochi metri dalla tour Eiffel in un quartiere residenziale con una fermata della metro vicinissima
casa carina e confortevole con un letto molto comodo,cosa non scontata a Parigi 
ci trovate tutto il necessario per cucinare
comodissimo il check-in e check-out a tutte le ore
unico neo i lavori alla facciata del palazzo che creano un po di polvere sulle scale 
ma casa era pulitissima
Appartement tout confort, très bien situé et super propre. Je recommande.
conforme à mes attentes, appart très bien situé.

Very cozy appartment. Not too big, just right for two persons.
Cannot recommend this for more than 2 people though.
Nonetheless, we had a great time. Location is very good and close to the metro station (approx. 4 minute walk).

Hostess was very nice and left us with some good restaurant tips and things to see in Paris.

I would do it over @Mélanie

Mélanie's place is great! Nicely furnished and decorated, and very quiet due to it's location in the back building. It is close enough to the city centre to reach everything easily, and far enough to have some nice, not touristic bars and restaurants around. Mélanie is very organised, and even though we didn't get a chance to meet her, she informed us perfectly!

We enjoyed the stay, the flat was lovely!
Melanie helped us out with any issues we had, stayed connected and wrote us during our stay :) Could not be happier!
Sintija and Kaspars

L'appartement de Mélanie est super-- encore meilleur que les photos. Tout était très propre et il y avait une lumière très agréable. Le quartier est sympa et la proximité aux buttes des chaumont est vraiment cool. Mélanie était super-communicative et a même laissé une liste des restaurants et petits commerces. 

Melanie has a great apartment--even bigger and better than the photos show. The kitchen especially is fantastic. Everything was very clean and there was pleasant sunlight in the whole place. The neighborhood is great and the proximity to Buttes de Chaumont (a great park for running, picnics and people-watching) makes this apartment especially great. Melanie was very responsive and left a list (in French and English) of all the great neighborhood restaurant and shops.
Deuxième long séjour chez Mélanie et j'ai de nouveau passé un excellent moment dans ce charmant appartement, au calme et particulièrement bien équipé et confortable.

L'appartement de Mélanie est particulièrement agréable : un calme absolu grâce au fait que l'immeuble ne donne pas sur la rue mais sur un grand jardin/cour, très lumineux, vue dégagée et au coeur du quartier Jourdain/Belleville qui a un côté village à l'écart des flux touristiques.
Deux lignes de métro à proximité qui permettent de se rendre très rapidement dans le centre de Paris et à deux pas du parc des Buttes-Chaumont, l'un des plus beaux parc de la ville. 
Mélanie a été une hôte super accueillante, compréhensive et réactive, je n'hésiterai pas à relouer son logement.

PaS d'ascenseur
Pas de micro ondes 
Chambre sans table et lampe de chevet
PaS d'espace pour ranger son linge, aucun cintre ni penderie
Bon séjour. Mélanie était sympa et accueillante.

L'appartement de Mélanie est juste à côté du Parc des Buttes Chaumont, très bien situé : métro et bus à proximité.
On traverse un beau petit jardin pour accéder dans le logement très propre, bien agencée et très spacieux pour 2 personnes. J'avais déjà des amis à la maison et il me fallait un pied à terre pour 2 amies américaines de passage sur Paris pour une nuit. Elles ont été ravies de vivre dans vrai appart parisien . Mélanie est très arrangeante, elle s'est adaptée à nos contraintes horaires.
Je recommande vivement ce logement. Leïla
Logement très agréable et grand dans un quartier vivant ! On s'est senti comme chez nous!! Il nous a même conseillé des petits restos très sympathiques !!

Logement charmant et confortable. Bien situé au niveau du 20 éme arrondissement, quartier vivant et commerces à proximité.
Hugo a fait le nécessaire pour que notre séjour se déroule le mieux possible.
Très bon point de chute à Paris.

Hugo a été très arrangeant pour la remise des clés, après une réservation à la dernière minute, faisant preuve d'une organisation très professionnelle et redoublant d'attentions (une fiche explicative nous attendait, une prise de contact par sms en cas de problèmes et des chocolats à l'arrivée). 
L'appartement est très bien situé, conforme aux photos et à la description, et très propre. 
On reviendra avec plaisir, merci pour le séjour !
P.s : véritable appartement de sportifs, mon copain a été mort d'envie devant tout le matériel d'Hugo ;-)

Wonderful little apartment 20 minutes walk from the Eiffel Tower and close to many cafes, places to buy wine, open air markets and the metro. The apartment is adorable and perfect for a couple! Nice hot water for the shower, laundry, amenities, WiFi, French press coffee. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone!
It’s a beautiful cozy place ! Has everything you will need
Love this little space of Sadras! It was exactly as described. Small and in the heart of Paris, but perfect! Check-in was made easy and explained well. Everything we needed for a weekend in Paris.

Sadra was an excellent host with an excellent apartment! It was perfect space and location for my husband and I for our first visit to Paris. We walked everywhere from Sadra’s place, it was so close to everything! We also used metros in the case of a long day. We would stay here again if we ever make our way back to Paris!

Sadra's place was perfect.  It was within walking distance to everything from A to Z.  Especially the Eiffel Tower.  It was only 15 to 20 minutes walk.  Her place is perfect for couples or solo travelers looking to get a nice stay on a budget.

Sadra is a very friendly host and responds to messages very promptly. Her home is warmly decorated, with lots of touches in the right places and a sense of life. If there is a chance, I will come to live again. In the past two days, the house has some small water leaks from her neighbors, and I believe the problem will be solved soon.
Great accommodation! Wonderful atmosphere and tidy room!

Other guests indicated the place was clean. It was not. The floors were dirty, the refrigerator had rotted food and was packed with little room for a guest. The owner has a locked large walk in closet and stated she would empty the one near the bed. It too was filled with clothing.. only 2 dirty dusty shelves so I lived out of my suitcase. Even that was hard as her stuff was everywhere. Unlike the photo showing a nice open room, the space was filled with 2 broken chairs, a bicycle and stuff piled up every where. The wrong code for the lockbox was sent but luckily she quickly responded with the right one but after a long flight, this was annoying. The bedroom is actually in the floor below the ground floor which is a converted ’cave’. She has a dehumidifier running but it was noisy so if you turn it off at night, it gets damp.  She claims it was recently renovated but it appeared very run down and dingy.  Maybe I am too fussy in light of the other reviews and admit it was not expensive...still as I come often to Paris for work, you can find better. I suggest she perform a major declutter as there is stuff everywhere and no space for even one guest. The place needs small repairs everywhere...sagging shelves, leaking drain pipe by the toilet. Loose light switches and plugs of which many don’t work.
Great location! Perfect for a few days stay or longer.
I really like sadra’s place! Good and safe location! A place just like home with all the things you need!
Great location for traveling in Paris.

It was one amazing place. The apartment is with very good location. Near the apartment were thousands of shops and restaurants.  Metro and bus stations are also close so you can reach every point of the city quick the only thing you need to do is to walk 7min max. Thanks to the good location if you are visiting Paris for a short period of time you are not losing time for buses and metro for travelling around. Eiffel tower is a 20min walk from the apartment. About the apartment and the host. Easy, nice and really fast communication with the host. Sandra answer to all my questions. The apartment was very clean nice and cosy and comfortable. It was also really nice because in the apartment you can find a list of restaurants and things to do ( if you don't have any idea where to eat or which places to visit).  It was one amazing stay. 
Thank you :)
This is a lovely place to stay. The rooms are clean too. The location is also perfect and close to everything.
Great little nest
Perfect place, 5min away from a huge mall with shops and restaurants and cinema. Also near a lot of buses and the metro. The apartment is very pretty and cozy, felt like at home.

Nice and very clean appartement in great area. We enjoyed our stay very much. The communication was perfect and the arrival went very smooth thanks to the instructions from Sadra. The stairs to the bedroom is a bit small (and a bit scary in the dark) but if you walk down slowly it is ok.

Sandra's place is perfect for couples and friends who want to stay in the center of Paris: with the mentro and the RER stations nearby, you can reach every place you want in a few minutes! The apartment is really cool and has all the comforts, I really recomend it!

Great Apartment in the middle of Paris! It was not only clean but furnished lovely. The communication with Sadie worked fast and without complications. Nice and quiet area with Bars, Restaurants and Shops in short walking distance. Would recommend it to everyone!
nous avons passé un très bon séjour.

Konum olarak bizi tatmin etti, eyfel kulesine yürüme mesafesindeydi.
Evin genel temizliği iyiydi ancak bazı yerler tozluydu bu bizi rahatsız etti.
Son olarak, ev küçük ve sevimli ancak tuvaleti o kadar küçük ki bu bizi çok zorladı. Onun dışında Sadra ile iletişim çok hızlıydı. Bu deneyim için kendisine teşekkür ederiz.

This is a beautiful apartment - my husband and I really enjoyed our stay- Quiet, pretty and close to everything - I particularly enjoyed the loft 'feel' with high ceilings - and her wonderful book collection
Beautiful flat with amazing light. Very large and comfortable. Sarah was very helpful and accommodating. Easy access to buses and metro. Lots of restaurants and cafes within an easy walk.

The place is grandiose. Pristine. Very clean. The interior: intellectual and inspiring. Creative solutions, away from the mainstream suffocating us everywhere (thats why I prefer Airbnb). Still a rare find. Playfully decorated with many precious little pieces of art and rare publishings. It is much more beautiful than on the photos. A place I would wish to own. The house is very safe. The neighbourhood vibrant. The cleaning lady gave us a very warm welcome and Sarah tailored recommendations along our interests. All the insider tips what is happening right now you otherwise never know. It is a stay you want to leave a nice present or flowers behind. Thank you so much.

We thoroughly enjoyed our 10 days in this wonderful apartment. It was just perfect for the two of us. It is spacious, well equipped and tastefully decorated. The big window panes in combination with the double-height ceiling fill the space with light and make you feel connected to the city (if you are sensitive to light during nighttime, just bring a sleeping mask ;.) ). The location is colourful and very convenient in terms of bars, restaurants, shopping and especially public transport. Last but not least: the communication with Sarah was always smooth and welcoming - we would love to come back asap!

Sarah's place felt very at home, a super cozy but spacious interior. It was easy to move around the kitchen and have a good time cooking but also taking short breaks to sit on the comfy couch.

The area is easily accessible and has useful Metro stations close by, with lots of marketstalls and supermarkets for groceries. Sarah also provided good recommendations in the area for drinks in the evening and coffee in the morning
We loved Sarah's place - the location is fantastic and super lively, plus the space is really cool! Perfect for the 2 of us, we'd definitely stay here again. thank you!

Incredible space, I highly recommend. I love this neighborhood and the apartment was beyond my expectations. Sarah was super communicative and helpful with everything. The loft/duplex is even better in person than in photos. The bathroom is also really nice. It's one of the nicest places I've had the pleasure to stay in and I've lived all across town over the past 10 years. I don't think I've seen a cooler or unique place in paris ! Thanks Sarah :)

Sarah's apartment is a very large mezzanine apartment with plenty of natural light.
It is in a very vibrant part of town with live bands playing out in the street on the Friday and Saturday nights when I was there which may not be everyone's cup of tea. The flat is fairly quiet due to the double glazed windows. 
It has some rough edges, dishwasher not working, towel rail broken but all in all it is a well equipped, eclectically furnished apartment that I enjoyed staying at very much.
Sarah répond rapidement. elle est aussi flexible dans les heures d'arrivées. Je suis très contentt de ce séjour.

Le logement est très bien, très original et spacieux mais un Système de rideau ou autre serait très efficace pour passer une nuit complète car la lumière du jour éblouit dès les premières lueur.du jour.
Loft agréable à vivre !
Clémence is so kind and helpful, she one of the best hostess I meet. The apartment is cute and cosy, I felt safe and at home. Really recommend this place.

Clemence's apartment was very cool, really close to the metro in Belleville. 
Communication with her was great and really fast. She let us do a late checkout, very appreciated. the apartment overlooks a very quiet internal courtyard. the house is a bit warm, especially the mezzanine where you sleep, the mattress is on the floor and can be comfier. the noise of the subway is a little bit bothersome but you will use to it very soon.

Wir haben uns in dem kleinen kuscheligen Nest sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Lage war perfekt, direkt an der Metro Station Bellleville. Von dem Treiben auf der Hauptstraße bekommt man in der Wohnung gar nichts mit. Clemence war sehr gastfreundlich und kam uns beim check-out sehr entgegen. Wir würden jeder Zeit wieder kommen. Liebe Grüße!!

Calme, propre, chaleureux avec ses nombreuses plantes l'appartement de Clémence correspond tout a fait sa description.
Clémence était absente lors de mon arrivée mais sa soeur m'attendait, aucun problème .
Très bonne adresse pour un séjour "bellevillois".

Cet appartement est chic, confortable et la localisation est parfaite! Clémence était très agréable à gérer vers mon arrivée, encore quand j'étais en rétard. Merci encore pour le bon séjour!  // This apartment is chic, comfortable and the location is perfect! Clémence was really pleasant to deal with towards my arrival, even when I was running late. Thanks again for the great stay!

Super séjour chez Clémence : le studio est bien situé en plein Belleville, quartier mixte et animé, plein de chouettes petits bars et restos alentours, station de métro au pied de l'immeuble. Le studio est propre, lumineux,  donne sur la cour (donc au calme) avec une déco cozy et personnelle, la literie très confortable et la petite cuisine fonctionnelle, tout est dispo pour se faire à manger. Communication super facile avec Clémence qui nous a gentiment accueillis à notre arrivée. Bref, on s'est sentis comme à la maison et on reviendra !
Super expérience dans un bel appartement bien situé et tout à fait conforme aux photos. Marianne et Kevin ont été très sympas et très réactifs.

The apartment is perfect for one person or a couple traveling, very clean, cozy, and nice view.  Bogdan's brother Viktor was very helpful and accommodating,  we arrived earlier than check in and was happy to let us in earlier and gave us tips for restaurants/bars in the area. Full disclosure though, the apartment is at a fifth floor walk up, so you will get your exercise.

HOST
Ho soggiornato tre giorni con la mia ragazza, siamo stati accolti molto bene, l'host parla italiano, è stato puntualisimo sia al check-in sia al check-out, veloce e completo nelle risposte prima del check-in.

APPARTAMENTO
La casa è bellissima e accogliente ha un salottino con cucinino e una camera da letto abbastanza grande  con un balcone che affaccia sul corso e la vista è davvero bella.
L' appartamento si trova all'ultimo piano di uno stabile signorile situato in una a zona tranquilla, comoda e bella da girare.
C'è tutto l' essenziale, asciugamani, caffè/the, asciugacapelli, fornetto, fornelli, posate, piatto e pentole.
Abbiamo trovato la casa davvero pulita e il bagno molto profumato.
Pur essendo su un corso, con le finestre chiuse non si sente nessun rumore.
Il riscaldamento è buono (se messo al max è anche troppo)

TRASPORTO PUBBLICO
È ben servita dai mezzi pubblici, ai piedi dell'immobile ci sono le linee bus 21 e 27 con le quali si può arrivare direttamente all' Opéra(15mn), Louvre(10mn), Gare st Lazare(20mn).
Per prendere la metro o la RER basta camminare 10 min oppure 3 minuti con   il  bus 21 o 27 fino a Luxembourg, ma è più comodo spostarsi con i bus (a meno che non sia necessario attraversare tutta la città, a quel punto la RER e metro sono più veloci)

Facilmente accessibile dalla stazione Gare de lyon in 15mn (bus 93+27)
Inoltre a piedi dell'immobile è presente la stazione del Car sharing Autolib e la stazione del bike sharing Velib.

CONCLUSIONI: l' accoglienza è stata ottima, l' appartamento è perfetto per le coppie, accogliente, pulito e comodo ai servizi, in una zona tranquilla non degradata, senza delinquenza o persone poco raccomandabili.
Inoltre a pochi metri sono presenti mini market aperti anche di notte.
Consiglio vivamente l' appartamento di Bogdan!

Es un piso con una ubicación  ideal a su cercanía al panteón y a la catedral de Notredam. Limpio y ordenado, Nuestro anfitrión  Bogdan estuvo todo el tiempo pendiente para lo que pudiéramos necesitar.  Muy recomendado...

The pictures and descriptions are true to text. Traveling through Paris this area was our absolute favorite. We fell in love with the Montmartre area. Walking around and getting lost in that area was the best decision my husband and I made. But most notable, we had such a great interaction with Ugo, pre-travel, while we were there, and after we left. If you haven’t already, hit him up with recs! You won’t be disappointed!
Really great location. Can easily get to all the best of paris from this place. Montmartre is one of the best neighborhoods in Paris.
Lovely place. Great location. Faces a quiet courtyard that shields you from the noise of the city. Slept like a baby.

Thanks for the excellent stay Ugo! Your place was perfect for my wife and my romantic 3 day getaway to Paris. 
We loved the location at the foot of the hills of Montmartre, and your place was very inviting and comfortable for our stay. Kassaundra was wonderful in giving us great advice for touring around the local area. We absolutely loved the advice to walk south from your place to get great fresh squeezed juices and tasty food, and to walk north up the hill to check out the amazing Sacre C’oeur and the Place du Tertre! These are both an absolute MUST see and scream what I would guess is quintessential Paris! 
We absolutely loved our stay at your place. Thank you for informing us in advance that most buildings in Paris don’t have an elevator. We got used to it quite quickly given the many stairs that we climbed in the area around Montmartre and the monuments of Paris in general:) 
5 STARS for your place, your hosting, and your location, and 10 Stars for Paris! If only all the smokers would move away:) That was our only issue with Paris, but this has zero to do with your place. Just a fact about Paris and I guess it gives it even more unique charm. 
Thanks again Ugo for a wonderful romantic stay in Paris.

Nice apartment in a great location. Ugo is the nicest host you could have. He would go the extra mile to help you.He had to change his schedule to let us check in early and helped carrying our luggage upstairs. 
Thank you Ugo!

This is a lovely apartment in one of the coolest areas of Paris. Pigalle and Montmartre are fantastic! Ugo was a gracious host and was extremely helpful upon our arrival. We came with an 11 month old and a lot of baggage and Ugo carried it up to the apartment for us. He was kind, accommodating and helpful! This is a great place to stay! It’s quiet and centrally located. I highly recommend it!

Great space, ample room for 2 people, plenty of room if there was even 4 people. Grocery store across the street for anything you may need, plenty of cafe's and bakeries around the corner, souvenir shops literally 2 doors down. Great space overall.
Great location, beautiful apartment.  Will definitely stay here again

This is a great location in a very lively area.  The Metro is very close, making getting around very easy. The apartment was clean, the bed was comfy, and the kitchen was well equipped (but who would eat in with all the French cafes around?).

Ugo was wonderfully responsive and was an excellent host. His apartment was perfect for us and was absolutely charming. We loved the neighborhood and loved how close we were to public transit. Would definitely recommend this spot!

Perfect location, so easy to the metro, cafes, grocery store. We stayed with our very mobile 11 month old and I had no concerns about her getting hurt.  Very clean, quiet place. Ugo is a gracious host, great with communication and flexible for us airline employees who fly standby and don’t have firm plans until 12hrs before. We will definitely try to stay here again on our next visit.

Ugo has a beautiful place available, its close to some very beautiful sights and restaurants. I would highly recommend to any tourist looking to explore Paris. I would also highly recommend visiting the close-by basilica for an amazing view of Paris.

This is a lovely Parisienne apartment with easy access to the metro and a nice walkable climb to Sacre Coeur. Plenty of good eating spots nearby. Our host, Ugo, was terrific, very accessible, and checked in with us several times to ensure we were doing well. After a long day of discovering Paris we were always happy to retreat here to relax. Beds were great; lots of water pressure; place was clean and tidy; kitchen was complete. Nice experience.

The apartment was in a great location and really convenient for getting around! Our host, Ugo, was really flexible with check-in/check-out times, provided great tips for the area, and was available whenever we had questions. We will definitely check to see if this space is available again in the future. Thanks Ugo!

This is a full-featured apartment, more than we really needed for our short stay, but well located.  One of the quietest places we have stayed, despite being on the same block as some nightclubs!  An advantage of overlooking an enclosed courtyard.

The place was in a great location. Near a train station so we rode the train to everywhere we needed to go. The place was clean and overall a large space. Ugo was so nice and welcoming! If I was ever in Paris again, we would definitely stay here. The building was quiet and clean. He was even nice enough to have beverages and snacks in the kitchen. There was some biscuits there that were actually pretty delicious! Thank you Ugo!

I have stayed at many AirBnB places, and I can say Ugo is by far the best accommodating host. He is generous, quick to respond, always on-site to help, flexible, and a great hospitable host. I 100% recommend anyone to book Hugo’s place. It’s in a great location, within walking distance to many great shops and restaurants in Montmartre, and right across the street from a big supermarket for any last minute necessities you’ll need. It was cold in Paris during my stay, but Hugo brought an extra heater for me. From check-in to check-out he was a fantastic host and I could not be any less satisfied with y stay. Thanks again, Ugo!

Ugo's apartment looked exactly like the photos. He was a gracious host--check-in and check-out easy, lots of local tips, and he even provided snacks and extra towels. The location was very convenient: close to the metro, grocery store across the street, and very lively surrounding nightlife with an easy walk to Montmartre. I would recommend a stay at this listing!

I would give Ugo 6 stars if I could! His apartment was spotlessly clean, comfortable and central. He made check-in and check-out very easy, and sent us a list of his favorite places in the area. Highly recommended!

The apartment was comfortable, clean, and extremely well located - walking distance from the Gare du Nord, several minutes to the metro, and in the middle of many shops and restaurants. Check in was easy. Ugo was easy to communicate with and helpful. Bed was comfortable and the bathroom small and efficient with a nice shower. We would definitely stay here again.

Highly recommend this apartment! Cassandre was great by providing many local recommendations (including an amazing bakery on her block) and very convenient self check in/out. The apartment itself has an authentic Parisian feel and was very clean and comfortable. It is within walking distance to the main train station as well as to many top sights in Paris.

Wonderful, clean and well located apartment in an area with lots of cafés and bars, and walking distance to lots of other places. The rooms in the apartment were all good sizes, and well kept and decorated!

Cassandre is a very charming girl and an excellent host.
The flat is so cute, cozy and clean! The location is so good because it has many comunications whit underground and it is in the heart of Montmartre so you can feel like a really parisian while you are there. the decorations and the flat's style help to feel it too.
At finally we are so happy with our experience and I recommend it to everyone.
Appartement très agréable et bien situé. Cassandre était très réactive et devançait nos questions. Parfait pour un séjour à Paris.
Lara’s apartment is great- only 20 mins to the centre of town and super cool and comfortable. Lara was a very helpful and communicative host, and I would highly recommend this listing.

Yuka and her partner did a great job with communication and helping us get access with the air bnb. The location great with many options to eat, drink and buy specialty items. Plus her location was near a metro stop. Totally recommend everyone to book with Yuka.
Such a lovely and cozy place! It’s charming, it has everything, it has that Parisian vibes, and its location is everything!! Highly recommend this amazing place.
Appartement Spacieux ! Hôte très accueillant et réponse rapide, à deux pas du métro l'emplacement est magique! Je recommande ce chaleureux logement !!!
Soraya est très réactive et tout etait vraiment bien indiqués . Elle etait disponible . Je recommande vivement son logement très bien situé !

Ce fut un séjour plus que parfait. Nous avons eu droit à un super accueil de Soraya, qui fut adorable et disponible, et nous a fourni toutes les informations demandées et de façon très réactive. L'appartement est très sympa, bien décoré, bien placé et bien équipé. Nous y retournerons avec plaisir, n'hésitez pas vous aussi ! Merci mille fois Soraya.

Nicolas est très agréable et m'a remis les clés la veille de ma venue car il partait en week-end. L'appartement est spacieux, agréable et propre. La cuisine est bien équipée, et le lit confortable. Le quartier est super, il y a plein de petits restaurants et bars aux alentours, c'est un plaisir! Merci encore et à bientôt peut-être!
Appartement aménagé avec beaucoup de goût

Grand appartement dans un quartier typique parisien a cinq minutes des animations de la Place de Clichy 
Un hôte aimable disponible et ayant aménagé son appartement avec goût . Propre
Très bon séjour et excellent accueil ! Merci !

Do not hesitate to book this apartment. It’s exactly as it looks in the photos. My wife and I were especially impressed with the view from the balcony. There is an elevator in the building but it’s a little small.

Alexis is a great host. He personally met us and gave us a quick tour of the apartment. He also gave us some suggestions on places to eat. 

The apartment itself is very spacious and we felt right at home after a long day of sightseeing. A big plus was the washer. There is no dryer but there is a rack in the bathroom to hang your clothes to dry. 

There’s three metro stations near the apartment that will get you to anywhere that you want to go to while you visit Paris. There’s also a grocery store and a pharmacy close by. 

Want to shop and eat like a local, Rue des Martyrs and Rue de Abbesses are very near. 
If you want to visit Sacre Cœur, it’s about two blocks up the hill behind the apartment. 

If we return to Paris we will definitely see if this apartment is available.

Alexis' place made us feel right at home. It was large, comfortable, and with a great view. Easily accessible to the metro and you can also walk up the hill to the Montmartre restaurants. The only inconvenience was the shower/tub since it's not enclosed but that's clearly shown in the images and you learn to deal with it after one or two uses. I would definitely stay here again!

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Alexis’ place. The apartment is charming and very Parisian, and the overwhelming plus is the view, simply gorgeous, awesome.  Alexis was very dependable and I would not hesitate to return for another visit next time I’m in Paris.

I really can't say enough good things about the stay at Alexis'. The apartment was better than described and with a great bonus of being in a gated community. The check in was very smooth. We were a tad late getting in and the hosts rep stayed longer to allow us entry. 
Old world charm, decorated lovely, and the view is unlike any you'll get for the cost of a night. 
The neighborhood is our favorite in all of Paris. We had plans in other parts of the city and ended up cancelling some of them because we enjoyed our surroundings so much. 
Alexis is a great host and exceptionally accommodating. Do not hesitate to punch the ticket for this reservation.

Due to the lack of reviews, I almost hesitated to rent the flat for a night in paris. What a mistake it would have been, the flat is absolutely perfect for a couple wishing to visit paris. 
Located in one of the liveliest area of the city, the flat is still very quiet (gated residence, ensuring quietness and security). The nice ensuite room, (large bed, nice furniture) is quite large for Paris and the view is really astonishing. I would definitely recommend the flat for any visitors be it a long or a short stay (special recommendation for couples though...)
Enjoy!

Ps: Thanks Alexis for the help and the gently prepared welcome bottle!

Eine super Unterkunft in einer tollen Lage. Der Blick über Paris war fantastisch und wir haben sehr viel Zeit auf dem Balkon verbracht. Die Wohnung ist sehr hübsch und liebevoll eingerichtet und wir haben uns schnell sehr wohl gefühlt. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Bäckereien, die Metro und Restaurants sind zu Fuß schnell zu erreichen.  Alexis ist ein toller Gastgeber, die Kommunikation auf englisch und französisch war einfach und sehr angenehm. Wenn sich die Möglichkeit ergibt, kommen wir gerne wieder!!! Vielen Dank.
El piso está genial, la ubicación es buenísima, el piso está muy cuidado y es precioso. Tiene unas vistas ideales. Alexis, lo hace todo mucho más fácil.

Superbe appartement idéalement situé à côté de Pigalle (a deux pas de la place mais parfaitement calme), avec une vue imprenable sur tout Paris. Alexis a été très réactif et l’arrivée/départ se sont passé du mieux possible. Je recommande cet appartement à n’importe qui venant à paris que ce soit en couple, entre amis ou pour le travail. Merci pour tout Alexis !

Laura was an amazing host! She was very accommodating from the moment we booked the reservation. Our train arrived late into Paris and she was happy to meet us to show us around and give us the key well into the night. 

The apartment was just as pictured. It was in a very nice, safe building and had a lift to get our luggage in easily.  The location was superb! Just steps from the Saint-Lazare train station made taking public transportation both around the city and out for a day trip to Giverny very seamless. 

I would absolutely recommend this apartment and Laura as a host. I hope I have the chance to be a repeat guest!

The stay in this appartment is perfect. Everything is showed as photos and location is 4min by walk to Saint Lazare (line 3/9/14 etc). Safe neighborhood and easy access to commerial area (printemps and galary lafayette) and one supermarket just nearby. Also the owner is a very kind person. Highly recommended.

We booked Laura's apartment for a long weekend in Paris.  The apartment was just as in the pictures, clean and lovely.  Laura was there to greet us and went out of her way to show us a place to park our car.  The location is superb - just next to the metro, cafes and walking distance to so many of Paris' must see sites.  I would highly recommend Laura's apartment for your stay in Paris.

Bonsoir, avons été ravis de séjourner chez Laura. Appartement clean et très bien situé avec tout le confort nécessaire pour un séjour agréable. Hôte sympathique et arrangeante... 
Merci et on y reviendra très certainement...
Bernard et Nathalie.

Appartement idéalement situe dans un très bel immeuble. L emplacement est parfait pour visiter et profiter de Paris. 
Accueil chaleureux et sincère de la part de Laura, nous y reviendrons sans hésitations !
Merci Clement pour t'adapter au changement de  mon horaire d'arrive. Dû a la greve, mon train a ete annulle et j'ai dû changer mes plans. Tres beau appartement et bien equippé. Metro a 1mn. Rue calme

Julie’s flat is clean, charming, and cozy. She is a superb host— very easy to get ahold of and flexible with our changing schedule. Great value in a fun neighborhood. One thing to note is that she is at the top of several narrow flights of stairs with no lift. It is absolutely not a big deal, but if you have big, heavy luggage or a disability it might be difficult. We absolutely recommend staying here, and would do so again!

We really enjoyed our stay at Julie's apartment. The location is excellent being close to the metro and also some fantastic boulangeries! Julie and her co-host Julie were both lovely and easy to contact. The apartment itself is exactly as described and a wonderful place to use a base for exploring Paris.  The handwritten note welcoming us to the apartment was a lovely touch :)

L’appartement est conforme à l’annonce, fonctionnel et très bien situé, transport à proximité. 
J’ai passé un très agréable séjour et je recommande

La description de Julie est tout a fait juste.J'ajoute que l'appartement est très lumineux,le matelas super,la rue calme..bref j'y ai dormi comme un bébé!!Le quartier de Plaisance porte bien son nom!!A découvrir
Logement très confortable et très bien situé, commodités proches du logement.
Lucien est un hôte exceptionnel, très réactif, il a m'a accueilli chez lui comme un ami. La bise à Mr Mao.

Very nice apartment, spacious, perfect for a couple or friends. 
Everything works very well. Very close to the metro stop. The area is very peaceful. 
I would recommend.
很好 很方便
An amazing place, charming and with all modern conveniences working at top form. Perfect.

If you have the chance to stay in this stylish French apartment do not hesitate.  Everything about this apartment listing is great. The location is incredible.  The Montmarte area is buzzing with life and art.  The apartment itself is clean, nicely decorated, as pictured, comfortable, and easy to access.  I really enjoyed my stay here along with my partner.  Perfect for two people.  Don’t hesitate and rent this place.  It’s the best. The host is very accommodating and easy to communicate with.  Very nice and helpful host.  Thank you.
Great place to stay, close to great shops and cafes.  also a quick walk to the metro.  A bit of foot traffic from the apartments above with some thin walls makes for a city living experience.

This is a very special place in an incredible location. The space is stylish, beautifully furnished with excellent amenities provided. Benoit is an exceptional host: thoughtful, kind and extremely efficient. This area of Montmartre offers easy access to the Sacré Coeur and all the tourist attractions uphill, as well as the magical cobbled streets, small shops, galleries and trendy restaurants downhill and along Abbesses. I would love to come back :-) Mille merci Cher Benoit
Charmant et très romantique.

UN COUP DE COEUR! <3
Mon copain et moi avons séjourné une semaine dans le magnifique appartement rénové avec soin et avec goût par Benoît. Ce dernier nous a accueilli avec chaleur (p. ex. grâce à de petites attentions) et a été très généreux en matière d'informations et de conseils (p. ex. sur l'appartement et le quartier) afin que nous puissions bien profiter de notre visite. L'appartement est encore plus grand que les photos peuvent le suggérer. Il est situé idéalement entre le Sacré-Coeur (accessible par les marches et le funiculaire en moins d'une minute à pied) et la station de Métro des Abbesses (la plus profonde et magnifique de Paris). Le quartier est habité par des locaux et visité par des touristes. C'est le quartier idéal pour se poser après une visite des différents arrondissements de Paris. L'appartement est impeccablement propre, bien aménagé et fonctionnel. Tous les électroménagers s'y trouvent: frigo, four, plaque, lave-vaisselle, laveuse. Vous pourrez donc vous imaginer y vivre à long terme... comme nous! Benoît, si jamais tu décides de vendre, écris-nous ;)

Primeiro o apartamento fica numa das localizações em Paris que eu particularmente mais gosto.
Muito Próxima da Sacre Coeur, facílimo chegar pelo metro Avenrs, não tem que caminhar nada.
Apartamento recém reformado, muito limpo, ambiente agradável, em andar térreo, o que pra quem tem dificuldades de locomoção é uma vantagem, apesar de se localizar próximo de um famoso ponto turístico a vizinhança é calma e tranquila.
A hospitalidade do anfitrião fez toda a diferença, ele nos esperou, havia água e muitas frutas disponíveis o que foi excelente após um voo de 12 horas!! 
Estrutura do apartamento foi impecável !! Roupas de cama limpas, cama super macia, chuveiro perfeito, cozinha impecável e equipada.
O anfitrião durante a estadia sempre se preocupava conosco e mandava mensagens frequentes para perguntar se precisa de algo ou para oferecer ajuda!!
Certamente virou minha “casa” em Paris...

This flat is a gem in the trendy, vibrant neighborhood of Montmartre. I wasn’t sure what to expect as a first time visitor to Paris, but Sumer’s flat did not disappoint!  

The flat can be described as a studio apartment that is separated into bedroom and living room areas by a divider, and with a spacious kitchen that contains a dishwasher and washer machine.  I appreciated the amenities offered, including standard things e.g. Wi-Fi but also a Nespresso machine and hairdryer.  And the elevator, which is unusual for an older building.  I also appreciated the host’s flexibility in allowing me to check in early, which meant that I could rest a bit after a redeye flight.

Thank you so much for our wonderful stay at you flat. Everything was so updated and great. You were so responsive to all our requests. The place was so close to Metro line 4. We were able too do everything we wanted. Thank you again!

Erika

I knew the area well and this was exactly where I wanted to be. Great location, near convenient metro stop, very cool neighborhood with lots to do, and couldn’t have asked for a better flat. It’s just like the pictures. Clean, gorgeous view, completely renovated and well appointed. I will recommend this to anybody I know looking for a place in Paris! And Sumer was fantastic, accommodated my desired checkin time and was available by text for any questions.

Sumer was very helpful answering all my questions and giving me some tips for my stay.

The apartment is very clean and with everything you need for your stay.

Definitely would recommend and will come back.
Thanks Sumer for being a lovely host ! Great appartement in a nice neighborhood. Good place to stay !
The apartment was great and Sumer was very helpful when we had questions. Would not hesitate to stay again!
Booked for an employee, great feedback from their stay. 10/10
Perfect location near Montmartre, stylish and clean apartment. I recommend sumer’s place for a weekend in Paris as for a Business trip.
The apartment is exactly like the pictures - clean, nicely decorated with a lovely view. Sumer was a great host, very responsive and accomodating. We had a great stay here, thank you!

L’alloggio di Sumer é davvero confortevole. C’é tutto ciò che occorre. In quanto italiani abbiamo apprezzato molto la macchinetta del caffè espresso. Si può godere di un’ottima vista sui tetti di Parigi. É comodo alla fermata della metro. Sumer é stato gentile, disponibile e molto veloce nell’interazione. Grazie!

Superbe séjour passé avec ma fille dans cet appartement 
Bien placé (métro-restaurants) 
Hôte disponible et réactif

Le logement est très cosy, bien décoré, facile d'accès.
L'hôte est disponible rapidement si problème
Je recommande
Logement tout confort, calme et bien localisé. Summer est accessible et de bon conseil pour les restaurants. On reviendra !

Accueil super chaleureux, merci.
Petit cocon adorable dans un chouette quartier au dessus des toits avec une vue sur la cime des arbres et Paris. Calme...juste parfait. Merci pour tout Sumer, on reviendra. 
Géraldine et Tanguy 💖

Super séjour de 4 jours chez Sumer. L'endroit est super bien placé et parfaitement fidèle au descriptif. Sumer est très accueillant et très souple sur le check in check out et communique avec beaucoup de reactivité. Il n'a pas hésité à aller acheter un ventilateur le jour de mon arrivée pour compenser la vague de chaleur ! L'appartement est très cosy, tout neuf, bien équipé et rénové avec beaucoup de goût. Café, bouteilles d'eau fraiches et quelques produits de 1ere necessité sont proposés. Le quartier est très agréable avec bus et métro très proches, des commerçants, cafés, restaus. Une tres bonne experience, merci ! Je reviendrai avec plaisir.

L'appartement est vraiment fabuleux et cosy. La vue surplombant les arbres est très agréable, le quartier regorge de petites adresses. Sumer est un hôte très cordial et à l'écoute. N'hésitez pas une seconde !

Wow! We absolutely loved our stay at Chloe’s flat. The photos do no justice to how beautiful & inspiring the space is. It was a perfect spot for 2 people. The bed is comfy, the bathroom is more spacious than it looks in the photos, and the living room is gorgeous (the wood floors! the high ceilings! the mood lighting!). The location is fantastic; a quick walk to the metro station, and lots to do nearby. Chloe is a wonderful host - very responsive, helpful, and sweet. We hope to stay in Chloe’s flat again the next time we’re in Paris!
Chloe's place was great! Clean, high ceilings, well decorated, lots of light, good location, responsive host.

Chloe’s place is beautiful, comfortable, and perfectly situated in the 11th on the same block as the metro and within walking distance of anything central. Cool and thoughtfully designed with all the essentials—and a charming terrace. I spent a wonderful week here for work  travel and hope to return in the future! Highly recommend.
Fantastic apartment in a great location, conveniently situated and supplied with all the amenities you need. Would highly recommend !

Chloe’s place is even better looking in person with lots of cool decor. It was warm and cozy in late December. The location is perfect and the wifi worked great. I did not want to leave! Thank you Chloe!
This place is exactly as listed, and Chloe's quick and helpful responses were very much appreciated!  Highly recommend!
Chloe's apartment is fantastic! -- clean, quiet, spacious, and really well-equipped. The host herself was accommodating about check-in, and very communicative throughout my whole stay.

My stay at Chloe's was wonderful. Very close to the metro and it was super convenient. I've been to Paris for many times but this is the best location I've ever stayed so far.
The apt was so clean and big. The mattress was super comfortable. There are washer and dish washer which made my long stay super pleasant. She was very good at communicating and I would love to stay there again!!
Amazing apartment! Very well located, quiet, spacious, with all the amenities needed, and great great host!

Great appartement! Very large living room with plenty of natural light and a nice balcony. Awesome location, literally 20 feet from Metro station, with lots of bars restaurants and shops all around. Super easy communication with Chloé, even if we didn’t meet as her friendly neighbor helped with check-in. I highly recommend!

Chloe’s apartment is amazing, it’s much bigger than it looks in the photos and very very cosy and stylish. I fell in love with this area of 11th district. There’s a nice yoga centre and supermarket and a lot of little cafes in two steps. A very french building with good neighbours. I was very very happy living there. Thank you Chloe and Parmentier:)

Very comfortable and stylish flat, you quickly feel at home. Things are well organised, it’s a nice place to spend time home and relax. You get a lot of light in the afternoon and can even get a tan on the sunny balcony (better wear earplugs though as a bit noisy). Room is big and on a quiet road. The neighbourhood is also very friendly, supermarkets and many shops nearby, canal 10minutes walk. A very lovely stay :)

Chloe’s flat is clean and spacious, perfectly located in a lively and vibrant area of the 11th arrondissement of Paris, Oberkampf, walking distance from République, Canal Saint Martin and Belleville. Furniture is modern and comfy, the flat is pleasant to stay in, with all desirable amenities, reliable wifi, kitchen and bathroom with good water pressure. Chloe was easy to reach for checkin/out info. I had a great stay and will definitely come back if available!
Wonderful place nearby metro station.

I spent 4 nights at Chloe’s place. The description provided does not do justice. I found the place well kept, clean and highly functional yet trendy and with nice touches. Chloe maintained regular communication with me before my arrival and was kindly flexible in waiting for me as I arrived later than anticipated. The flat is located in a very central location, with restaurants, cafes and supermarkets all at your doorstep. The metro is just around the corner. Good for value and I highly recommend this flat.
The flat is super! Bright, clean and nicely decorated. Comfy bed and good pressure in the shower. We had a lovely stay and hope to return. Merci beacoup!!!!
Great flat, close to good restaurants and beautiful Saint Martin canal. Chloe was very helpful and quick to respond to any queries.
It was a really great experience. Great location and everything worked perfectly. Chloe was super attentive and friendly since from the first messages. I highly recommend it.

Chloé's flat is very nice, perfect size, very confortable and well-equipped for a short stay in Paris. The location is very good, close to Bastille and Republique, with the metro station almost at the doorstep. The communication was easy and there was no problem for the check-in. I recommend it !

We had a wonderful stay at Chloe's apartment. It's a wonderful space to relax in, and such a great location for exploring different areas in Paris. We also loved the bars & restaurants that were on our doorstep. A great find, would love to stay again!

We stayed in Adèles and Damiens apartment for four days and enjoyed it very much. It's a well equipped, very comfortable and clean apartment, which is individually furnished with an artistic flair. The location is great, very close to gare du nord and other metro stations. The neighbourhood is very agreeable and quite. It’s only a short walk to Montmartre. Communication with Adèle was very uncomplicated and everything was well organized. We would highly recommend this apartment and would like to come back.

Appart, hôtes et localisation hyper agréables !
Lieu de séjour recommandé !

We adored Sarah and Mathieu’s apartment! The space had the perfect Parisian charm (even a small balcony) and was in an ideal location in the 10e - a few streets away from several metro lines and walking distance to many major sights. We also really appreciated the amenities such as full kitchen and washing machine. Sarah and Mathieu were great hosts - easy to contact, simple check-in, and tons of great local tips. A home away from home, definitely recommended!
We're very jealeous of Mathieu's & Sarah' s apartment. We loved every minute we spent there! :))  Great Host.  Great location!  Highly recommended!!!
Super sejour ! Amazing place!

We absolutely loved this apartment. It is spacious and well-equipped and the location is excellent. Sarah and Mathieu were great hosts. They were clear about how to check-in and were available for anything we needed. Cannot recommend it too strongly. One of our best AirBNB experiences.

I highly recommend Sarah and Mathieu's apartment and them as hosts. They were super accommodating for a late arrival and then when my plans changed at the last minute. The apartment is amazing- huge by Parisian standards and you can tell they've put a lot of love into it. Fab neighbourhood too!
I stayed already in some places in Pris b
One of the most pleasant flat I've visited in paris. Lovely place, very clean. Sarah and Mathieu are easy to communicate. I recommend
Beautiful apartment, superb location (in a cool and not-so-touristy area) and very kind/helpful hosts. Made for a great weekend in Paris!

I really enjoyed my stay at Sarah's apartment. She was very hospitable and responded quickly to my questions.
The apartment was clean and in a nice neighborhood. The photos give a correct impression of the apartment: stylish and cosy. I can highly recommend this place!

Un grand merci à Sarah et Mathieu. Leur gentillesse et la qualité de l’appartement (spacieux, propre, aménagé avec goût et bien équipé) ont fait de mon séjour à Paris un excellent moment. La situation de l’appartement est parfaite, proche des transports et des commerces, et très centrale. J’y retournerai avec plaisir.

Appartement très agréable lumineux et propre dans un quartier vivant, à deux pas du métro. Sarah et Mathieu sont très réactifs. Nous n’avons pas eu la chance de les rencontrer mais ils ont tout fait pour que notre séjour se passe pour le mieux. Je recommande grandement, et pense le garder pour mes prochains déplacements sur Paris.

Wat een mooie ervaring. Het begon al met het goede contact met Mathieu. Op alle vragen kreeg ik antwoorden. Bij aankomst werden we heel vriendelijk ontvangen door Sarah en Mathieu. En we werden direct verliefd op het appartement!!! Prachtig ingericht, netjes en schoon. Voor ons op een top locatie in het 10e arrondissement, op een paar minuten loopafstand van het Canal st Martin. We komen hier zeker nog terug....
A great place to stay to get an authentic Parisian loft apartment experience.
Charming apartment in an amazing location. We had such  a great stay!
Lovely apartment, situated in an ideal location. Host was quick to respond and communication was clear, despite our last minute booking.
The perfect location, the perfect place to stay in Paris.

Our stay in Paris was perfect. 

The host was very sympathetic and gentle, he provide us with all information that we needed.  

Jan's appartment is perfectly located. The flat is very cosy and clean but the most important, you can enjoy the view of Paris from the balony.

We'll come back for sure!

I stayed at Yann's flat for 5 nights to visit some friends in Paris. Nicolas, was the main point of contact. He was quick to reply and easy to communicate with. Nicolas was very helpful when I suddenly extended my trip. He quickly made the necessary arrangements and was very accommodating to my change of plans. 

The apartment is pretty much as described and shown in the pictures. It is spacious with large windows and a balcony. It has amazing natural light and great ventilation. The apartment is simple and has all the necessities you may need while travelling. What I loved the most about it are the details in the art and decoration. It's definitely a cool apartment with a eccentric combination of modern details and classic French feel. It is perfect for people like me who are in the creative industries or a young couple visiting Paris. 

The location was perfect for my stay. It is in a cool and central area with lots of great restaurants and bars nearby. It's located at walking distance to Le Marais, Canal St Martin, Bastille and right next to the Republique square. The only downfall was walking up 5 floors since there is no elevator. Nevertheless, this is very typical of Parisian apartments and I must say that it kept me active. I actually enjoyed the extra exercise. 

I highly recommend this apartment. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and will probably be in touch with Nicolas for future bookings.
Appartement parfait pour un couple!
Parfait
Magnifique appartement  , hôte sympathique et disponible , a raccommoder fortement

The apartment was located in an extremely convenient location near two different metro lines, one immediately in front of the apartment. The place was very quiet, with a balcony overlooking a serene garden out back. Botanical gardens, Roland Garros, Bois Boulogne are all within easy walking distance. Several good restaurants and grocery stores nearby. I'd highly recommend for anyone who wants a relaxing stay in Paris

What a great stay. Super convenient metro station across the street. Small grocer across the street too, and a slasher one two blocks away. Cafes and restaurants abound. Place was spacious, style AH and comfortable. Balcony is delightful. Nespresso machine and milk foamer for coffee lovers. 9 minute walk to PSG stadium. Check-in was great. Everything 5- stars.

Fiora’s place looks just like the photos. Tastefully decorated and very clean. It is a few steps from the M9 metro station which will take you to some of Paris major attractions. The property manager, Nicolas was very responsive and helpful, answering our questions and providing suggestions. Overall, a great stay. Tres bien!

The best Airbnb during our trip in Europe! 

The apartment is exactly same as photos. It’s spacious and tastefully decorated in a very quite building. It’s has 2 balcony and a large living room combined with open kitchen. It has everything you need and really feel like home. 

The location is convenient, metro stop is right downstairs, about 7 stations away from the city center.

We highly recommend this place!

Our stay in Fiora’s appartement was super nice. The appartement was very, very clean, everything you need was in there. It’s also a very big appartment in comparison to Parisian standard appartments. The two balconies certainly add extra value to your stay as you can sit outside when you want to. The contact with her / her ‘concierge’ went super smooth and they are open for any questions. 

À recommander sans doute!

Beautiful interior, very quiet location which was a blessing after the sightseeing. All went well, checking/checkout. Bakery/Grocery just outside of the building. Metro access around the corner. Really nice and I would recommend it any time.
Lovely apartment in great location. Would highly recommend

We stayed at Fiora’s apartment for 7 nights. We loved the apartment and enjoyed our mornings on the balconies. The apartment is clean, cozy, warm, and has all needed appliances. Also, it is very practical since metro stations, bus station, grocery shops, bakeries, café shops are very close and in the same neighborhood. I highly recommend this apartment.
Perfect place to enjoy Paris

very good place to stay.
closed to station,mart,bakery.
Nice place to stay and a few steps to the metro ...

A nice and well located flat. However I was hoping it would look a bit more fresh / clean (as an example the sofa really needs a big clean). 
We didn't see the host as it s run by a management company and they do a very good job for check in and communication.

Fiora’s apartment is very close to metro stop, convenience stores and cafes. The apartment itself is very clean and cosy, with two lovely balconies. I really enjoyed staying at the balcony and watching all plants and pigeons. Highly recommended.
Fiora’s place is an absolute gem, I can’t recommend it highly enough. Perfection!
Five stars from start to finish.  Highly recommended
Really great location. Metro station in front of the house. Quite and safe neighborhood with many reastaurant and shops. Touristic places very close!
마레지구 등 파리 중심지에 위치하진 않았지만, 지하철이 정말 바로 앞에 위치해있기 때문에 여행에는 불편함이 없으며, 16지구라 그런지 확실히 숙소 근처는 매우 안전하다는 느낌을 받았습니다. 편하게 잘 이용했습니다.
Perfect!!!!
Gemütliche Wohnung. Gut gelegen. Direkt daneben gibt es eine Boulangerie, einen Supermarkt und die Metro Station.
Très bel appartement - idéalement situé - je recommande.
Our stay was fabulous! Amazing location, great local spots, awesome communication and overall cozy but perfect!

I rented apartment of Aline for a month initially and extended it for longer term since I was absolutely happy and satisfied with service, accuracy, cleanliness, location and hospitality of Aline. Location is impossible to beat. That’s the most prestigious and posh part of Paris, only few minutes walking from all the hot spots. To get to the Alexandre the Bridge it takes only few minutes on foot. There are all the amenities and facilities in place which makes the staying absolutely comfy for travelers. The windows overlook a serene lovely courtyard and atmosphere is very quite in apartment day and night time. 
Check in was as smooth as possible and I was helped with my luggage. Aline is always helpful and kind host. She provided me with a good discount for which I am so thankful to her. Bed is convenient to sleep for 2 people. I highly recommend this apartment to everyone and hope Aline will allow me to stay again in her place
Adorable place, located very close to the Eiffel Tower and metro :)
Such a great location! Would say if you need a place where you can see the most of the city that would definitely be it. Spacious and clean too!

Aline é uma excelente host, nos recebeu tarde da noite, deixou todas as informações anotadas em um caderno e foi muito simpática e atenciosa a todo momento. Nos ajudou em tudo o que foi possível, inclusive em relação ao checkout e saída. O espaço é muito acolhedor, possui uma excelente estrutura para banhos e fica extremamente bem localizado. Adoramos a experiência!
L appartement est extrêmement bien placé et très mignon. Bémol pour la literie : le lit est un simple matelas sur le sol donc peu confortable.
Merci pour l’interet que vous nous avez apporte

Aunque es un departamento pequeño es confortable y único, se compensa con los servicios que tiene, así como su excelente ubicación para ir desde la torre eiffel hasta el palacio de Versalles. La anfitriona muy amable, atenta y al pendiente en todo momento de que estés cómodo y tranquilo.
Lovely apartment, perfect location. Would stay again if I'm ever back in Paris

Sophie and Illias apartment is very comfortable and more spacious than the average Paris one.
It is located in a lively neighboorhood but with sound-proof windows, which is great.
Very clean, comfortable bed and sofa-bed, a little dark (but who will stay inside an apartment during the day if you are in París??), great shower...it has everything you need even for longer stays.
The relation price-quality was very good. Reccomended!
Parfait logement, bien placé, propre et très agréable, je recommande !

Un endroit magnifique, propre, clair, très chaleureux, 
Emplacement top
Sophia et Ilias ont été très agréables et réactifs dans leur réponse, merci beaucoup

Hôtes très réactifs par message, attentionnés, vous trouverez à votre arrivée un appartement spacieux et très propre ! La literie est très confortable. Je vous recommande cette adresse très bien placée, à proximité de nombreux restaurants/ bars et de la place de la Bastille !
Hôtes très réactifs et flexibles. Appartement très bien situé. Très satisfaites de notre séjour.

Appartement dans un quartier vivant et animé, très bien situé : le pied à terre idéal que nous recherchions pour notre séjour Parisien. Nous n'avons malheureusement pas rencontré Sophia et Illias mais leurs indications précises  et attentionnées nous ont permis de trouver sans encombre l'appartement. Merci encore pour votre gentillesse.
July’s place is so cozy and unique. Her personal touches make the apartment really feel like home!
We had a great time at July’s sunny and clean apartment in Paris. It was filled with beautiful plants and in a perfect location! Thank you for a lovely stay.

Julie's place was fantastic! Very open and tastefully decorated. Located near a major train line (RER B) making it very easy to get from the airport to the apartment (30 mins, no transfers). The area itself is very safe and has easy access to the city of Paris through multiple subway and bus lines. Paris itself is a very expensive city and I think this place was priced more than reasonable. Great for a solo traveler or couples. If given the chance, I'd book this place again!
Great and cosy place. Great host. Julie was available for all questions and tips. Nice and easy communication. Clean and warm. We had fantastic time in Paris and in Julie's palce. I reccommend it!
Уютная квартира, хорошее месторасположение. Башню видно из окна 👍🏻
L'appartement est super bien placé, très propre et très fonctionnel ! N'hésitez plus, réservez !!!

El departamento, si bien no es céntrico, está muy bien ubicado, a dos cuadras de Gare du Nord y Gare de l´Est. Es pequeño y muy limpio. Se dificulta cocinar ya que tiene pocos utensillos y puede utilizarse solo una hornalla de las dos disponibles. Debido a que la anfitriona vive usualmente en el departamento cuando no está alquilado no hay disponibles lugares de guardado. Nos parece bueno para una estadía corta por todas sus cualidades.
房子很不错，设施齐全，考虑周到，靠近车站，方便坐车，位置在一条小路里，比较安静。非常好

I cannot praise Mahaut enough. Our flight was delayed over 12 hours and she let us into the flat in the middle of the night on Christmas morning. I give her the highest review possible and plan on using her any time I travel to Paris!

This flat is in the perfect location. Plenty of restaurants and bakeries close. There are nice street markets close by. The flat has everything you need for a great stay. Thanks Mahaut for letting us stay.

Mahaut was a perfect host. She was flexible with checking in and met us outside her apartment. She even helped with our bags. Her apartment was perfect for us. The location was perfect. The Eiffel Tower is about a 5 min walk, the subway about 10 mins, plenty of places to eat and shop nearby. The neighborhood was nice. The apartment was just as shown in the descriptions and pics. It was very clean, cozy and a comfortable bed. I would definitely stay here again and I definitely recommend Mahaut as a host.

Staying in Mahaut's apt was a pleasure. It is ridiculously close to the Eiffel Tower (3min walk). Even with a last minute change of arrival time she was very accommodating and met us outside her place. Gave us some non-touristy restaurants to try. This place is a great value, super clean, nicely set up and exactly what we needed for our time in Paris.

After the reservation was confirmed, Mahaut was very easy to communicate with. 
Her apartment is cozy and the location is extremely easy access to anywhere you want to go in Paris. It is one minute walking distance to bus station, less than 10 minutes to Eiffel Tower and Metro station.
I definitely recommend her apartment to anyone who plan to have a lovely vacation in Paris on an affordable budget.

Mahaut was a perfect host! She was easily reachable by phone or message and gladly answered all of our questions. She very kindly left a brand new store bought set of towels for each of us, and some French goodies on the bed when we arrived. The flat was incredibly convenient to our tour office, the metro, and major site such as the Eiffel Tower! Our stay was perfect and we are so grateful for Mahaut. Highly recommended!
Very nice, wonderful apartment and in a great place. Host was very nice too! Would definitely recommend :)
Il miglior appartamento nella città più magica del mondo. Tour Eiffel a vista!!!! Spettacolare

We spent 2 weeks in Andreas apartment and it was perfect for us.  Bed is comfortable and it was nice to have extra linens and some coffee! Everything you might need is conveniently located near the apartment. Highly recommend if you want a comfy and quiet place to stay in Paris.

Stayed here primarily for work. Andrea has a very roomy apartment with fully renovated bathroom and shower,  and an excellent workspace. With a nice desk. Very convenient to the Bibliothèque Nationale.  Very good Italian restaurant, SPIGO, downstairs.

A good choice: convenient location, spacious apartment, responsive host. It was cold so we had the windows closed, but there was absolutely no noise from the street and with a little noise from the apartments above and around.
To keep in mind:
* the elevator is very small; not even as deep as the width of an airline seat. The stairs are good, all 56 steps.
* the entering and exiting the shower is tricky; a big step up with nothing to hold on to.

Unique and charming apartment in a vintage building. The lock to the apartment was quite quirky and we found very difficult to use. The master bedroom faced the interior windows of other apartments and there was accompanying noise very early in the morning which could be annoying if you are a light sleeper.

Spacious apartment in an authentic Hausmann building, in a neighborhood of authentic Hausmann buildings.  As the weather was often cold, the apartment was always warm and had plenty of hot water.  The neighborhood is lively, with plenty of restaurants and nightlife, but the Coulée Verte is a short block away so there is always a quiet place to walk during the day.  The Marché Beauvau, Marché Aligré and Rue de Aligré are just a few blocks North, so there are some wonderful things to find to eat and drink.   And the bakeries... they're are many in the neighborhood.  I'm unable to recommend one over another, because they all have something special, so browse around and find what you like, not only bread (such wonderful bread)  and pastries, but sandwiches, salads, quiche and more.
Step back in time and use your imagination…  Not wanting to be redundant, read the other reviews, as I found them to be accurate.

A nice, old apartment, in a beautiful, very clean building. The neighborhood is fantastic: public transport, restaurants, groceries stores.
  We didn't meet Andréa but she stayed in communication constantly and answered all our questions immediately. Her friend Jessica received us and was extremely helpful.
 I would have given a 5 stars review had it not been for the bathroom. It might be perfect for young people but not for seniors. To get in the shower, you had an 18 -inch step up with nothing to hold on to, and getting out of the shower was even more dangerous.

These accommodations are clean, comfortable, well decorated and lovely.  The host is wonderful.  Staying here was easy.  The neighborhood has lots to offer and easy access to the metro and taxis.   I was incredibly pleased with my experience.

Excellent place! Location was great, and the apartment looked better than in pictures. Living in this lovely apartment for a week made me feel like a local. Andrea was very helpful and her dad was lovely. We got recommendations on where to eat around the area and everything was great. Don’t hesitate to stay here. You won’t regret it! Thank you so much Andrea for everything! :)

Apartment is as described and very nicely decorated! 5 min from Gare de Lyon location is fabulous near the Coulée Verte, Aligre Market and great Paris gems like the Station F (la Felicita) or the Marais.  We stayed with a baby and our Yoyo stroller fitted perfectly in the tiny elevator :) Would love to stay again in future trips to Paris
This is a fantastic rental in Paris- comfortable, quiet and elegant. It is one of the best air b n b's I have stayed in around the world.

The flat is clean, spacious, and in a great location just blocks from Gare de Lyon, so trains, M1 and M14 are close to get around Paris and the south of France. The kitchen is fully equipped. The bedroom is quiet with ample closet space and a VERY comfortable bed! WiFi reception is best in the living room. Andrea responds to requests quickly and her parents were very helpful in Andrea’s absence. I’ve stayed in Paris 8 times…this flat is my favorite so far!

This was a wonderful place to stay--spacious, attractive, comfortable, clean, and quiet...and so close to public transport of all types.  Plus Andrea was a great host.  Quick responses from Andrea.
